compare: He said, "Yes, and then you will belong to our neighbors."

src: Und die ihnen keine Unterstützung gewähren, noch sich selbst helfen können?
ref: Who can neither help them, nor help themselves?
draft: And those who do not provide them with support, nor can help themselves?
hil: "And those who do not provide them with support, nor can help themselves?"
compare: And those who do not provide them with support, nor can help themselves?

src: Oder (gewahrtest du etwa nicht) denjenigen, der an einer Ortschaft vorbeiging, während die Stützen ihrer (Häuser) dem Erdboden gleichgemacht wurden?!
ref: Or take the man who passed by a town which lay destroyed upside down.
draft: Or (did you not notice) the one who passed by a village while its pillars were leveled to the ground?!
hil: Or such as he who passed by a city that was fallen down upon its turrets; he said, 'How shall God give life to this now it is dead?'
compare: Or (did you not notice) the one who passed by a village while its pillars were leveled to the ground?!

src: Dann entfernten sie sich.
ref: Then they turn away.
draft: Then they moved away.
hil: Then they moved away.
compare: Then they moved away.

src: Aber er blieb nicht lange aus. Er sagte: "Ich habe (an Wissen) erfaßt, was du nicht erfaßt hast.
ref: But he was not long in coming, and reported: "I have been around where you have not been.
draft: But he did not stay away long. He said: "I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped."
hil: But he did not stay away long. He said: 'I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped.'
compare: But he did not stay away long. He said: "I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped."

src: Es wird für sie keine Speise geben außer aus trockenen Dornen,
ref: They will have no food except bitter thorn,
draft: There will be no food for them except for dry thorns.
hil: There will be no food for them except for dry thorns.
compare: There will be no food for them except for dry thorns.

src: Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: If you do not have the means, then surely God is forgiving and kind.
draft: And if you are not able, then surely Allah is forgiving, merciful.
hil: If you are unable, then certainly Allah is forgiving, merciful.
compare: And if you are not able, then surely Allah is forgiving, merciful.

src: Aber nein, die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: Nay, but the most of them have no knowledge.
draft: But no, most of them don't know.
hil: Nay, but most of them know not.
compare: But no, most of them don't know.

src: Und die ihre Scham bewahren,
ref: Who guard their sex
draft: And those who preserve their shame.
hil: And those who preserve their modesty,
compare: And those who preserve their modesty,

src: Ibrahim!
ref: "O Ibrahim (Abraham)!
draft: Ibrahim!
hil: Ibrahim!
compare: Ibrahim!

src: Gehen sie jedoch weg, so ist es kein Vergehen für euch, wenn sie zu ihrem Besten über sich selbst verfügen.
ref: But if they leave (of their own accord), you will not be blamed for what they do with themselves in their own rights.
draft: However, if they go away, it is no offense for you if they dispose of themselves for their good.
hil: However, if they go away, it is not an offense for you if they dispose of themselves for their good.
compare: However, if they go away, it is not an offense for you if they dispose of themselves for their good.

src: Was hinderte dich daran, nachdem du gesehen hattest, daß sie irregingen,
ref: What stopped you when you saw them going astray;
draft: What prevented you from [doing something] after you had seen that they went astray?
hil: And what prevented you from taking action to steer them back to the right path after you had seen that they had gone astray?
compare: And what prevented you from taking action to steer them back to the right path after you had seen that they had gone astray?

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran.
ref: When We said to you: "Verily your Lord circumscribes mankind," and showed you the vision and the accursed tree of the Qur'an, it was as a bone of contention for men.
draft: And (remember) when WE said to you: "Indeed, your LORD will destroy the people." And WE made the vision that We showed you and the cursed tree in the Quran only a trial for the people.
hil: Remember when WE said to you: "Indeed, your LORD will destroy the people." And WE made the dream vision that we showed you only as a trial for the people, just like the cursed tree in the Quran.
compare: And (remember) when WE said to you: "Indeed, your LORD will destroy the people." And WE made the vision that We showed you and the cursed tree in the Quran only a trial for the people.

src: Also was ist mit denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sie kommen zu dir eilend
ref: What is the matter with unbelievers that they stare at you with fixed gazes and hasten towards you
draft: So what about those who have practiced disbelief, they come to you hastening.
hil: So what about those who have committed disbelief, they come to you hastening.
compare: So what about those who have practiced disbelief, they come to you hastening.

src: Hast du etwa nicht diejenigen gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde, sie erkaufen sich das Irregehen und wollen, daß auch ihr irregeht?!
ref: Have you not seen the people who were given a share of the Book, but who purchased only error, and wish that you also go astray?
draft: Did you not see those to whom a part of the scripture was given? They buy error and want you to stray from the right path.
hil: Have you not seen those to whom a part of the scripture was given? They purchase error and desire that you should also stray [from the right path].
compare: Did you not see those to whom a part of the scripture was given? They buy error and want you to stray from the right path.

src: Und wenn dann unsere Boten zu ihnen kommen, um sie abzuberufen, sagen sie: «Wo sind diejenigen, die ihr anstelle Gottes anzurufen pflegtet?»
ref: Until, when Our envoys come to them, to take their souls away, they will say, “Where are they whom you used to pray to besides God?”
draft: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to invoke besides Allah?"
hil: And when our messengers come to take them away, they say, 'Where are those whom you used to invoke instead of Allah?'
compare: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to invoke besides Allah?"

src: Bist du denn gegen meinen Befehl ungehorsam gewesen?»
ref: Did you not disobey my command?" (And Moses pulled him by the hair).
draft: Have you been disobedient against my orders?
hil: Have you been disobedient against my orders?
compare: Have you been disobedient against my orders?

src: Es läßt nichts aus, ob klein oder groß, sondern hält alles aufgezeichnet."
ref: They will find in it whatsoever they had done.
draft: "It leaves nothing out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded."
hil: It does not leave anything out, small or large, but records everything.
compare: "It leaves nothing out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded."

src: Sie sagten: "Wenn er stiehlt, so stahl bereits sein Bruder vor ihm." Yusuf behielt es jedoch bei sich und offenbarte es ihnen nicht, er sagte (bei sich): "Ihr seid sicherlich niedriger in der Stellung.
ref: They [(Yusuf's (Joseph) brothers] said: "If he steals, there was a brother of his [Yusuf (Joseph)] who did steal before (him)." But these things did Yusuf (Joseph) keep in himself, revealing not the secrets to them.
draft: They said: "If he steals, his brother has already stolen before him." However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You are certainly lower in position."
hil: They said, 'If he steals, his brother has already stolen before him.' However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them. He said to himself, 'You are certainly lower in rank.'
compare: They said, 'If he steals, his brother has already stolen before him.' However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them. He said to himself, 'You are certainly lower in rank.'

src: Hat nicht Derjenige, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Ja doch! Und Er ist der Allerschaffer und Allwissende.
ref: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
draft: Doesn't He who created the heavens and the earth also have the power to create the like of them? Yes indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.
hil: Doesn't He who created the heavens and the earth also have the power to create the like of them? Yes indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.
compare: Doesn't He who created the heavens and the earth also have the power to create the like of them? Yes indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.

src: Sie sagen: «Unser Herr, unser Unglück hat uns besiegt, und wir waren abgeirrte Leute.
ref: They will say: "O Lord, our misery overwhelmed us, so we remained a people astray.
draft: They say, "Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us and we were misguided people."
hil: They say, "Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us and we were misguided people."
compare: They say, "Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us and we were misguided people."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God.
draft: You who have internalized the faith! Do not precede Allah and His Messenger and act according to Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not precede Allah and His Messenger and act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah!
compare: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not precede Allah and His Messenger and act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah!

src: Darum wende dich von ihnen ab und sprich: "Frieden!" Und bald werden sie es wissen.
ref: Therefore excuse them and proclaim, “Peace”; for they will soon come to know.
draft: Therefore turn away from them and say, "Peace!" And soon they will know.
hil: Therefore turn away from them and say, 'Peace!' And soon they will know.
compare: Therefore turn away from them and say, "Peace!" And soon they will know.

src: ER sagte: "Fürchtet euch beide nicht! Gewiß, ICH bin mit euch beiden, ICH höre und sehe.
ref: He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”
draft: He said, "Do not be afraid, both of you! Indeed, I am with both of you, I hear and see."
hil: "He said, 'Fear not, for I am with you both. Verily, I hear and see.'"
compare: "He said, 'Fear not, for I am with you both. Verily, I hear and see.'"

src: Sag: "Soll ich euch in Kenntnis setzen über schlimmere Vergeltung als für dies, (was ihr uns verübelt), bei ALLAH?: Es ist (die Vergeltung für) denjenigen, wen ALLAH verflucht, über den ER zürnt und aus denen ER Affen, Schweine und Taghut-Anbeter machte." Diese haben die niedrigere Stellung und sind vom rechten Weg noch mehr verirrt.
ref: Say, “Shall I tell you of those who are in a worse position than this, in Allah’s sight? It is those whom Allah has cursed and has wreaked His wrath upon and turned some of them into apes and swine, and worshippers of the devil; theirs is a worse destination and they have wandered further astray from the Straight Path.”
draft: Say, "Should I tell you about a worse retribution than this, (which you have blamed us for), from Allah? It is (the retribution for) those whom Allah has cursed, upon whom He has wrath, and of whom He has made apes, pigs, and idolaters." They are in a worse position and have strayed further from the right path.
hil: Say, 'Shall I tell you about a worse retribution than this, (which you have blamed us for), from Allah? It is (the retribution for) those whom Allah has cursed, upon whom He has wrath, and of whom He has made apes, pigs, and idolaters.' They are in a lower position and have strayed even further from the right path.
compare: Say, 'Shall I tell you about a worse retribution than this, (which you have blamed us for), from Allah? It is (the retribution for) those whom Allah has cursed, upon whom He has wrath, and of whom He has made apes, pigs, and idolaters.' They are in a lower position and have strayed even further from the right path.

src: Nun belohnt sie Gott für das, was sie gesagt haben mit Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen.
ref: God will reward them for saying so with gardens where streams flow by, where they will live for ever.
draft: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will abide forever.
hil: God now rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will abide forever.
compare: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will abide forever.

src: Und das Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für dich als das Diesseits.
ref: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
draft: And the afterlife is truly better for you than this life.
hil: Verily, the Hereafter is better for you than the present life.
compare: And the afterlife is truly better for you than this life.

src: Sei nun geduldig. Das Versprechen Gottes ist wahr.
ref: So have thou patience; verily the promise of Allah is true.
draft: Be patient now. God's promise is true.
hil: Be patient now. Indeed, God's promise is true.
compare: Be patient now. God's promise is true.

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing by, and excellent mansions in the garden of Eden.
draft: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and into pleasant dwellings within the gardens of Eden.
hil: "Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and into pleasant dwellings within the gardens of Eden."
compare: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and into pleasant dwellings within the gardens of Eden.

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann einen Jungen trafen, er ihn tötete.
ref: The two went on till they came to a boy, whom he killed.
draft: Then they both continued until, when they met a boy, he killed him.
hil: Then they both continued until, when they met a boy, he killed him.
compare: Then they both continued until, when they met a boy, he killed him.

src: Und sooft eine Sura herabgesandt wird, schauen sie einander an (und sagen): "Sieht euch jemand?" Dann wenden sie sich ab. Allah hat ihre Herzen abgewendet, weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: And whenever a chapter is sent down, one of them looks at the other; “Is there someone watching you?” – and then they turn away; Allah has inverted their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
draft: And whenever a sura is sent down they look at each other (saying): "Does anyone see you?" Then they turn away. Allah shall turn away their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
hil: And whenever a sura is sent down, they look at each other (saying): 'Does anyone see you?' Then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are people who do not understand.
compare: And whenever a sura is sent down, they look at each other (saying): 'Does anyone see you?' Then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are people who do not understand.

src: Ob Wir dich einen Teil dessen, was Wir ihnen androhen, sehen lassen oder dich abberufen, zu Uns wird ihre Rückkehr sein. Dann ist Gott Zeuge über das, was sie tun.
ref: Whether We show you some of the promise (of punishment in wait) for them, or take you to Ourself, their returning is to Us in the end; and God is a witness to all they do.
draft: Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with, or We take you back, to Us is their return. Then Allah is witness to what they do.
hil: Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with, or take you back, to Us is their return. Then God is witness to what they do.
compare: Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with, or take you back, to Us is their return. Then God is witness to what they do.

src: Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie kein Kind hat.
ref: And he inherits from her if she leaves no children.
draft: And he inherits from her if she has no child.
hil: He inherits from her if she has no child.
compare: And he inherits from her if she has no child.

src: Denken sie nicht über den Quran nach?!
ref: Do they not ponder on what the Qur'an says?
draft: Do they not reflect on the Quran?!
hil: Do they not ponder on what the Quran says? Or have their hearts been sealed with locks?
compare: Do they not reflect on the Quran?!

src: Und wenn sie das Sinnlose hören, wenden sie sich davon ab und sagen: "Uns gehören unsere Handlungen und euch gehören eure Handlungen, Salam sei mit euch!
ref: When they hear idle talk they turn aside and say: "To us our actions, to you yours.
draft: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say, "Our deeds belong to us and your deeds belong to you. Peace be upon you!"
hil: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say, 'Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you. Peace be upon you!'}
compare: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say, "Our deeds belong to us and your deeds belong to you. Peace be upon you!"

src: Dennoch wollen sie dir mit denjenigen, die es außer Ihm geben soll, Furcht einflößen. Und wen Allah in die Irre gehen läßt, der hat niemanden, der ihn rechtleitet.
ref: They frighten you with others apart from Him, although he whom Allah lets go astray, none can guide him to the Right Way.
draft: Nevertheless, they want to instill fear in you with those who are supposed to exist besides him. And whoever Allah lets go astray, there is no one to guide him.
hil: "Nevertheless, they want to instill fear in you with those who are supposed to exist besides Him. And whoever Allah leads astray, has no one to guide him."
compare: Nevertheless, they want to instill fear in you with those who are supposed to exist besides him. And whoever Allah lets go astray, there is no one to guide him.

src: Auch die Sterne sind durch seinen Befehl dienstbar gemacht worden.
ref: The stars are subjected by His Command.
draft: "The stars too have been made obedient through his command."
hil: "The stars too have been made obedient through his command."
compare: "The stars too have been made obedient through his command."

src: ICH werde euch Meine Ayat zeigen, so fordert keine Eile von Mir.
ref: We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).
draft: "I will show you My Signs, so do not demand haste from Me."
hil: I will show you My Signs, so do not demand haste from Me.
compare: "I will show you My Signs, so do not demand haste from Me."

src: Und zu Ihm werdet ihr zurückgebracht.
ref: And to Him will you be brought back in the end.
draft: And to Him you will be returned.
hil: And to Him you shall be brought back.
compare: And to Him you will be returned.

src: Sag: "Es wird mir nur alsWahy zuteil, daß euer Gott nur ein einziger Gott ist.
ref: Say: "This is what has been revealed to me: 'Your God is one and only God.'
draft: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your God is the only one God."
hil: Say, 'It is revealed to me only through revelation that your God is one and only one God.'
compare: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your God is the only one God."

src: ER sagte: "Adam! Teile ihnen deren Namen mit!" Und nachdem er ihnen deren Namen mitgeteilt hatte, sagte ER: "Sagte ICH euch etwa nicht, daß ICH das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde kenne, und daß ICH das kenne, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr zu verheimlichen pflegtet?!"
ref: He said, ‘O Adam, inform them of their names,’ and when he had informed them of their names, He said, ‘Did I not tell you that I know the Unseen of the heavens and the earth, and that I know whatever you disclose and whatever you conceal?’
draft: He said, "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he told them their names, he said, "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you have been concealing?!"
hil: He said, "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had informed them of their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you have been concealing?!"
compare: He said, "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had informed them of their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you have been concealing?!"

src: Und wenn ihr eure Riten beendet habt, dann gedenket Gottes, wie ihr eurer Väter (früher) gedacht habt oder mit noch innigerem Gedenken. Unter den Menschen gibt es welche, die sagen: «Unser Herr, beschenke uns im Diesseits.»
ref: So when you have completed your Hajj rites, remember Allah as you used to remember your forefathers, in fact more than that; and among the people are some that say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when you have finished your rites, remember God as you have remembered your fathers (previously) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among people are those who say: "Our Lord, grant us good in this world."
hil: And when you have completed your rites, remember God as you have remembered your fathers (previously) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among people are those who say: "Our Lord, grant us good in this world."
compare: And when you have finished your rites, remember God as you have remembered your fathers (previously) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among people are those who say: "Our Lord, grant us good in this world."

src: So vergelten Wir den Übeltätern.
ref: That is how We requite the transgressors:
draft: So we repay the wrongdoers.
hil: This is how we repay the wrong-doers.
compare: This is how we repay the wrong-doers.

src: Darum fürchtet Allah, ihr Verständigen, auf daß ihr erfolgreich sein möget.
ref: So fear God, O men of wisdom; you may haply find success.
draft: Therefore, fear Allah, you who have understanding, so that you may be successful.
hil: Therefore, fear Allah, you who have understanding, so that you may be successful.
compare: Therefore, fear Allah, you who have understanding, so that you may be successful.

src: Friede sei auf euch!
ref: Peace be to you.
draft: Peace be upon you!
hil: Peace be upon you!
compare: Peace be upon you!

src: Sag: Allah hat die Wahrheit gesprochen. So folgt dem Glaubensbekenntnis Ibrahims, (als) Anhänger des rechten Glaubens, und er gehörte nicht zu den Götzendienern.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Allah is truthful; so follow the religion of Ibrahim, who was free from all falsehood; and he was not of the polytheists.”
draft: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Abraham, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not among the idolaters.
hil: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Abraham, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not among the idolaters.
compare: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Abraham, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not among the idolaters.

src: Sag: "Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam die Wahrheit zu euch von eurem HERRN. Wer also der Rechtleitung folgt, der folgt der Rechtleitung nur für seinen eigenen Nutzen. Wer jedoch irregeht, der geht nur irre zu seinem eigenen Schaden. Und ich bin kein Wakil über euch."
ref: Say: "O men, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so he who follows the right path does so for himself, and he who goes astray errs against himself, and I am not a guardian over you.
draft: Say: "O mankind! The truth has come to you from your Lord, so whoever accepts guidance, it is only for his own self; and whoever goes astray only does so to his own detriment. And I am not a guardian over you."
hil: Say: O mankind! The truth has already come to you from your Lord. Whoever follows guidance, only follows it for his own benefit. And whoever goes astray, he goes astray only to his own loss. And I am not a custodian over you.
compare: Say: "O mankind! The truth has come to you from your Lord, so whoever accepts guidance, it is only for his own self; and whoever goes astray only does so to his own detriment. And I am not a guardian over you."

src: Hierauf rufe sie. Sie werden eilends zu dir kommen.
ref: Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them; then call them - they will come [flying] to you in haste.
draft: Then she calls. They will come to you quickly.
hil: Then she calls. They will come to you quickly.
compare: Then she calls. They will come to you quickly.

src: Haben denn die Gläubigen nicht den Versuch (, daran zu zweifeln,) aufgegeben, daß, wenn Allah gewollt hätte, Er sicher der ganzen Menschheit hätte den Weg weisen können?
ref: Have the believers not learnt that if God had so willed He could have guided all mankind?
draft: Have the believers not given up the attempt to doubt that if Allah had willed, He could have surely shown the entire humanity the way?
hil: And have not the believers given up trying to doubt that if Allah had willed, He could have surely shown the entire humanity the way?
compare: And have not the believers given up trying to doubt that if Allah had willed, He could have surely shown the entire humanity the way?

src: Und (damit) Er die Heuchler und Heuchlerinnen und die Götzendiener und Götzendienerinnen strafe, die von Allah die böse Erwartung hegen.
ref: And that He may chastise the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women and the associaters and the associatresses, the thinkers of evil thought concerning Allah.
draft: And (so that) He punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters who have evil expectations of Allah.
hil: And (so that) He punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters who have evil expectations of Allah.
compare: And (so that) He punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters who have evil expectations of Allah.

src: Dann rief er in den Finsternissen: "Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir!
ref: Glory be to Thee!
draft: Then he called out in the darkness: "There is no God but You!
hil: He called out in the darkness, 'There is no God but You!'
compare: He called out in the darkness, 'There is no God but You!'

src: Ihr haltet sie (beide Zeugen) nach dem rituellen Gebet auf, dann schwören sie bei ALLAH - falls ihr Zweifel hegen solltet -: "Wir erkaufen uns damit nichts Geringfügiges, selbst dann nicht, wenn derjenige, (für den wir Zeugnis ablegen), ein Verwandter ist, und wir verbergen nicht das von ALLAH gebotene Zeugnis, sonst gehören wir doch zu den Verfehlenden."
ref: Detain them after the service of prayer, and if you doubt their word make them swear by God that: "We shall not take a bribe even though it be offered by a near relative, nor hide the testimony of God, for then we shall surely be sinful."
draft: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer and then they swear by ALLAH - in case you might have doubts - "We don't buy anything insignificant with that, not even if the person (we're bearing witness for) is a relative, and we don't hide the testimony commanded by ALLAH, otherwise we will be among the sinners."
hil: After the ritual prayer, detain them, the two witnesses, then they swear by ALLAH - in case you harbor doubts -: "We obtain nothing trivial by doing so, not even when the one (for whom we bear witness) is a relative, and we do not conceal the testimony commanded by ALLAH, otherwise we will belong to the sinners."
compare: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer and then they swear by ALLAH - in case you might have doubts - "We don't buy anything insignificant with that, not even if the person (we're bearing witness for) is a relative, and we don't hide the testimony commanded by ALLAH, otherwise we will be among the sinners."

src: Dann sagten sie: "Etwa einem einzigen Menschen von uns folgen wir?
ref: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us?
draft: Then they said: "Do we follow only one person among us?"
hil: Then they said, “Do we follow only one of us?”
compare: Then they said: "Do we follow only one person among us?"

src: Und gedenke deines HERRN viel und lobpreise Ihn zu Sonnenuntergang und zu Sonnenaufgang!"
ref: And mention thy Lord oft, and give glory at evening and dawn.'
draft: "And remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and sunrise!"
hil: Remember your Lord abundantly and praise Him at sunset and sunrise!
compare: "And remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and sunrise!"

src: Wenn ihn Gutes trifft, so ist er damit zufrieden; trifft ihn aber eine Prüfung, dann kehrt er zu seinem (früheren) Weg zurück.
ref: When something good comes his way, he is content with it. But when an ordeal strikes him, he makes a turnaround.
draft: If good things happen to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he faces a challenge, he returns to his (former) path.
hil: "If good befalls him, he is content with it; but if hardship afflicts him, he turns back to his former (ways)."
compare: If good things happen to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he faces a challenge, he returns to his (former) path.

src: Dann ängstigte sich insgeheim, Musa.
ref: And Moses felt afraid within himself.
draft: Then Musa secretly became afraid.
hil: Then Musa secretly became afraid.
compare: Then Musa secretly became afraid.

src: Hast Du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel niedersendet und es als Quellen in die Erde dringen läßt und dadurch Gewächs hervorbringt, das mannigfaltig an Farben ist?
ref: Beholdest thou not that Allah sendeth down water from the heaven, and causeth it to enter springs in the earth, and thereafter produceth thereby corn various coloured.
draft: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky and causes it to penetrate into the ground as springs, and thereby produces crops that are diverse in colors?
hil: Have you not seen that Allah sent down water from the sky and caused it to penetrate into the earth as springs, and thereby produced crops of diverse colors?
compare: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky and causes it to penetrate into the ground as springs, and thereby produces crops that are diverse in colors?

src: Laß uns herausbringen, damit wir gottgefällig Gutes tun, anderes als das, das wir zu tun pflegten." Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?!
ref: Extricate us, so that we may do good deeds, the opposite of what we used to do”; (It will be said to them) “And did We not give you an age long enough, in which anyone who wants to understand would have understood?
draft: Let us find out so that we can do good that is pleasing to God, unlike what we used to do. Did we not grant you a long life during which one could remember, if one wanted to remember?!
hil: Let us find out so that we can do good that is pleasing to God, unlike what we used to do. Did we not grant you a long life during which one could remember, if one wanted to remember?!
compare: Let us find out so that we can do good that is pleasing to God, unlike what we used to do. Did we not grant you a long life during which one could remember, if one wanted to remember?!

src: O die ihr glaubt, wer von euch sich von seiner Religion abkehrt -, so wird Allah Leute bringen, die Er liebt und die Ihn lieben, bescheiden gegenüber den Gläubigen, mächtig (auftretend) gegenüber den Ungläubigen, und die sich auf Allahs Weg abmühen und nicht den Tadel des Tadlers fürchten. Das ist Allahs Huld, die Er gewährt, wem Er will. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: O you who believe! whoever from among you turns back from his religion, then Allah will bring a people, He shall love them and they shall love Him, lowly before the believers, mighty against the unbelievers, they shall strive hard in Allah's way and shall not fear the censure of any censurer; this is Allah's Face, He gives it to whom He pleases, and Allah is Ample-giving, Knowing.
draft: O you who believe, whoever among you turns away from his religion, Allah will bring a people He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, mighty against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
hil: O you who believe, whoever among you turns away from his religion, Allah will bring a people He loves and who love Him, humble towards the believers, mighty against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and All-Knowing.
compare: O you who believe, whoever among you turns away from his religion, Allah will bring a people He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, mighty against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.

src: Und wenn Wellen wie überschattende Hüllen sie überdecken, rufen sie zu Gott, wobei sie Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion sind. Wenn Er sie ans Land errettet, zeigen nur einige von ihnen einen maßvollen Wandel.
ref: And when the waves cover them like shadows they call upon God, making their religion sincerely His; but when He has delivered them to the land, some of them are lukewarm.
draft: And if waves cover them like overwhelming shadows, they call to God, while they are sincere towards Him in religion. When He rescues them to the shore, only some of them show a moderate behavior.
hil: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God, being sincere to Him in religion. When He rescues them to the shore, only some of them show a moderate conduct.
compare: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God, being sincere to Him in religion. When He rescues them to the shore, only some of them show a moderate conduct.

src: Wäre dies ein demnächst verfügbarer Profit mit einer Reise von mittlerer Entfernung gewesen, wären sie dir gewiß gefolgt.
ref: Were it a gain at hand or a short journey, they would have surely followed you, but the distance seemed too far to them.
draft: If this had been a profit available soon with a journey of medium distance, they would certainly have followed you.
hil: If this had been a profit available soon with a journey of medium distance, they would certainly have followed you.
compare: If this had been a profit available soon with a journey of medium distance, they would certainly have followed you.

src: Von Zaqqum-Bäumen essen
ref: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,
draft: Eating from Zaqqum trees.
hil: Eat from the trees of Zaqqum.
compare: Eating from Zaqqum trees.

src: Allah aber ist der Schutzherr der Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And Allah is the Friend of the God-fearing.
draft: Allah, however, is the protector of the pious.
hil: However, Allah is the protector of the pious.
compare: Allah, however, is the protector of the pious.

src: Folge dem, was dir an Wahy von deinem HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Follow what was revealed to you from your Lord.
draft: Follow what has been revealed to you by your LORD.
hil: Follow what has been revealed to you by your Lord.
compare: Follow what has been revealed to you by your LORD.

src: (Ist es) etwa einer, der im Glanz aufgezogen wird und nicht beredt im Wortstreit ist?
ref: Can one who has been raised on ornaments and cannot present her case coolly in a dispute (be associated with God?)
draft: Is it someone who is brought up in glory and is not eloquent in an argument?
hil: Is it one who is brought up in glory but is not eloquent in a debate?
compare: Is it someone who is brought up in glory and is not eloquent in an argument?

src: Keiner außer Allah kann sie abwenden.
ref: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
draft: No one except Allah can turn them away.
hil: No one except Allah can deflect them.
compare: No one except Allah can turn them away.

src: Wenn sie sich abkehren, so befinden sie sich in Widerstreit.
ref: But if they turn away, then they are in schism.
draft: If they turn away, they are in conflict.
hil: If they turn away, they are in conflict. Allah will suffice thee against them.
compare: If they turn away, they are in conflict.

src: Er ist es, Der euch erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created you.
draft: He is the one who created you.
hil: It is the one who created you.
compare: He is the one who created you.

src: Und wisset, daß Allah dessen gewahr ist, was in euren Seelen ist.
ref: Know that God knows what is in your hearts.
draft: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
hil: And know that God is aware of what is in your souls.
compare: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.

src: Das Feuer darin ist mit Brennstoff,
ref: Full of fire fed by faggots,
draft: The fire inside is fueled.
hil: The fire inside is fueled.
compare: The fire inside is fueled.

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so liebt Allah die Ungläubigen nicht.
ref: But if they turn their backs, God loves not the unbelievers.
draft: However, if they turn away, Allah does not love the disbelievers.
hil: However, Allah does not love the disbelievers if they turn away.
compare: However, Allah does not love the disbelievers if they turn away.

src: Sag (in Meinem Namen): "Meine Diener, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!"
ref: Tell them: "O my creatures who have come to belief, have fear of displeasing your Lord.
draft: Say (in My name), "O My servants who have embraced faith! Fear your Lord in all matters. For those who do good deeds in this world shall receive a good reward. And spacious shall be Allah's earth. Verily, the patience in adversity is most becoming."
hil: Say (in My name), "O you who believe, act with Taqwa towards Allah, those who have internalized Iman."
compare: Say (in My name), "O you who believe, act with Taqwa towards Allah, those who have internalized Iman."

src: Doch die, denen Kenntnis und Glauben verliehen wurden, sagen: "lhr habt wahrlich gemäß dem Buche Allahs bis zum Tage der Auferstehung (im Grabe) geweilt.
ref: But those endowed with knowledge and faith will say, “You remained in God’s Book until the Day of Resurrection.
draft: But those who have been given knowledge and faith say: "Indeed, you have remained according to the Book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."
hil: Those who have been granted knowledge and faith say, "Indeed, you have truly followed the book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."
compare: Those who have been granted knowledge and faith say, "Indeed, you have truly followed the book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen). Und wir entsandten dich für die Menschen als Gesandten. Und ALLAH genügt als Bezeugender.
ref: Whatever good reaches you, O listeners, is from Allah, and whatever ill reaches you is from yourselves; and We have sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a Noble Messenger towards all mankind; and Allah is Sufficient, as a Witness.
draft: What hit you of good is from Allah, and what hit you of calamity is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.
hil: What came to you of good is from Allah, and what came to you of hardship is due to your own actions. And We have sent you as a Messenger to mankind. And Allah is sufficient as a Witness.
compare: What hit you of good is from Allah, and what hit you of calamity is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.

src: Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: Do not put (yourselves) forward before Allah and His Messenger (SAW), and fear Allah.
draft: Do not precede Allah and His Messenger and act with Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: Do not put yourselves ahead of Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah. Indeed, Allah is All-Hearing and All-Knowing.
compare: Do not put yourselves ahead of Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah. Indeed, Allah is All-Hearing and All-Knowing.

src: Doch Allah gehört die Macht, und auch Seinem Gesandten und den Gläubigen.
ref: In truth, all honour belongs to Allah, and to His Messenger, and to the believers.
draft: But Allah owns the power, and also His Messenger and the believers.
hil: But Allah possesses power, as do His messenger and the believers.
compare: But Allah owns the power, and also His Messenger and the believers.

src: Laßt sie auf Allahs Erde weiden und fügt ihr nichts Böses zu, sonst überkommt euch eine baldige Strafe."
ref: So leave her alone to graze on God's earth, and do not molest her, otherwise the swiftest punishment would befall you."
draft: "Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will come upon you."
hil: Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will come upon you.
compare: Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will come upon you.

src: Sind es aber zwei (Schwestern), dann erhalten sie zwei Drittel von seiner Erbschaft.
ref: In ease he has two sisters then they will get two-thirds of the heritage.
draft: But if they are two (sisters), then they receive two thirds of his inheritance.
hil: But if they are two (sisters), then they receive two thirds of his inheritance.
compare: But if they are two (sisters), then they receive two thirds of his inheritance.

src: Vergib uns unsere Verfehlungen und unsere Übertretungen in unseren Angelegenheiten, mache uns standhaft und stehe uns bei gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: Forgive us our sins and the excesses committed during our efforts, and keep our feet steady, and bestow us help over the disbelievers.”
draft: Please forgive us our faults and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the unbelieving people!
hil: Forgive us our faults and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the unbelieving people!
compare: Forgive us our faults and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the unbelieving people!

src: Sag: Wenn Allah wollte, würde ich ihn euch nicht verlesen, und Er würde euch nicht davon Kenntnis geben. Ich habe doch vordem ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: Say, ‘Had Allah [so] wished, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I have dwelled among you for a lifetime before it.
draft: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you. I had lived among you for a lifetime before.
hil: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you. I had lived among you for a lifetime before.
compare: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you. I had lived among you for a lifetime before.

src: Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt keinen stolzen Eingebildeten.
ref: Do not walk around puffed-up with pride; God does not love arrogant and boastful people.
draft: And do not walk on the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.
hil: And do not walk exultantly on the earth. Surely, Allah does not love the proud and boastful.
compare: And do not walk exultantly on the earth. Surely, Allah does not love the proud and boastful.

src: Daß ihr (sogar) die Gräber besucht.
ref: Till you reach the grave.
draft: That you (even) visit the graves.
hil: That you (even) visit the graves.
compare: That you (even) visit the graves.

src: ALLAH leitet nicht diejenigen Menschen recht, die Unrecht begehen.
ref: And Allah guides not those people who are the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).
draft: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoings.
hil: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoings.
compare: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoings.

src: Er sagte: "Bringt ihr mir die frohe Kunde ungeachtet dessen, daß ich vom Alter getroffen bin?
ref: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me.
draft: He said, "Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I am struck by age?"
hil: He said, "Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I am struck by age?"
compare: He said, "Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I am struck by age?"

src: Und warne die Menschen vor dem Tag, an dem die Strafe über sie kommen wird.
ref: Warn the people of that Day when the punishment would be inflicted upon them.
draft: And warn the people about the day when the punishment will come upon them.
hil: And warn mankind of the day when the chastisement will come upon them.
compare: And warn mankind of the day when the chastisement will come upon them.

src: Tauscht er dann aber nach der bösen Tat etwas Gutes ein, dann bin Ich voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: But if he substitutes good in place of evil, I am Most Forgiving, Most Compassionate.
draft: If he then exchanges something good after the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.
hil: If he then exchanges something good after the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.
compare: If he then exchanges something good after the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.

src: ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH weiß, was ihr nicht wißt."
ref: And God said: "I know what you do not know."
draft: He said: "Certainly, I know what you don't know."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I know what you don't know.'
compare: He said: "Certainly, I know what you don't know."

src: Aber Allah läßt im richtigen Maß herabkommen, was Er will.
ref: So He gives according to measure as He will.
draft: But Allah sends down in the right measure what He wills.
hil: But Allah sends down in the right measure what He wills.
compare: But Allah sends down in the right measure what He wills.

src: O Yusuf, wende dich ab von dieser Sache, und du (, o Frau), bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde.
ref: “O Yusuf! Disregard this – and O woman!
draft: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, O woman), ask forgiveness for your sin.
hil: "O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, O woman), ask forgiveness for your sin."
compare: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, O woman), ask forgiveness for your sin.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der die Schrift wahrheitsgemäß hinabsandte sowie Almizan. Und was läßt dich wissen?! Vielleicht liegt die Stunde doch nahe.
ref: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Scales of Justice; and what do you know – possibly the Last Day could really be near!
draft: ALLAH is the One who sent down the Scripture truthfully, as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.
hil: ALLAH is the One who sent down the Scripture truthfully, as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.
compare: ALLAH is the One who sent down the Scripture truthfully, as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.

src: Das ist - sie sollen es kosten - heißes Wasser und stinkender Eiter
ref: There will be boiling water for them and cold, clammy, fetid drink to taste,
draft: That is - they should taste it - hot water and stinking pus.
hil: "That is - they should taste it - hot water and stinking pus."
compare: "That is - they should taste it - hot water and stinking pus."

src: Dies, weil ihre Gesandten immer wieder zu ihnen mit den klaren Beweisen kamen, sie aber sagten: "Sollen (etwa) menschliche Wesen uns rechtleiten?" So wurden sie ungläubig und kehrten sich ab.
ref: That is because, when their Messengers came to them with clear proofs they said: 'Shall humans be our guides' They disbelieved and turned away, but Allah was not in need (of them).
draft: This is because their messengers came to them with clear proofs, but they said: "Should human beings guide us?" So they disbelieved and turned away.
hil: This is because their messengers came to them with clear proofs, but they said: "Should human beings guide us?" So they disbelieved and turned away.
compare: This is because their messengers came to them with clear proofs, but they said: "Should human beings guide us?" So they disbelieved and turned away.

src: Vielleicht werdet ihr (Allah) fürchten.
ref: It is expected that this will produce piety in you.
draft: Maybe you (Allah) will be feared.
hil: Maybe you will fear (Allah).
compare: Maybe you will fear (Allah).

src: Gewiß, wer ALLAH gegenüber Schirk betreibt, dem hat ALLAH bereits die Dschanna für haram erklärt und sein Aufenthaltsort ist das Feuer." Und für die Unrecht-Begehenden gibt es keine Helfer.
ref: Whosoever associates a compeer with God, will have Paradise denied to him by God, and his abode shall be Hell; and the sinners will have none to help them.
draft: Certainly, whoever commits shirk against Allah, Allah has already declared paradise haram for him and his place of residence is the Fire." And for those who commit injustice, there are no helpers.
hil: Indeed, whoever associates partners with Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise forbidden for him and his abode is the Fire. And for those who commit wrongdoing there are no helpers.
compare: Indeed, whoever associates partners with Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise forbidden for him and his abode is the Fire. And for those who commit wrongdoing there are no helpers.

src: Diejenigen, die Enthaltsamkeit von ihren Frauen beschwören, sollen vier Monate warten.
ref: Those who vow abstinence from their wives must wait for four months.
draft: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.
hil: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.
compare: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.

src: Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: But you forbear and overlook till God fulfil His plan; and God has power over all things.
draft: But forgive and be indulgent until Allah issues His judgment. Verily, Allah has power over all things.
hil: Forgive and be patient until Allah passes His judgement. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.
compare: Forgive and be patient until Allah passes His judgement. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.

src: An jenem Tag habt ihr keinen Zufluchtsort und keine Möglichkeit, (irgend etwas) abzustreiten.
ref: You will have no place of refuge then nor time for denying.
draft: On that day, you will have no refuge and no way to deny (anything).
hil: On that day, you will have no refuge and no way to deny (anything).
compare: On that day, you will have no refuge and no way to deny (anything).

src: Diejenigen, die sie anrufen, trachten nach einem Mittel zu ihrem Herrn (und wetteifern), wer von ihnen (Ihm) am nächsten sei, und hoffen auf Seine Barmherzigkeit und fürchten Seine Strafe.
ref: Those they invoke themselves seek the way to their Lord, (striving) which one of them shall be nearest (to Him); and hope for His grace, and dread His punishment.
draft: Those who call upon them seek a means to their Lord (and compete), who of them is closest to Him, and hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.
hil: Tell those who call upon Him, that they seek a means of access to their Lord (and compete), that who among them is closest to Him, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.
compare: Tell those who call upon Him, that they seek a means of access to their Lord (and compete), that who among them is closest to Him, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.

src: Dein Herr ist wahrlich voll Huld gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten von ihnen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: Verily your Lord is gracious to men, though most men are ungrateful.
draft: "Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful."
hil: Have you not looked at those who, out of fear of death, went out of their homes in thousands? God spoke to them, 'Die.' Then He made them alive again. God is full of grace towards human beings. But most people are not grateful.
compare: "Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful."

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin bleiben sie ewig.
ref: They are the inmates of Hell, where they will abide for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of fire. They remain therein forever.
hil: And these are the companions of fire. They will remain therein forever.
compare: And these are the companions of fire. They remain therein forever.

src: Gewiß, mit denjenigen, die ihre Religion spalteten und zu Lagern geworden sind, hast du nichts gemein.
ref: As for those who have created schisms in their order, and formed different sects, you have no concern with them.
draft: Surely, you have nothing in common with those who have split their religion and become factions.
hil: Surely, you have nothing in common with those who have split their religion and become factions.
compare: Surely, you have nothing in common with those who have split their religion and become factions.

src: Für diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurde dann Kleidung aus Feuer gefertigt.
ref: But they who disbelieve will be fitted out with garments of flames.
draft: For those who committed kufr, clothing was then made from fire.
hil: For those who have committed kufr, clothing was then made of fire.
compare: For those who have committed kufr, clothing was then made of fire.

src: Also werden jene, die gläubig sind und gute Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: Then those who had come to believe and done the right will be in gardens of delight.
draft: So those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Bliss.
hil: Those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Bliss.
compare: So those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Bliss.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch vieles von dem zu enthüllen, was ihr von der Schrift verborgen habt, und vieles unenthüllt zu lassen. Bereits kam doch zu euch von ALLAH Licht und deutliche Schrift!
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you a lot of the things which you had hidden in the Book, and forgiving a lot of them; indeed towards you has come a light* from Allah, and a clear Book. (* The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah).
draft: Our Messenger has already come to you to reveal much of what you have been concealing from the Scripture, and to overlook much. Indeed, a clear revelation from Allah has come to you.
hil: O people of the book! Our Apostle has already come to you revealing much of what you concealed in the book and passing over much. Indeed, a clear book and light from Allah has already come to you.
compare: O people of the book! Our Apostle has already come to you revealing much of what you concealed in the book and passing over much. Indeed, a clear book and light from Allah has already come to you.

src: Und dem Zeugen und dem, was bezeugt ist!
ref: And the witness and the witnessed,
draft: And the witness and what is testified to!
hil: And to the witness and to what is testified!
compare: And the witness and what is testified to!

src: Und wenn Allah es gewollt hätte, hätte Er euch in Bedrängnis gebracht. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allmächtig, Allweise.
ref: And had Allah so willed, He could have harassed you; verily Allah is Mighty, Wise.
draft: And if Allah had willed, He would have put you in distress. Truly, Allah is Almighty, Wise.
hil: Had Allah willed it, He could have put you in distress. Truly, Allah is All-Powerful, All-Wise.
compare: And if Allah had willed, He would have put you in distress. Truly, Allah is Almighty, Wise.

src: Eine Rechtleitung und Barmherzigkeit für die Rechtschaffenen,
ref: And a guidance and grace for those who do good,
draft: A guidance and mercy for the righteous.
hil: Guidance and mercy for the righteous.
compare: A guidance and mercy for the righteous.

src: Sie empfinden insgeheim Reue, wenn sie die Pein sehen. Und zwischen ihnen wird in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: And they shall conceal remorse when they behold the torment, and the matter will be decreed between them in equity, and they shall not be wronged.
draft: They feel secret remorse when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them, and no wrong is done to them.
hil: They secretly feel remorse when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them in a fair manner, and no injustice is done to them.
compare: They secretly feel remorse when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them in a fair manner, and no injustice is done to them.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erdichtet oder das Wahre ableugnet, nachdem es zu ihm gekommen war! Gibt es etwa nicht in Dschahannam eine Bleibe für die Kafir?!
ref: And who is a greater wrong-doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth the truth when it cometh unto him Will there not be in the Hell an abiding-place for the infidels?
draft: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him! Isn't there a dwelling place in Jahannam for the Kafir?!
hil: No one commits more injustice than one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him. Is there not a dwelling place in Jahannam for the Kafir?
compare: No one commits more injustice than one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him. Is there not a dwelling place in Jahannam for the Kafir?

src: Du warst nicht auf der westlichen Seite', als Wir Musa die Angelegenheit auftrugen, und du warst nicht zugegen.
ref: You were not there on the western side (of Mount Sinai) when We gave the commandments to Moses, nor were you witness (to the event).
draft: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."
hil: You were not on the western side when We entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present.
compare: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."

src: Und werdet ihr nun Muslime werden?!
ref: (And say:) "Will you now submit?"
draft: And will you now become Muslims?!
hil: And will you now become Muslims?
compare: And will you now become Muslims?!

src: Bäche werden unter ihnen in den Gärten der Wonne fließen.
ref: At their feet shall flow streams of running water in gardens of delight.
draft: Brooks will flow among them in the gardens of pleasure.
hil: Brooks will flow among them in the gardens of bliss.
compare: Brooks will flow among them in the gardens of bliss.

src: Und ihr pflegtet euch nicht so zu verdecken, daß nicht euer Gehör, eure Augen und eure Häute Zeugnis wegen euch ablegten. Aber ihr meintet, daß Gott nicht viel wisse von dem, was ihr tut.
ref: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.
draft: And you did not cover yourselves in such a way that your ears, your eyes, and your skins testified against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.
hil: You used to not cover yourselves in a way that your ears, eyes, and skins wouldn't testify against you. But you thought that God didn't know much about what you were doing.
compare: And you did not cover yourselves in such a way that your ears, your eyes, and your skins testified against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird.
ref: Those without faith among the people of the Book, and those who worship idols, do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.
draft: Those among the People of the Book and the polytheists who do not believe do not like that anything good should be revealed to you from your Lord.
hil: Those among the People of the Book and the polytheists who do not believe do not like that anything good should be revealed to you from your Lord.
compare: Those among the People of the Book and the polytheists who do not believe do not like that anything good should be revealed to you from your Lord.

src: Damit beleben Wir eine abgestorbene Ortschaft. Auf diese Weise werdet auch ihr hervorgebracht werden.
ref: Then We revive a dead land therewith, and even so you will be brought forth (from the dead),
draft: We are reviving a dead village. In this way, you will also be brought forth.
hil: Thus do We bring to life a dead village, and thus shall you be brought forth as well.
compare: Thus do We bring to life a dead village, and thus shall you be brought forth as well.

src: Hierauf wird eure Rückkehr zu eurem Herrn sein.
ref: No one shall bear another's burden.
draft: Your return to your Lord will be after this.
hil: Your return to your Lord will be after this.
compare: Your return to your Lord will be after this.

src: Jede Gemeinschaft hat einen Gesandten. Wenn nun ihr Gesandter kommt, wird zwischen ihnen in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und es wird ihnen kein Unrecht zugefügt.
ref: For every people there is an apostle; and when their apostle is come the matter is decided between them equitably, and no one is wronged.
draft: Every community has an envoy. If their envoy now comes, a just decision will be made between them and no injustice will be done to them.
hil: Every community has an envoy. If their envoy now comes, a just decision will be made between them and no injustice will be done to them.
compare: Every community has an envoy. If their envoy now comes, a just decision will be made between them and no injustice will be done to them.

src: Und ihm dann die Herzader durchschnitten,
ref: Then cut off his aorta,
draft: And then they cut through his heart vein.
hil: "God" then had his heart vein slit.
compare: And then they cut through his heart vein.

src: Sie waren beide in der Höhle, und er sagte zu seinem Gefährten: «Sei nicht traurig. Gott ist mit uns.»
ref: When both of them were in the cave, he said to his companion: "Do not grieve, for God is with us."
draft: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion: "Don't be sad. God is with us."
hil: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion: 'Do not be sad. God is with us.'
compare: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion: "Don't be sad. God is with us."

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: And Allah will never give respite to any soul when its promise arrives; and Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: But Allah does not postpone a soul when its time has come. And Allah is all-aware of what you do.
hil: But Allah does not postpone any soul when its time has come, and Allah is all-knowing of what you do.
compare: But Allah does not postpone any soul when its time has come, and Allah is all-knowing of what you do.

src: Dann sagte ich: "Bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung! Gewiß, ER ist immer allvergebend,
ref: “I therefore told them, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord; He is indeed Most Forgiving.’
draft: Then I said: "Ask your LORD for forgiveness! Indeed, HE is always forgiving.
hil: Then I said, 'Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Indeed, HE is always forgiving.'
compare: Then I said: "Ask your LORD for forgiveness! Indeed, HE is always forgiving.

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt. Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.
draft: But Allah has kept you safe. Indeed, He knows what is within the hearts.
hil: But Allah has kept you safe. Indeed, He knows what is within the hearts.
compare: But Allah has kept you safe. Indeed, He knows what is within the hearts.

src: Und gedenke deines Herrn in deinem Herzen in Demut und Furcht, ohne laut vernehmbare Worte am Morgen und am Abend; und sei nicht einer der Unachtsamen.
ref: Meditate on your Lord inwardly with humility and trepidation, reciting His Book softly, morning and evening, and be not negligent.
draft: And remember your Lord within yourself with humility and in awe, without speaking aloud, in the morning and the evening, and be not among the heedless.
hil: And remember your Lord within yourself with humility and in awe, without speaking aloud, in the morning and the evening, and be not among the heedless.
compare: And remember your Lord within yourself with humility and in awe, without speaking aloud, in the morning and the evening, and be not among the heedless.

src: Und von wo du auch herkommst, wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der heiligen Moschee.
ref: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque.
draft: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Holy Mosque.
hil: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque; and indeed it is the truth from your Lord; and Allah is not unaware of your deeds.
compare: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque; and indeed it is the truth from your Lord; and Allah is not unaware of your deeds.

src: Darin sollen sie verweilen auf ewig und immerdar.
ref: He has prepared for them Gardens under which rivers flow (Paradise), to dwell therein forever.
draft: They should abide therein forever and ever.
hil: They shall abide therein forever and ever.
compare: They should abide therein forever and ever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht machte, damit ihr euch darin ausruht, sowie den Tag hell. Gewiß, ALLAH hat bestimmt den Menschen Gunst erwiesen. Doch die meisten Menschen erweisen sich nicht dankbar.
ref: It is Allah Who created night for you so that you may gain rest in it, and the day giving sight; indeed Allah is Most Munificent towards mankind, but most people do not give thanks.
draft: ALLAH is the One who made for you the night so that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Surely ALLAH has been gracious to you. Yet most people do not give thanks.
hil: ALLAH is the One who made for you the night so that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Surely ALLAH has been gracious to you. Yet most people do not give thanks.
compare: ALLAH is the One who made for you the night so that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Surely ALLAH has been gracious to you. Yet most people do not give thanks.

src: Gleich wohlverwahrten Perlen.
ref: Like pearls within their shells,
draft: Equally well-protected pearls.
hil: Like well-protected pearls.
compare: Like well-protected pearls.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist.
ref: The secrets of the hearts of these people are well known to God.
draft: These are the ones of whom God knows what is in their hearts.
hil: These are those of whom God knows what is in their hearts.
compare: These are those of whom God knows what is in their hearts.

src: Darin erfaßt sie keine Mühsal, und sie werden nicht daraus vertrieben.
ref: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.
draft: Therein they feel no hardship, and they are not driven away from it.
hil: Therefore, they feel no hardship therein and they are not driven away from it.
compare: Therefore, they feel no hardship therein and they are not driven away from it.

src: Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: He is all-forgiving and all-merciful.
draft: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Und sag: "Ich hoffe, daß mein HERR mich zu einer besseren Führung als dieses rechtleitet.
ref: Say, "I hope that my Lord will provide me better guidance."
draft: And say: "I hope that my LORD will guide me to a better guidance than this."
hil: And say: "I hope that my LORD will guide me to a better guidance than this."
compare: And say: "I hope that my LORD will guide me to a better guidance than this."

src: Allah aber verspricht euch Vergebung von Sich aus und Huld. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: But God promises His pardon and grace, for God is bounteous and all-knowing.
draft: Allah, however, promises you forgiveness from himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
hil: However, Allah promises you forgiveness from Himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
compare: However, Allah promises you forgiveness from Himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.

src: Als Lebensunterhalt für die Diener. Und Wir haben damit abgestorbene Ortschaften wieder belebt. So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: As sustenance for the bondmen; and with it We revived a dead city; this is how you will be raised.
draft: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have thus revived dead villages.
hil: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have thereby revived dead villages. This is also how emergence occurs.
compare: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have thereby revived dead villages. This is also how emergence occurs.

src: Was gibt es denn anstelle der Wahrheit außer dem Irregehen?!
ref: What then is there after the truth but error?
draft: What is there instead of the truth other than going astray?!
hil: What is there besides going astray instead of the truth?!
compare: What is there instead of the truth other than going astray?!

src: Und verfertige das Schiff vor Unseren Augen und nach Unserer Eingebung. Und sprich Mich nicht an zugunsten derer, die Unrecht getan haben; sie werden ertränkt werden."
ref: “And build the ship in front of Us, and by Our command, and do not speak to Me regarding the unjust; they will surely be drowned.”
draft: And manufacture the ship before Our eyes and according to Our inspiration. And do not address Me in favor of those who have done wrong; they shall be drowned."
hil: And make the ship before Our eyes and according to Our inspiration. And do not address Me in favor of those who have done wrong; they shall be drowned.
compare: And manufacture the ship before Our eyes and according to Our inspiration. And do not address Me in favor of those who have done wrong; they shall be drowned."

src: Diejenigen aber, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, entscheiden ohne jede Grundlage.
ref: But those they call apart from Him can not adjudge in the least.
draft: But those who call upon them in his place decide without any basis.
hil: Those, however, who call upon them in his place, decide without any basis.
compare: But those who call upon them in his place decide without any basis.

src: Da sagte er zu seinem Gefährten, während er mit ihm einen Wortwechsel führte: "Ich habe mehr Besitz als du und auch eine mächtigere Schar."
ref: Arguing one day with his friend he said: "I have more wealth than you and more powerful kinsmen."
draft: Then he said to his companion while having a conversation with him, "I have more possessions than you and also a more powerful troop."
hil: He said to his companion during a discussion, "I have more possessions and also a more powerful troop than you."
compare: Then he said to his companion while having a conversation with him, "I have more possessions than you and also a more powerful troop."

src: Aber Allah hebt auf, was der Satan dazwischenwirft. Hierauf legt Allah Seine Zeichen eindeutig fest.
ref: But God nullifies what Satan interjects, and God affirms His revelations.
draft: But Allah voids whatever the devil casts [in the way of evil suggestions] - then Allah makes His messages clear:
hil: But Allah voids whatever the devil casts [in the way of evil suggestions] - then Allah makes His messages clear.
compare: But Allah voids whatever the devil casts [in the way of evil suggestions] - then Allah makes His messages clear:

src: Er sagte: "O mein Volk, was meint ihr, wenn ich mich auf einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn stütze und Er mir eine Barmherzigkeit von Sich hat zukommen lassen, die aber eurem Blick entzogen wurde, sollen wir sie euch da aufzwingen, wo sie euch zuwider ist?
ref: He said: "O my people, think. If I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has bestowed on me His grace, though unknown to you, can we force it upon you when you are averse?
draft: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear evidence from my Lord and He has bestowed upon me a mercy from Himself, but it has been obscured from your view, should we then compel you to accept it, when it is repugnant to you?
hil: He said,"O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear evidence from my Lord and He has bestowed upon me a mercy from Himself, but it has been obscured from your view, should we then compel you to accept it, when it is repugnant to you?"
compare: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear evidence from my Lord and He has bestowed upon me a mercy from Himself, but it has been obscured from your view, should we then compel you to accept it, when it is repugnant to you?

src: Er sagte: "Allah bewahre mich davor, einer der Unwissenden zu sein."
ref: And he said: "God forbid that I be of the ignorant."
draft: He said, "Allah preserve me from being one of the ignorant."
hil: He said, 'Allah save me from being one of the ignorant.'
compare: He said, "Allah preserve me from being one of the ignorant."

src: Ich bin doch nur ein Ermahner und ein Überbringer froher Botschaft für Leute, die den Iman verinnerlichen."
ref: I am only a bearer of warnings and bringer of happy news for those who believe."
draft: I am just a warning giver and a bringer of good news for people who internalize the imam.
hil: I am just a warner and a bringer of glad tidings for people who internalize the faith.
compare: I am just a warner and a bringer of glad tidings for people who internalize the faith.

src: damit er weiß, ob sie wohl die Botschaften ihres Herrn ausgerichtet haben, und daß Er das, was bei ihnen ist, umfaßt, und Er die Zahl von allem erfaßt'.
ref: So that He may know if they have delivered their Lord's messages. He comprehends all that has been given them, and keeps count of everything.
draft: So that he knows whether they have properly conveyed the messages of their Lord and that He encompasses whatever is with them and takes account of everything.
hil: So that he knows whether they have properly conveyed the messages of their Lord and that He encompasses whatever is with them and takes account of everything.
compare: So that he knows whether they have properly conveyed the messages of their Lord and that He encompasses whatever is with them and takes account of everything.

src: Sag: "Mein HERR weiß besser Bescheid über denjenigen, der mit der Rechtleitung kam, und über denjenigen, der in einem klaren Fehlgehen ist.
ref: Say: "My Lord knows who has come to guidance, and who is clearly in error."
draft: Say, "My Lord knows better about the one who came with guidance, and the one who is in clear deviation."
hil: Say, 'My Lord knows better about the one who came with guidance, and the one who is in clear deviation.'
compare: Say, "My Lord knows better about the one who came with guidance, and the one who is in clear deviation."

src: Und rezitiere das, was dir als Wahy von der Schrift deines HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.
draft: And recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord as a revelation.
hil: And recite what has been revealed to you from the Book of your Lord as a revelation.
compare: And recite what has been revealed to you from the Book of your Lord as a revelation.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Übertretenden.
ref: O believers, forbid not such good things as God has permitted you; and transgress not; God loves not transgressors.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal for you, and do not transgress! Surely, ALLAH does not love the transgressors.
hil: You who have internalized the imam! Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what Allah has declared halal for you, and do not transgress! Surely, Allah does not love the transgressors.
compare: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal for you, and do not transgress! Surely, ALLAH does not love the transgressors.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Der die Engel zu Gesandten gemacht hat mit Flügeln, (je) zwei, drei und vier! Er fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was Er will. Gewiß, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: All praise is to Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth, Who assigns angels as messengers – who have pairs of two, three, four wings; He increases in creation whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: All praise be to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers having wings, two, three and four. He adds to His creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is Able to do all things.
hil: All praise be to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers having wings, two, three, and four. He adds to His creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is Able to do all things.
compare: All praise be to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers having wings, two, three and four. He adds to His creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is Able to do all things.

src: Allein nur diejenigen lassen sich warnen, die verständig sind.
ref: Only they think who are wise."
draft: Only those who are sensible can be warned.
hil: Only the sensible can be warned.
compare: Only those who are sensible can be warned.

src: Aber die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
