src: Diejenigen von den Kindern Israils, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurden aus dem Munde von Dawud und von 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam verflucht. Dies war wegen dem, was sie sich widersetzt haben, und dem, was sie zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Cursed were disbelievers among the children of Israel by David and Jesus, son of Mary, because they rebelled and transgressed the bounds.
draft: Those of the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouth of David and Jesus son of Mary. This was because of what they had defied and what they used to transgress.
hil: Those of the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouth of David and Jesus son of Mary. This was because of what they had defied and what they used to transgress.
compare: Those of the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouth of David and Jesus son of Mary. This was because of what they had defied and what they used to transgress.

src: Und ALLAH macht gewiß kenntlich diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, und ER macht gewiß kenntlich die Munafiq.
ref: God will surely know the believers and know the hypocrites.
draft: And Allah certainly distinguishes those who have internalized faith, and He certainly distinguishes the hypocrites.
hil: And Allah certainly distinguishes those who have internalized faith, and He certainly distinguishes the hypocrites.
compare: And Allah certainly distinguishes those who have internalized faith, and He certainly distinguishes the hypocrites.

src: Aber wir werden dir ganz gewiß Zauberei gleicher Art bringen. So setze zwischen uns und dir eine Verabredung(szeit) fest, die weder wir noch du verfehlen werden, an einem Ort, der (uns allen) gleichermaßen recht ist."
ref: “So we will also produce before you a similar magic, therefore set up an agreed time between us and you, from which neither we nor you shall turn away, at a level place.”
draft: "But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So set a time and place for us and for you that neither we nor you will miss, at a place that is equally convenient for us all."
hil: "But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So let us set a date and time for a meeting between us and you that neither we nor you will miss, at a place that is equally convenient for all of us."
compare: "But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So set a time and place for us and for you that neither we nor you will miss, at a place that is equally convenient for us all."

src: Bitte für uns um die Vergebung unserer Verfehlungen, denn wir waren gewiß Verfehlende."
ref: Seek forgiveness for our sins, for we were indeed guilty.”
draft: "Please pray for the forgiveness of our shortcomings, because we were certainly offenders."
hil: Please pray for the forgiveness of our transgressions, for we were certainly transgressors.
compare: "Please pray for the forgiveness of our shortcomings, because we were certainly offenders."

src: Dann werden sie bereuen, was sie in ihren Herzen verbargen.
ref: Then will they be repentant of what they had concealed in their hearts.
draft: Then they will regret what they concealed in their hearts.
hil: Then they will regret what they concealed in their hearts.
compare: Then they will regret what they concealed in their hearts.

src: Emporgehoben und rein gehalten,
ref: Exalted and holy,
draft: Lifted up and held in.
hil: Raised up and kept pure,
compare: Lifted up and held in.

src: ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He supports whomever He wills.
draft: He helps to victory whoever he wants.
hil: He grants victory to whom He wills.
compare: He grants victory to whom He wills.

src: Unser HERR! Ich ließ von meiner Nachkommenschaft in einem unfruchtbaren Tal nieder - bei Deinem Muharram-Haus, unser HERR! - damit sie das rituelle Gebet ordnungsgemäß verrichten.
ref: I have settled some of my children, O Lord, in a barren valley near Your sacred House, so that, O our Lord, they may be constant in devotion.
draft: "Our Lord! I let my offspring settle in a barren valley - near Your Muharram house, our Lord! - so that they can perform the ritual prayer properly."
hil: Our Lord! I let my offspring dwell in a barren valley near Thy Muharram house, our Lord, so that they may perform the ritual prayer properly.
compare: Our Lord! I let my offspring dwell in a barren valley near Thy Muharram house, our Lord, so that they may perform the ritual prayer properly.

src: Und WIR gaben 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam, die Wunderzeichen und unterstützten ihn mit Ruhhul-qudus.
ref: And We gave 'Iesa (Jesus), the son of Maryam (Mary), clear signs and supported him with Ruh-ul-Qudus [Jibrael (Gabriel)].
draft: And WE gave Isa Ibnu-Maryam the miracles and supported him with Ruhhul-qudus.
hil: And WE gave 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam miracles and supported him with Ruhhul-qudus.
compare: And WE gave Isa Ibnu-Maryam the miracles and supported him with Ruhhul-qudus.

src: Sie haben doch das, was darin steht, erforscht.
ref: And they have read this in it.
draft: You have researched what is written in it.
hil: They have researched what is written in it.
compare: You have researched what is written in it.

src: Als ihr es mit euren Zungen übernahmt und ihr mit eurem Mund das ausspracht, wovon ihr keine Kenntnis hattet, da hieltet ihr es für eine geringe Sache, während es vor Allah eine große war.
ref: When you talked about it and said what you did not know, and took it lightly -- though in the sight of God it was serious --
draft: When you took it on your tongues and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, and considered it to be a little thing, while with Allah it was very great.
hil: When you took it on your tongues and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, and considered it to be a small matter, while in the sight of Allah it was great.
compare: When you took it on your tongues and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, and considered it to be a little thing, while with Allah it was very great.

src: Am Tage, wenn die Heuchler und die Heuchlerinnen zu den Gläubigen sagen werden: "Wartet auf uns!
ref: On the Day when the hypocrites men and women will say to the believers: "Wait for us!
draft: On the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to those who believe: "Wait for us!
hil: On the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to those who believe: 'Wait for us!'
compare: On the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to those who believe: "Wait for us!

src: (Es wird ihnen) wie den Leuten Pharaos und denen (ergehen), die vor ihnen waren: Sie hielten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für eine Lüge, darum ließen Wir sie zugrunde gehen um ihrer Sünden willen, und Wir ertränkten die Leute Pharaos; sie alle waren Frevler.
ref: This was the case with the people of Pharaoh and those before them, who rejected the signs of their Lord and were destroyed for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh as they were oppressors.
draft: "They (will be) no different from the people of Pharaoh and those who were before them: They denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh; they were all wrongdoers."
hil: They (will be) no different from the people of Pharaoh and those who were before them: They denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh; they were all wrongdoers.
compare: "They (will be) no different from the people of Pharaoh and those who were before them: They denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh; they were all wrongdoers."

src: Und sie freuen sich dabei über das, was Gott ihnen von seiner Huld zukommen ließ.
ref: Exulting in that which Allah hath vouchsafed them of His grace.
draft: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of His grace.
hil: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of His grace.
compare: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of His grace.

src: Sag: "Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, ich handle auch.
ref: Tell them: "O my people, go on acting on your part, I am acting on mine.
draft: Say: "My people! Act according to your positions, I will act accordingly."
hil: Say: "My people! Act according to your positions, I will act accordingly."
compare: Say: "My people! Act according to your positions, I will act accordingly."

src: Genügt es ihnen denn nicht, daß Wir das Buch auf dich hinabgesandt haben, das ihnen verlesen wird?
ref: Is it not sufficient for them that We have revealed the Book to you which is read out to them?
draft: Is it not enough for you that We have sent down to you the Book which is recited to them?
hil: Is it not enough for you that We have sent down to you the Book which is recited to them?
compare: Is it not enough for you that We have sent down to you the Book which is recited to them?

src: Und hätte ALLAH ihnen die Deportation nicht bestimmt, hätte ER sie doch im Diesseits gepeinigt.
ref: Had God not decreed exile for them, He would have punished them in this life.
draft: And if ALLAH had not destined them for deportation, He would have surely punished them in this life.
hil: "And had Allah not destined their deportation, He would have surely afflicted them in this life."
compare: "And had Allah not destined their deportation, He would have surely afflicted them in this life."

src: Ihm gehören die Schönsten Namen.
ref: His are all the names beautiful.
draft: "He owns the most beautiful names."
hil: To Him belong the most beautiful names.
compare: To Him belong the most beautiful names.

src: Und es gibt nichts, was kleiner ist als dies oder größer, das nicht in einem deutlichen Buch stünde.
ref: Not what is less than that or what is greater than that but is (written) in a Clear Record. (Tafsir At-Tabari.
draft: And there is nothing that is smaller or bigger than this that is not written in a clear book.
hil: There is nothing smaller or larger than this which is not stated in a clear book.
compare: And there is nothing that is smaller or bigger than this that is not written in a clear book.

src: Wer aber jetzt horcht, der findet, daß eine Sternschnuppe auf ihn lauert.
ref: But he who listeneth now findeth a flame in wait for him;
draft: But whoever listens now finds that a shooting star is lurking for him.
hil: But whoever listens now finds that a shooting star is lurking for him.
compare: But whoever listens now finds that a shooting star is lurking for him.

src: Dann wird ihre Heimstätte die Hölle sein - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: What a miserable resort.
draft: Then their home will be hell - what a terrible place!
hil: Then their abode will be Hell - what an evil destination!
compare: Then their abode will be Hell - what an evil destination!

src: Einem jeden von ihnen wird zuteil, was er an Schuld erworben hat.
ref: Each person among them bears his share in the sin.
draft: Each of them will receive what they have earned in guilt.
hil: Each one of them will receive what he has earned in guilt.
compare: Each one of them will receive what he has earned in guilt.

src: "Am Tag, wenn sie im Feuer der Fitna unterzogen werden."
ref: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,
draft: "On the day they are subjected to the fire of fitna."
hil: And on the day they are subjected to the fire of fitna.
compare: "On the day they are subjected to the fire of fitna."

src: Und dem Berg Sinai,
ref: The Mount Sinai,
draft: "And Mount Sinai,"
hil: And (to) Mount Sinai,
compare: "And Mount Sinai,"

src: Sprich: "Allah weiß am besten wie lange sie verweilten." Ihm gehören das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde. Wie sehend ist Er! Und wie hörend! Sie haben keinen Helfer außer Ihm, und Er teilt Seine Befehlsgewalt mit keinem.
ref: Say, “Allah well knows how long they stayed; for Him only are the hidden of the heavens and the earth; how well He sees and hears! They do not have any supporter besides Him; and He does not associate anyone in His command.”
draft: Speak: "Allah knows best how long they stayed." To Him belongs the concealment of the heavens and the earth. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper besides Him, and He shares His authority with none.
hil: Say, 'Allah knows best how long they stayed.' To Him belongs the concealment of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper besides Him, and He shares His authority with none.
compare: Say, 'Allah knows best how long they stayed.' To Him belongs the concealment of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper besides Him, and He shares His authority with none.

src: So rächten Wir uns an ihnen.
ref: So We punished them too.
draft: So we took revenge on them.
hil: Thus did we take revenge on them.
compare: So we took revenge on them.

src: "Dies ist so, weil ihr ungläubig bliebt, als Allah allein angerufen wurde; doch als Ihm Götter zur Seite gesetzt wurden, da glaubtet ihr.
ref: This has come upon you because when God alone was invoked you disbelieved; but when partners were associated with Him, you believed.
draft: "This is so because you remained unbelievers when Allah was called upon alone, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed."
hil: This is so because you remained unbelievers when Allah was called upon alone, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed.
compare: "This is so because you remained unbelievers when Allah was called upon alone, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed."

src: Und Wir werden euch ganz gewiß mit ein wenig Furcht und Hunger und Mangel an Besitz, Seelen und Früchten prüfen.
ref: We will certainly test you with some fear and hunger, and some loss of possessions and lives and crops.
draft: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and a shortage of wealth, souls, and fruits.
hil: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and the shortage of wealth, souls, and fruits.
compare: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and the shortage of wealth, souls, and fruits.

src: Und zwischen uns und euch sind Feindschaft und Haß auf immer sichtbar geworden, bis ihr an Gott allein glaubt.»
ref: Enmity and hatred has surfaced between us and you, forever, until you believe in God alone.”
draft: "And enmity and hatred have become visible forever between us and you, until you believe in God alone."
hil: And between us and you enmity and hatred have become visible forever, until you believe in God alone.
compare: "And enmity and hatred have become visible forever between us and you, until you believe in God alone."

src: Und was wäre dabei, wenn sie den Iman an ALLAH und an den Jüngsten Tag verinnerlicht und vom Rizq gegeben hätten, das ALLAH ihnen gewährte?! Und ALLAH ist immer über sie allwissend.
ref: What have they (to fear) if they believe in Allah and the Last Day and spend (aright) of that which Allah hath bestowed upon them, when Allah is ever Aware of them (and all they do)?
draft: And what would be wrong if they internalized the iman in Allah and the Last Day, and had given from the Rizq which Allah granted them?! And Allah is always all-knowing about them.
hil: And what harm would it do if they internalized the iman in Allah and the Last Day and gave from the Rizq which Allah granted them?! And Allah is always all-knowing about them.
compare: And what would be wrong if they internalized the iman in Allah and the Last Day, and had given from the Rizq which Allah granted them?! And Allah is always all-knowing about them.

src: ICH will von ihnen keinerlei Rizq, und ICH will nicht, daß sie Mich speisen.
ref: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.
draft: I do not want any provision from them, and I do not want them to feed Me.
hil: I do not desire any provision from them, nor do I desire that they should feed me.
compare: I do not desire any provision from them, nor do I desire that they should feed me.

src: Wahrhaftig!
ref: By your life!
draft: Truly!
hil: Truly!
compare: Truly!

src: Mein Besitz hat mir nichts genützt.
ref: Of no use was even my wealth.
draft: My possession has not been of any use to me.
hil: My possessions have been of no use to me.
compare: My possessions have been of no use to me.

src: Sie (, die anderen,) sagten: "O Musa, gewiß werden wir es niemals betreten, solange sie darin sind.
ref: They said: "O Moses, we shall never, never enter so long as they are there.
draft: They (the others) said: "O Moses, we will certainly not enter it as long as they are in it."
hil: They (the others) said, 'O Moses, we will certainly not enter it as long as they are in it.'
compare: They (the others) said, 'O Moses, we will certainly not enter it as long as they are in it.'

src: Und du siehst die Schiffe es durchspalten, damit ihr nach etwas von seiner Huld strebt und auf daß ihr dankbar werdet.
ref: And thou seest therein ships cleaving the water, that ye may seek of His graCe, and that haply ye may give thanks.
draft: And you see the ships splitting it, so that you strive for something of his grace and so that you become grateful.
hil: And you can see the ships splitting it so that you may strive for something of His grace, and so that you may be grateful.
compare: And you can see the ships splitting it so that you may strive for something of His grace, and so that you may be grateful.

src: Oder wer ist anstelle des Erbarmers derjenige, der euch eine Heerschar wäre, die euch unterstützen könnte?
ref: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman?
draft: Or who, besides the Merciful, could be the one who would be a host to you and support you?
hil: Or who, besides the Merciful, could be the one to be a host to you and support you with an army?
compare: Or who, besides the Merciful, could be the one to be a host to you and support you with an army?

src: Und ER ist Der Allgnädige, Der Allvergebende.
ref: He is all-merciful, all-forgiving.
draft: And HE is the Most Gracious, The Most Forgiving.
hil: And He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.
compare: And HE is the Most Gracious, The Most Forgiving.

src: Und WIR ließen vom Himmel Wasser in Abgewogenheit fallen, dann ließen WIR es in der Erde unterbringen. Und WIR sind, um es vergehen zu lassen, doch allmächtig.
ref: We send down water from the sky in determined measure, and store it up in the earth; and We have power to drain it away.
draft: And we let water fall from the sky in measured quantity, and We gave it lodging in the earth, and We are certainly able to take it away.
hil: And WE caused water to fall from the sky in measured amounts, and then WE gave it a place to settle in the earth. And WE are indeed able to make it disappear.
compare: And we let water fall from the sky in measured quantity, and We gave it lodging in the earth, and We are certainly able to take it away.

src: Und so haben wir euch in Verirrung fallen lassen, denn wir waren ja selbst in Verirrung gefallen."
ref: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."
draft: "And so we let you fall into error, for we ourselves had fallen into error."
hil: After all, we left you to stray because we ourselves had strayed.
compare: "And so we let you fall into error, for we ourselves had fallen into error."

src: Und, o mein Volk, dies ist die Kamelstute Gottes, euch zum Zeichen. Laßt sie auf Gottes Erde weiden und rührt sie nicht mit etwas Bösem an. Sonst ergreift euch eine baldige Pein.»
ref: And O my people! yonder is the she-camel of Allah: a sign unto you; so let her alone, feeding in Allah's land, and touch her not with evil, lest there may overtake you a torment nigh.
draft: And, O my people, this is the female camel of God as a sign to you. Let her graze in God's earth and do not touch her with anything evil, lest you be seized by a swift punishment.''
hil: And, O my people, this is the female camel of God as a sign to you. Let her graze in God's earth and do not touch her with anything evil, lest you be seized by a swift punishment.
compare: And, O my people, this is the female camel of God as a sign to you. Let her graze in God's earth and do not touch her with anything evil, lest you be seized by a swift punishment.''

src: An jenem Tage werden Wir die einen von ihnen wie Wogen gegen die anderen anstürmen lassen, und es wird in den Sur gestoßen.
ref: On that Day, We will leave them surging upon one another.
draft: On that day, We will let them surge against each other like waves, and the trumpet will be blown.
hil: On that day, We will let some of them surge against others like waves, and the trumpet will be blown.
compare: On that day, We will let some of them surge against others like waves, and the trumpet will be blown.

src: Allah hatte ja Wohlgefallen an den Gläubigen, als sie dir unter dem Baum den Treueid leisteten.
ref: God was pleased with the believers, when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
draft: Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
hil: Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
compare: Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.

src: Schauen sie denn nicht zu den Kamelen, wie sie erschaffen sind
ref: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;
draft: Please do they not look at the camels how they are created.
hil: "Do they not look at the camels how they are created."
compare: "Do they not look at the camels how they are created."

src: Er ging daran, das Schiff zu verfertigen. Und sooft Vornehme aus seinem Volk an ihm vorbeikamen, verhöhnten sie ihn.
ref: So he built the ark; and when groups of his people passed by him, they scoffed at him.
draft: He started to manufacture the ship. And every time nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.
hil: He started to manufacture the ship. And every time nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.
compare: He started to manufacture the ship. And every time nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.

src: Fürchtet ihr sie etwa?
ref: Are you afraid of them?
draft: Do you fear her?
hil: Do you fear her?
compare: Do you fear her?

src: Ihr hättet unmöglich deren Bäume wachsen lassen können.
ref: It was not in your power to make trees germinate.
draft: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.
hil: And you could never have let their trees grow.
compare: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.

src: Begehren sie (etwa) Macht bei ihnen (zu finden)? Gewiß, alle Macht gehört Allah.
ref: Then (know that) undoubtedly all honour is for Allah.
draft: Do they desire power (perhaps) to be found with them? Surely, all power belongs to Allah.
hil: "We should give them power (maybe) to be found with them?" Certainly, all power belongs to Allah.
compare: Do they desire power (perhaps) to be found with them? Surely, all power belongs to Allah.

src: An jenem Tag werden sie an derselben Pein teilhaben.
ref: So, they will become partners in punishment.
draft: On that day, they will share in the same pain.
hil: On that day, they will share in the same punishment.
compare: On that day, they will share in the same punishment.

src: Das Gute verweigert, Übertretungen begeht und Zweifel hegt,
ref: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,
draft: The good refuses, commits transgressions and harbours doubts.
hil: The good refuses, commits transgressions and harbours doubts.
compare: The good refuses, commits transgressions and harbours doubts.

src: Als ihnen aber vorgeschrieben wurde zu kämpfen, kehrten sie sich ab bis auf wenige von ihnen. Und Gott weiß Bescheid über die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: But when they were ordered to fight they turned away, except for a few; yet God knows the sinners.
draft: But when they were commanded to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
hil: But when they were commanded to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
compare: But when they were commanded to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.

src: Das ist der Lohn der Feinde Allahs: das (Höllen)feuer, in dem sie die ewige Wohnstätte haben, als Vergeltung dafür, daß sie Unsere Zeichen zu verleugnen pflegten.
ref: This is the requital for God's enemies: Hell, where they will have their lasting home, as punishment for denying Our revelations.
draft: "This is the reward of the enemies of Allah: the (Hell)fire, in which they have the eternal abode, as retribution for denying Our signs."
hil: "This is the reward of Allah's enemies: the (Hell)fire, in which they have the eternal abode, as retribution for denying Our signs."
compare: "This is the reward of Allah's enemies: the (Hell)fire, in which they have the eternal abode, as retribution for denying Our signs."

src: Und wenn ALLAH dich zu einer Gruppe von ihnen wiederkehren läßt und diese dich um Erlaubnis (zur Teilnahme) am Aufbruch bitten, dann sag: "Ihr werdet mit mir nie und nimmer aufbrechen und den bewaffneten Kampf gegen keinen Feind mit mir aufnehmen.
ref: If you come back to them by (the grace of) God, and they seek your permission to go (to fight), you should tell them: "You will never go out nor fight the enemy with me any more.
draft: And if ALLAH lets you return to a group of them and they ask you for permission to join (the departure), then say, "You will never ever depart with me, nor will you ever take up armed combat with me against any enemy".
hil: And if ALLAH lets you return to a group of them and they ask you for permission to join (the departure), then say, "You will never ever depart with me, nor will you ever take up armed combat with me against any enemy".
compare: And if ALLAH lets you return to a group of them and they ask you for permission to join (the departure), then say, "You will never ever depart with me, nor will you ever take up armed combat with me against any enemy".

src: Ich fürchte, daß sie mich der Lüge bezichtigen."
ref: Verily! I fear that they will belie me."
draft: "I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying."
hil: I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying.
compare: "I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying."

src: Sie schmiedeten Ränke, und Wir schmiedeten Ränke, ohne daß sie es merkten.
ref: They hatched up the plot; We also planned without their knowledge.
draft: They plotted schemes, and we plotted schemes without them noticing.
hil: They plotted schemes, and we plotted schemes without them noticing.
compare: They plotted schemes, and we plotted schemes without them noticing.

src: Und wende dich nicht in Arroganz von den Leuten ab! Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt!
ref: Do not hold men in contempt, and do not walk with hauteur on the earth.
draft: And do not turn away from people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth exultantly!
hil: Do not turn away from people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth exultantly!
compare: And do not turn away from people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth exultantly!

src: Sag: "Weder Ihr wer-det nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was wir schwer verfehlten, noch wir werden nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was ihr tut."
ref: Say: "You will not be questioned about the sins that we have committed, nor shall we be questioned about your deeds."
draft: Say: "Neither will you be held accountable for what we have greatly failed at, nor will we be held accountable for what you do."
hil: Say: "Neither will you be held accountable for what we have greatly failed at, nor will we be held accountable for what you do."
compare: Say: "Neither will you be held accountable for what we have greatly failed at, nor will we be held accountable for what you do."

src: Bis zum Tag der bestimmten Zeit.»
ref: Till the appointed day."
draft: "Until the day of the specified time."
hil: Until the day of the appointed time.
compare: Until the day of the appointed time.

src: Und an dem Tage, wo die Stunde herankommt, werden die Schuldigen schwören, daß sie nicht länger als eine Stunde (auf Erden) weilten - so sehr sind sie an (Selbsttäuschung gewöhnt.
ref: The day Resurrection is set the sinners will swear: "We did not tarry more than an hour (and cannot be guilty)." That is how they have always been deceived.
draft: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty ones will swear that they did not dwell on earth for more than an hour - so much are they accustomed to self-deception.
hil: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty will swear that they did not linger on earth for more than an hour - so accustomed are they to self-deception.
compare: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty ones will swear that they did not dwell on earth for more than an hour - so much are they accustomed to self-deception.

src: Sie hatten eine stärkere Kraft als ihr und mehr Vermögen und Kinder.
ref: They were more powerful than you, and had more wealth and children.
draft: They had a stronger power than hers and more wealth and children.
hil: "Fight on in the way of Allah; you cannot compel anyone except your own self, but urge the believers to fight. So do not be surprised at their wealth or their children; Allah only intends to punish them in the life of this world with these things and that they die only as disbelievers. They had a stronger power than hers and more wealth and children."
compare: They had a stronger power than hers and more wealth and children.

src: Und die Aussöhnung ist besser. Doch die Seelen sind der Habsucht zugeneigt.
ref: Reconciliation is good even though men's souls are swayed by greed.
draft: And reconciliation is better. But souls are inclined to greed.
hil: And reconciliation is better. But souls are inclined towards greed.
compare: And reconciliation is better. But souls are inclined to greed.

src: Steh auf (zum Gebet) die ganze Nacht, bis auf einen kleinen Teil,
ref: Keep watch all the night except some,
draft: Get up (for prayer) the whole night, except for a small part.
hil: Stay up (for prayer) the whole night with the exception of a small part.
compare: Stay up (for prayer) the whole night with the exception of a small part.

src: (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los. Nicht uns dienten sie ja."
ref: We clear ourselves before You: They never worshipped us."
draft: We say goodbye to them in front of you. They didn't serve us anyway.
hil: We say goodbye to them in front of you. They didn't serve us anyway.
compare: We say goodbye to them in front of you. They didn't serve us anyway.

src: Der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt ist der Tagesanbruch. Ist nicht der Tagesanbruch schon nahe?"
ref: Their hour of doom is in the morning: Is not the morning nigh?"
draft: The promised time for them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already near?
hil: The promised time for them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already near?
compare: The promised time for them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already near?

src: Und sag: Wirkt! Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: And say, "Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds, and [so, will] His Messenger and the believers.
draft: And say: It works! Allah will see your actions, and (also) His Messenger and the believers.
hil: And say, 'It works! Allah will see your deeds, and His Messenger and the believers will see them too.'
compare: And say, 'It works! Allah will see your deeds, and His Messenger and the believers will see them too.'

src: (Sie treten ein in) Dschannat von 'Adn, die Der Allgnade Erweisende Seinen Dienern von der Welt des Verborgenen versprochen hat.
ref: In the gardens of Eden promised by Ar-Rahman to His creatures in the unknown (future).
draft: "They enter into the Paradise of 'Adn, which The All-merciful has promised His servants from the realm of the Unseen."
hil: "They enter into the Paradise of 'Adn, which The All-merciful has promised His servants from the realm of the Unseen."
compare: "They enter into the Paradise of 'Adn, which The All-merciful has promised His servants from the realm of the Unseen."

src: Und WIR lehrten ihn nicht das Dichten und dies gebührt ihm nicht! Er ist doch nichts anderes außer Ermahnung und ein klarer Quran,
ref: And We have not taught him (Prophet Mohammed- peace and blessings be upon him) to recite poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but an advice and the bright Qur’an.
draft: And WE did not teach him poetry and it does not befit him. He is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.
hil: And WE did not teach him poetry and it is not appropriate for him. He is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.
compare: And WE did not teach him poetry and it does not befit him. He is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.

src: Und der Satan sagt, nachdem die Angelegenheit entschieden ist: "Gewiß, Allah hat euch ein wahres Versprechen gegeben, und ich habe euch (etwas) versprochen, es aber dann gebrochen. Und ich hatte keine Macht über euch, außer daß ich euch gerufen habe und ihr auf mich gehört habt. So tadelt mich nicht, sondern tadelt euch selbst. Ich kann euch nicht zu Hilfe kommen, und ihr könnt mir nicht zu Hilfe kommen. Ich weise es ja von mir, daß ihr mich zuvor (Allah) beigesellt habt." Gewiß, für die Ungerechten gibt es schmerzhafte Strafe.
ref: And Satan will say when the matter has been decided, “Indeed Allah had given you a true promise – and the promise I gave you, I made it untrue to you; and I had no control over you except that I called you and you obeyed me; so do not accuse me, blame only yourselves; neither can I help you, nor can you help me; I have no concern with your ascribing me as a partner (to Allah); indeed for the unjust is a painful punishment.”
draft: And Satan said, after the matter had been decided, "Indeed, Allah had given you a true promise and I had promised you but then I failed you. I had no authority over you except that I invited you and you responded to me. So do not blame me; instead, blame yourselves. I cannot help you, nor can you help me. Indeed, I deny your association of me with Allah before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
hil: And Satan said, after the matter had been decided, "Indeed, Allah had given you a true promise and I had promised you but then I failed you. I had no authority over you except that I invited you and you responded to me. So do not blame me; instead, blame yourselves. I cannot help you, nor can you help me. Indeed, I deny your association of me with Allah before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
compare: And Satan said, after the matter had been decided, "Indeed, Allah had given you a true promise and I had promised you but then I failed you. I had no authority over you except that I invited you and you responded to me. So do not blame me; instead, blame yourselves. I cannot help you, nor can you help me. Indeed, I deny your association of me with Allah before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."

src: Allah hat auf dich das Buch und die Weisheit herabgesandt und dich gelehrt, was du (vorher) nicht wußtest.
ref: God has revealed to you the Scripture and wisdom, and has taught you what you did not know.
draft: "Allah has sent down to you the book and wisdom and has taught you what you did not know before."
hil: Allah has sent down to you the Book (the Quran) and Al-Hikmah (Islamic laws, knowledge of legal and illegal things i.e. the Prophet's Sunnah; legal ways), and taught you that which you knew not before.
compare: Allah has sent down to you the Book (the Quran) and Al-Hikmah (Islamic laws, knowledge of legal and illegal things i.e. the Prophet's Sunnah; legal ways), and taught you that which you knew not before.

src: Gewiß, wir werden ihn und die Seinen erretten, bis auf seine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen."
ref: We are to save him and his family except his wife, for she is one of those who will stay behind."
draft: "Surely, we will save him and his own, except for his wife who belongs to those who are meant to be left behind."
hil: Indeed, we will save him and his kin, except for his wife who is among those who are to be left behind.
compare: Indeed, we will save him and his kin, except for his wife who is among those who are to be left behind.

src: Und sie lernten, was ihnen schadete und nicht nützte. Und sie wußten, daß derjenige, der dies erkauft, im Jenseits keinen Anteil hat.
ref: Indeed, they learned what harms them and does not profit them, yet they knew that anyone who buys it would have no share in the Everlasting Life.
draft: And they learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that whoever buys this has no share in the afterlife.
hil: They learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that whoever buys this has no share in the afterlife.
compare: And they learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that whoever buys this has no share in the afterlife.

src: Ich will, daß du die Last meiner Sünde und deiner Sünde trägst und so unter den Bewohnern des Feuers bist, und dies ist der Lohn der Frevler."
ref: I would rather you suffered the punishment for sinning against me, and for your own sin, and became an inmate of Hell. And that is the requital for the unjust."
draft: "I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin, and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of wrongdoers."
hil: I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin, and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of wrongdoers.
compare: "I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin, and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of wrongdoers."

src: Und ER machte euch die Nacht, das Tageslicht, die Sonne und den Mond gratis fügbar.
ref: He has subjected to you the night, the day, the sun and the moon.
draft: And HE made the night, the daylight, the sun and the moon freely available to you.
hil: And He made the night, the daylight, the sun, and the moon freely accessible to you.
compare: And He made the night, the daylight, the sun, and the moon freely accessible to you.

src: Mein HERR! Laß mich des rituellen Gebets ordnungsgemäßer Verrichtender sein sowie von meiner Nachkommenschaft. Mein HERR! Und erfülle mein Bittgebet!
ref: My Lord! make me establisher of prayer and also from my progeny, our Lord! and accept Thou my supplication.
draft: My Lord! Let me be a properly performing worshipper, and provide my offspring (also proper guidance). My Lord! Accept my prayer!
hil: My Lord! Let me and my descendants perform the ritual prayer properly. My Lord! And fulfill my supplication!
compare: My Lord! Let me and my descendants perform the ritual prayer properly. My Lord! And fulfill my supplication!

src: Und was für ein erbärmlicher Aufenthaltsort!
ref: Their dwelling place will be Hell; - and worst indeed is that place for rest.
draft: And what a miserable place to stay!
hil: And what a miserable place to stay!
compare: And what a miserable place to stay!

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: And Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.
hil: Verily, Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
compare: And Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.

src: (Er ist) der Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde in ihrer schönsten Form. Wie soll Er Kinder haben, wo Er doch keine Gefährtin hat und Er (sonst) alles erschaffen hat?
ref: Creator of the heavens and the earth from nothingness, how could He have a son when He has no mate?
draft: (He is) the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no mate and He has created everything else?
hil: (He is) the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no mate and He has created everything else?
compare: (He is) the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no mate and He has created everything else?

src: Heute habe Ich euch eure Religion vervollkommnet und Meine Gunst an euch vollendet, und Ich bin mit dem Islam als Religion für euch zufrieden. - Und wer sich aus Hunger in einer Zwangslage befindet, ohne zu einer Sünde hinzuneigen, so ist Allah Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: This day, I have perfected your religion for you, completed My Favour upon you, and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. But as for him who is forced by severe hunger, with no inclination to sin (such can eat these above-mentioned meats), then surely, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: "Today I have perfected your religion for you and have completed My favor upon you, and I am satisfied with Islam as a religion for you. - And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
hil: "Today, I have perfected your religion for you and completed My favor upon you, and I am pleased for Islam to be your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin, then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
compare: "Today, I have perfected your religion for you and completed My favor upon you, and I am pleased for Islam to be your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin, then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

src: Sie sagen: "Aber nein!
ref: They will say, "No!
draft: They say: "But no!
hil: They say, 'But no!'
compare: They say, 'But no!'

src: ER sagte: "Deine Aya sei, daß du mit den Menschen drei volle Nächte nicht reden kannst."
ref: "Though sound," He answered, "you will not talk to any one for three nights running."
draft: He said, "Your Aya is that you cannot speak to people for three full nights."
hil: He said, "Your sign shall be that you will not speak to people for three full nights."
compare: He said, "Your sign shall be that you will not speak to people for three full nights."

src: Darum rufe du auf und verhalte dich recht, wie dir befohlen worden ist. Und folge nicht ihren Neigungen, sondern sprich: Ich glaube an das, was Gott an Büchern herabgesandt hat, und mir ist befohlen worden, unter euch Gerechtigkeit zu üben.
ref: Therefore call thou, and go straight as thou hast been commanded; do not follow their caprices.
draft: Therefore, you should call upon and behave rightly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: "I believe in that which God has sent down in the Books, and I am commanded to do justice among you."
hil: Therefore, you should call upon and behave rightly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: 'I believe in that which God has sent down in the Books, and I am commanded to do justice among you.'
compare: Therefore, you should call upon and behave rightly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: "I believe in that which God has sent down in the Books, and I am commanded to do justice among you."

src: Ich kann euch nicht retten, noch könnt ihr mich retten.
ref: Neither can I help you nor can you give me help.
draft: I cannot save you, nor can you save me.
hil: I cannot save you, nor can you save me.
compare: I cannot save you, nor can you save me.

src: Und gehe auf Erden nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, dabei wirst du weder die Erde zerlöchern können, noch wirst du die Berghöhen an Höhe erreichen.
ref: And do not strut about the land with insolence: Surely you cannot cleave the earth, nor attain the height of mountains in stature.
draft: And do not walk joyfully on the earth! Certainly, thereby you will neither be able to puncture the earth, nor will you reach the mountain heights in altitude.
hil: And do not walk joyfully on the earth! Certainly, thereby you will neither be able to puncture the earth, nor will you reach the mountain heights in altitude.
compare: And do not walk joyfully on the earth! Certainly, thereby you will neither be able to puncture the earth, nor will you reach the mountain heights in altitude.

src: Ihm gereicht zum Vorteil, was er erworben hat, und ihm gereicht zum Schaden, was er begangen hat.
ref: Each will enjoy what (good) he earns, as indeed each will suffer from (the wrong) he does.
draft: He benefits from what he has acquired and he suffers harm from what he has committed.
hil: He benefits from what he has acquired and he suffers harm from what he has committed.
compare: He benefits from what he has acquired and he suffers harm from what he has committed.

src: Ihr macht sie zu Schreibblättern, die ihr offenlegt, aber auch vieles davon verheimlicht.
ref: Some of it ye disclose and much thereof ye conceal.
draft: You turn them into writing sheets that you reveal, but also conceal much of it.
hil: You turn them into writing sheets that you reveal, but also conceal much of it.
compare: You turn them into writing sheets that you reveal, but also conceal much of it.

src: (So war) Allahs Gesetzmäßigkeit mit denjenigen, die zuvor dahingegangen sind - und Allahs Anordnung ist ein fest gefaßter Beschluß
ref: This has been the way of God with (apostles) who have gone before you, and God's command is a determined act.
draft: (Thus it was) Allah's regularity with those who have passed away before - and Allah's command is a firm decree.
hil: Allah's regularity with those who have passed away before - and Allah's command is a firm decree.
compare: (Thus it was) Allah's regularity with those who have passed away before - and Allah's command is a firm decree.

src: Und Wir ließen dem Mose das Buch zukommen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture, but dispute arose therein.
draft: And We gave the book to Moses.
hil: And We sent the Book to Moses.
compare: And We sent the Book to Moses.

src: Derjenige, Der mich erschuf.
ref: who created me.
draft: The one who created me.
hil: HE is the One who created me.
compare: HE is the One who created me.

src: Aber Taube hören nicht den Ruf, wenn sie gewarnt werden.
ref: But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
draft: But pigeons do not hear the call when they are warned.
hil: But doves do not hear the call when they are warned.
compare: But pigeons do not hear the call when they are warned.

src: Aber ihr seid ja Leute, die der Versuchung ausgesetzt sind.»
ref: In reality you are a people under trial (for your own inauspiciousness)."
draft: "But you are people who are exposed to temptation."
hil: Our Lord, you are indeed people who are exposed to temptation.
compare: "But you are people who are exposed to temptation."

src: Was Allah den Menschen an Barmherzigkeit gewährt, das kann keiner zurückhalten; und was Er zurückhält, das kann nach Ihm keiner freigeben; und Er ist der Allmächtige, der Allweise.
ref: There is none who can take away the favours He bestows on man; and there is none apart from Him to restore what He has withheld. He is all-mighty and all-wise.
draft: What Allah grants to humans of mercy, no one can withhold; and what He withholds, no one can release after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
hil: Allah's mercy granted to mankind cannot be held back by anyone; and what He withholds, no one can release after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
compare: Allah's mercy granted to mankind cannot be held back by anyone; and what He withholds, no one can release after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.

src: Ich folge ausschließlich dem, was mir als Wahy zuteil wird. Und ich bin doch nichts anderes als ein deutlicher Warner."
ref: I only follow what is revealed to me; I am only a clear warner.'
draft: "I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear Warner."
hil: I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear Warner.
compare: "I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear Warner."

src: Das sind die, die Gott rechtgeleitet hat.
ref: They are those whom Allah had guided.
draft: These are the ones whom God has guided right.
hil: These are the ones whom God has guided right.
compare: These are the ones whom God has guided right.

src: Das sind die, die das diesseitige Leben gegen das Jenseits erkauft haben.
ref: Those are they who have bought the life of this world at the price of the Hereafter.
draft: These are those who have bought the worldly life for the Hereafter.
hil: These are those who have bought the worldly life for the Hereafter.
compare: These are those who have bought the worldly life for the Hereafter.

src: Und gewähre ihnen noch eine kurze Frist.
ref: And give them respite for a little while.
draft: And grant them a short grace period.
hil: And grant them a short grace period.
compare: And grant them a short grace period.

src: Sprich: Das ist mein Weg.
ref: Say: 'This is my way.
draft: Speak: That is my path.
hil: Say: That is my way.
compare: Speak: That is my path.

src: Oder sagen sie: "Er hat es ersonnen"? Nein!
ref: What! They dare say that, “He has fabricated it”?
draft: Or do they say, "He invented it"? No!
hil: Or do they say, 'He made it up?' No!
compare: Or do they say, "He invented it"? No!

src: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Dem alles gehört, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist.
ref: Praise belongs to God to whom belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth.
draft: All praise is due to ALLAH, to whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.
hil: All praise is due to Allah, to Whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.
compare: All praise is due to Allah, to Whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.

src: Gewiß, mir wurde vom Wissen das zuteil, was dir nicht zuteil wurde, so folge mir, dann leite ich dich recht auf einen geraden Weg!
ref: There has come to me of knowledge that which came not unto you. So follow me.
draft: Surely, I have been granted the knowledge that has not been granted to you, so follow me and I will guide you straight on a straight path!
hil: Surely, I have been granted the knowledge that has not been granted to you, so follow me and I will guide you straight on a straight path!
compare: Surely, I have been granted the knowledge that has not been granted to you, so follow me and I will guide you straight on a straight path!

src: Und WIR entsandten dich nur als Überbringer froher Botschaft und als Warner.
ref: Yet We have not sent you but to give good tidings and to warn.
draft: And we only sent you as a bringer of good news and as a warner.
hil: Verily We have sent you with the Truth, giving glad tidings and warnings.
compare: And we only sent you as a bringer of good news and as a warner.

src: O ihr Menschen, ein Gleichnis ist geprägt, so hört darauf: Gewiß, jene, die ihr an Allahs Statt anruft, werden in keiner Weise vermögen, eine Fliege zu erschaffen, auch dann nicht, wenn sie sich dazu zusammentäten. Und wenn die Fliege ihnen etwas raubte, könnten sie es ihr nicht entreißen.
ref: O men, give ear to this parable: Those you worship other than God can never create as much as a fly, even if they get together to do so; and if the fly were to rob them of a thing they would not be able to snatch it away from it.
draft: O people, a similitude is coined, so listen to it: surely those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create a fly, even if they were together for that purpose. And if the fly should snatch away anything from them, they could not recover it from it.
hil: O people, a similitude is coined, so listen to it: surely those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create a fly, even if they were together for that purpose. And if the fly should snatch away anything from them, they could not recover it from it.
compare: O people, a similitude is coined, so listen to it: surely those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create a fly, even if they were together for that purpose. And if the fly should snatch away anything from them, they could not recover it from it.

src: Aber er vergaß (sie). Und wir fanden bei ihm keine Entschlossenheit.
ref: He forgot Our commandment and We did not find in him the determination to fulfil Our commandments.
draft: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him.
hil: "But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him."
compare: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him.

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig sind und Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklären, für sie wird es schmachvolle Strafe geben.
ref: But those who did not believe and called Our revelations lies, will be given disgraceful punishment.
draft: But those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, they will be the inhabitants of Hellfire.
hil: Those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, they will be subjected to a degrading punishment.
compare: Those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, they will be subjected to a degrading punishment.

src: ER sagte: "Das ist ein Mir verbindlicher, geradliniger Weg:
ref: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.
draft: He said, "This is a binding, straightforward path for me."
hil: He said, "This is a straightforward path that is binding on me."
compare: He said, "This is a straightforward path that is binding on me."

src: "Gaben Wir euch nicht ein genügend langes Leben, so daß ein jeder, der sich besinnen wollte, sich darin hätte besinnen können?
ref: Did We not give you a long enough span of life so that he who remembered may reflect? And did not the warner come to you?
draft: "Did We not give you a long enough life, so that whoever wanted to reflect could have done so?"
hil: Did we not give you a long enough life so that anyone who wanted to reflect could have done so?
compare: "Did We not give you a long enough life, so that whoever wanted to reflect could have done so?"

src: Auch sollst du Mitteilung machen über denjenigen, der Unseren Ayat gegenüber Kufr betrieben und gesagt hat: "Ganz gewiß werden mir Vermögen und Kinder zuteil!"
ref: Have you seen him who denies Our revelations, and says: "I will certainly be given wealth and children."
draft: Also, you shall inform about the one who has committed Kufr against Our Ayat and said, "Surely, wealth and children will be given to me."
hil: You shall also inform about the one who has committed Kufr against Our Ayat and said, "Surely, wealth and children will be given to me."
compare: Also, you shall inform about the one who has committed Kufr against Our Ayat and said, "Surely, wealth and children will be given to me."

src: (dies) als Ermahnung. Und nie sind Wir ungerecht.
ref: To advise; and We never oppress.
draft: (this) as a warning. And We are never unjust.
hil: This is a warning. And We are never unjust.
compare: (this) as a warning. And We are never unjust.

src: Sind die beiden im Gleichnis etwa gleich? Lob sei Gott!
ref: All praise belongs to Allah!
draft: Are the two in the parable about equal? Praise be to God!
hil: Are the two in the parable approximately equivalent? Praise be to God!
compare: Are the two in the parable about equal? Praise be to God!

src: Und wenn sie den bewaffneten Kampf gegen euch aufnahmen, dann tötet sie.
ref: But if they attack you, then kill them.
draft: And if they take up armed struggle against you, then kill them.
hil: And if they take up arms against you, then kill them.
compare: And if they take up armed struggle against you, then kill them.

src: Und als ihnen gesagt wurde: "Verinnerlicht den Iman, wie die (anderen) Menschen den Iman verinnerlicht haben", sagten sie: "Sollen wir etwa den Iman verinnerlichen, wie die Beschränkten den Iman verinnerlicht haben?"
ref: When asked to believe as others do, they say: "Should we believe like fools?"
draft: And when they were told, "Internalize the faith as the (other) people have internalized it," they said, "Should we internalize the faith as the limited have internalized the faith?"
hil: And when they were told, 'Internalize the faith as other people have internalized it,' they said, 'Should we internalize faith as the limited have internalized faith?'
compare: And when they were told, 'Internalize the faith as other people have internalized it,' they said, 'Should we internalize faith as the limited have internalized faith?'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH macht, was ER will.
ref: Verily God does as He pleases.
draft: Sure, ALLAH does whatever HE wants.
hil: "Indeed, Allah does what He wills."
compare: Sure, ALLAH does whatever HE wants.

src: Und wenn einer ungläubig ist, so ist Gott auf die Weltenbewohner nicht angewiesen.
ref: Whosoever denies, should remember that God is independent of the peoples of the world.
draft: And if one is an unbeliever, God does not rely on the inhabitants of the world.
hil: And if one is an unbeliever, God is not dependent on the inhabitants of the world.
compare: And if one is an unbeliever, God does not rely on the inhabitants of the world.

src: Diejenigen, denen das Buch zugekommen ist, sind erst uneins geworden, nachdem das Wissen zu ihnen gekommen war, dies aus ungerechter Auflehnung untereinander.
ref: Those who were given the Book were not at variance except after the knowledge came to them, being insolent one to another.
draft: Those to whom the book has come have become divided only after the knowledge came to them, and this out of unjust rebellion among themselves.
hil: Those to whom the book has come have become divided only after the knowledge came to them, and this out of unjust rebellion among themselves.
compare: Those to whom the book has come have become divided only after the knowledge came to them, and this out of unjust rebellion among themselves.

src: Über sie kommt eine Pein, die unabwendbar ist.»
ref: Verily, there will come a torment for them which cannot be turned back."
draft: "An agony comes over her which is unavoidable."
hil: An agony comes upon them which is unavoidable.
compare: "An agony comes over her which is unavoidable."

src: Also, dann sollen sie mit ihren Verbindungen hochsteigen!
ref: Then let them climb up the ladders (to the heavens).
draft: So, then they should rise up with their connections!
hil: So, they should then rise up with their connections!
compare: So, then they should rise up with their connections!

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet. Und das ist eine üble Bestimmung.
ref: God is wroth with them, and has cursed them, and has prepared for them Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!
draft: Such (sinners) will be struck by a bad misfortune; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And that is a bad destiny.
hil: Such (sinners) will be struck by a bad misfortune; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And that is a bad destiny.
compare: Such (sinners) will be struck by a bad misfortune; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And that is a bad destiny.

src: Und vervollständigt die Hadsch und die 'Umra für ALLAH! Und solltet ihr daran gehindert werden, dann (opfert) das, was an Opfertieren verfügbar ist, und rasiert nicht eure Köpfe, bis das Opfertier seinen Opferplatz erreicht hat.
ref: Fulfil the Pilgrimage and the Visitation unto God; but if you are prevented, then such offering as may be feasible. And shave not your heads, till the offering reaches its place of sacrifice.
draft: And complete the Hajj and the Umrah for ALLAH! And if you are prevented, then [offer] what can be obtained of sacrificial animals, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter.
hil: And complete the Hajj and the Umrah for ALLAH! And if you are prevented from doing so, then sacrifice whatever sacrificial animal is available, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter.
compare: And complete the Hajj and the Umrah for ALLAH! And if you are prevented, then [offer] what can be obtained of sacrificial animals, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter.

src: Hätte es doch aus den Generationen vor euch manche gegeben, die einsichtig waren, welche Verderben auf Erden verboten!
ref: Why were there not, out of the generations that passed away before you, righteous men who would forbid others from causing corruption on the earth?
draft: If only there had been some generations before you who were insightful about what devastation is forbidden on earth!
hil: Oh people of the generations before you! If only there had been some who were insightful about which calamities are forbidden on earth!
compare: Oh people of the generations before you! If only there had been some who were insightful about which calamities are forbidden on earth!

src: (Er), der sieben Himmel in Schichten erschaffen hat.
ref: Who created the seven skies one above the other.
draft: "He who created the seven heavens in layers."
hil: He who created the seven heavens in layers.
compare: "He who created the seven heavens in layers."

src: Sie haben Allah nicht eingeschätzt, wie es Ihm gebührt', wo die ganze Erde am Tag der Auferstehung in Seiner Hand gehalten wird und (auch) die Himmel in Seiner Rechten zusammengefaltet sein werden. Preis sei Ihm! Erhaben ist Er über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: And they did not realise the importance of Allah as was His right; and on the Day of Resurrection, He will compress the lands and the heavens will be rolled up by His power; Purity and Supremacy are to Him, from all what they ascribe as partners.
draft: "They have not estimated Allah as He deserves, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded up in His right hand. Praise be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him."
hil: they have not estimated Allah as He deserves, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded up in His right hand. Praise be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.
compare: "They have not estimated Allah as He deserves, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded up in His right hand. Praise be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him."

src: Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: Verily God is forgiving and kind.
draft: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Pardoning.
hil: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Pardoning.
compare: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Pardoning.

src: Und den Himmel haben Wir mit Kraft aufgebaut.
ref: And the heaven!
draft: And We have built the sky with power.
hil: We have built the sky with power.
compare: And We have built the sky with power.

src: Sollten sie jedoch Kinder haben, dann bekommt ihr das Viertel von dem, was sie hinterlassen haben, nach (der Vollstreckung) des Testaments, das sie hinterlegt haben, und nach (der Begleichung) der Schulden.
ref: If they had children, you get one-fourth of what they leave. After fulfilling any bequest and paying off debts.
draft: However, if they have children, you will receive a quarter of what they have left behind after the execution of the will they have deposited and after the settlement of debts.
hil: If, however, they have children, you will receive a quarter of what they have left behind after the execution of the will they have deposited and after the settlement of debts.
compare: However, if they have children, you will receive a quarter of what they have left behind after the execution of the will they have deposited and after the settlement of debts.

src: Mit Sicherheit ist ALLAHs Versprechen wahr, doch die meisten wissen es nicht.
ref: Remember, the promise of God is true. But most of them do not know.
draft: Certainly, Allah's promise is true, but most do not know it.
hil: Certainly, God's promise is true, but most do not know it.
compare: Certainly, Allah's promise is true, but most do not know it.

src: Dein Herr hat dich weder verlassen, noch verabscheut.
ref: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.
draft: Your master has neither abandoned you nor despised you.
hil: Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor despised you.
compare: Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor despised you.

src: Und auch manche von ihren Vätern, ihren Nachkommen und ihren Brüdern.
ref: as We did their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers.
draft: And also some of their fathers, their progeny and their brothers.
hil: And some of their fathers, offspring, and brothers as well.
compare: And also some of their fathers, their progeny and their brothers.

src: Und als er dort ankam, wurde gerufen: "Baraka wurde verliehen dem, das im Feuer ist, sowie dem um es herum. Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: So when he reached it, it was proclaimed, “Blessed is he who is in the location of the fire (Moosa) and those who are close to it (the angels); and Purity is to Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.”
draft: And when he arrived there, it was proclaimed: "Baraka was bestowed upon the one who is in the fire, as well as upon those around it. And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation."
hil: And when he arrived there, it was proclaimed: 'Baraka was bestowed upon the one who is in the fire, as well as upon those around it. And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.'
compare: And when he arrived there, it was proclaimed: "Baraka was bestowed upon the one who is in the fire, as well as upon those around it. And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation."

src: Als er dann (die Lücke) zwischen den beiden Wallabhängen auf gleicher Höhe zuschütten ließ, sagte er: "Blast!" Als er dann es (das Eisen) erhitzte, sagte er: "Bringt mir geschmolzenes Kupfer, das ich darüber gieße!"
ref: At length, when he had filled up the space between the two steep mountain-sides, He said, "Blow (with your bellows)" Then, when he had made it (red) as fire, he said: "Bring me, that I may pour over it, molten lead."
draft: When he then had the gap on the same level between the two valley slopes filled up, he said: "Blow!" When he then heated it (the iron), he said: "Bring me molten copper, which I pour over it!"
hil: When he had then filled the gap at the same level between the two valley slopes, he said: "Blow!" When he heated it (the iron) then, he said: "Bring me molten copper that I pour over it!"
compare: When he had then filled the gap at the same level between the two valley slopes, he said: "Blow!" When he heated it (the iron) then, he said: "Bring me molten copper that I pour over it!"

src: Und du hast eine Verabredung, die dir nicht gebrochen wird. Und schau auf deinen Gott, dessen Andacht du dich dauernd hingegeben hast.
ref: And thereafter a tryst awaits thee thou canst not fail to keep Behold thy god, to whom all the day thou wast cleaving!
draft: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, whose devotion you have constantly dedicated yourself to.
hil: You have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, to whom you have constantly devoted yourself to.
compare: You have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, to whom you have constantly devoted yourself to.

src: Und ER erschafft, was ihr nicht kennt.
ref: He created other things too which you do not know.
draft: And HE creates what you do not know.
hil: And it creates what you do not know.
compare: And HE creates what you do not know.

src: ER sagte: "Geh!
ref: (And God) said: "Away!
draft: He said: "Go!
hil: He said, "Go!"
compare: He said: "Go!

src: Also diejenigen, die den Iman an ihn verinnerlicht, ihn geehrt, ihm zum Sieg verholfen haben und dem Licht (Quran) gefolgt sind, das ihm hinabgesandt wurde, diese sind die wirklichen Erfolgreichen.
ref: Those who believe and honour and help him, and follow the light sent with him, are those who will attain their goal."
draft: So those who internalized the faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.
hil: So those who internalized faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.
compare: So those who internalized faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.

src: Doch ich verfüge nicht über das, was ihr übereilt haben wollt.
ref: But what you wish to be hastened is not within my power.
draft: But I don't have what you want to rush.
hil: I don't have what you want to rush, though.
compare: I don't have what you want to rush, though.

src: Gespottet wurde schon vor dir über Gesandte. Da umschloß diejenigen, die sie verhöhnt hatten, das, worüber sie spotteten.
ref: Surely the apostles have been mocked before you; but what they had mocked rebounded on the mockers themselves.
draft: Mockery has already been made about messengers before you. Those who had mocked them were then surrounded by that which they had ridiculed.
hil: Mockery has already been made about messengers before you. Those who had mocked them were then surrounded by that which they had ridiculed.
compare: Mockery has already been made about messengers before you. Those who had mocked them were then surrounded by that which they had ridiculed.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt. Und fürchtet Allah; wahrlich, Allah ist dessen wohl kundig, was ihr tut.
ref: O People who Believe! Fear Allah, and every soul must see what it has sent ahead for tomorrow; and fear Allah; indeed Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: O you, who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has sent forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah; surely, Allah is aware of what you do.
hil: O you who believe! Fear Allah, and let each soul look to what it has sent forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah; surely, Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: O you, who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has sent forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah; surely, Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Und für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: They will have a painful punishment.
draft: And for them a painful pain is determined.
hil: A painful punishment is determined for them.
compare: A painful punishment is determined for them.

src: Und Fir'aun sagte: "O ihr führende Schar, keinen anderen Gott weiß ich für euch als mich (selbst). So entfache mir, o Haman, einen Brand auf Lehm, und mache mir einen Hochbau, auf daß ich zum Gott Musas emporsteige. Ich glaube fürwahr, daß er zu den Lügnern gehört."
ref: 'Assembly' said Pharaoh, 'I do not know that you have any god except me' 'O Haman, kindle a fire upon clay and make me a tower so that I can climb to see the God of Moses, I think that he is one of the liars'
draft: And Pharaoh said: "O you eminent ones, I know of no other god for you besides myself. So set for me, O Haman, a fire upon the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses; indeed, I do think he is among the liars."
hil: Pharaoh said: 'O you eminent ones, I know of no other lord for you besides myself. So, O Haman, fire some clay and build me a tower that I may see the God of Moses, for I think he is among the liars.'
compare: And Pharaoh said: "O you eminent ones, I know of no other god for you besides myself. So set for me, O Haman, a fire upon the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses; indeed, I do think he is among the liars."

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch Seine Ayat zeigt und euch Rizq vom Himmel nach und nach hinabsendet.
ref: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends you food from the heavens.
draft: HE is the One Who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance for you from the sky.
hil: He is the One Who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance for you from the sky, bit by bit.
compare: HE is the One Who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance for you from the sky.

src: Diese verinnerlichen den Iman an ihn. Und wer von Al-ahzab daran Kufr betreibt, dem ist das Feuer bestimmt.
ref: Such believe therein, and whoso disbelieveth therein of the clans, the Fire is his appointed place.
draft: These internalize faith in him. And whoever disbelieves in Al-ahzab, the Fire is for him.
hil: They internalize belief in him. And whoever disbelieves in Al-ahzab, the Fire is destined for him.
compare: They internalize belief in him. And whoever disbelieves in Al-ahzab, the Fire is destined for him.

src: Er sagte: "O wehe mir! War ich unfähig, zu sein wie dieser Rabe und die böse Tat an meinem Bruder zu verbergen?"
ref: He said: woe unto me was incapable of being like unto this raven so that I might cover the corpse of my brother!
draft: He said: "Oh woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and hide the evil deed from my brother?"
hil: He said: "Oh woe is me! Was I incapable of being like this raven and hiding the evil deed from my brother?"
compare: He said: "Oh woe is me! Was I incapable of being like this raven and hiding the evil deed from my brother?"

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Sagt nicht ra'ina, sondern sagt unzurna und hört zu! Und für die Kafir ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: O believers, do not say, 'Observe us,' but say, 'Regard us'; and give ear; for unbelievers awaits a painful chastisement.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Do not say 'ra'ina' but say 'unzurna' and listen! And for the kafir is a painful torment destined.
hil: "You who have internalized the Imam, say not "ra'ina" but say "unzurna" and listen! And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment destined."
compare: "You who have internalized the Imam, say not "ra'ina" but say "unzurna" and listen! And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment destined."

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf.
ref: who has created all things well.
draft: The one who did everything well that He created.
hil: The One who created everything well that He made.
compare: The one who did everything well that He created.

src: Gewiß, Allah vergibt die Sünden alle. Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful, so that He may forgive those who do evil and reward those who do good.
compare: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Er ist es, der die Himmel und die Erde der Wahrheit entsprechend erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose.
draft: He is the one who has created the heavens and the earth in accordance with the truth.
hil: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in truth, and He will say 'Be!' on the Day of Resurrection, and it shall become. He causes water to fall from the sky, then it flows into valleys according to their measure; then the swiftly flowing water carries along froth. And from that ore which is heated in the fire, in order to make ornaments or tools, arises a similar froth. Thus does Allah illustrate truth and falsehood. For as far as the froth is concerned, it is cast away; but as for that which is useful to mankind, it remains behind on earth. Thus does Allah draw analogies. The seven heavens and the earth and all those in them proclaim His purity with praise, and there is not a thing that does not proclaim His purity. But you do not understand their proclamation of purity. Indeed, He is Most Forbearing, Oft-Forgiving.
compare: He is the one who has created the heavens and the earth in accordance with the truth.

src: Und zu Seinen Ayat zählt euer Schlaf während der Nacht und am Tag und euer Anstreben nach Seiner Gunst. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: And among His signs is your sleeping during the night and day, and your seeking His munificence; indeed in this are signs for people who heed.
draft: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day and your striving after His favor. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who listen.
hil: Among His signs is your sleep during the night and day, and your striving after His favor. Surely, in that are signs for people who listen.
compare: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day and your striving after His favor. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who listen.

src: Oder dachten diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, daß ALLAH ihren Groll nie hervorbringen wird?!
ref: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?
draft: Or did those in whose hearts there is disease think that ALLAH will never bring forth their resentment?
hil: Or did those in whose hearts there is disease think that Allah will never bring forth their resentment?
compare: Or did those in whose hearts there is disease think that ALLAH will never bring forth their resentment?

src: Sag: "Wer gewährt euch Rizq von den Himmeln und der Erde?" Sag: "ALLAH!
ref: Proclaim, “Who provides you sustenance from the sky and the earth?”
draft: Say: "Who provides you with Rizq from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"
hil: Say: 'Who provides you with sustenance from the heavens and the earth?' Say: 'It is Allah!'
compare: Say: "Who provides you with Rizq from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"

src: Und WIR schenkten ihm Ishaq und Ya'qub, bestimmten die Prophetenschaft und die Schrift bei seiner Nachkommenschaft und ließen ihm seine Belohnung im Diesseits zuteil werden.
ref: And, We gave him (Abraham), Isaac and Jacob and appointed on his descendants the Prophethood and the Book.
draft: And WE gave him Ishaq and Ya'qub, appointed prophethood and the scripture among his descendants, and gave him his reward in this world.
hil: And WE gave him Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, appointed prophethood and revealed the scripture among his descendants, and gave him his reward in this world.
compare: And WE gave him Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, appointed prophethood and revealed the scripture among his descendants, and gave him his reward in this world.

src: Aber nein! Die Ungerechten befinden sich in deutlichem Irrtum.
ref: Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.
draft: But no! The unjust are clearly mistaken.
hil: But no! The unjust are in clear error.
compare: But no! The unjust are clearly mistaken.

src: Diese erhoben sich jedoch in Arroganz und waren schwer verfehlende Leute.
ref: But they behaved arrogantly and were Mujrimun (disbelievers, sinners, polytheists, criminals, etc.) folk.
draft: However, they rose in arrogance and were people who missed the mark heavily.
hil: However, they rose in arrogance and were people who missed the mark heavily.
compare: However, they rose in arrogance and were people who missed the mark heavily.

src: Und wenn sie als Gefangene zu euch kommen, so löst ihr sie aus.
ref: Although, should they come to you as captives, you would ransom them.
draft: And if they come to you as prisoners, you shall set them free.
hil: And if they come to you as prisoners, you shall set them free.
compare: And if they come to you as prisoners, you shall set them free.

src: Doch kooperiert nicht bei dem Verwerflichen und bei der Übertretung! Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber.
