ref: Assist each other to virtue and piety, and assist not each other to sin and transgression, Fear Allah: verily Allah is Severe in chastising.
draft: But do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH.
hil: But do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH.
compare: But do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH.

src: (Fordert) dann hernach entweder Gnade oder Lösegeld, bis der Krieg seine Lasten (von euch) wegnimmt. Das ist so.
ref: Then, either free them by grace orransom until war shall lay down its loads, in this way, it shall be.
draft: Then afterwards either demand mercy or ransom until the war removes its burdens from you. That's how it is.
hil: Then afterwards, demand either mercy or ransom until the war takes its burdens away from you. This is how it is.
compare: Then afterwards either demand mercy or ransom until the war removes its burdens from you. That's how it is.

src: Davon sind diejenigen Götzendiener ausgenommen, mit denen ihr einen Vertrag eingegangen seid und die es euch an nichts haben fehlen lassen und die keine anderen gegen euch unterstützt haben.
ref: Except those idolaters with whom you have a treaty, who have not failed you in the least, nor helped anyone against you.
draft: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have made a treaty and who have not failed you in any respect nor have aided anyone [against you].
hil: Exempted from this are those idolaters with whom you made a treaty and who have not failed you in any respect nor have aided anyone against you.
compare: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have made a treaty and who have not failed you in any respect nor have aided anyone [against you].

src: - denn gewiß, vor der Strafe ihres Herrn (kann) sich niemand sicher glauben,
ref: Surely no one can be secure from the punishment of his Lord, --
draft: For surely, no one can believe themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.
hil: For surely, no one can believe themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.
compare: For surely, no one can believe themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.

src: Am Tag, da sie auf ihren Gesichtern ins (Höllen)feuer gezerrt werden: "Kostet die Berührung der Sengenden."
ref: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."
draft: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire on their faces: "Taste the touch of the Scorching."
hil: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire on their faces: 'Taste the touch of the Scorching.'
compare: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire on their faces: "Taste the touch of the Scorching."

src: Ob der eine reich oder arm ist, so ist Allah beiden näher; darum folgt nicht der persönlichen Neigung, auf daß ihr gerecht handeln könnt. Und wenn ihr aber (die Wahrheit) verdreht oder euch von (der Wahrheit) abwendet, so ist Allah eures Tuns kundig.
ref: Whether a man be rich or poor, God is his greater well-wisher than you. So follow not the behests of lust lest you swerve from justice; and if you prevaricate or avoid (giving evidence), God is cognisant of all that you do.
draft: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; Therefore, do not follow personal inclination in order to act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or refuse (to accept it), then Allah is indeed aware of what you do.
hil: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; Therefore, do not follow personal inclination in order to act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or refuse (to accept it), then Allah is indeed aware of what you do.
compare: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; Therefore, do not follow personal inclination in order to act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or refuse (to accept it), then Allah is indeed aware of what you do.

src: Und richte deine Wünsche auf deinen Herrn aus.
ref: And turn to your Lord with all your love.
draft: And direct your wishes towards your Lord.
hil: And direct your desires towards your Lord.
compare: And direct your desires towards your Lord.

src: So ruft Ihn an, (wobei ihr) Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion (seid).
ref: Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.
draft: So call him, being sincere towards him in religion.
hil: So call on Him, being sincere towards Him in religion.
compare: So call on Him, being sincere towards Him in religion.

src: Aber viele von ihnen waren Frevler.
ref: But many of them are wicked.
draft: But many of them were wrongdoers.
hil: But many of them were wrongdoers.
compare: But many of them were wrongdoers.

src: Eine Gruppe von meinen Dienern pflegte zu sagen: >Unser Herr, wir glauben, so vergib uns und erbarme dich unser.
ref: There was a section among My creatures that said: 'O Lord, we believe.
draft: A group of my servants used to say, "Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us."
hil: A group of My bondmen said, 'Our Lord! We have accepted faith, therefore forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best among the merciful.'
compare: A group of my servants used to say, "Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us."

src: Und wenn Wir eine Stadt verderben wollen, befehlen Wir denen, die in ihr üppig leben, (zu freveln), und sie freveln in ihr.
ref: And when We decide to destroy a town (population), We (first) send a definite order (to obey Allah and be righteous) to those among them [or We (first) increase in number those of its population] who are given the good things of this life.
draft: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word [of punishment] comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it completely.
hil: On the day when We intend to destroy a city, We instruct its affluent people (to commit crimes), and they commit crimes therein.
compare: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word [of punishment] comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it completely.

src: Soll die Ermahnung (ausgerechnet) auf ihn aus unserer Mitte herabgesandt worden sein?"
ref: Hath Unto him the admonition been sent down from amongst us!
draft: "Should the admonition have been (of all people) sent down to him from our midst?"
hil: Has the admonition been sent to him from our midst (of all people)?
compare: "Should the admonition have been (of all people) sent down to him from our midst?"

src: Gewiß, wen DU ins Feuer eintreten läßt, den hast DU bereits mit Sicherheit erniedrigt.
ref: Whom Thou causest to enter the Fire: him indeed Thou hast confounded.
draft: Certainly, whom YOU let enter the fire, YOU have already humiliated for sure.
hil: Certainly, whom YOU let enter the fire, YOU have already humiliated with certainty.
compare: Certainly, whom YOU let enter the fire, YOU have already humiliated with certainty.

src: Und sie sagten: "Unser HERR!
ref: And they said, “Our Lord!
draft: And they said: "Our Lord!
hil: And they said, 'Our Lord!'
compare: And they said: "Our Lord!

src: Sie sagten: "Wir werden seinen Vater trotz seiner Zuneigung ihm gegenüber zu überreden suchen.
ref: They said, “We will solicit him from his father.
draft: They said: "We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him."
hil: They said, "We will seek to persuade his father despite his affection towards him."
compare: They said, "We will seek to persuade his father despite his affection towards him."

src: Wenn WIR wollen, lassen WIR mit ihnen die Erde versinken oder lassen WIR über ihnen Bruchteile vom Himmel fallen. Gewiß, darin ist doch eine Aya für jeden umkehrenden Diener.
ref: If We will, We can bury them into the earth or cause a part of the sky to fall on them; indeed in this is a sign for every repentant bondman.
draft: If we want to, we let the earth sink with them or we let fractions of the sky fall on them. Certainly, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.
hil: If WE will, We can make the Earth swallow them, or We can let fragments of the sky fall on them. Surely, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.
compare: If we want to, we let the earth sink with them or we let fractions of the sky fall on them. Certainly, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.

src: O meine Kinder, geht und erkundigt euch über Yusuf und seinen Bruder. Und gebt nicht die Hoffnung auf das Erbarmen Allahs auf.
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God.
draft: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope in Allah's mercy.
hil: "O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope in Allah's mercy."
compare: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope in Allah's mercy.

src: Der Ungläubige ist ein Helfer gegen seinen Herrn.
ref: The unbeliever has always been an auxiliary against his Lord.
draft: The unbeliever is an assistant against his master.
hil: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
compare: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.

src: Und sollten sie gegen euch den bewaffneten Kampf aufnehmen, werden sie euch den Rücken flüchtend kehren, dann wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: And if they fight you, they will turn around and flee, then they will not be helped.
draft: And if they take up armed struggle against you, they will flee from you in fear, and then no support will be given to them.
hil: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from Allah. Indeed, He initiates the creation, then repeats it, so that He may reward those who internalized faith and did good deeds in a fair manner. But for those who committed unbelief, there is a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to do.
compare: And if they take up armed struggle against you, they will flee from you in fear, and then no support will be given to them.

src: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was At-Tariq ist?
ref: How will you comprehend what the night star is?
draft: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?
hil: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?
compare: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?

src: Und solltest du sie um Rechtleitung bitten, hören sie bestimmt nicht.
ref: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear.
draft: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.
hil: "If you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen."
compare: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.

src: Es wird (zu ihnen) gesagt werden: "Betretet die Tore der Hölle, ewig darin zu bleiben."
ref: "Enter the gates of Hell," they will be told, "and there abide for ever."
draft: "They will be told (to them): 'Enter the gates of hell to stay there forever.'"
hil: They will be told (to them): 'Enter the gates of Hell to stay there forever.'
compare: They will be told (to them): 'Enter the gates of Hell to stay there forever.'

src: Und WIR erhöhten die einen von ihnen über die anderen um Stellungen, damit die einen von ihnen die anderen zu Beschäftigten nehmen. Doch die Gnade deines HERRN ist besser als das, was sie anhäufen.
ref: We have distributed among them their comforts in the life of this world, and gave high status to some over others so that they mock at each other; and the mercy of your Lord is better than all what they hoard.
draft: And WE raised some of them over others in ranks, so they may make use of one another for service. But the Mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.
hil: And WE raised some of them over others in ranks, so they may make use of one another for service. But the Mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.
compare: And WE raised some of them over others in ranks, so they may make use of one another for service. But the Mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.

src: Doch nur diejenigen, die zuhören, hören auf dich, während die Toten ALLAH erweckt. Dann werden sie zu Ihm zurückgebracht.
ref: Only they will respond who can hear. As for the dead, raised they will be by God, then to Him they will be returned.
draft: But only those who listen, hear you, while the dead are awakened by ALLAH. Then they are brought back to Him.
hil: And only those who listen, hear you, while the dead are revived by Allah. Then they are brought back to Him.
compare: But only those who listen, hear you, while the dead are awakened by ALLAH. Then they are brought back to Him.

src: Und wenn ihnen gesagt wird: "Folgt dem, was ALLAH hinabsandte." Sagen sie: "Nein, sondern wir folgen dem, woran wir unsere Ahnen fanden."
ref: and when it is said to them, 'Follow what God has sent down,' they say, 'No; but we will follow such things as we found our fathers doing.' What?
draft: And when they are told, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "No, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers."
hil: And when they are told, 'Follow what Allah has revealed', they say, 'No, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers.'
compare: And when they are told, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "No, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers."

src: Und es wurde den Menschen gesagt: "Wollt ihr euch nicht versammeln,
ref: And the people were also asked to assemble.
draft: And it was said to the people: "Do you not want to gather,
hil: And it was said to the people: 'Do you not want to gather'
compare: And it was said to the people: 'Do you not want to gather'

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt!
ref: O People who Believe!
draft: You who have declared the imam!
hil: You who have declared faith!
compare: You who have declared faith!

src: Das Bleibende (an Lohn) von Allah ist besser für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid. Und ich bin nicht Hüter über euch."
ref: That which is left to you by God is better, if you are true believers; yet I am not a warden over you."
draft: "The enduring (reward) from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not a keeper over you."
hil: The enduring reward from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not a keeper over you.
compare: "The enduring (reward) from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not a keeper over you."

src: (Er ist) der Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde.
ref: The Creator of the heavens and the earth.
draft: He is the creator of the heavens and the earth.
hil: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth.
compare: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth.

src: Und Frömmigkeit besteht nicht darin, daß ihr durch die Hinterseite in die Häuser geht. Frömmigkeit besteht darin, daß man gottesfürchtig ist.
ref: Piety does not lie in entering the house through the back door, for the pious man is he who follows the straight path.
draft: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.
hil: And tell them that they are there to indicate to people the phases of time and the pilgrimage season. Piety is to be God-fearing.
compare: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.

src: Sie alle haben WIR vor den Menschen ausgezeichnet,
ref: And each one of them We favoured over all mankind.
draft: They all have distinguished US in front of people.
hil: We have distinguished all of them in front of people.
compare: We have distinguished all of them in front of people.

src: Die Vornehmen seines Volkes, die nicht glaubten, sagten: "Wir sehen in dir nur einen Menschen unseresgleichen und wir sehen, daß dir keine als jene gefolgt sind, die aller äußeren Erscheinung nach die Niedrigsten unter uns sind, noch sehen wir in euch irgendeinen Vorzug vor uns; nein, wir erachten euch für Lügner."
ref: The leaders of the people who were unbelievers, replied: "We see that you are but a man like us, and see that none among us follows you but the meanest and immature of judgement, and do not see any excellence in you above us. In fact, we think you are a liar."
draft: The nobles of his people who did not believe said: "We only see in you a person like ourselves, and we see that none but those who are the lowest among us, judged by outward appearances, have followed you, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be a liar."
hil: The nobles of his people who did not believe said: 'We only see in you a person like ourselves, and we see that none but those who appear to be the lowest among us, have followed you, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be a liar.'
compare: The nobles of his people who did not believe said: "We only see in you a person like ourselves, and we see that none but those who are the lowest among us, judged by outward appearances, have followed you, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be a liar."

src: Und das Wort wird über sie fällig werden dafür, daß sie Unrecht taten, und da werden sie nicht reden.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed upon them for their wickedness, they will not be able to say a word.
draft: And the word will befall them for doing wrong, and then they will not speak.
hil: The word will come upon them because they did wrong, and then they will not speak.
compare: And the word will befall them for doing wrong, and then they will not speak.

src: Er steht für die Gerechtigkeit ein. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm, dem Mächtigen, dem Weisen.
ref: He upholds justice there is no god except He, the Mighty, the Wise.
draft: He stands up for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.
hil: He stands up for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.
compare: He stands up for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.

src: Und WIR machten sie zu Imamen, die zum Feuer einladen. Und am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: We made them the leaders of those who call to Hell; and on the Day of Judgement they will not be helped.
draft: And WE made them Imams inviting to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.
hil: And WE made them Imams who invite to the Fire; and on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.
compare: And WE made them Imams inviting to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.

src: Er sagte: «Doch. Aber mein Herz soll Ruhe finden.»
ref: Ibrahim said, “Surely yes, why not?
draft: He said, "However, my heart should find peace."
hil: He said, "Yes, but my heart should find peace."
compare: He said, "Yes, but my heart should find peace."

src: Kinder Adams! Bereits haben WIR euch Kleidung hinabgesandt, die eure Schamteile bedeckt, auch schmückende Kleidung.
ref: O sons of Adam, We have revealed to you a dress that would both hide your nakedness and be an adornment, but the raiment of piety is best.
draft: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your private parts and clothing for adornment.
hil: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your private parts and clothing for adornment.
compare: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your private parts and clothing for adornment.

src: Sie werden sagen: "(All dies ist) Allahs." Sprich: "Wieso also seid ihr verblendet?"
ref: Thereupon they will say, “Such greatness is only that of Allah”; say, “Then by what magic are you deceived?”
draft: You will say, "(All of this is) Allah's." Say, "So why are you deluded?"
hil: They will say, '(All of this is) Allah's.' Say, 'So why are you deluded?'
compare: They will say, '(All of this is) Allah's.' Say, 'So why are you deluded?'

src: Vielmehr (soll er sagen): "Seid Gottesgelehrte mit dem, was ihr gelehrt habt und mit dem, was ihr studiert habt."
ref: Rather, 'Be you masters in that you know the Book, and in that you study.'
draft: Rather (he should say): "Be scholars of God with what you have taught and what you have studied."
hil: Instead, he should say, 'Be scholars of God with what you have taught and what you have studied.'
compare: Instead, he should say, 'Be scholars of God with what you have taught and what you have studied.'

src: Ich folge nur dem, was mir eingegeben wird.
ref: I only follow what is sent down to me."
draft: I only follow what is given to me.
hil: I only follow what is given to me.
compare: I only follow what is given to me.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: "lch tat es damals, als ich auf dem Irrweg war.
ref: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,
draft: He (Moses) said, "I did it back then when I was lost."
hil: He (Moses) said: 'I did it back then when I was lost.'
compare: He (Moses) said, "I did it back then when I was lost."

src: Sie werden mit silbernen Spangen geschmückt sein. Und ihr Herr wird sie von einem reinen Trank trinken lassen.
ref: And adorned they shall be with bracelets of silver: and their Lord shall give them drink a beverage pure.
draft: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will allow them to drink from a pure potion.
hil: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will allow them to drink from a pure potion.
compare: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will allow them to drink from a pure potion.

src: Die damit rechnen, daß sie ihrem Herrn begegnen und daß sie zu Ihm zurückkehren werden.
ref: Who are conscious that they have to meet their Lord, and to Him they have to return.
draft: Those who expect to meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.
hil: Those who expect to meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.
compare: Those who expect to meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: They are the residents of Hell where they will live for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain therein forever.
hil: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain therein forever.
compare: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain therein forever.

src: Dann verdorrt es, und du siehst es gelb werden. Dann macht Er es zu zermalmtem Zeug.
ref: Thereafter it wirhereth, and thou beholdest it turn yellow; then He maketh it chaff.
draft: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.
hil: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.
compare: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.

src: Aber er wandte sich der Erde zu und folgte seiner Neigung. So ist es mit ihm wie mit einem Hund: Gehst du auf ihn los, hängt er die Zunge heraus; läßt du ihn in Ruhe, hängt er auch die Zunge heraus.
ref: if it had been Our will, We could have used these signs to exalt him, but instead he clung to the earth and followed his own desires, he was like a dog that pants whether you chase it away or leave it alone.
draft: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him as with a dog: If you attack him, he sticks out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also sticks out his tongue.
hil: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him as with a dog: If you attack him, he sticks out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also sticks out his tongue.
compare: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him as with a dog: If you attack him, he sticks out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also sticks out his tongue.

src: Und erwähne den Bruder von 'Aad, als er seine Leute in Al-ahqaf warnte, und bereits vergingen die Warner vor ihm und hinter ihm: "Dient nichts anderes als ALLAH!
ref: And remember (Hud) the brother of 'Ad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf (the curved sand-hills in the southern part of Arabian Peninsula).
draft: And mention the brother of 'Aad, as he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf and warners had already passed on before him and behind him: "Worship none but Allah!
hil: And mention the brother of 'Aad, as he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf and warners had already passed on before him and behind him: 'Worship none but Allah!'
compare: And mention the brother of 'Aad, as he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf and warners had already passed on before him and behind him: 'Worship none but Allah!'

src: Aber was für ihre Teilhaber ist, das erreicht Allah nicht, während das, was für Allah ist, ihre Teilhaber erreicht.
ref: So what is for their associates reaches not God; and what is for God reaches their associates.
draft: But what is for their partners, Allah does not attain, while what is for Allah, their partners attain.
hil: But what belongs to their partners does not reach Allah, while what belongs to Allah reaches their partners.
compare: But what belongs to their partners does not reach Allah, while what belongs to Allah reaches their partners.

src: Sag: Wenn ich ihn ersonnen haben sollte, so vermögt ihr für mich nichts gegen Allah (auszurichten). Er weiß sehr wohl, worüber ihr euch (ausgiebig) auslaßt.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “If I have fabricated it, then (I know that) you have no power to support me against Allah; He well knows the matters you are involved in; He is Sufficient as a Witness between me and you; and He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”
draft: Say: "If I had devised it, you would not possess for me [the power of protection] against Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved.
hil: Say: "If I had devised it, you would not possess for me [the power of protection] against Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved."
compare: Say: "If I had devised it, you would not possess for me [the power of protection] against Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved.

src: Und Nuh rief Uns ja bereits zu - welch trefflicher Erhörer sind Wir fürwahr!
ref: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).
draft: And Nuh already called out to us - what a splendid listener we truly are!
hil: And Noah already called out to Us - what an excellent listener We truly are!
compare: And Nuh already called out to us - what a splendid listener we truly are!

src: Und gib denen frohe Botschaft, die Gutes tun.
ref: So give glad tidings to those who are doers of good.
draft: And give glad tidings to those who do good.
hil: And give glad tidings to those who do good.
compare: And give glad tidings to those who do good.

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben. Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem ER will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: That God may reward them for the best of their deeds, and bestow more on them of His bounty, for God gives whom He please without measure.
draft: "ALLAH will surely reward them with something better than what they have done, and will give them more of His grace. And ALLAH provides Rizq (sustenance) to whom He wills, without measure."
hil: Verily, Allah will give them a reward much better than what they had done, and will give them more of His bounty. And Allah provides sustenance to whom He wills without limit.
compare: "ALLAH will surely reward them with something better than what they have done, and will give them more of His grace. And ALLAH provides Rizq (sustenance) to whom He wills, without measure."

src: Er macht sie deutlich für Leute, die Bescheid wissen.
ref: He manifesteth them for people who have knowledge.
draft: He makes them clear for people who know.
hil: He makes them clear for people who know.
compare: He makes them clear for people who know.

src: Dann vertauschten es diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, mit einem Ausspruch, der anders war als das, was ihnen gesagt worden war. Da sandten Wir über diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, ein Zorngericht vom Himmel herab dafür, daß sie frevelten.
ref: But the wicked changed and perverted the word We had spoken to a word distorted, and We sent from heaven retribution on the wicked, for they disobeyed.
draft: Then those who were doing wrong substituted another saying for that which had been given to them; so We sent upon the wrong-doers wrath from heaven because they were violating (the truth).
hil: Then those who committed wrongdoing attributed to Him a statement not aligned with that which they were given. So We sent down upon the wrongdoers wrath from the sky for their transgression.
compare: Then those who were doing wrong substituted another saying for that which had been given to them; so We sent upon the wrong-doers wrath from heaven because they were violating (the truth).

src: Und wen ALLAH abirren läßt, für den gibt es keinen Weg (zur Rechtleitung).
ref: He whom God allows to go astray has no way.
draft: And whom Allah leads astray, there is no way (to the right path).
hil: And whoever Allah allows to go astray, there is no way for them (to guidance).
compare: And whom Allah leads astray, there is no way (to the right path).

src: Sie gebieten das Rechte und verbieten das Verwerfliche, verrichten das Gebet und entrichten die Abgabe und gehorchen Allah und Seinem Gesandten.
ref: They advocate virtue, forbid evil, perform the prayers, practice charity, and obey God and His Messenger.
draft: They command what is right and forbid what is wrong, perform prayer and pay alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.
hil: They command what is right and forbid what is wrong, perform prayer and pay alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.
compare: They command what is right and forbid what is wrong, perform prayer and pay alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.

src: Die Bewohner von Medina und die arabischen Beduinen in ihrer Umgebung dürfen nicht hinter dem Gesandten Gottes zurückbleiben und sich selbst ihm vorziehen. Dies, weil sie weder auf dem Weg Gottes Durst oder Mühsal oder Hunger erleiden noch einen Schritt unternehmen, der die Ungläubigen in Groll versetzt, noch einem Feind etwas zufügen, ohne daß dadurch ein gutes Werk für sie aufgezeichnet würde.
ref: It was not worthy of the people of Madina, and the Arabs of the desert around them, to abandon the Prophet of God, and to care more for themselves than for him; for there is no hardship or thirst or hunger that they know in the service of God, and no place they walk on where walking provokes the unbelievers, and no harm they receive from the enemy, but is put down as a good deed in their favour.
draft: The residents of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings may not lag behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship or hunger on the way of God, nor take a step that would cause disbelief, nor inflict harm on an enemy without a good deed being recorded for them.
hil: The people of Medinah and the villages around them should not stay behind the Noble Messenger of God and consider their own lives dearer to them than his life. This is because they are neither thirsty, nor in pain or hungry on Allah's cause, nor tread a place that angers the disbelievers, nor cause harm to an enemy except that a good deed is recorded for them. Allah does not waste the wages of the virtuous.
compare: The residents of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings may not lag behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship or hunger on the way of God, nor take a step that would cause disbelief, nor inflict harm on an enemy without a good deed being recorded for them.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allkräftig, allwürdig.
ref: Verily God is all-powerful and all-mighty.
draft: Certainly, Allah is all-powerful, all-worthy.
hil: Certainly, Allah is all-powerful, all-worthy.
compare: Certainly, Allah is all-powerful, all-worthy.

src: Doch selbst dann, wenn sie sich mit ihrer Kleidung verhüllen, ER kennt alles, was sie verheimlichen und was sie offenlegen.
ref: But when they cover themselves up with their garments, He knows what they hide and what they expose.
draft: But even then, when they conceal themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they hide and what they reveal.
hil: But even then, when they conceal themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they hide and what they reveal.
compare: But even then, when they conceal themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they hide and what they reveal.

src: Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: The Ark came to rest on Mount Judi.
draft: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
hil: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
compare: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Und rufe neben Allah keinen anderen Gott an. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: And call not upon another god with God; there is no god but He.
draft: And call upon no other god alongside Allah. There is no god but Him.
hil: And call upon no other god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.
compare: And call upon no other god alongside Allah. There is no god but Him.

src: Sag: "Diejenigen in den Himmeln und auf Erden kennen das Verborgene nicht, nur ALLAH (kennt es)!" Und sie merken nicht, wann sie erweckt werden.
ref: Say: "No one in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unknown except God, nor can they know when they will be raised again.
draft: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only ALLAH (knows it)!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
hil: Say: 'Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only ALLAH (knows it)!' And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
compare: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only ALLAH (knows it)!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.

src: Oder sagen sie etwa: "Er hat ihn sich selbst ausgedacht'"? Nein!
ref: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”?
draft: Or do they say: "He made it up himself?" No!
hil: Or do they say, 'He made it up himself?' No!'
compare: Or do they say: "He made it up himself?" No!

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ändert nichts von dem worin Menschen sind, bis sie das ändern, was sie in sich tragen. Und wenn ALLAH für Menschen Übel bestimmt, so kann es nicht aufgehalten werden.
ref: Lo! Allah changeth not the condition of a folk until they (first) change that which is in their hearts; and if Allah willeth misfortune for a folk there is none that can repel it, nor have they a defender beside Him.
draft: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in which people are until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah has determined something bad for people, it cannot be stopped.
hil: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in which people are until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah has determined something bad for people, it cannot be stopped.
compare: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in which people are until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah has determined something bad for people, it cannot be stopped.

src: Und unter ihnen ist eine Gruppe, die mit ihren Zungen die Schrift verdrehen, damit ihr denkt, dies gehöre zur Schrift, obwohl es nicht zur Schrift gehört, noch dazu sagen sie: "Es sei von ALLAH", doch es ist nicht von ALLAH. Und sie verbreiten Lügen im Namen ALLAHs, während sie es wissen.
ref: Among them is a section which distorts in reading the Scripture in a way that though it sounds like the Scripture, in fact it is not; yet they say it is from God, when they know it is not; and they lie about God, and knowingly.
draft: And among them is a group who distort the Scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the Scripture, but it is not from the Scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.
hil: And among them is a group who distort the scripture with their tongues so that you may think it is from the scripture, although it is not from the scripture. Additionally, they say: 'It is from Allah,' but it is not from Allah. And they spread lies in the name of Allah, even though they know.
compare: And among them is a group who distort the Scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the Scripture, but it is not from the Scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.

src: Und haltet sie an; denn sie sollen befragt werden."
ref: And detain them, for they will be questioned."
draft: "And stop them, for they shall be questioned."
hil: And detain them because they shall be questioned.
compare: And detain them because they shall be questioned.

src: Und ER ist mit euch, wo ihr seid.
ref: And He is with you (by His Knowledge) wheresoever you may be.
draft: And HE is with you, wherever you are.
hil: And HE is with you, wherever you are.
compare: And HE is with you, wherever you are.

src: Vielmehr ist Allah euer Schutzherr; und Er ist der beste Helfer.
ref: Allah is your Patron and He is the best of the helpers.
draft: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.
hil: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.
compare: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist einer von dreien."
ref: They are unbelievers who say, 'God is the Third of Three.
draft: For sure, those who say "Certainly, Allah is one of three" are unbelievers.
hil: Verily, those who say 'Certainly Allah is one of three' are unbelievers.
compare: For sure, those who say "Certainly, Allah is one of three" are unbelievers.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb. Er sagte: «O mein Volk, dienet Gott. Ihr habt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Ein deutliches Zeichen ist von eurem Herrn zu euch gekommen, so gebt volles Maß und Gewicht und zieht den Menschen nichts ab, was ihnen gehört, und stiftet nicht Unheil auf der Erde, nachdem sie in Ordnung gebracht worden ist. Das ist bestimmt besser für euch, so ihr gläubig seid.
ref: And We sent Shuaib to Madyan from their community; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah – you do not have any God except Him; indeed a clear proof has come to you from your Lord, so measure and weigh in full and do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not spread turmoil in the earth after it is organised; this is for your good, if you believe.”
draft: And (We sent) their brother Shuayb to Madyan. He said, "O my people, worship Allah. You have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers."
hil: And to Madyan We sent their brother Shuayb. He said: O my people, worship Allah. You have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers.
compare: And (We sent) their brother Shuayb to Madyan. He said, "O my people, worship Allah. You have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers."

src: Seine Blütenstände sind so, als wären sie Köpfe der Satane.
ref: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.
draft: His inflorescences are as if they were heads of Satan.
hil: His inflorescences are like heads of Satan.
compare: His inflorescences are like heads of Satan.

src: (Geht also) mit unseren Zeichen. Ihr und diejenigen, die euch folgen, werden die Sieger sein.»
ref: By virtue of Our signs, you and those who follow you will be the triumphant.”
draft: "So (goes it), by our signs. You and those who follow you will be the winners."
hil: Go forth, therefore, with Our signs. You and those who follow you will be the victorious ones.
compare: "So (goes it), by our signs. You and those who follow you will be the winners."

src: Und Sulaiman beerbte Dawud.
ref: And Sulaiman (Solomon) inherited (the knowledge of) Dawud (David).
draft: And Sulaiman succeeded Dawud.
hil: And Sulaiman succeeded Dawud.
compare: And Sulaiman succeeded Dawud.

src: Kein Anderer als der Allerbarmer hält sie zurück.
ref: Nothing holds them aloft but God.
draft: No one but the Most Merciful holds them back.
hil: No other than the Most Merciful holds them back.
compare: No one but the Most Merciful holds them back.

src: So vergelten Wir den Ungerechten.
ref: That is how We requite the iniquitous.
draft: So we repay the unjust.
hil: Thus do we recompense the wrongdoers.
compare: Thus do we recompense the wrongdoers.

src: Und Mein Fluch soll auf dir bis zum Tage des Gerichts lasten."
ref: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."
draft: "And my curse shall weigh upon you until the day of judgement."
hil: And my curse shall weigh upon you until the day of judgement.
compare: "And my curse shall weigh upon you until the day of judgement."

src: Entsinnt euch Meiner Gaben, die ICH euch gewährt habe, und daß ICH euch den Menschen gegenüber auszeichnete.
ref: Remember the favour of Mine, which I bestowed upon you and gave you superiority over others of your time. (by sending the Noble Messengers to your nation)
draft: Remember my gifts that I have granted you and that I have distinguished you from people.
hil: Remember my gifts which I have granted you and that I have set you apart from people.
compare: Remember my gifts which I have granted you and that I have set you apart from people.

src: Sprich: "Er ist es, Der euch ins Dasein rief und Der euch Ohren und Augen und Herzen gab; (aber) gering ist es, was ihr an Dank wißt!"
ref: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
draft: Speak: "It is He who called you into being and gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (but) little do you know of gratitude!"
hil: Speak: "He is the one who called you into being and gave you ears and eyes and hearts; yet you know little of gratitude!"
compare: Speak: "It is He who called you into being and gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (but) little do you know of gratitude!"

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Wenn ihr zum rituellen Gebet aufstehen wollt, dann wascht (vorher) eure Gesichter, eure Hände und Arme bis zu den Ellenbogen, benetzt eure Köpfe und (wascht) eure Füße bis zu den Knöcheln.
ref: O believers, when you stand up for the service of prayer wash your faces and hands up to elbows, and also wipe your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! If you want to get up for ritual prayer, then wash your faces, your hands and arms up to the elbows beforehand, moisten your heads and wash your feet up to the ankles.
hil: "O you who have internalized the Imam! If you wish to stand up for the prayer <for> then wash your faces, your hands, and arms up to the elbows, pass wet palms over your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles."
compare: "O you who have internalized the Imam! If you wish to stand up for the prayer <for> then wash your faces, your hands, and arms up to the elbows, pass wet palms over your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles."

src: Dies (geschieht), weil sie dem folgten, was Allah erzürnte, und das haßten, was ihm wohlgefällig war. So macht Er ihre Werke zunichte.
ref: This is because they followed the matter which displeases Allah, and they disliked what pleases Him – He therefore squandered away all their deeds.
draft: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what pleased Him. Thus, He makes their deeds vain.
hil: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what pleased Him. Thus, He makes their deeds vain.
compare: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what pleased Him. Thus, He makes their deeds vain.

src: Und sag: "Die Wahrheit ist von eurem HERRN. Wer will, der soll den Iman verinnerlichen, und wer will, der soll Kufr betreiben."
ref: Say: "The truth is from your Lord: So believe if you like, or do not believe if you will."
draft: And say, "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wishes, let them internalize iman (belief), and whoever wishes, let them engage in kufr (disbelief)."
hil: Say: 'The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wishes, let them internalize iman (belief), and whoever wishes, let them engage in kufr (disbelief).'
compare: And say, "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wishes, let them internalize iman (belief), and whoever wishes, let them engage in kufr (disbelief)."

src: ALLAH gehört, was in den Himmeln und auf Erden ist. Gewiß, ALLAH ist Der absolut Autarke, Der Alllobenswürdige.
ref: To Allah only belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and in the earth; indeed Allah only is the Absolute, the Most Praiseworthy.
draft: Allah owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, Allah is the completely self-sufficient, the praised.
hil: Allah owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, Allah is the completely self-sufficient, the praised.
compare: Allah owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, Allah is the completely self-sufficient, the praised.

src: Und WIR ließen darin einen Fluß entspringen.
ref: And We made a river flow through them.
draft: And we let a river spring from it.
hil: And WE made a river spring from it.
compare: And WE made a river spring from it.

src: Das, was Gott für euch an Lebensunterhalt herabgesandt hat und was ihr in Verbotenes und Erlaubtes eingeteilt habt, - sprich: Hat Gott es euch erlaubt, oder erdichtet ihr etwas gegen Gott?
ref: And you have made of it lawful and unlawful." Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Has Allah permitted you (to do so), or do you invent a lie against Allah?"
draft: What God has sent down to you as sustenance and which you have divided into forbidden and lawful, say: "Has God permitted you to do so, or do you invent lies against God?"
hil: What God has sent down to you as sustenance and which you have divided into forbidden and lawful, say: "Has God permitted you to do so, or do you invent lies against God?"
compare: What God has sent down to you as sustenance and which you have divided into forbidden and lawful, say: "Has God permitted you to do so, or do you invent lies against God?"

src: Und jeder Seele wird in vollem Maß zukommen, was sie getan hat. Er weiß sehr wohl Bescheid über das, was sie tun.
ref: And every soul will be repaid for its deeds in full, and He knows very well what they used to do.
draft: And every soul will receive in full measure what they have done. He is well aware of what they do.
hil: And every soul will be rewarded for what it has done in full measure. He knows well about what they do.
compare: And every soul will be rewarded for what it has done in full measure. He knows well about what they do.

src: Diejenigen nun, die gottergeben sind, bemühen sich um den rechten Wandel.
ref: Those who have submitted have taken the right course;
draft: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.
hil: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.
compare: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.

src: Und viel Beute, die sie nehmen würden.
ref: And the many spoils that they were to take.
draft: And a lot of loot they would take.
hil: And much loot they would take.
compare: And much loot they would take.

src: ALLAH richtet zwischen euch am Tag der Auferstehung in dem, worüber ihr uneins zu sein pflegtet."
ref: God will judge between you on the Day of Judgement in what you are at variance."
draft: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding the matters in which you used to dispute."
hil: ALLAH judges between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding the matters in which you used to dispute.
compare: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding the matters in which you used to dispute."

src: Nein! Vielmehr ist die Stunde (des Gerichts) der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt. Und die Stunde ist noch schrecklicher und bitterer.
ref: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.
draft: No! Rather, the hour (of judgment) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.
hil: Rather, the Hour is their encounter, which is even more terrible and bitter.
compare: No! Rather, the hour (of judgment) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.

src: angelehnt darin auf Liegen.
ref: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches.
draft: leaning on them on loungers.
hil: "leaning on them on loungers."
compare: leaning on them on loungers.

src: Für diejenigen, die Gutes tun, gibt es hier im Diesseits Gutes.
ref: For those who do good in this world, is goodness.
draft: "For those who do good, there is good in this world"
hil: For those who do good, good is there in this world.
compare: "For those who do good, there is good in this world"

src: Dann sprachen Wir: "Geht beide zum Volk, das Unsere Zeichen verworfen hat": dann zerstörten Wir sie alle vollständig.
ref: Then We told them: "Go to the people who have rejected Our signs." Then We annihilated them completely.
draft: Then We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them completely.
hil: Then We said, 'Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs.' Then We destroyed them completely.
compare: Then We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them completely.

src: Doch wenn ihr in Furcht seid, dann betet zu Fuß oder im Reiten. Und wenn ihr in Sicherheit seid, gedenkt Allahs, wie Er euch das gelehrt hat, was ihr nicht wußtet.
ref: If you fear (war or danger), pray while standing or on horseback; but when you have safety again remember God, for He taught you what you did not know.
draft: But if you are afraid, then pray on foot or riding. And when you are safe, remember Allah as He has taught you what you did not know.
hil: "But if you are afraid, then pray on foot or riding. And when you are safe, remember Allah as He has taught you what you did not know."
compare: But if you are afraid, then pray on foot or riding. And when you are safe, remember Allah as He has taught you what you did not know.

src: Acht Paare: zwei von den Schafen und zwei von den Ziegen.
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats.
draft: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
hil: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
compare: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.

src: Und Wir haben Mose das Buch zukommen lassen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)].
draft: And We have sent Moses the book.
hil: And We have sent Moses the book.
compare: And We have sent Moses the book.

src: Und es werden sie dort ewig junge Knaben bedienen. Wenn du sie siehst, hältst du sie für verstreute Perlen.
ref: Immortal youths shall surround them, waiting upon them; when you see them, you would think they are scattered pearls.
draft: And there, forever young boys will serve them. If you see them, you will take them for scattered pearls.
hil: And there, forever young boys will serve them. If you see them, you will take them for scattered pearls.
compare: And there, forever young boys will serve them. If you see them, you will take them for scattered pearls.

src: Doch, mit Sicherheit! Gewiß, sein HERR war über ihn allsehend.
ref: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.
draft: Yes, for sure! Certainly, his LORD was all-seeing over him.
hil: "Of course, definitely! Surely, his Lord was all-seeing over him."
compare: Yes, for sure! Certainly, his LORD was all-seeing over him.

src: Und WIR ließen diejenigen Leute, die unterdrückt wurden, erben das Östliche und das Westliche des Landes, das WIR mit Baraka erfüllt haben. Und das gute Versprechen deines HERRN für die Kinder Israils wurde vollständig eingelöst als Belohnung für die Geduld, die sie aufbrachten. Und WIR vernichteten das, was Pharao und seine Leute bewerkstelligten, und das, was sie an Bauten errichteten.
ref: And We made the people who were oppressed, the inheritors of the eastern and western parts of the land in which We placed blessings; and the good promise of your Lord was fulfilled for the Descendants of Israel – the reward of their patience; and We destroyed whatever Firaun and his people built and whatever they had contrived.
draft: And WE let those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land, which WE have filled with Baraka. And the good promise of your LORD for the Children of Israel was fully fulfilled as a reward for the patience they showed. And WE destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and what they had built.
hil: And WE let those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land, which WE have filled with blessings. And the good promise of your LORD for the Children of Israel was fully fulfilled as a reward for the patience they showed. And WE destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and what they had built.
compare: And WE let those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land, which WE have filled with Baraka. And the good promise of your LORD for the Children of Israel was fully fulfilled as a reward for the patience they showed. And WE destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and what they had built.

src: Auch haben sie eine Schuldklage gegen mich erhoben, deshalb fürchte ich, daß sie mich umbringen."
ref: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."
draft: Also, they have filed a lawsuit against me, so I'm afraid they'll kill me.
hil: They have also brought a lawsuit against me, so I am afraid that they will kill me.
compare: They have also brought a lawsuit against me, so I am afraid that they will kill me.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt diejenigen, die euren Din zum Spott und zur Belustigung mißbrauchen von denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, und von den Kafir, nicht als Wali!
ref: O ye who believe! take not as friends those who make a mockery and fun of your religion from among those who have been vouchsafed the Book before you and other infidels.
draft: You, who have internalized the Iman! Take not as allies those who mock and make fun of your Din from among those who were given the Scripture before you, and the disbelievers.
hil: You who have been granted the Scripture! Do not take as allies those who mock and make sport of your faith from among those who were given the Scripture before you, and from the unbelievers, not as Wali!
compare: You, who have internalized the Iman! Take not as allies those who mock and make fun of your Din from among those who were given the Scripture before you, and the disbelievers.

src: Nimm Almosen von ihrem Besitz, auf daß du sie dadurch reinigen und läutern mögest.
ref: Accept the offerings they make from their wealth in order to cleanse and purify them for progress, and invoke blessings upon them.
draft: Take alms from their possessions, so you may thereby purify and cleanse them.
hil: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.
compare: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.

src: So gewähre den Ungläubigen noch eine Frist.
ref: So give a respite to the disbelievers.
draft: "So give the unbelievers a deadline."
hil: So grant the unbelievers yet a respite.
compare: So grant the unbelievers yet a respite.

src: Sie folgen einem bloßen Wahn und ihren persönlichen Neigungen, obwohl doch die Weisung ihres Herrn zu ihnen kam.
ref: They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.
draft: They follow a mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.
hil: They follow a mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.
compare: They follow a mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.

src: ER sagte: "Das von Mir Versprochene umfaßt nicht die Unrecht-Begehenden."
ref: He said 'My covenant shall not reach the evildoers.'
draft: He said, "What I promised does not include those who commit wrong."
hil: He said, 'What I promised does not include those who commit wrong.'
compare: He said, "What I promised does not include those who commit wrong."

src: Das Wasser nahm ab, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Es hielt auf dem Djudi an.
ref: And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).
draft: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.
hil: The water receded, and the matter was resolved. It stopped at the Djudi.
compare: The water receded, and the matter was resolved. It stopped at the Djudi.

src: Doch WIR sehen mit euch nicht eure Fürbittenden, die ihr unter euch als Partner (für ALLAH) angenommen habt. Gewiß, bereits ist (die Bindung) zwischen euch unterbrochen und euch ist das abhanden gekommen, was ihr angenommen habt.
ref: We do not see with you your intercessors, those you asserted to be associates in you; the bond between you is now broken; that which you ever asserted has now gone astray from you.
draft: But WE do not see those intercessors whom you have taken as partners (besides Allah) among yourselves. Indeed, the bond between you has been severed and lost from you is what you assumed.
hil: But we do not see with you the intercessors whom you have taken as partners (for Allah) among yourselves. Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken, and what you had assumed is now lost to you.
compare: But WE do not see those intercessors whom you have taken as partners (besides Allah) among yourselves. Indeed, the bond between you has been severed and lost from you is what you assumed.

src: Und hätten WIR ihnen geboten: "ihr sollt euch selbst töten oder eure Wohnstätten verlassen, würden dies nur wenige von ihnen tun." Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: If We had commanded them to lay down their lives and to go forth from their homes, only a few would have obeyed; though had they followed what they had been commanded it would surely have been good for them and the strengthening of their faith.
draft: And if we had commanded them, "kill yourselves" or "leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.
hil: If we had commanded them, 'kill yourselves' or 'leave your homes,' only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.
compare: And if we had commanded them, "kill yourselves" or "leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.

src: Und (denke daran,) wenn sie (dereinst) im (Höllen)feuer miteinander streiten, dann sagen die Schwachen zu denjenigen, die sich hochmütig verhielten: "Wir waren doch eure Gefolgsleute; könnt ihr uns nun einen Teil des (Höllen)feuers abnehmen?"
ref: As they will noisily argue in the Fire, the weaker ones will say to the arrogant: "We were your followers, so will you take over some of our share of the fire?"
draft: And (remember,) when they (someday) argue with each other in the (hell)fire, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you now take a part of the (hell)fire from us?"
hil: And when they argue with each other in the (hell)fire someday, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you now take a part of the (hell)fire from us?"
compare: And (remember,) when they (someday) argue with each other in the (hell)fire, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you now take a part of the (hell)fire from us?"

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben.
ref: If you lend a goodly loan to God, He will double it for you, and forgive you.
draft: If you give ALLAH (His cause) a Hasan loan, HE will multiply it for you and forgive you.
hil: If you give ALLAH (His cause) a Hasan loan, HE will multiply it for you and forgive you.
compare: If you give ALLAH (His cause) a Hasan loan, HE will multiply it for you and forgive you.

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il!
ref: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book.
draft: And mention Isma'il in the scripture!
hil: And mention Isma'il in the scripture!
compare: And mention Isma'il in the scripture!

src: Da wandte Er sich euch wieder gnädig zu.
ref: Then He accepted your repentance.
draft: He turned to you again with grace.
hil: At that time, your Creator turned to you again with grace, the Merciful.
compare: He turned to you again with grace.

src: Erhaben ist Allah, der König, der Wahre!
ref: So high exalted be God, the true King!
draft: Sublime is Allah, the King, the True!
hil: Exalted is Allah, the King, the True!
compare: Sublime is Allah, the King, the True!

src: Er (Fir'aun) sagte: "Ihr glaubt an ihn, bevor ich es euch erlaube?
ref: (The Pharaoh) said: "You have come to believe without my dispensation.
draft: He (Pharaoh) said, "You believe in him before I allow you to?"
hil: He said, 'Do you believe in him before I give you permission?'
compare: He said, 'Do you believe in him before I give you permission?'

src: Dann warf Moses seinen Stock hin, und siehe, er verschlang (all) das, was sie vorgetäuscht hatten.
ref: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it swallowed up their conjurations.
draft: Then Moses threw his staff, and behold, it devoured all that they had falsely displayed.
hil: Then Moses threw his staff, and behold, it devoured all that they had falsely displayed.
compare: Then Moses threw his staff, and behold, it devoured all that they had falsely displayed.

src: Und sie haben Gott Teilhaber gegeben: die Djinn, wo Er sie doch erschaffen hat. Und sie haben Ihm Söhne und Töchter angedichtet, ohne (richtiges) Wissen.
ref: Yet they ascribe to jinns a partnership with God, although He created them; and they ascribe to Him sons and daughters, without possessing any knowledge.
draft: And they have attributed partners to God: the Jinn, even though He created them. And they have ascribed sons and daughters to Him, without knowledge.
hil: And they have assigned partners to God: the Jinn, even though He created them. And they have attributed sons and daughters to Him, without knowledge.
compare: And they have attributed partners to God: the Jinn, even though He created them. And they have ascribed sons and daughters to Him, without knowledge.

src: Sag: "ALLAH genügt als Zeuge zwischen mir und euch!
ref: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you.
draft: Say: "Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!
hil: Say: 'Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!'
compare: Say: "Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!

src: Sondern nur, wenn einer mit einem gesunden Herzen zu Gott kommt.»
ref: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."
draft: "But only if someone comes to God with a healthy heart."
hil: But only when someone comes to God with a pure heart.
compare: "But only if someone comes to God with a healthy heart."

src: Sie sagten: "Wir vermissen den Kelch des Königs.
ref: "We cannot find the master's goblet.
draft: They said, "We miss the king's chalice."
hil: They said: 'We miss the king's chalice.'
compare: They said: 'We miss the king's chalice.'

src: Für alle sind Rangstufen bestimmt für das, was sie getan haben, und dies, damit Er ihnen ihre Taten voll erstatte. Und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: Each will have a position in accordance with his deeds; and no wrong will be done to them.
draft: "For everyone, ranks are determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged."
hil: For everyone, ranks are determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged.
compare: "For everyone, ranks are determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged."

src: Und Wir machen damit (manch) totes Land wieder lebendig; so wird auch das Herauskommen (erfolgen).
ref: And We give life therewith to a dead land. Thus will be the resurrection (of the dead).
draft: And we make (some) dead land come back to life; thus the coming out (will happen) as well.
hil: We make (some) dead land come back to life; thus the coming out (will happen) as well.
compare: And we make (some) dead land come back to life; thus the coming out (will happen) as well.

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, wenn WIR sie im Lande festigen, dann verrichten sie ordnungsgemäß das rituelle Gebet, entrichten die Zakat, rufen zum Gebilligten auf und raten vomMißbilligten ab. Und ALLAH gehört das Anschließende von den Angelegenheiten.
ref: The people who, if We give them control in the land, would keep the prayer established and pay charity and enjoin virtue and forbid from evil; and for Allah only is the result of all works.
draft: (They are) those who, when WE establish them in the land, perform the prayer, give the zakat, enjoin the good and forbid the evil. And the final success in all matters is with Allah.
hil: They are those who, when WE establish them in the land, perform the prayer properly, give the zakat, enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And the final outcome of all matters is with Allah.
compare: They are those who, when WE establish them in the land, perform the prayer properly, give the zakat, enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And the final outcome of all matters is with Allah.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch aus Erde erschuf, dann aus Nutfa, dann aus 'Alaqa, dann bringt ER euch als Kind heraus, dann damit ihr reif werdet, dann damit ihr Alte werdet - und von euch gibt es manche, deren (Seelen) vorher eingezogen werden - und damit ihr eine festgelegte Frist erreicht. Und damit ihr begreift.
ref: It is He who created you from dust, then a drop of semen, then the embryo; afterwards He brings you forth as a child; then you attain the age of manhood, and then reach old age. But some of you die before you reach the appointed term that you may haply understand.
draft: HE is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [age of] full strength, and then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a appointed term; and perhaps you will use reason.
hil: He is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [age of] full strength, and then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach an appointed term; and perhaps you will use reason.
compare: HE is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [age of] full strength, and then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a appointed term; and perhaps you will use reason.

src: Und es kamen die Brüder Yusufs und traten zu ihm ein; er erkannte sie, sie aber erkannten ihn nicht.
ref: The brothers of Joseph came (to Egypt) and visited him. He recognised them, though they did not recognise him.
draft: And the brothers of Joseph came and approached him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.
hil: And Joseph's brothers came and approached him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.
compare: And the brothers of Joseph came and approached him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.

src: Seid ihr darin also gleich (und) fürchtet sie, wie ihr einander fürchtet?
ref: Whom you fear as you fear each other?
draft: Are you the same in it and afraid of them as you are afraid of each other?
hil: Are you equal therein and fear them as you fear each other?
compare: Are you equal therein and fear them as you fear each other?

src: Dies sind (die Mittel) zur Aufklärung für die Menschheit und eine Führung und Barmherzigkeit für Leute, die einen festen Glauben haben.
ref: These are precepts of wisdom for men, and guidance and grace for people who believe with certainty.
draft: These are (the means) of enlightenment for humanity and a guidance and mercy for people who have strong faith.
hil: These are (the means) of enlightenment for humanity and a guidance and mercy for people who have strong faith.
compare: These are (the means) of enlightenment for humanity and a guidance and mercy for people who have strong faith.

src: Und zehrt nicht ihr Vermögen auf zu eurem Vermögen hinzu. Das wäre eine große Sünde.
ref: And do not consume their properties by combining them with yours, for that would be a serious sin.
draft: And do not consume your wealth by adding it to your wealth. That would be a great sin.
hil: Do not consume your wealth by adding it to your wealth, that would be a great sin.
compare: Do not consume your wealth by adding it to your wealth, that would be a great sin.

src: Verderben auf den Menschen! Wie undankbar ist er!
ref: May man be slain – how ungrateful he is!
draft: Doom to mankind! How ungrateful he is!
hil: Destruction on mankind! How ungrateful he is!
compare: Destruction on mankind! How ungrateful he is!

src: Also und wer ALLAHs Hurumat hochachtet, dies ist gut für ihn bei seinem HERRN.
ref: Apart from this, whoever respects the sacred ordinances of God, will find a better reward for him with his Lord.
draft: So whoever respects Allah's Hurumat, it is good for him with his Lord.
hil: Whoever respects the boundaries set by Allah, it is good for him with his Lord.
compare: So whoever respects Allah's Hurumat, it is good for him with his Lord.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran. Und WIR ermahnen sie, doch dies bestärkt sie nur zu einer noch größeren Übertretung.
ref: And when We proclaimed to you, “Indeed all mankind is within the control of your Lord”; and We did not create the spectacle* which We showed you except to try mankind, and the Tree** which is cursed in the Qur’an; and We warn them – so nothing increases for them except extreme rebellion. (* The Ascent of the Holy Prophet to the heavens and beyond, which the disbelievers denied as just a dream. ** The Zakkum tree which will grow in hell and be the food for its inhabitants.)
draft: And (remember) when WE told you, "Surely, your Lord encompasses the people," and WE made the vision that WE showed you only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran. And WE warn them, but it only increases their transgression.
hil: And (remember) when WE told you, 'Surely, your Lord will destroy the people,' and WE made the vision that WE showed you only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran. And WE warn them, but it only strengthens them in their transgression.
compare: And (remember) when WE told you, "Surely, your Lord encompasses the people," and WE made the vision that WE showed you only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran. And WE warn them, but it only increases their transgression.

src: Und er sprach: "O meine Söhne, zieht nicht durch ein einziges Tor ein, sondern zieht durch verschiedene Tore ein; ich kann euch nichts gegen Allah nützen. Die Entscheidung ruht bei Allah allein.
ref: (As they were leaving) their father said to them: "O my sons, do not seek one approach but employ different ways (of attaining your object). If anything should befall you from God I shall not be able to avert it, for all authority belongs to God.
draft: "And he said, "O my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates; I cannot be of any use to you against Allah. The decision rests with Allah alone."
hil: And he said, "My sons! Don't enter through a single gate, but enter through various gates. I can't do anything for you against Allah. The decision rests with Allah alone."
compare: "And he said, "O my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates; I cannot be of any use to you against Allah. The decision rests with Allah alone."

src: Da sagte er: "O mein Volk, dient Allah, erwartet den Jüngsten Tag und richtet auf der Erde nicht unheilstiftend Verderben an."
ref: He said: "O people, worship God and be ready for the Day of Resurrection. Do no evil, and create no mischief in the land."
draft: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Last Day, and do not cause mischief on earth as corrupters."
hil: He said, 'O my people, worship Allah, expect the Last Day, and do not cause mischief on earth as corrupters.'
compare: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Last Day, and do not cause mischief on earth as corrupters."

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"?
ref: Are the people astonished that a man who is one of them was commanded by Us to warn them and to bring glad tidings to those who believe that they have a true precedence with their Lord?
draft: Is it surprising to mankind that We have revealed to a man from among them, saying: 'Warn mankind, and give the glad tidings to those who believe, that they are on a true footing of equality with their Lord'?
hil: Is it surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among them (as Revelation): 'Warn people and proclaim to those who believe the good news that they have a true standing with their Lord'?
compare: Is it surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among them (as Revelation): 'Warn people and proclaim to those who believe the good news that they have a true standing with their Lord'?

src: Als der Schrecken von Abraham gewichen und die frohe Botschaft zu ihm gekommen war, begann er mit Uns über das Volk von Lot zu streiten.
ref: When Abraham's fear was dispelled, and the good news had come to him, he pleaded for the people of Lot with Us.
draft: When the terror had passed from Abraham and the happy news had come to him, he began arguing with Us about the people of Lot.
hil: When the terror had passed from Abraham and the good news had come to him, he began to argue with Us about the people of Lot.
compare: When the terror had passed from Abraham and the good news had come to him, he began to argue with Us about the people of Lot.

src: Das ist, was euch für den Tag der Abrechnung verheißen ist.
ref: This is what is promised you for the Day of Reckoning.
draft: This is what is promised to you for the day of reckoning.
hil: This is what is promised to you for the day of reckoning.
compare: This is what is promised to you for the day of reckoning.

src: Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf.
ref: There they found a wall that was crumbling, which he repaired.
draft: Then they found a wall in her that was about to collapse, and so he straightened it up.
hil: And so they found a wall in her that was about to collapse, and he straightened it up.
compare: And so they found a wall in her that was about to collapse, and he straightened it up.

src: Das verursacht dem Propheten Ungelegenheit, und er ist scheu vor euch, jedoch Allah ist nicht scheu vor der Wahrheit.
ref: And when ye ask of them aught, ask it of them from behind a curtain.
draft: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy of you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.
hil: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy of you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.
compare: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy of you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.

src: Sie machten für ihn, was er begehrte: Paläste und Bildwerke, Becken wie Teiche und feststehende Kochbottiche: "Wirkt ihr vom Hause Davids in Dankbarkeit." Und nur wenige von Meinen Dienern sind dankbar.
ref: fashioning for him whatsoever he would -- places of worship, statues, porringers like water-troughs, and anchored cooking-pots. 'Labour, O House of David, in thankfulness; for few indeed are those that are thankful among My servants.'
draft: They did for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, basins like ponds and stationary cooking troughs: "Work in gratitude from the House of David". And only a few of My servants are grateful.
hil: They did for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, basins like ponds and stationary cooking troughs: 'Work in gratitude from the House of David'. And only a few of My servants are grateful.
compare: They did for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, basins like ponds and stationary cooking troughs: 'Work in gratitude from the House of David'. And only a few of My servants are grateful.

src: Sei geduldig.
ref: So be patient.
draft: Be patient.
hil: Be patient.
compare: Be patient.

src: So wurde Fir'aun sein böses Tun ausgeschmückt, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgehalten. Aber Fir'auns listige Tat wird nur zugrunde gehen.
ref: So the evil of his deeds was decked out fair to Pharaoh, and he was barred from the way, and Pharaoh's guile came only to ruin.
draft: So Pharaoh's evil deed was embellished, and he was led astray from the (right) path. But Pharaoh's cunning plan will only lead to ruin.
hil: So Pharaoh's evil deed was embellished, and he was led astray from the (right) path. But Pharaoh's cunning plan will only lead to ruin.
compare: So Pharaoh's evil deed was embellished, and he was led astray from the (right) path. But Pharaoh's cunning plan will only lead to ruin.

src: (Schon) vor ihnen haben das Volk Nuhs und nach diesen die Gruppierungen (ihre Gesandten) der Lüge bezichtigt.
ref: The people of Noah had denied before them, and many factions after them.
draft: (Before them) the people of Nuh accused (their messengers) of lies and after them the groups (their messengers) too.
hil: Before them, the people of Nuh accused their messengers of lies, and after them, the groups (their messengers) did the same.
