compare: Before them, the people of Nuh accused their messengers of lies, and after them, the groups (their messengers) did the same.

src: Die Woge trennte sie beide, und so war er einer von denen, die ertränkt wurden.
ref: And a wave came between them, and he was among those who were drowned.
draft: The wave separated them both, and so he was one of those who drowned.
hil: The wave separated them both, and so he was one of those who drowned.
compare: The wave separated them both, and so he was one of those who drowned.

src: Dann sagten sie: "ALLAH gegenüber üben wir doch Tawakkul.
ref: They answered: "We have placed our trust in God.
draft: Then they said, "But we exercise Tawakkul towards Allah".
hil: Then they said, 'But we exercise Tawakkul towards Allah.'
compare: Then they said, "But we exercise Tawakkul towards Allah".

src: Und wirf nur, was in deiner Rechten ist; es wird das verschlingen, was sie gemacht haben; denn das, was sie gemacht haben, ist nur die List eines Zauberers. Und ein Zauberer soll keinen Erfolg haben, woher er auch kommen mag."
ref: Throw down what is in your right hand: It will swallow up what they have conjured. For what they have fashioned is only a trick of the sorcerer; and a sorcerer does not succeed wherever he may come."
draft: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made; for what they have made is only the trick of a magician. And a magician will not be successful, wherever he may come from."
hil: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made; for what they have made is only the trick of a magician. And a magician will not be successful, wherever he may come from."
compare: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made; for what they have made is only the trick of a magician. And a magician will not be successful, wherever he may come from."

src: Bitte also deinen Herrn für uns, daß Er uns (Speise) von dem hervorbringe, was die Erde wachsen läßt, (von) Kräutern, Gurken, Knoblauch, Linsen und Zwiebeln Da sagte er: "Wollt ihr etwa das, was geringer ist, in Tausch nehmen für das, was besser ist?
ref: We shall never put up with only one kind of food, so call upon your Lord to produce for us what the earth grows – some herbs, cucumbers, corn, lentils and onions”; he said, “What!
draft: Please ask your Lord for us to bring forth for us (food) from what the earth grows; from herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions.” He said, “Would you exchange what is better for what is lesser?
hil: Please ask your Lord to provide us with (food) from what the earth grows; from herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions. He said, "Would you take what is lesser in exchange for what is better?"
compare: Please ask your Lord for us to bring forth for us (food) from what the earth grows; from herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions.” He said, “Would you exchange what is better for what is lesser?

src: Hast du nicht gesehen, wie dein Herr an den Aad gehandelt hat,
ref: Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad
draft: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the Aad?
hil: "Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the Aad?"
compare: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the Aad?

src: Sag: "Den Überschuß."
ref: Tell them: "The utmost you can spare."
draft: Say: "The surplus."
hil: Say, "The surplus."
compare: Say, "The surplus."

src: Dies sind die Verse des Quran - eines deutlichen Buches.
ref: THESE are the verses of the Qur'an, and collection of explicit laws,
draft: These are the verses of the Quran - a clear book.
hil: These are the verses of the Quran - a clear book.
compare: These are the verses of the Quran - a clear book.

src: O Prophet, Wir erlaubten dir deine Gattinnen, denen du ihre Brautgabe gegeben hast, und jene, die du von Rechts wegen aus (der Zahl) derer besitzt, die Allah dir als Kriegsbeute gegeben hat, und die Töchter deines Vaterbruders und die Töchter deiner Vaterschwestern und die Töchter deines Mutterbruders und die Töchter deiner Mutterschwestern, die mit dir ausgewandert sind, und jedwede gläubige Frau, die sich dem Propheten schenkt, vorausgesetzt, daß der Prophet sie zu heiraten wünscht; (dies gilt) nur für dich und nicht für die Gläubigen. Wir haben bereits bekanntgegeben, was Wir ihnen bezüglich ihrer Frauen und jener, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, verordnet haben, so daß sich (daraus) keine Verlegenheit für dich ergibt. Und Allah ist Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that God has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any woman believer, if she give herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet desire to take her in marriage, for thee exclusively, apart from the believers -- We know what We have imposed upon them touching their wives and what their right hands own -- that there may be no fault in thee; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: O Prophet, We have allowed you your wives, to whom you have given their dowry, and those whom your right hand possesses out of those whom Allah has given you as spoils of war, and the daughters of your paternal uncle, and the daughters of your paternal aunts, and the daughters of your maternal uncle, and the daughters of your maternal aunts, who emigrated with you, and a believing woman who gives herself to the Prophet if the Prophet desires to marry her. This is only for you, not for the believers. We have already made known to them concerning their wives and those whom their right hands possess. This is so that you may not be grieved. And Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
hil: O Prophet, We have allowed you your wives, to whom you have given their dowry, and those whom your right hand possesses out of those whom Allah has given you as spoils of war, and the daughters of your paternal uncle, and the daughters of your paternal aunts, and the daughters of your maternal uncle, and the daughters of your maternal aunts, who emigrated with you, and a believing woman who gives herself to the Prophet if the Prophet desires to marry her. This is only for you, not for the believers. We have already made known to them concerning their wives and those whom their right hands possess. This is so that you may not be grieved. And Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
compare: O Prophet, We have allowed you your wives, to whom you have given their dowry, and those whom your right hand possesses out of those whom Allah has given you as spoils of war, and the daughters of your paternal uncle, and the daughters of your paternal aunts, and the daughters of your maternal uncle, and the daughters of your maternal aunts, who emigrated with you, and a believing woman who gives herself to the Prophet if the Prophet desires to marry her. This is only for you, not for the believers. We have already made known to them concerning their wives and those whom their right hands possess. This is so that you may not be grieved. And Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.

src: Sag: "Ich sage euch nicht, daß ich über dieMagazine von ALLAHs (Rizq) verfüge. Auch kenne ich das Verborgene nicht.
ref: Tell them: "I do not say that I possess the treasures of God, or have knowledge of the Unknown, or that I am an angel.
draft: Say, "I do not tell you that I have control over the treasures of Allah, nor do I know the unseen."
hil: Say, 'I do not tell you that I have control over the treasures of Allah, nor do I know the unseen.'
compare: Say, "I do not tell you that I have control over the treasures of Allah, nor do I know the unseen."

src: Wahrlich, der Messias, Jesus, Sohn der Maria, ist nur der Gesandte Allahs und Sein Wort, das Er Maria entboten hat, und von Seinem Geist. Darum glaubt an Allah und Seine Gesandten, und sagt nicht: "Drei."
ref: The Messiah 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary), was (no more than) a Messenger of Allah and His Word, ("Be!" - and he was) which He bestowed on Maryam (Mary) and a spirit (Ruh) created by Him; so believe in Allah and His Messengers.
draft: Truly, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only the Messenger of Allah and His Word, which He sent to Mary, and a Spirit from Him. So believe in Allah and His Messengers, and do not say, "Three."
hil: Truly, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only the Messenger of Allah and His Word, which He sent to Mary, and a Spirit from Him. So believe in Allah and His Messengers, and do not say, "Three."
compare: Truly, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only the Messenger of Allah and His Word, which He sent to Mary, and a Spirit from Him. So believe in Allah and His Messengers, and do not say, "Three."

src: Wenn wir und unsere Väter zu Staub geworden sind, sollen wir dann wirklich wieder hervorgebracht werden?
ref: When we and our fathers have become dust shall we be raised [from the dead]?
draft: If we and our fathers have turned to dust, will we then really be brought forth again?
hil: Should we really be brought forth again if we and our fathers have turned to dust?
compare: If we and our fathers have turned to dust, will we then really be brought forth again?

src: Und sie sagen: "Sollen wir etwa, wenn wir (bereits) Knochen und Überreste geworden sind, denn wirklich als neue Schöpfung auferweckt werden?"
ref: Yet they say: "When we are turned to bones and bits, shall we be raised as a new creation?"
draft: And they say, "Shall we then, when we have become bones and dust, be brought forth as a new creation?"
hil: And they say, 'Shall we then, when we have become bones and dust, be brought forth as a new creation?'
compare: And they say, "Shall we then, when we have become bones and dust, be brought forth as a new creation?"

src: Die Barmherzigkeit Gottes ist den Rechtschaffenen nahe.
ref: The blessing of God is at hand for those who do good.
draft: The mercy of God is near to the righteous.
hil: The mercy of God is near to the righteous.
compare: The mercy of God is near to the righteous.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Fügt euch ALLAH und dem Gesandten, wenn er euch zu dem aufruft, was euch lebendig macht. Und wisst, daß ALLAH gewiß dem Menschen die Verfügung über sein Inneres verwehren kann und daß ihr gewiß zu Ihm versammelt werdet.
ref: O believers, respond to God and the Messenger when He calls you unto that which will give you life; and know that God stands between a man and his heart, and that to Him you shall be mustered.
draft: You, who have internalized the faith! Submit to Allah and the Messenger when he calls you to that which gives you life. And know that Allah can certainly deny man control over his inner self and that you will surely be gathered to Him.
hil: O you who have internalized faith! Present yourselves upon the command of Allah and his noble Messenger when the noble Messenger calls you to the matter that will bestow you life, and know that the command of Allah becomes a barrier between a man and his heart's intentions, and that you will all be raised towards Him.
compare: O you who have internalized faith! Present yourselves upon the command of Allah and his noble Messenger when the noble Messenger calls you to the matter that will bestow you life, and know that the command of Allah becomes a barrier between a man and his heart's intentions, and that you will all be raised towards Him.

src: Und sollten sie dem Salam zugeneigt sein, dann sei ihm ebenfalls zugeneigt und übe ALLAH gegenüber Tawakkul! ER ist gewiß Der Allhörende, Der Allwissende.
ref: But if they are inclined to peace, make peace with them, and have trust in God, for He hears all and knows everything.
draft: And if you are inclined towards peace, then be also inclined towards him and exercise Tawakkul towards Allah! He is indeed the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
hil: And if they are inclined towards peace, then be also inclined towards them and exercise Tawakkul towards Allah! He is indeed the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
compare: And if they are inclined towards peace, then be also inclined towards them and exercise Tawakkul towards Allah! He is indeed the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

src: Dann erfüllten WIR ihnen das Versprechen und erretteten sie und diejenigen, die WIR wollten, und richteten die Maßlosen zugrunde.
ref: Then We made Our promise good to them and delivered whomsoever We pleased, and destroyed the transgressors.
draft: Then, we fulfilled the promise to them and saved them and those whom we wanted, and destroyed the wicked.
hil: Then, We fulfilled the promise to them and saved them and those whom We wanted, and destroyed the wicked.
compare: Then, we fulfilled the promise to them and saved them and those whom we wanted, and destroyed the wicked.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Gehorcht ALLAH und gehorcht dem Gesandten und laßt eure Handlungen nicht nichtig werden!
ref: O you who believe, obey God and the Prophet, and do not waste your deeds.
draft: You who have internalized the Iman! Obey ALLAH and obey the messenger and do not make your actions in vain!
hil: You who have internalized the faith! Obey ALLAH and obey the messenger and do not let your actions become in vain!
compare: You who have internalized the Iman! Obey ALLAH and obey the messenger and do not make your actions in vain!

src: Heute versiegeln WIR ihnen ihre Münder, und zu Uns sprechen dann ihre Hände, auch ihre Beine legen Zeugnis ab für das, was sie zu erwerben pflegten.
ref: We shall seal their lips that day; and their hands will speak, their feet testify to what they had done.
draft: Today we seal their mouths for them, and then their hands speak to us, and their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.
hil: Today we seal their mouths for them, and then their hands speak to us, and their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.
compare: Today we seal their mouths for them, and then their hands speak to us, and their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.

src: Du bist nichts (anderes) als ein Mensch wie wir. So bringe ein Zeichen, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: “You are just a human like us; therefore bring some sign if you are truthful.”
draft: "You are nothing (else) but a human like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful."
hil: You are nothing (else) but a human like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful.
compare: "You are nothing (else) but a human like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful."

src: Und derjenige, der zu seinen Eltern sagt: "Pfui über euch!
ref: And the one who said to his parents, “Uff – I am fed up with both of you! What!
draft: And whoever says to their parents, "Shame on you!"
hil: The one who says to his parents, "Shame on you!"
compare: The one who says to his parents, "Shame on you!"

src: Und sei nicht laut beim Gebet, und auch nicht leise dabei.
ref: (Muhammad), do not be too loud or slow in your prayer.
draft: And do not be loud during prayer, nor quiet.
hil: And do not be loud during prayer, nor quiet.
compare: And do not be loud during prayer, nor quiet.

src: Es wurde von dem einen angenommen und von dem anderen nicht angenommen. Der sagte: «Ich schlage dich tot.»
ref: God accepted the sacrifice of one of them (Abel) but not that of the other (Cain) who then said to his brother, "I shall certainly kill you."
draft: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. The one said, "I'll beat you to death."
hil: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. The one said, 'I will beat you to death.'
compare: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. The one said, "I'll beat you to death."

src: Sie sind bei ALLAH nicht gleich!
ref: They are not equal before Allah.
draft: You are not equal in the eyes of Allah!
hil: Remember, you are not equal in the eyes of Allah.
compare: You are not equal in the eyes of Allah!

src: Und der, der zu seinen Eltern sagt: «Pfui über euch! Wollt ihr denn mir versprechen, ich würde hervorgebracht werden, wo vor mir Generationen dahingegangen sind?»...
ref: But he who says to his parents: "Shame on you: You intimidate me that I will be resurrected when many generations will have passed before me?"
draft: And he who says to his parents, "Shame on you! Do you promise me that I will be brought forth where generations before me have passed away?"...
hil: And (there is) he who says to his parents, 'Shame on you! Do you promise me that I will be brought forth where generations before me have passed away?'
compare: And he who says to his parents, "Shame on you! Do you promise me that I will be brought forth where generations before me have passed away?"...

src: Das ist die Bedeutung dessen, was du nicht in Geduld zu ertragen vermöchtest."
ref: So, I did not do that of my own accord. This is the explanation of things you could not bear with patience."
draft: "This is the meaning of what you cannot endure with patience."
hil: This is the meaning of what you are unable to bear in patience.
compare: "This is the meaning of what you cannot endure with patience."

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allwissend und Nachsichtig.
ref: Verily God is all-knowing and forbearing.
draft: And Allah is truly all-knowing and forgiving.
hil: And know that God is truly all-knowing and compassionate.
compare: And Allah is truly all-knowing and forgiving.

src: Und sie sagen: "Wir glauben an Allah und an den Gesandten, und wir gehorchen."
ref: They say, 'We believe in God and the Messenger, and we obey.'
draft: "And they say: "We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey."
hil: And they say, 'We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey.'
compare: "And they say: "We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey."

src: Er sagte: "Bei ALLAH!
ref: He said: "By Allah!
draft: He said, "By Allah!"
hil: He said, 'By Allah!'
compare: He said, "By Allah!"

src: Es gibt unter ihnen aber auch manche, die, wenn du ihnen (nur) einen Dinar anvertraust, ihn dir nicht (wieder) aushändigen, es sei denn, du bist ständig hinter ihnen her. Dies, weil sie sagen: "Gegen uns kann man der Schriftunkundigen wegen nicht vorgehen".
ref: 6 lbs.), will return it to you, and there are others, who, if you trust him with a dinar will not hand it back unless you stand over him, for they say: 'As for the common people, they have no recourse to us' They say lies against Allah while they know.
draft: There are also some among them who, if you entrust them with (just) one dinar, will not return it to you unless you constantly stand over them demanding it. That is because they say, "There is no blame upon us concerning the unlettered."
hil: There are also some among them who, if you entrust them with (just) one dinar, will not return it to you unless you constantly stand over them demanding it. That is because they say, 'There is no blame upon us concerning the unlettered.'
compare: There are also some among them who, if you entrust them with (just) one dinar, will not return it to you unless you constantly stand over them demanding it. That is because they say, "There is no blame upon us concerning the unlettered."

src: Diejenigen aber, die Widerwillen zeigen und sich hochmütig verhalten, wird Er mit einer schmerzhaften Pein peinigen. Und sie werden für sich anstelle Gottes weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: He will bestow upon those who have been disdainful and arrogant a painful chastisement; and they will find for themselves neither a guardian nor a helper besides Allah.
draft: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will torment with painful punishment. And they will find neither friend nor helper for themselves instead of God.
hil: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will torment with painful punishment. And they will find neither friend nor helper for themselves instead of God.
compare: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will torment with painful punishment. And they will find neither friend nor helper for themselves instead of God.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist mein HERR und euer HERR.
ref: Surely God is my Lord and your Lord; so serve Him.
draft: Surely, ALLAH is my LORD and your LORD.
hil: Surely, Allah is my Lord and your Lord.
compare: Surely, ALLAH is my LORD and your LORD.

src: Er läßt die Nacht in den Tag eindringen, und Er läßt den Tag in die Nacht eindringen. Und Er hat die Sonne und den Mond dienstbar gemacht - ein jedes läuft auf eine festgesetzte Frist zu. Dies ist doch Allah, euer Herr; Ihm gehört die Herrschaft. Diejenigen aber, die ihr anstatt Seiner anruft, verfügen nicht einmal über das Häutchen eines Dattelkerns.
ref: He brings the night in a part of the day and He brings the day in a part of the night; and He has subjected the sun and moon; each one runs to its fixed term; such is Allah, your Lord – only His is the kingship; and those whom you worship instead of Him do not own even the husk of a date-seed.
draft: He allows the night to penetrate the day and He allows the day to penetrate the night. And He has made the sun and the moon subservient, each running its course for a specified term. This is indeed Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs the kingdom. But those whom you call upon besides Him do not possess even the membrane of a date seed.
hil: He lets the night penetrate the day and He lets the day penetrate the night. And He has made the sun and the moon subservient, each running its course for a specified term. This is indeed Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs the kingdom. But those whom you call upon besides Him do not possess even the membrane of a date seed.
compare: He allows the night to penetrate the day and He allows the day to penetrate the night. And He has made the sun and the moon subservient, each running its course for a specified term. This is indeed Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs the kingdom. But those whom you call upon besides Him do not possess even the membrane of a date seed.

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt.
ref: But God does not grant a soul respite once its term has come to end.
draft: Allah, however, will not postpone any soul when its appointed term comes.
hil: Allah, however, will not postpone any soul when its appointed term comes.
compare: Allah, however, will not postpone any soul when its appointed term comes.

src: Und ER fand dich irrend, so leitete ER dich recht.
ref: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?
draft: And HE found you wandering, so HE guided you right.
hil: And HE found you wandering, so HE guided you right.
compare: And HE found you wandering, so HE guided you right.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir haben zugehört und uns widersetzt." So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: They said, 'We hear, and rebel'; and they were made to drink the Calf in their hearts for their unbelief.
draft: They said, "We have listened and resisted." Thus (the affection) for the calf was imprinted in their hearts because of their disbelief.
hil: They said, 'We have listened and disobeyed.' And thus, the love for the calf was imprinted in their hearts because of their disbelief.
compare: They said, 'We have listened and disobeyed.' And thus, the love for the calf was imprinted in their hearts because of their disbelief.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der Lügen im Namen ALLAHs erfindet oder Seine Ayat ableugnet.
ref: Who could be more wicked than he who imputes lies to God or denies His revelations?
draft: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of ALLAH or denies His Ayat.
hil: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of ALLAH or denies His Ayat.
compare: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of ALLAH or denies His Ayat.

src: Und von den Satanen gab es welche, die für ihn tauchten und andere Arbeit als diese verrichten.
ref: And of the devils were some that dived for him, and performed other, lesser tasks.
draft: And among the Satanists there were those who dived for him and perform other work than that.
hil: And among the devils there were those who dived for him and performed other work than this.
compare: And among the devils there were those who dived for him and performed other work than this.

src: Erwarten Sie denn etwas anderes, als daß die Engel zu ihnen kommen, oder daß der Befehl deines Herrn eintrifft? So handelten auch diejenigen, die vor ihnen lebten.
ref: What! Do the (unbelievers) expect that the angels should descend, or the sentence of your Lord come to pass?
draft: Do you expect anything different than that the angels come to them or that the command of your Lord arrives? This is how those who lived before them acted as well.
hil: Do you expect anything different than that the angels come to them or that the command of your Lord arrives? This is how those who lived before them acted as well.
compare: Do you expect anything different than that the angels come to them or that the command of your Lord arrives? This is how those who lived before them acted as well.

src: Er sagte: "Ja! Und gewiß, ihr werdet dann doch von den Vertrauten sein."
ref: He said, “Yes, and you will then become close to me.”
draft: He said: "Yes! And of course, you will be among the confidants."
hil: He said, "Yes! And surely, you will then be among the trusted ones."
compare: He said, "Yes! And surely, you will then be among the trusted ones."

src: Das sind ja nichts als Fabeln der Früheren."
ref: This is only the tales of the ancients!"
draft: "That is nothing but the myths of the ancients."
hil: These are nothing but the myths of the ancients.
compare: These are nothing but the myths of the ancients.

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden in Scharen zu Gahannam geführt werden, bis daß, wenn sie sie erreichen, sich ihre Pforten öffnen und ihre Wächter zu ihnen sprechen: "Sind nicht Gesandte aus eurer Mitte zu euch gekommen, um euch die Verse eures Herrn zu verlesen und euch vor dem Eintreffen dieses euren Tages zu warnen?"
ref: The unbelievers will be driven into Hell in groups till, when they reach it and its doors are opened up, its keepers will say to them: "Did not apostles of your own come to you reciting your Lord's revelations, warning you of this your day of Doom?"
draft: And the unbelievers will be led in crowds to Gehenna until, when they reach it, its gates will be opened and its keepers will say to them: "Have not messengers from among you come to you, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this Day of yours?"
hil: "And the unbelievers will be led in crowds to Gehenna until they reach it, and when its gates are opened and its keepers say to them: 'Have not messengers from among you come to you, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this Day of yours?"
compare: And the unbelievers will be led in crowds to Gehenna until, when they reach it, its gates will be opened and its keepers will say to them: "Have not messengers from among you come to you, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this Day of yours?"

src: Und Gott genügt als Freund, und Gott genügt als Helfer.
ref: Sufficieth Allah as a Friend and sufficieth Allah as a Helper.
draft: "And God suffices as a friend, and God suffices as a helper."
hil: And God is sufficient as a friend, and God is sufficient as a helper.
compare: And God is sufficient as a friend, and God is sufficient as a helper.

src: Beinahe hätte er uns doch von unseren Gottheiten abirren lassen, hätten wir uns nicht in Geduld ihnen gegenüber geübt!" Und sie werden wissen, wenn sie die Peinigung sehen, wer weiter vom Weg abgeirrt ist.
ref: “Possibly he would have misled us away from our Gods had we not been firm upon them”; soon they will know, when they see the punishment, who was astray from the path.
draft: "Almost he would have led us astray from our deities, if we had not practiced patience towards them!" And they will know, when they see the punishment, who has gone astray from the path.
hil: Almost he would have led us astray from our deities, if we had not practiced patience towards them! And they will know, when they see the punishment, who has deviated from the path.
compare: Almost he would have led us astray from our deities, if we had not practiced patience towards them! And they will know, when they see the punishment, who has deviated from the path.

src: Es ist für euch kein Vergehen, unbewohnte Häuser zu betreten, in denen sich eine Nutznießung für euch befindet. Und Gott weiß, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr verschweigt.
ref: There is no harm in going into uninhabited houses where there is some convenience for you, as God has knowledge of what you hide and what you disclose.
draft: It is not a sin for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And God knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
hil: It is not a sin for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And God knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
compare: It is not a sin for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And God knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

src: Die Zurückgebliebenen werden sagen: "Wenn ihr zu den Beutegütern aufbrecht, um sie einzunehmen, dann laßt uns euch folgen!" Sie wollen ALLAHs Worte ändern.
ref: The Bedouins who were left behind will say, when you set forth after spoils, to take them, 'Let us follow you,' desiring to change God's words.
draft: The remaining will say, "If you go to the spoils to take them, then let us follow you!" They want to change Allah's words.
hil: The others will say, "If you leave to take the spoils, then let us follow you!" They want to alter the words of Allah.
compare: The others will say, "If you leave to take the spoils, then let us follow you!" They want to alter the words of Allah.

src: Da ergriff sie Allah für ihre Sünden, und sie hatten vor Allah keinen Beschützer.
ref: Yet they were seized by God for their sins, and had none to protect them against God.
draft: Then Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector before Allah.
hil: Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector before Allah.
compare: Then Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector before Allah.

src: Eignet euch euer Vermögen untereinander nicht durch das für nichtig Erklärte an! Nicht verboten ist es, (es euch anzueignen) durch einen Handel, den ihr in gegenseitigem Einvernehmen abschließt.
ref: Eat not up your property among yourselves unjustly except it be a trade amongst you, by mutual consent.
draft: Do not appropriate your property among yourselves through what has been declared void! It is not forbidden to (appropriate it) through a trade that you conclude with mutual agreement.
hil: Do not appropriate your property among yourselves through what has been declared void! It is not forbidden to appropriate it through a trade that you conclude with mutual agreement.
compare: Do not appropriate your property among yourselves through what has been declared void! It is not forbidden to (appropriate it) through a trade that you conclude with mutual agreement.

src: Ich wußte für euch von keinem anderen Gott außer mir! Also Haman behandle meinetwegen die Erde mit Feuer und lasse für mich einen Turm errichten!
ref: I know not that ye have a god other than me, so kindle for me (a fire), O Haman, to bake the mud; and set up for me a lofty tower in order that I may survey the god of Moses; and lo!
draft: I knew of no other god for you except for me! So, Haman, for my sake, treat the earth with fire and erect a tower for me!
hil: I knew of no other god for you except for me! So, Haman, for my sake, treat the earth with fire and erect a tower for me!
compare: I knew of no other god for you except for me! So, Haman, for my sake, treat the earth with fire and erect a tower for me!

src: Und wisset, daß der Gesandte Allahs unter euch ist. Würde er sich in so vielen Dingen nach euren Wünschen richten, würdet ihr sicher in Bedrängnis kommen; jedoch Allah hat euch den Glauben lieb gemacht und sehr begehrenswert für eure Herzen; und Er hat euch Unglauben, Widersetzlichkeit und Ungehorsam verabscheuenswert gemacht.
ref: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief. But God has made faith more desirable to you, and attractive to your hearts, and rendered disbelief and sin and disobedience repugnant.
draft: And know that the Messenger of Allah is among you. If he were to comply with your wishes in many matters, you would certainly be in difficulty, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has made it attractive to your hearts, and He has made disbelief, disobedience and rebellion detestable to you.
hil: And know that the Messenger of Allah is among you. If he were to comply with your wishes in many matters, you would certainly be in difficulty, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has made it attractive to your hearts, and He has made disbelief, disobedience and rebellion detestable to you.
compare: And know that the Messenger of Allah is among you. If he were to comply with your wishes in many matters, you would certainly be in difficulty, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has made it attractive to your hearts, and He has made disbelief, disobedience and rebellion detestable to you.

src: Sie werden nicht sprechen, ausgenommen der, dem der Erbarmer es erlaubt und der das Richtige sagt.
ref: None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.
draft: They will not speak, except for the one to whom the Merciful allows it and who says the right thing.
hil: They will not speak, except for one to whom the Merciful allows it and who speaks the truth.
compare: They will not speak, except for the one to whom the Merciful allows it and who says the right thing.

src: (sie), die auf Lügen horchen, und die darauf aus sind, unrechtmäßig Erworbenes zu verschlingen.
ref: Eavesdropping for telling lies, earning through unlawful means!
draft: (They) who listen to lies and seek to devour unlawfully acquired goods.
hil: "They" who listen to lies and seek to devour unlawfully acquired goods.
compare: (They) who listen to lies and seek to devour unlawfully acquired goods.

src: Jede Seele wird den Tod kosten, und euch wird euer Lohn am Tag der Auferstehung vollständig gegeben; und wer da vom Feuer ferngehalten und ins Paradies geführt wird, der soll glücklich sein. Und das irdische Leben ist nichts als ein trügerischer Nießbrauch.
ref: Every soul must taste death; and only on the Day of Resurrection will you be fully recompensed; so the one who is saved from the fire and is admitted into Paradise – he is undoubtedly successful; and the life of this world is just counterfeit wealth.
draft: Every soul will taste death, and you will only receive your full compensation on the Day of Resurrection. Whoever is kept away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise will surely triumph. The life of this world is nothing but an illusory enjoyment.
hil: Every soul will taste death, and you will only receive your full compensation on the Day of Resurrection. Whoever is kept away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise will surely triumph. The life of this world is nothing but a deceptive enjoyment.
compare: Every soul will taste death, and you will only receive your full compensation on the Day of Resurrection. Whoever is kept away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise will surely triumph. The life of this world is nothing but an illusory enjoyment.

src: Also Vernichtung sei den Weggenossen der Gluthitze!
ref: Deprived (of all joys) will be the inmates of Hell.
draft: Also destruction be to the companions of the heat of fire!
hil: May destruction be upon the companions of the heat of fire!
compare: May destruction be upon the companions of the heat of fire!

src: Sie möchten Allah und diejenigen, die glauben, betrügen. Aber sie betrügen nur sich selbst, ohne zu merken.
ref: They (try to) deceive God and those who believe, yet deceive none but themselves although they do not know.
draft: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe. But they only deceive themselves without realizing it.
hil: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe, but they only deceive themselves without realizing it.
compare: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe. But they only deceive themselves without realizing it.

src: Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem er will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: And Allah provideth whomsoever He listeth without reckoning.
draft: And Allah grants Rizq to whom He wills, without measure.
hil: Allah grants sustenance (Rizq) to whomever He wills without measure.
compare: And Allah grants Rizq to whom He wills, without measure.

src: In Gärten und an Quellen,
ref: In these gardens and these springs,
draft: In gardens and at springs,
hil: In gardens and at springs,
compare: In gardens and at springs,

src: Unter ihnen gab es Rechtschaffene und solche, die dies nicht waren.
ref: Some of them righteous, and some of them short of that.
draft: Among them, there were righteous ones and those who were not.
hil: Among them were righteous people and those who were not.
compare: Among them, there were righteous ones and those who were not.

src: Fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER mit euch die Erde versinkt, und daß sie gleich bebt?!
ref: Are you so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not open up the earth to swallow you, when it will begin to tremble?
draft: Do you feel safe from Him whose (instruction) is in the sky, that He sinks the earth with you and that it trembles equally?!
hil: Do you feel safe from Him whose (instruction) is in the sky, that He sinks the earth with you and that it trembles equally?!
compare: Do you feel safe from Him whose (instruction) is in the sky, that He sinks the earth with you and that it trembles equally?!

src: Unser HERR! Lasse in unseren Herzen keine Falschheit entstehen, nachdem DU uns rechtgeleitet hast, und schenke uns von Dir aus Gnade! Gewiß, DU bist zweifellos Der großzügigste Schenkende.
ref: Our Lord, make not our hearts to swerve after that Thou hast guided us; and give us mercy from Thee; Thou art the Giver.
draft: "Our Lord! Do not let any falsehood arise in our hearts after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from Yourself. Indeed, You are the Bestower. "
hil: Our Lord! Do not let any falsehood arise in our hearts after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from Yourself. Indeed, You are the Most Generous Giving.
compare: Our Lord! Do not let any falsehood arise in our hearts after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from Yourself. Indeed, You are the Most Generous Giving.

src: Hättest du alles, was auf der Erde ist, dafür ausgegeben, hättest du ihre Herzen nicht vereint!
ref: Had you given away all the riches of the earth you could not have joined their hearts, but it is Allah Who joined their hearts.
draft: If you had spent everything that is on earth, you would not have united their hearts!
hil: Would you have spent everything that is on earth, you could not have united their hearts.
compare: Would you have spent everything that is on earth, you could not have united their hearts.

src: Wenn dem Menschen Unheil widerfährt, ruft er Uns an.
ref: When adversity touches the human being, he calls on Us.
draft: When humans are afflicted with misfortune, they call upon Us.
hil: When man falls into adversity, he calls upon Us.
compare: When humans are afflicted with misfortune, they call upon Us.

src: (Dies ist) eine Verpflichtung von ALLAH, und ALLAH ist allwissend, allweise.
ref: God is all-knowing and all-wise.
draft: This is an obligation from Allah, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
hil: This is an obligation from Allah and Allah is all-knowing and all-wise.
compare: This is an obligation from Allah, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.

src: Dies ist eine Erinnerung.
ref: This is indeed a reminder.
draft: This is a reminder.
hil: This is a reminder.
compare: This is a reminder.

src: Für euch gibt es anstelle von Ihm weder Wali noch Fürbittenden. Wollt ihr euch etwa nicht entsinnen?!
ref: Apart from Him, you have no protector neither mediator; will you not remember?
draft: Instead of Him, there is neither a guardian nor an intercessor for you. Don't you want to remember?!
hil: There is neither a guardian nor an intercessor for you instead of Him. Do you not want to remember?
compare: Instead of Him, there is neither a guardian nor an intercessor for you. Don't you want to remember?!

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es? Wenn ich über ein eindeutiges Zeichen von meinem HERRN verfüge und ER mir Gnade von Ihm erwies, die euch verborgen blieb, sollen wir diese euch etwa zur Pflicht machen, wenn ihr demgegenüber abgeneigt seid?
ref: He said: bethink ye, O my people! if I rested upon an evidence from my Lord, and a mercy hath come unto me from Him, and that hath been obscured unto you, Shall we make you adhere to it while ye are averse thereto?
draft: He said, "My people! How do you see it? If I have a clear sign from my LORD and HE has shown me grace from Him, which was hidden from you, should we make it obligatory for you when you are averse to it?
hil: He said, "My people! How do you see it? If I have a clear sign from my LORD and HE has shown me grace from Him, which was hidden from you, should we make it obligatory for you when you are averse to it?
compare: He said, "My people! How do you see it? If I have a clear sign from my LORD and HE has shown me grace from Him, which was hidden from you, should we make it obligatory for you when you are averse to it?

src: Oder wer wird ihr Beschützer sein?
ref: Or who will be their representative?
draft: Or who will be her protector?
hil: Or who will be their protector?
compare: Or who will be her protector?

src: Kehrt zurück zu eurem Vater, dann sagt: "Unser Vater! Dein Sohn hat gestohlen, und wir haben nur das bezeugt, was wir wußten. Und wir hatten über das Verborgene keine Kenntnis.
ref: Return you all to your father, and say, "Father, thy son stole; we do not testify except that we know; we were no guardians of the Unseen.
draft: Return to your father and say, "Our father! Your son has stolen, and we have only testified to what we knew. And we had no knowledge of the hidden."
hil: Return to your father and tell him, 'Our father, your son has committed theft and we testify only to what we know. We have no knowledge of the unseen.'
compare: Return to your father and say, "Our father! Your son has stolen, and we have only testified to what we knew. And we had no knowledge of the hidden."

src: Nein, sie leugnen die Stunde; und denen, welche die Stunde leugnen, haben Wir einen Höllenbrand bereitet.
ref: Yet they reject the Hour as untrue. We have prepared a Fire for those who deny the Resurrection.
draft: No, they deny the Hour; and as for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared for them a Blaze.
hil: They deny the Hour; and as for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared for them a Blaze.
compare: No, they deny the Hour; and as for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared for them a Blaze.

src: Doch nie war ich mit dem Bittgebet zu Dir - HERR!  erfolglos.
ref: And in calling on Thee, my Lord, I have never been hitherto unprosperous.
draft: But I have never been unsuccessful with the prayer to you - O LORD!
hil: My LORD! I have never been unsuccessful with the prayer to YOU - O LORD!
compare: My LORD! I have never been unsuccessful with the prayer to YOU - O LORD!

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr habt ihr selbst euch etwas eingeredet.
ref: (Their father) said: "It is not so; you have made up the story.
draft: He said: "No! Rather, you have talked yourselves into something."
hil: He said, 'No! Rather, you talked yourselves into something.'
compare: He said: "No! Rather, you have talked yourselves into something."

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben.
ref: That Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and add even more for them out of His Grace.
draft: "ALLAH will surely repay them with something better than what they have done, and will give them even more of His grace."
hil: They will surely be repaid by Allah with something better than what they have done, and Allah will give them even more of His grace.
compare: They will surely be repaid by Allah with something better than what they have done, and Allah will give them even more of His grace.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir glauben an den Herrn der Welten
ref: And said: "We have come to believe in the Lord of all the worlds,
draft: They said: "We believe in the Lord of the worlds."
hil: They said: 'We believe in the Lord of the worlds.'
compare: They said: "We believe in the Lord of the worlds."

src: So haben Wir bemessen.
ref: Then We facilitated (your birth).
draft: So have we measured.
hil: Thus have We measured.
compare: Thus have We measured.

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: We have seen thee turning thy face about in the heaven; now We will surely turn thee to a direction that shall satisfy thee.
draft: We already see the wandering of your face upwards. So we will definitely make you take a direction of prayer that you like.
hil: We already see the wandering of your face upwards. So we will definitely make you take a direction of prayer that you like.
compare: We already see the wandering of your face upwards. So we will definitely make you take a direction of prayer that you like.

src: Die Gesandten unseres Herrn haben in der Tat die Wahrheit gebracht."
ref: The apostles of our Lord had indeed brought the truth."
draft: "The messengers of our Lord have indeed brought the truth."
hil: The messengers of our Lord have indeed brought the truth.
compare: "The messengers of our Lord have indeed brought the truth."

src: Und sollten sie für euch auf etwas davon freiwillig verzichten, dann nehmt es als Gutes Unschädliches an.
ref: But if they willingly forego some of it, then consume it with enjoyment and pleasure.
draft: And if they voluntarily refrain from something for you, then accept it as a harmless good.
hil: Allah will never leave the believers in the state in which you are until He has separated the evil from the good. And Allah will never grant you insight into the unseen, but Allah chooses from His messengers whom He wills. So believe in Allah and His messengers! And if you believe and fear Allah, then there will be great reward for you.
compare: And if they voluntarily refrain from something for you, then accept it as a harmless good.

src: Er sagte: "Nein, sondern euer Ego machte euch etwas leicht! (Ich übe mich) in klagloser Geduld.
ref: He said, ‘No, your souls have made a matter seem decorous to you.
draft: He said, "No, but your ego made something easy for you! (I am practicing) in patient endurance."
hil: He said, "No, but your ego made something easy for you! (I am practicing) in patient endurance."
compare: He said, "No, but your ego made something easy for you! (I am practicing) in patient endurance."

src: Gott wollte feststellen, wer Ihn und seine Gesandten unterstützt, auch in Abwesenheit.
ref: That God may know who supports Him and His messengers invisibly.
draft: God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.
hil: God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.
compare: God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.

src: Hätten sie doch dafür vier Zeugen gebracht! Und sollten sie nun die Zeugen nicht bringen, dann sind diese selbst bei ALLAH die wirklichen Lügner.
ref: Would that they had brought four witness to testify to their report. Since they brought none, they are liars before God.
draft: "If only they had brought four witnesses for it! And if they do not produce the witnesses, then they themselves are the liars before Allah."
hil: They would have brought four witnesses for this if only! And if they do not bring the witnesses, then before Allah they are indeed the liars.
compare: "If only they had brought four witnesses for it! And if they do not produce the witnesses, then they themselves are the liars before Allah."

src: Gewiß, bereits entsandten WIR (Gesandte) zu Umam vor dir, dann hat diesen der Satan ihre (schlechten) Taten schön erscheinen lassen, so ist er ihr Wali heute.
ref: We have sent messengers before you to other nations. But Satan made their [foul] deeds seem fair to them and today he is their patron.
draft: Certainly, we have already sent messengers to Umam before you, then Satan made their (bad) deeds appear beautiful to them, so he is their Walī today.
hil: Certainly, we have already sent messengers to Umam before you, then Satan made their (bad) deeds appear beautiful to them, so he is their guardian today.
compare: Certainly, we have already sent messengers to Umam before you, then Satan made their (bad) deeds appear beautiful to them, so he is their Walī today.

src: Mit denen, die ihr Vermögen spenden im Streben nach dem Wohlwollen Gottes und zur Festigung ihrer Seelen, ist es wie mit einem Garten auf einer Anhöhe.
ref: And the parable of those who spend their wealth seeking God’s approval, and to strengthen their souls, is that of a garden on a hillside.
draft: Those who donate their possessions in striving for God's goodwill and strengthening their souls are like a garden on a hill.
hil: Those who donate their wealth in pursuit of God's approval and to strengthen their souls are like a garden on a hill.
compare: Those who donate their possessions in striving for God's goodwill and strengthening their souls are like a garden on a hill.

src: Gewiß, bereits waren sie vorher um Fitna bemüht und wollten deine Angelegenheiten (durch Intrigen) durcheinander bringen, bis dieWahrheit kam und die Sache ALLAHs siegte, während sie (diesem) abgeneigt sind.
ref: They had tried to create disorder before and intrigued against you, but truth came out in the end and God's will prevailed, even though they did not like it.
draft: Certainly, they were already concerned about Fitna before and wanted to confuse your affairs (through intrigues) until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they are averse to it.
hil: Certainly, they were already concerned about Fitna before and wanted to confuse your affairs (through intrigues) until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they are averse to it.
compare: Certainly, they were already concerned about Fitna before and wanted to confuse your affairs (through intrigues) until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they are averse to it.

src: Ergötzt euch denn (eine Weile), bald jedoch werdet ihr es wissen.
ref: Please yourselves for a time; you will come to know soon.
draft: Enjoy yourselves for a while, but soon you will find out.
hil: Enjoy yourselves for a while, but soon you will find out.
compare: Enjoy yourselves for a while, but soon you will find out.

src: Und wen ALLAH rechtleitet, ist zweifellos der Rechtgeleitete, und wen ER abirren läßt, für die findest du gewiß keine Wali anstelle von Ihm! Und WIR werden sie am Tag der Auferstehung auf ihren Gesichtern versammeln - blind, stumm und taub.
ref: Whomsoever God guides, he is rightly guided; and whom He leads astray -- thou wilt not find for them protectors, apart from Him.
draft: And whoever Allah guides, there is no doubt that he is guided, and whoever He leads astray, you will not find a guardian for him besides Him! And We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf.
hil: Whomsoever Allah guides, he is indeed guided; and whomsoever He leaves to stray, you shall find no guardian besides Him. And We shall gather them all together on the Day of Resurrection, (fallen) on their faces, blind, dumb, and deaf.
compare: Whomsoever Allah guides, he is indeed guided; and whomsoever He leaves to stray, you shall find no guardian besides Him. And We shall gather them all together on the Day of Resurrection, (fallen) on their faces, blind, dumb, and deaf.

src: Da warfen sie sich nieder, außer Iblis. Er weigerte sich.
ref: They fell prostrate, but Iblis did not; he refused.
draft: They threw themselves down, except for Iblis. He refused.
hil: They threw themselves down, except for Iblis. He refused.
compare: They threw themselves down, except for Iblis. He refused.

src: Und darin haben sie vollkommen gereinigte Gattinnen. Und ewig werden sie darin bleiben.
ref: And they shall have fair spouses there, and live there abidingly.
draft: And therein they have completely purified spouses. And they will remain therein forever.
hil: And therein they have completely purified spouses. And they will remain therein forever.
compare: And therein they have completely purified spouses. And they will remain therein forever.

src: Nehmt euch daher keine Beschützer von ihnen, solange sie nicht auf Allahs Weg wandern. Und wenn sie sich abwenden, dann ergreift sie und tötet sie, wo immer ihr sie auffindet; und nehmt euch keinen von ihnen zum Beschützer oder zum Helfer
ref: Wherefore take not friends from among them until they migrate for the sake of Allah; and if they turn away, then lay hold of them and slay them, wheresoever ye find them, and take not from among them a friend or a helper.
draft: Therefore, do not take protectors from them unless they migrate in Allah's cause. And if they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them and do not take from among them any protector or helper.
hil: Do not take protectors from them unless they migrate in Allah's cause. And if they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them and do not take from among them any protector or helper.
compare: Therefore, do not take protectors from them unless they migrate in Allah's cause. And if they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them and do not take from among them any protector or helper.

src: So sollen sie Mich nicht um Beschleunigung bitten.
ref: So let them not ask Me to hasten (the punishment).
draft: So they should not ask me to accelerate.
hil: So they should not ask me to accelerate.
compare: So they should not ask me to accelerate.

src: Sie gehören nicht zu euch, und auch nicht zu ihnen.
ref: They are not of you, nor of them.
draft: They don't belong to you, and not to them either.
hil: They do not belong to you, nor to them.
compare: They do not belong to you, nor to them.

src: Und der Sünde der Juden wegen haben Wir ihnen gute Dinge verboten, die ihnen erlaubt waren, wie auch, weil sie viele Hindernisse in Allahs Weg legten
ref: Because of the wickedness of some among the Jews, and because they obstructed people from the way of God, We forbade them many things which were lawful for them;
draft: "And because of the transgression of the Jews, We forbade them good things which were permitted to them, and also because they hindered many from Allah's path."
hil: Because of the transgression of the Jews, We forbade them good things which were permitted to them, and also because they hindered many from Allah's path.
compare: "And because of the transgression of the Jews, We forbade them good things which were permitted to them, and also because they hindered many from Allah's path."

src: Seine Leute kamen eilig zu ihm getrieben.
ref: His people came excited to him.
draft: His people came driven to him hastily.
hil: His people came driven to him hastily.
compare: His people came driven to him hastily.

src: Hinsichtlich derjenigen, in deren Herzen Falschheit ist, so folgen sie dem, was darin mehrdeutig ist  in Bestrebung nach Fitna und in Bestrebung nach (irriger) Auslegung.
ref: As for those in whose hearts is swerving, they follow the ambiguous part, desiring dissension, and desiring its interpretation; and none knows its interpretation, save only God.
draft: Regarding those in whose hearts is falsehood, they follow what is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and in pursuit of (erroneous) interpretation.
hil: Regarding those in whose hearts is falsehood, they follow what is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and in pursuit of (erroneous) interpretation.
compare: Regarding those in whose hearts is falsehood, they follow what is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and in pursuit of (erroneous) interpretation.

src: Vor dem Unheil dessen, was Er erschaffen hat,
ref: From the evil of what He has created,
draft: Before the calamity of what He has created.
hil: Before the calamity of that which He has created.
compare: Before the calamity of what He has created.

src: Ist etwa derjenige, der ins Feuer geworfen wird, besser oder derjenige, der am Tage der Auferstehung sicher kommt?! Tut, was ihr wollt!
ref: Is he who is hurled into the Fire better? Or he who arrives safely on the Day of Resurrection?
draft: Is the one who is thrown into the fire better or the one who comes safely on the day of resurrection?! Do what you want!
hil: Is the one who is thrown into the fire better or the one who comes safely on the day of resurrection? Do whatever you want!
compare: Is the one who is thrown into the fire better or the one who comes safely on the day of resurrection?! Do what you want!

src: Dies sind die Gesandten; einige von ihnen haben Wir vor anderen bevorzugt. Unter ihnen gibt es manche, zu denen Allah gesprochen hat, und einige, die Er um Rangstufen erhöht hat.
ref: Of those messengers, some of whom We have caused to excel others, and of whom there are some unto whom Allah spake, while some of them He exalted (above others) in degree; and We gave Jesus, son of Mary, clear proofs (of Allah's Sovereignty) and We supported him with the holy Spirit.
draft: These are the messengers; We have preferred some of them over others. Among them are those to whom Allah has spoken, and He has raised some of them in degrees of rank.
hil: These are the messengers; We have preferred some of them over others. Among them are those to whom Allah has spoken, and He has raised some of them in degrees of rank.
compare: These are the messengers; We have preferred some of them over others. Among them are those to whom Allah has spoken, and He has raised some of them in degrees of rank.

src: Dient ALLAH, meinem HERRN und eurem HERRN.
ref: Worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord."
draft: "Serve Allah, my Lord and your Lord."
hil: Serve Allah, the Lord of all creation!
compare: "Serve Allah, my Lord and your Lord."

src: Ehefrauen des Propheten! Ihr seid nicht wie irgendeine (Gruppe) der Frauen, wenn ihr Taqwa gemäß handelt.
ref: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like other women.
draft: Wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women, if you act according to Taqwa.
hil: O wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women, if you act according to Taqwa.
compare: O wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women, if you act according to Taqwa.

src: ALLAH möge ihnen vergeben. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: It may be that God will accept their repentance, for God is forgiving and kind.
draft: "May Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
hil: May Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: "May Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

src: "Es gibt nur unseren ersten Tod, und wir werden nicht wiedererweckt werden.
ref: "There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.
draft: There is only our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
hil: There is only our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
compare: There is only our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm zugerufen: "Gesegnet ist wer im Feuer und wer in dessen Umgebung ist, und Preis sei Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner!
ref: But when he reached it, a voice called out: "Blessed is He who is in the fire and all around it. Praised be God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: When he arrived there, he was called out to: "Blessed is he who is in the fire and in its surroundings, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!"
hil: When he arrived there, he was called out to: 'Blessed is he who is in the fire and in its surroundings, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!'
compare: When he arrived there, he was called out to: 'Blessed is he who is in the fire and in its surroundings, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!'

src: Als ihr fortlieft und euch nach niemandem umdrehtet, während der Gesandte euch von hinten her rief. Da belohnte Er euch mit Kummer für (den) Kummer (des Propheten), damit ihr weder traurig wäret über das, was euch entgangen war, noch über das, was euch getroffen hatte. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: Remember, as you were rushing up (the hill) without turning back to look, though the Prophet was calling you from the rear, He requited you with anguish for an anguish that you do not fret for missed opportunity and what befell you, for God is aware of all that you do,
draft: As you walked away and did not turn to anyone while the messenger called you from behind. Then, He rewarded you with sorrow for (the Prophet's) sorrow, so that you would neither be sad about what you had missed nor about what had befallen you. And Allah is aware of what you do.
hil: As you walked away and did not turn to anyone while the messenger called you from behind. Then, He rewarded you with sorrow for (the Prophet's) sorrow, so that you would neither be sad about what you had missed nor about what had befallen you. And Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: As you walked away and did not turn to anyone while the messenger called you from behind. Then, He rewarded you with sorrow for (the Prophet's) sorrow, so that you would neither be sad about what you had missed nor about what had befallen you. And Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Am Morgen war er in der Stadt furchtsam und hielt (immer wieder) Ausschau. Auf einmal schrie derjenige, der ihn am Tag zuvor um Hilfe gebeten hatte, zu ihm um Beistand. Musa sagte zu ihm: "Du bist offenkundig einer, der wahrlich (zu Gewalttaten) verleitet."
ref: So he was in the city at morning fearing, waiting to see what happens – thereupon he sighted the one who had appealed to him the day before, crying out to him for help; Moosa said to him, “Indeed you are clearly astray.”
draft: "In the morning he was fearful in the city and kept watch (time and again). Suddenly the one who had asked him for help the day before shouted to him for assistance. Musa said to him: "You are obviously one who is truly tempted (to commit violence)."
hil: "In the morning he was fearful in the city and kept watch (time and again). Suddenly the one who had asked him for help the day before shouted to him for assistance. Musa said to him: 'You are obviously one who is truly tempted (to commit violence).' "
compare: "In the morning he was fearful in the city and kept watch (time and again). Suddenly the one who had asked him for help the day before shouted to him for assistance. Musa said to him: "You are obviously one who is truly tempted (to commit violence)."

src: Und WIR senden nach und nach vom Quran hinab, was eine Heilung und Gnade für die Mumin ist. Doch er bestärkt die Unrecht-Begehenden nur noch im Fehlgehen.
ref: What We have sent down of the Qur'an is a healing and a grace for the faithful, and adds only loss for the sinners.
draft: And WE send down bit by bit from the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers. But it only increases the wrongdoers in loss.
hil: We send down bit by bit from the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers. But it only increases the wrongdoers in loss.
compare: And WE send down bit by bit from the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers. But it only increases the wrongdoers in loss.

src: Solcherart erläutert ALLAH für euch Seine Ayat.
ref: Thus Allah makes clear His Ayat (Commandments and legal obligations) for you.
draft: Such Allah explains His signs to you.
hil: Say, such Allah explains His signs to you.
compare: Such Allah explains His signs to you.

src: Und gäbe es nicht das Wort des Richtens, würde bestimmt unter ihnen gerichtet.
ref: But for the decisive Word (of God) a sentence would have been passed amongst them.
draft: And if there were no word of judgment, they would surely be judged among themselves.
hil: And if there were no word of judgment, they would surely be judged among themselves.
compare: And if there were no word of judgment, they would surely be judged among themselves.

src: Sollen wir etwa Sudschud zu dem vollziehen, den du uns anweist?!"
ref: Should we adore whoever you ask us to?"
draft: "Are we supposed to obey Sudschud just because you tell us to?!"
hil: Say, "Are we supposed to obey Sudschud just because you tell us to?" Say, "Should we execute the one you order us to, Sudschud?!"
compare: "Are we supposed to obey Sudschud just because you tell us to?!"

src: Also richte deine Bittgebete an keinen anderen Gott neben ALLAH, sonst wirst du von den Gepeinigten.
ref: So call on no other god but God, lest you are condemned to torment;
draft: Also direct your supplications to no other God than ALLAH, otherwise you will be among the tormented.
hil: So direct your supplications to no other god than Allah, or else you will be among the tormented.
compare: So direct your supplications to no other god than Allah, or else you will be among the tormented.

src: Nach dem Gesetz des Königs hätte es ihm nicht zugestanden, seinen Bruder (als Sklaven) zu nehmen, außer daß Allah es wollte. Wir erhöhen, wen Wir wollen, um Rangstufen.
ref: He could not take his brother by the law of the king (as a slave), except that Allah willed it. (So Allah made the brothers to bind themselves with their way of "punishment, i.e. enslaving of a thief.")
draft: According to the law of the king, he would not have been entitled to take his brother (as a slave), unless Allah had willed it. We elevate whom We will in degrees [of rank].
hil: According to the law of the king, he would not have been entitled to take his brother (as a slave), unless Allah had willed it. We elevate whom We will in degrees [of rank].
compare: According to the law of the king, he would not have been entitled to take his brother (as a slave), unless Allah had willed it. We elevate whom We will in degrees [of rank].

src: Diejenigen, die aus Furcht vor ihrem Herrn erschrecken,
ref: Surely those who live in awe of their Lord,
draft: Those who are frightened of their Lord,
hil: Those who are afraid of their Lord,
compare: Those who are frightened of their Lord,

src: Gut wart ihr, so betretet es; darin werdet ihr ewig weilen.»...
ref: So enter here to live for ever."
draft: "Well were you, so enter it; therein shall you dwell forever."
hil: Well were you, so enter it; therein shall you dwell forever.
compare: "Well were you, so enter it; therein shall you dwell forever."

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt.
ref: O you who believe, be fearful of God. Let each soul consider what it has sent (of good deeds) in advance for the morrow, and fear God.
draft: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let each soul look to what it has put forward for tomorrow.
hil: O you who believe, fear Allah; and every soul should look to what it sends ahead for tomorrow.
compare: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let each soul look to what it has put forward for tomorrow.

src: Von Pharao. Er hatte hohe Gewalt und war einer der Maßlosen.
ref: From Firaun; he was indeed proud, among the transgressors.
draft: From the Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the excessive ones.
hil: "From Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the excessives."
compare: From the Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the excessive ones.

src: ALLAH erwählt aus den Engeln Gesandte und aus den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allhörend, allsehend.
ref: Allah chooses the Noble Messengers from the angels, and from men; indeed Allah is All Hearing, All Seeing.
draft: ALLAH chooses from the angels Messengers and from the people. Surely, ALLAH is all-hearing, all-seeing.
hil: Allah chooses messengers from the angels and from the people. Surely, Allah is all-hearing and all-seeing.
compare: ALLAH chooses from the angels Messengers and from the people. Surely, ALLAH is all-hearing, all-seeing.

src: Beide versorgen WIR, diese und diese mit den Gaben deines HERRN.
ref: To each these as well as those We bestow from the Bounties of your Lord.
draft: Both of us provide these and these with the gifts of your LORD.
hil: We both provide these and these with the gifts of your Lord.
compare: We both provide these and these with the gifts of your Lord.

src: Und am Morgen war (der Garten) bereits verwüstet.
ref: So by the morning it seemed as though picked clean.
draft: And in the morning (the garden) was already devastated.
hil: And in the morning (the garden) was already devastated.
compare: And in the morning (the garden) was already devastated.

src: Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm, so richtet an Ihn Bittgebete als Aufrichtiger im Din Ihm gegenüber.
ref: There is no god but He. Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.
draft: There is no deity except Him, so direct sincere supplications to Him in His religion.
hil: There is no deity except Him, so direct supplications to Him in sincerity in His religion.
compare: There is no deity except Him, so direct sincere supplications to Him in His religion.

src: Er sagte: "Mein Vater! Tu, was dir geboten wurde.
ref: Do what you are commanded!
draft: He said: "My father! Do what was commanded of you.
hil: He said, 'My father! Do what you have been commanded.'
compare: He said: "My father! Do what was commanded of you.

src: Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: Verily there are signs in this for those who pay heed.
draft: Certainly, therein are signs for people who listen.
hil: Amongst these are certainly signs for those who listen.
compare: Certainly, therein are signs for people who listen.

src: Die Gänge der Himmel, daß ich zum Gott des Mose emporsteige. Ich halte ihn ja für einen Lügner.» So wurde dem Pharao sein böses Tun verlockend gemacht, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgewiesen. Die List Pharaos ist dem Verderben erlegen.
ref: “The routes of the heavens, in order to glance at the God of Moosa – and indeed I think he is a liar”; this is how the evil deeds of Firaun were made seeming good to him, and he was stopped from the path; and the evil scheme of Firaun was destined to be ruined.
draft: The aisles of the heavens, so that I ascend to the God of Moses. I do consider him a liar. » Thus, Pharaoh was tempted to do evil, and he was led astray from the (righteous) path. The cunning of Pharaoh perished in ruin.
hil: The avenues of the heavens, so that I can ascend to the God of Moses. I believe him to be a liar.' Thus, Pharaoh was tempted to do evil, and he was led astray from the (righteous) path. The cunning of Pharaoh perished in ruin.
compare: The avenues of the heavens, so that I can ascend to the God of Moses. I believe him to be a liar.' Thus, Pharaoh was tempted to do evil, and he was led astray from the (righteous) path. The cunning of Pharaoh perished in ruin.

src: Diejenigen, über die das Urteil gefällt wird, sagen: "Unser Herr, dies sind jene, die wir irreführten.
ref: Those about whom the Word will have come true (to be punished) will say: "Our Lord! These are they whom we led astray.
draft: Those over whom judgment is passed say, "Our Lord, these are those whom we misled.
hil: Those over whom judgment is passed say, "Our Lord, these are those whom we misled."
compare: Those over whom judgment is passed say, "Our Lord, these are those whom we misled.

src: O Prophet, wenn ihr euch von Frauen scheidet, dann scheidet euch von ihnen auf ihre Wartezeit hin, und berechnet die Wartezeit.
ref: O PROPHET WHEN you divorce women, divorce them at their appointed period, and calculate that period, and fear God, your Lord. Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.
draft: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their waiting period and calculate the waiting period.
hil: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their waiting period and calculate the waiting period.
compare: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their waiting period and calculate the waiting period.

src: Und wer von euch es sich nicht leisten kann, freie Mumin-Frauen zu heiraten, dann (heiratet er) von den Mumin-Dienerinnen, die euch gehören. Und ALLAH kennt euren Iman besser - die einen von euch sind wie die anderen.
ref: Any one of you who has not the affluence to be able to marry believing freewomen in wedlock, let him take believing handmaids that your right hands own; God knows very well your faith; the one of you is as the other.
draft: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free Moomin women, then (he marries) from the Moomin maidservants who are owned by you. And ALLAH knows your faith better - some of you are like others.
hil: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free Mumin women, (let him marry) from the Mumin maidservants who belong to you. And ALLAH knows your faith better - some of you are like others.
compare: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free Mumin women, (let him marry) from the Mumin maidservants who belong to you. And ALLAH knows your faith better - some of you are like others.

src: So komme ich zu euch mit einem Zeichen von eurem Herrn.
ref: I have brought you a miracle from your Lord.
draft: "So I come to you with a sign from your Lord."
hil: So I come to you with a sign from your Lord.
compare: "So I come to you with a sign from your Lord."

src: Diese eilen zu den guten Dingen um die Wette und werden darin die Allerersten sein.
ref: Are the ones who hasten to goodness and outpace the others.
draft: These hurry to the good things as if in a competition and will be the very first in them.
hil: They hurry to the good things like in a competition and will be the very first in them.
compare: These hurry to the good things as if in a competition and will be the very first in them.

src: Sag: "Habt ihr irgendein Wissen darüber, das ihr uns offenlegt?" Doch ihr folgt nur dem Spekulieren, und ihr lügt ja nur.
ref: You follow only assumptions and only make guesses.”
draft: Say: "Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?" But you only follow speculation, and you are just lying.
hil: Say, 'Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?' But you only follow speculation, and you only lie.'
compare: Say: "Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?" But you only follow speculation, and you are just lying.

src: Und bittet ALLAH um etwas von Seiner Gunst!
ref: Ask God for His favours.
draft: And ask ALLAH for some of His favor!
hil: And ask Allah for some of His grace. Verily, Allah is of everything Knower.
compare: And ask Allah for some of His grace. Verily, Allah is of everything Knower.

src: Und aus den Bergen hauet ihr euch Wohnungen geschickt aus.
ref: And dwellings hewed out of mountains ingeniously?
draft: And from the mountains you have cleverly carved out homes for yourselves.
hil: And from the mountains, you cleverly carve out homes for yourselves.
compare: And from the mountains you have cleverly carved out homes for yourselves.

src: Und die Entscheidungsträger von ihnen gingen los: "Geht weiter so, und seid duldsam in eurer Gottheiten Sache! Gewiß, dies ist eine Sache, die doch erstrebt wird.
ref: The chiefs among them departed saying: go, and persevere in your gods; verily this is a thing designed.
draft: "And their decision-makers went on: 'Keep going like this and be patient in the matter of your gods! Certainly, this is a matter that is sought after."
hil: The decision-makers among them went on: "Continue like this and be patient in the matter of your gods! Surely, this is a matter that is sought after."
compare: The decision-makers among them went on: "Continue like this and be patient in the matter of your gods! Surely, this is a matter that is sought after."

src: So gibt es von euch keinen, der es von ihm zurückhält.
ref: And not one of you would have been able to stop (Us).
draft: So there is none of you who withholds it from him.
hil: "There is none of you who withholds it from him"
compare: "There is none of you who withholds it from him"

src: Diejenigen, gegen die der Spruch zu Recht fällig geworden ist, sagen: «Unser Herr, diese, die wir haben abirren lassen, haben wir abirren lassen, wie wir selbst abgeirrt waren. (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los.
ref: Those against whom the Word will have proved true will say, “Our Lord! These are they whom we led astray; we led them astray the way we ourselves went astray; we are unconcerned with them and we incline towards You – they never worshipped us!”
draft: Those against whom the verdict has been rightly issued say: "Our Lord, these whom we have led astray, we have led astray like we ourselves went astray. We free ourselves before You from them."
hil: Those against whom the verdict has been confirmed say: 'Our Lord, these whom we caused to go astray, we caused them to go astray as we ourselves had gone astray. We dissociate ourselves from them before You. Surely, they never worshiped us.'
compare: Those against whom the verdict has been confirmed say: 'Our Lord, these whom we caused to go astray, we caused them to go astray as we ourselves had gone astray. We dissociate ourselves from them before You. Surely, they never worshiped us.'

src: ER sagte: "Verlasse es als ein Verachteter, Verfluchter.
ref: "Begone," said (God), "contemptible and rejected!
draft: He said, "Leave it as a despised, cursed one."
hil: He said, 'Leave it as a despised, cursed one.'
compare: He said, 'Leave it as a despised, cursed one.'

src: Hätte Gott bei ihnen etwas Gutes festgestellt, hätte Er sie hören lassen. Und wenn Er sie hätte hören lassen, so hätten sie sich (dennoch) abgekehrt und abgewandt.
ref: And had Allah found any goodness in them, He would have made them hear; and had He made them hear they would, in the end, have turned away and gone back.
draft: If God had found anything good among them, He would have let them hear it. And if He had let them hear (it), they would have turned away while they were opposing.
hil: If God had found anything good among them, He would have let them hear it. And if He had let them hear (it), they would have turned away while they were opposing.
compare: If God had found anything good among them, He would have let them hear it. And if He had let them hear (it), they would have turned away while they were opposing.

src: Doch nur die verständigen Menschen besinnen sich.
ref: They alone take warning who are wise,
draft: But only the intelligent people reflect on it.
hil: Therefore, only the prudent people reflect on it.
compare: Therefore, only the prudent people reflect on it.

src: Als sie dann vor Yusuf traten, nahm er seine Eltern bei sich auf und sprach: "Zieht in Ägypten in Sicherheit ein, wie Allah es will."
