ref: When they went back to Joseph he gave his father and mother a place of honour, and said: "Enter Egypt in peace by the will of God."
draft: When they appeared before Yusuf, he took his parents to him and said, "Enter safety in Egypt as Allah wills."
hil: Upon their arrival in front of Yusuf, he took his parents to him and said: "Enter into safety in Egypt as Allah wills."
compare: When they appeared before Yusuf, he took his parents to him and said, "Enter safety in Egypt as Allah wills."

src: ER läßt die Nacht den Tag überdecken.
ref: He brings the night as a cover over the day.
draft: He lets the night cover the day.
hil: He turns night into day, and turns day into night.
compare: He lets the night cover the day.

src: Und haltet nicht die Kafir-Ehepartner!
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women.
draft: And do not keep the unbelieving spouses!
hil: And do not retain the disbelieving spouses!
compare: And do not retain the disbelieving spouses!

src: Dienet Ihm.
ref: So worship Him.
draft: Serve Him.
hil: Serve Him.
compare: Serve Him.

src: 'Isa, der Sohn Maryams, sagte: "O Allah, unser Herr, sende zu uns einen Tisch (mit Speisen) vom Himmel herab, der für uns, für den ersten von uns und den letzten von uns, ein Fest sein soll und ein Zeichen von Dir. Und versorge uns.
ref: Eisa, the son of Maryam, said, “O Allah, O our Lord! Send down to us a table spread from heaven, so that it may become a day of celebration for us – for our former and latter people – and a sign from You; and give us sustenance – and You are the Best Provider Of Sustenance.”
draft: Isa, the son of Maryam, said: "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table (spread with food) from heaven, that it may be a feast for us, for the first of us and for the last of us, and a sign from You. And provide us with sustenance.
hil: Isa, the son of Maryam, said: "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table (spread with food) from heaven, that it may be a feast for us, for the first of us and for the last of us, and a sign from You. And provide us with sustenance."
compare: Isa, the son of Maryam, said: "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table (spread with food) from heaven, that it may be a feast for us, for the first of us and for the last of us, and a sign from You. And provide us with sustenance.

src: Diejenigen, denen WIR die Schrift zuteil werden ließen, tragen sie vor, wie es ihr gebührt. Diese verinnerlichen den Iman daran.
ref: Those (who embraced Islam from Bani Israel) to whom We gave the Book [the Taurat (Torah)] [or those (Muhammad's Peace be upon him companions) to whom We have given the Book (the Quran)] recite it (i.e. obey its orders and follow its teachings) as it should be recited (i.e. followed), they are the ones that believe therein.
draft: Those to whom WE have granted the scripture recite it with its true recital. They [are the ones who] believe in it.
hil: To those whom we have granted the scripture, they recite it as it should be recited. They internalize the faith therein.
compare: To those whom we have granted the scripture, they recite it as it should be recited. They internalize the faith therein.

src: Hierauf nahm Allah ihre Reue an. Dann aber wurden (wieder) viele von ihnen blind und taub.
ref: Thereafter Allah relented toward them, then they again blinded and deafened themselves.
draft: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But then many of them became blind and deaf again.
hil: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But then many of them became blind and deaf again.
compare: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But then many of them became blind and deaf again.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, sind es, die der List erliegen.
ref: So the conspiracy will befall only upon the disbelievers.
draft: But those who are unbelievers are the ones who fall for the trickery.
hil: But it is those who are unbelievers who fall for the deception.
compare: But those who are unbelievers are the ones who fall for the trickery.

src: Also führe den bewaffneten Kampf fi-sabilillah!
ref: So fight on in the way of God (irrespective of the others).
draft: So carry out armed struggle in the way of Allah!
hil: Therefore, fight in the cause of Allah; you will not be burdened except for yourself, and urge the believers to fight.
compare: So carry out armed struggle in the way of Allah!

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war. Und Gott weiß besser, was sie verschweigen.
ref: They that day were nearer to unbelief than to belief, saying with their mouths that which never was in their hearts; and God knows very well the things they hide;
draft: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith, they said with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah knows better what they conceal.
hil: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith, they said with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah knows better what they conceal.
compare: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith, they said with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah knows better what they conceal.

src: Nehmen sie etwa nicht wahr, daß WIR gewiß Uns der Erde zuwenden und sie von ihren Enden einengen?!
ref: Do they not see Us advancing into the land, reducing its frontiers?
draft: Do they not perceive that WE certainly turn ourselves towards the Earth and constrain it from its edges?!
hil: Do they not perceive that We certainly turn towards the Earth and constrain it from its edges?!
compare: Do they not perceive that WE certainly turn ourselves towards the Earth and constrain it from its edges?!

src: Und erbärmlich ist sie als (ihr) Werden.
ref: What a wretched retreat!
draft: And pitiful is she in her becoming.
hil: And pitiful is she in her becoming.
compare: And pitiful is she in her becoming.

src: Wenn dann der Tod an einen von ihnen herantritt, sagt er: "Mein Herr, bringe mich zurück
ref: (But the unbelievers will persist) until when death comes to one of them he will say: "O Lord, send me back again
draft: When death approaches one of them, he says: "My lord, bring me back."
hil: And when death approaches one of them, he says, 'My Lord, send me back'[.]
compare: When death approaches one of them, he says: "My lord, bring me back."

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet.
ref: They shall be afflicted with misfortune, Allah is wroth with them. He has laid His curse upon them and has prepared for them Hell.
draft: Such (sinners) will befall an evil calamity; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them.
hil: Such (sinners) will befall an evil calamity; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Hellfire for them.
compare: Such (sinners) will befall an evil calamity; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Hellfire for them.

src: Sag: Allah hat das überzeugende Beweismittel.
ref: Say: "To God belongs the consummate argument.
draft: Say: Allah has the convincing proof.
hil: Say: Allah has the convincing proof.
compare: Say: Allah has the convincing proof.

src: Das ist ein Warner nach Art der früheren Warner.
ref: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.
draft: This is a warning in the style of earlier warnings.
hil: This is a warning in the style of earlier warnings.
compare: This is a warning in the style of earlier warnings.

src: Sie sagen: «Sie sind uns entschwunden. Nein, wir riefen früher nichts an.»
ref: They will say: they have failed us: aye! we have not been calling upon aught afore.
draft: They say: "You have escaped us. No, we didn't call anything earlier."
hil: They say: 'You have escaped us.' But we did not call anything earlier.
compare: They say: 'You have escaped us.' But we did not call anything earlier.

src: (Sie ist) als Unterkunft von Einem Allvergebenden, Allgnädigen."
ref: As a gift from the forgiving, ever-merciful (God)."
draft: "As a dwelling of the All-Forgiving, All-Merciful."
hil: as a dwelling of the All-Forgiving, All-Merciful.
compare: "As a dwelling of the All-Forgiving, All-Merciful."

src: Und Wir hoben den Berg über sie bei (der Entgegennahme von) ihrem Abkommen empor.
ref: And We raised the Mount over them for their bond.
draft: And We lifted the mountain over them at (the time of) their agreement.
hil: We raised the mountain above them during (the receiving of) their agreement.
compare: And We lifted the mountain over them at (the time of) their agreement.

src: Als Freudenbote und Warner.
ref: Announcing happy news and warnings.
draft: As a messenger of joy and warning.
hil: As a messenger of joy and warning.
compare: As a messenger of joy and warning.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde. Mit denen aber, die glauben und nicht ausgewandert sind, habt ihr keine Freundschaft zu pflegen, bis sie auswandern. Wenn sie euch jedoch um Unterstützung wegen der (euch gemeinsamen) Religion bitten, so habt ihr die Pflicht zur Unterstützung, außer gegen Leute, zwischen denen und euch eine Vertragspflicht besteht. Und Gott sieht wohl, was ihr tut.
ref: Indeed those who accepted faith and left their homes and belongings for Allah, and fought with their wealth and their lives in Allah's cause, and those who gave shelter and provided help, are the heirs of one another; and those who believed but did not leave their homes – you have no right in their estates until they migrate; and if they seek help from you in the matter of religion then it is your duty to provide help, except against the people between whom and you is a treaty; and Allah sees your deeds.
draft: Those who have believed and emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah , and those who gave shelter and aided - they are allies of one another. But those who believed and did not emigrate - for you there is no guardianship of them until they emigrate. And if they seek help of you for the religion, then you must help, except against a people between yourselves and whom is a treaty. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.
hil: Those who have believed and emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah, and those who gave shelter and aided - they are allies of one another. But for those who believed and did not emigrate, you are not in charge of their protection until they emigrate. And if they seek help from you for the sake of the (common) religion, then it is your duty to help, except against people between whom and you there is a contract. And Allah sees what you do.
compare: Those who have believed and emigrated and fought in the cause of Allah , and those who gave shelter and aided - they are allies of one another. But those who believed and did not emigrate - for you there is no guardianship of them until they emigrate. And if they seek help of you for the religion, then you must help, except against a people between yourselves and whom is a treaty. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

src: Und Wir gaben bereits Dawud und Sulaiman Wissen. Und sie sagten: "(Alles) Lob gehört Allah, der uns vor vielen Seiner gläubigen Diener bevorzugt hat!"
ref: We gave David and Solomon knowledge; and they said: "All praise be to God who has favoured us over many of His creatures who believe."
draft: And We had already given knowledge to David and Solomon, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah , who has favored us over many of His believing servants."
hil: And We had already given knowledge to David and Solomon, and they said, 'Praise [is due] to Allah , who has favored us over many of His believing servants.'
compare: And We had already given knowledge to David and Solomon, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah , who has favored us over many of His believing servants."

src: Dies sind die Ayat der Schrift und des erläuternden Quran.
ref: These are the verses of the Book and the perspicuous oration.
draft: These are the verses of the Scripture and the clarifying Quran.
hil: These are the verses of the Scripture and the clarifying Quran.
compare: These are the verses of the Scripture and the clarifying Quran.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde.
ref: Those who accepted the faith and set out of their homes, and fought in the way of God wealth and soul, and those who gave them shelter and helped them, are friends of one another.
draft: Those who believed and emigrated and, with their wealth and their own person, have striven in the way of God, and those who have housed and supported them are friends with one another.
hil: Those who believed and emigrated and, with their wealth and their own person, have striven in the way of God, and those who housed and supported them, are friends with one another.
compare: Those who believed and emigrated and, with their wealth and their own person, have striven in the way of God, and those who housed and supported them, are friends with one another.

src: Jede Trinkzeit soll (dann abwechselnd) wahrgenommen werden.
ref: Each one's right to drink being established (by turns).
draft: Each drinking time should be (then alternately) perceived.
hil: Each drinking time is to be perceived (then alternately).
compare: Each drinking time is to be perceived (then alternately).

src: Und hütet euch vor einem Tag, an dem keine Seele etwas anstelle einer anderen übernehmen kann und von keiner Fürsprache noch Ersatz(leistung) angenommen wird und ihnen keine Hilfe zuteil wird!
ref: Take heed of the day when no man will be useful to man in the least, when no intercession matter nor ransom avail, nor help reach them.
draft: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another and when no intercession or compensation will be accepted from them and no help will be given to them!
hil: And beware of a day when no soul will be able to do anything in place of another, and no intercession or compensation shall be accepted from them, nor shall they receive any aid!
compare: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another and when no intercession or compensation will be accepted from them and no help will be given to them!

src: Doch WIR lassen es nur nach einem bekannten Maß nach und nach hinabsenden.
ref: And We send it not down except in a known measure.
draft: But WE only let it gradually descend to a known extent.
hil: We only let it gradually descend to a known extent.
compare: We only let it gradually descend to a known extent.

src: Er wollte euch aber in alledem, was Er euch gegeben hat, auf die Probe stellen. Darum sollt ihr um die guten Dinge wetteifern.
ref: If Allah willed, He would have made you one nation, but that (He) may test you in what He has given you; so strive as in a race in good deeds.
draft: He wanted to test you in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should compete for the good things.
hil: But he wanted to test you in everything that he has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.
compare: But he wanted to test you in everything that he has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.

src: Und Gottes Wille wird durch nichts vereitelt weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde. Er weiß Bescheid und ist mächtig.
ref: And Allah is not such that anything in the heavens or in the earth can break away from His control; indeed He is All Knowing, Able.
draft: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows and is powerful.
hil: And Allah's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He has knowledge and is powerful.
compare: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows and is powerful.

src: Er ist ja eine Erinnerung.
ref: Verily this Qur'an is an Admonition.
draft: He is a memory.
hil: Indeed, he is a memory.
compare: Indeed, he is a memory.

src: DU hast mich aus Feuer geschaffen, aber ihn hast DU aus Lehm geschaffen."
ref: "You created me from fire, and him from clay."
draft: "You created me from fire, but you created him from clay."
hil: You created me from fire, but you created him from clay.
compare: "You created me from fire, but you created him from clay."

src: Diejenigen, die über ihn uneins sind, sind im Zweifel über ihn.
ref: Those who disagree in the matter are only lost in doubt.
draft: Those who are divided about him are doubtful about him.
hil: Those who are in disagreement about him are in doubt about him.
compare: Those who are divided about him are doubtful about him.

src: WIR werden ihnen doch noch Unsere Ayat in allen Bereichen zeigen und an ihnen selber, damit ihnen deutlich wird, daß er (der Quran) gewiß dieWahrheit ist.
ref: We will show Our signs to them in the horizons of the external world and within themselves, until it becomes clear to them that it's the truth.
draft: WE will indeed show them Our signs in all domains and within themselves as well, until it becomes clear to them that it (the Quran) is undoubtedly the truth.
hil: WE will indeed show them Our signs in all domains and within themselves as well, until it becomes clear to them that it (the Quran) is undoubtedly the truth.
compare: WE will indeed show them Our signs in all domains and within themselves as well, until it becomes clear to them that it (the Quran) is undoubtedly the truth.

src: Weshalb, wenn euch gesagt wird: "Brecht auf fi-sabilillah", werdet ihr träge an der Stelle haftend?!
ref: What is the matter with you, that when it is said to you, “Migrate in Allah's cause”, you sit on the ground with heaviness?
draft: Why, when you are told "Break up fi-sabilillah", do you become lazy and stay in place?!
hil: "Why, when you are told to 'set forth for the sake of Allah', do you become lazy and stay fixed in place?",
compare: "Why, when you are told to 'set forth for the sake of Allah', do you become lazy and stay fixed in place?",

src: Und ER machte euch aus euren Partnerwesen Kinder und Enkel und gewährte euch Rizq von den Tay-yibat.
ref: He has created your sons and grandsons from your spouses and has given you pure things for your sustenance.
draft: And HE made for you from your partners children and grandchildren and provided for you from the Tayyibat (good things).
hil: He made for you from your partners children and grandchildren, and provided for you from the good things of provision.
compare: And HE made for you from your partners children and grandchildren and provided for you from the Tayyibat (good things).

src: Wenn ihr einander eine Schuld für eine festgesetzte Frist gewährt, dann schreibt sie nieder!
ref: When you contract a debt for a fixed period, write it down.
draft: If you grant each other a debt for a fixed period of time, then write it down!
hil: "O you who believe! when you deal with each other in contracting a debt for a fixed time, then write it down. Let the writer faithfully record it."
compare: "O you who believe! when you deal with each other in contracting a debt for a fixed time, then write it down. Let the writer faithfully record it."

src: Sie schwören euch, damit ihr mit ihnen zufrieden seid.
ref: They will plead on oath that you accept them.
draft: They swear to you so that you are satisfied with them.
hil: They swear before you that you may be pleased with them; so if you become pleased with them, then indeed Allah will never be pleased with the sinful.
compare: They swear before you that you may be pleased with them; so if you become pleased with them, then indeed Allah will never be pleased with the sinful.

src: Dies, weil sie ALLAHs Ayat gegenüber Kufr zu betreiben und die Propheten zu Unrecht zu töten pflegten. Dies war für das, wie sie sich widersetzten und zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Therefore settle down in Egypt or any city, where you will get what you demand”; and disgrace and misery were destined for them; and they returned towards Allah’s wrath; that was because they disbelieved in Allah’s signs and wrongfully martyred the Prophets; that was for their disobedience and transgression.
draft: "They used to engage in disbelief towards ALLAH's teachings and unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgressions."
hil: They used to commit disbelief towards ALLAH's teachings and unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgressions.
compare: "They used to engage in disbelief towards ALLAH's teachings and unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgressions."

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN. Und Salam sei auf demjenigen, welcher der Rechtleitung folgt.
ref: We bring you a sign from your Lord, and peace be upon him who follows guidance.
draft: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord. And peace be upon those who follow guidance.
hil: We have already brought you a sign (verse) from your Lord. And peace be upon those who follow guidance.
compare: We have already brought you a sign (verse) from your Lord. And peace be upon those who follow guidance.

src: Und wenn sie darauf nicht reagieren, dann wisset, es ist mit Allahs Wissen offenbart worden; und es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: If they do not answer you, then know it has been revealed with the knowledge of God, and that there is no god but He.
draft: And if they do not react to it, then know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.
hil: And if they do not respond to it, then know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.
compare: And if they do not react to it, then know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.

src: Allah hat doch das Wort jener gehört, die mit dir wegen ihres Mannes stritt und sich vor Allah beklagte.
ref: God has heard the words of her that disputes with thee concerning her husband, and makes complaint unto God.
draft: "Allah has indeed heard the words of those who argued with you about their husbands and complained to Allah."
hil: "Indeed, Allah has heard the speech of the woman who argued with you about her husband and complained to Allah."
compare: "Indeed, Allah has heard the speech of the woman who argued with you about her husband and complained to Allah."

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu "Ad ihren Bruder Hud.
ref: And We sent Hud, their brother, to the people of 'Ad.
draft: And (we sent) to "Ad their brother Hud.
hil: And (We sent) their brother Hud to 'Aad.
compare: And (We sent) their brother Hud to 'Aad.

src: Gib mir ein, daß ich mich Deiner Wohltat, die DU mir und meinen Eltern gewährt hast, dankbar erweise, und daß ich gottgefällig Gutes tue, woran DU Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: Help me to be grateful for Your favours which You have bestowed upon me, and upon both my parents, and to do good deeds that will please You.
draft: Admit that I gratefully acknowledge Your favor that You have granted me and my parents, and that I do good in a way pleasing to God, in which You find pleasure.
hil: Admit that I gratefully acknowledge Your favor that You have granted me and my parents, and that I do good in a way pleasing to God, in which You find pleasure.
compare: Admit that I gratefully acknowledge Your favor that You have granted me and my parents, and that I do good in a way pleasing to God, in which You find pleasure.

src: Gewiß, sie haben sehr viele von den Menschen in die Irre geführt.
ref: They have indeed led astray many among mankind.
draft: Certainly, they have misled a lot of people.
hil: Verily, they have led many of the people astray.
compare: Certainly, they have misled a lot of people.

src: Alhamdulillah: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und die Finsternis und das Licht gemacht hat. Dann (trotzdem) stellen diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, ihrem HERRN etwas gleich.
ref: All praise is to Allah, Who has created the heavens and the earth, and has created darkness and light; yet the disbelievers appoint equals (false deities) to their Lord!
draft: Alhamdulillah: All praise belongs to ALLAH, Who created the heavens and the earth, and made darkness and light. Yet, those who committed Kufr, equate something with their Lord.
hil: All praise belongs to ALLAH, Who created the heavens and the earth, and made darkness and light. Yet, those who committed Kufr, equate something with their Lord.
compare: Alhamdulillah: All praise belongs to ALLAH, Who created the heavens and the earth, and made darkness and light. Yet, those who committed Kufr, equate something with their Lord.

src: Aber Gott läßt nicht unbeachtet, was ihr tut.
ref: God is not unaware of all you do.
draft: But God does not overlook what you do.
hil: But Allah does not leave unnoticed what you do.
compare: But God does not overlook what you do.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch eure Eltern und eure Geschwister nicht als Wali, wenn sie den Kufr dem Iman vorziehen. Und wer von euch sie als Wali nimmt, diese sind die wirklichen Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: O you who believe, do not hold your fathers and brothers as friends if they hold disbelief more dear than faith; and those of you who do so are iniquitous.
draft: Those of you who have internalized the iman! Do not take your parents and siblings as allies if they prefer kufr to iman. And whoever of you takes them as allies, they are the wrongdoers.
hil: O ye who believe! take not your fathers and your brothers for friends if they love infidelity above faith. And whoever of you takes them as allies, they are the wrongdoers.
compare: O ye who believe! take not your fathers and your brothers for friends if they love infidelity above faith. And whoever of you takes them as allies, they are the wrongdoers.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der aus dem Wasser einen Menschen erschuf, dann machte ER ihn zur Abstammung und Verschwägerung. Und dein HERR ist immer allmächtig.
ref: And it is He Who created man from water, then appointed relatives and in-laws for him; and your Lord is All Able.
draft: And HE is the one who created a human being from water, then made him into lineage and affinity. And your Lord is always almighty.
hil: And He is the One who created human being from water, then made him into lineage and affinity. And your Lord is always almighty.
compare: And HE is the one who created a human being from water, then made him into lineage and affinity. And your Lord is always almighty.

src: Und er betrat die Stadt um eine Zeit, da ihre Bewohner in einem Zustand der Unachtsamkeit waren; und er fand da zwei Männer, die miteinander kämpften.
ref: He came to the city when the people were in a care-free mood, and saw two men quarrelling, one belonging to his community, the other to his enemies.
draft: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of neglect; and he found there two men who were fighting with each other.
hil: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of neglect; and he found there two men who were fighting with each other.
compare: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of neglect; and he found there two men who were fighting with each other.

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm vom rechten Ufer des Tales im gesegneten Fleck (Land) aus dem Baum zugerufen: "O Musa, gewiß, Ich bin Allah, der Herr der Weltenbewohner."
ref: When he drew near, a voice called out to him from the tree on the blessed spot on the right side of the valley: "O Moses, I am verily God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: When he arrived there, he was shouted at from the tree on the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley: "O Musa, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the worlds."
hil: When he arrived there, he was shouted at from the tree on the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley: 'O Musa, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the worlds.'
compare: When he arrived there, he was shouted at from the tree on the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley: 'O Musa, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the worlds.'

src: Bringt sie nicht heraus aus ihren Wohnstätten! Und sie gehen nicht weg, außer wenn sie eine bewiesene Abscheulichkeit begehen.
ref: Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.
draft: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, except when they commit a proven abomination.
hil: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, except when they commit a proven abomination.
compare: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, except when they commit a proven abomination.

src: Allah hat Wohlgefallen an ihnen, und sie haben Wohlgefallen an Ihm. Jene sind Allahs Gruppierung.
ref: Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah.
draft: Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's group.
hil: Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's group.
compare: Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's group.

src: Und haltet nicht am Eheband mit den ungläubigen Frauen fest, sondern verlangt das zurück, was ihr (für sie) ausgegeben habt, und lasset (die Ungläubigen) das zurückverlangen, was sie (für sie) ausgegeben haben.
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women. Ask for the return of what you have spent (on them); and the unbelievers should ask for the return of what they have spent.
draft: And do not hold on firmly to the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but demand back what you have spent (on them), and let (the unbelievers) demand back what they have spent (on them).
hil: And do not cling to the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but demand back what you have spent (on them), and let the unbelievers demand back what they have spent (on them).
compare: And do not hold on firmly to the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but demand back what you have spent (on them), and let (the unbelievers) demand back what they have spent (on them).

src: Da empfing Adam von seinem Herrn Worte, und darauf nahm Er seine Reue an. Er ist ja der Reue-Annehmende und Barmherzige.
ref: Then his Lord sent commands to Adam and turned towards him: Indeed He is compassionate and kind.
draft: And Adam received words from his Lord, and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of repentance, the Merciful.
hil: Adam received words from his Lord, and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of repentance, the Merciful.
compare: And Adam received words from his Lord, and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of repentance, the Merciful.

src: Wahrlich, Wir haben dich mit der Wahrheit als Bringer froher Botschaft und als Warner entsandt; und es gibt kein Volk, in dem es nicht einmal schon Warner gegeben hätte.
ref: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn. Never has there been a community to which an admonisher was not sent.
draft: Verily, We have sent you with the Truth, as a bringer of glad tidings and a Warner; and there is no community to which a Warner has not been sent before you.
hil: Verily, We have sent you with the Truth, as bringer of good news and as a warner. And there is no community to which a Warner has not been sent before you.
compare: Verily, We have sent you with the Truth, as bringer of good news and as a warner. And there is no community to which a Warner has not been sent before you.

src: Gott hat sich Abraham ja zum Vertrauten genommen.
ref: And God chose Abraham as friend.
draft: God did take Abraham as a confidant.
hil: God has indeed taken Abraham as a confidant.
compare: God did take Abraham as a confidant.

src: "Stelle Panzerhemden her und füge die Ringe nach Maß ineinander."
ref: Saying: Make thou long coats of mail and measure the links (thereof).
draft: "Make armored shirts and fit the rings together to measure."
hil: "Make large coats of armor and keep proper measure while making them. And all of you perform good deeds, for I am indeed seeing your deeds."
compare: "Make armored shirts and fit the rings together to measure."

src: Wie wog er ab!
ref: How moliciously he devised!
draft: How he weighed it!
hil: How did he weigh it!
compare: How he weighed it!

src: Denen, die ungläubig sind, werden weder ihr Vermögen noch ihre Kinder vor Gott etwas nützen. Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers; sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: Indeed those who disbelieve – neither their wealth nor their offspring will help save them in the least, from Allah; and they are the people of fire; remaining in it forever.
draft: Those who are unbelievers, neither their wealth nor their children will benefit them with God. They are the companions of the Fire; they will dwell therein forever.
hil: For those who disbelieve, neither their wealth nor their offspring will help to save them in the least from Allah; they are the companions of the Fire, and they will dwell therein forever.
compare: For those who disbelieve, neither their wealth nor their offspring will help to save them in the least from Allah; they are the companions of the Fire, and they will dwell therein forever.

src: Allah hat ein Siegel auf ihre Herzen gelegt, so daß sie kein Wissen haben.
ref: Allah hath sealed up their hearts, so they know not.
draft: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts so that they have no knowledge."
hil: Allah has set a seal on their hearts so that they have no knowledge.
compare: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts so that they have no knowledge."

src: Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschaffen haben.
ref: What have they created of the earth?
draft: Show me what they have created from the Earth.
hil: Show me what they have created from the Earth.
compare: Show me what they have created from the Earth.

src: Oder denken sie etwa, daß WIR ihr Geheimnis und ihre heimliche Unterredung nicht hören?! Doch, mit Sicherheit!
ref: Or do they think that We do not hear what they conceal and their secret discourses?
draft: Or do they perhaps think that WE do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! But, for sure!
hil: Or do they perhaps think that WE do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! But, for sure!
compare: Or do they perhaps think that WE do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! But, for sure!

src: Und wenn sie den Weg der Besonnenheit sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich nicht zum Weg. Wenn sie aber den Weg der Verirrung sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich zum Weg.
ref: Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it; and if they see the path of rectitude, they will not adopt it for a path; and if they see the path of error, they will adopt it for a path.
draft: And when they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But when they see the path of error, they take it as their path.
hil: If they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But if they see the path of error, they take it as their path.
compare: If they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But if they see the path of error, they take it as their path.

src: Er sagte: «Wenn du gewollt hättest, hättest du dafür einen Lohn nehmen können.»
ref: He said, “If you wanted, you could have obtained a payment for it.”
draft: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it."
hil: He said, 'If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it.'
compare: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it."

src: (Gewähre uns) Deine Vergebung, unser Herr!
ref: Your forgiveness, our Lord.
draft: Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord!
hil: Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord!
compare: Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord!

src: Gewiß, sie widersetzten sich mir und folgten demjenigen, dessen Vermögen und Kinder ihn nur am Verlust mehrten.
ref: They have disobeyed me, and they follow the one whose wealth and children increase nothing for him except ruin.”
draft: Certainly, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased with the loss.
hil: Surely, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased in loss.
compare: Certainly, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased with the loss.

src: Gesandter! Verkünde, was dir von deinem HERRN hinabgesandt wurde! Und solltest du dies nicht tun, dann hast du Seine Botschaft nicht verkündet. Und ALLAH schützt dich vor den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH leitet die kufrbetreibende Gemeinschaft nicht recht.
ref: O Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)! Convey all what has been sent down upon you from your Lord; and if you do not, then you have not conveyed any of His messages; and Allah will protect you from the people; indeed Allah does not guide the disbelievers.
draft: "Messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your LORD! And if you do not do this, then you have not conveyed His message. And ALLAH protects you from the people. Indeed, ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving community correctly."
hil: O Messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your LORD! And if you do not do this, then you have not conveyed His message. And ALLAH protects you from the people. Indeed, ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving community correctly.
compare: "Messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your LORD! And if you do not do this, then you have not conveyed His message. And ALLAH protects you from the people. Indeed, ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving community correctly."

src: Da erhörte sie ihr Herr (und sprach): "Seht, Ich lasse kein Werk der Wirkenden unter euch verlorengehen, sei es von Mann oder Frau; die einen von euch sind von den anderen.
ref: The Lord heard their prayer and answered: "I suffer not the good deeds of any to go waste, be he a man or a woman: The one of you is of the other.
draft: Then her Lord answered her (and said): "I do not let the work of the workers among you go to waste, whether they are men or women; some of you come from others.
hil: Then her Lord answered her (and said): 'I do not let the work of the workers among you go to waste, whether they are men or women; some of you come from others.'
compare: Then her Lord answered her (and said): "I do not let the work of the workers among you go to waste, whether they are men or women; some of you come from others.

src: Wo auch immer ihr seid, der Tod ereilt euch doch, und wäret ihr in hohen Burgen. Und wenn ihnen Gutes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von Allah"; und wenn ihnen Schlimmes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von dir."
ref: Wherever you are, death will overtake you, though you are in lofty towers, and if a benefit comes to them, they say: This is from Allah; and if a misfortune befalls them, they say: This is from you.
draft: Wherever you are, death will come to you, even if you are in lofty towers. And if good fortune comes to them, they say: "This is from Allah"; and if misfortune befalls them, they say: "This is from you."
hil: Wherever you are, death will come to you, even if you are in lofty towers. And when good comes to them, they say, 'This is from Allah,' and when evil befalls them, they say, 'This is from you.'
compare: Wherever you are, death will come to you, even if you are in lofty towers. And if good fortune comes to them, they say: "This is from Allah"; and if misfortune befalls them, they say: "This is from you."

src: So waret ihr einst, dann aber hat Allah euch Seine Huld erwiesen; darum stellt erst gehörig Nachforschungen an. Seht, Allah ist eures Tuns wohl kundig.
ref: So you were aforetime; but God has been gracious to you. So be discriminating; surely God is aware of the things you do.
draft: So you were once, but then Allah showed you His mercy; therefore, first make proper inquiries. See, Allah is well aware of your actions.
hil: Once you were like that, but then Allah showed you His mercy; therefore, first make proper inquiries. See, Allah is well aware of your actions.
compare: So you were once, but then Allah showed you His mercy; therefore, first make proper inquiries. See, Allah is well aware of your actions.

src: Da stritten sie untereinander über ihre Angelegenheit und führten insgeheim vertrauliche Gespräche.
ref: So they discussed their strategy among themselves and conferred privately,
draft: They argued among themselves about their matter and secretly held confidential conversations.
hil: They were arguing among themselves about their affairs and secretly holding confidential conversations.
compare: They were arguing among themselves about their affairs and secretly holding confidential conversations.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du etwa zu uns gekommen, damit wir ALLAH alleine dienen und von dem ablassen, dem unsere Ahnen dienten?! Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: They said: "Comest thou to us, that we may worship Allah alone, and give up the cult of our fathers? bring us what thou threatenest us with, if so be that thou tellest the truth!"
draft: They said, "Have you come to us so that we may serve Allah alone and abandon what our ancestors have worshipped? Then let what you have warned us against come to pass, if you are truthful."
hil: Say: "Have you come to us so that we may serve Allah alone and abandon what our ancestors have worshipped? Then let what you have warned us against come to pass, if you are truthful."
compare: They said, "Have you come to us so that we may serve Allah alone and abandon what our ancestors have worshipped? Then let what you have warned us against come to pass, if you are truthful."

src: Sie waren einverstanden, mit den Zurückgebliebenen zu sein.
ref: They are content to be with those (the women) who sit behind (at home).
draft: They agreed to stay with the remaining people.
hil: They agreed to stay with the remaining people.
compare: They agreed to stay with the remaining people.

src: Und ich bin dafür einer der Zeugen.
ref: It was He who created them and I testify to this fact".
draft: And I am one of the witnesses for that.
hil: And I am one of those witnesses.
compare: And I am one of those witnesses.

src: Sprich: Der Kampf in ihm ist schwerwiegend; aber (die Menschen) vom Wege Gottes abweisen, an Ihn nicht glauben, den Zugang zur heiligen Moschee verwehren und deren Anwohner daraus vertreiben, (all das) wiegt bei Gott schwerer. Verführen wiegt schwerer als Töten.
ref: Tell them: "To fight in that month is a great sin. But a greater sin in the eyes of God is to hinder people from the way of God, and not to believe in Him, and to bar access to the Holy Mosque and turn people out of its precincts; and oppression is worse than killing.
draft: Speak: The struggle within him is serious; but to turn away from the path of God, not to believe in Him, to deny access to the holy mosque, and to drive out its inhabitants, all this is more serious in the sight of God. Tempting is more serious than killing.
hil: Say: the struggle within him is grave; but to turn away from the path of God, not to believe in Him, to deny access to the holy mosque, and to drive out its inhabitants, all of this weighs more heavily with God. Tempting weighs more heavily than killing.
compare: Speak: The struggle within him is serious; but to turn away from the path of God, not to believe in Him, to deny access to the holy mosque, and to drive out its inhabitants, all this is more serious in the sight of God. Tempting is more serious than killing.

src: Und würden sie die Tora und das Evangelium und das, was zu ihnen von ihrem Herrn herabgesandt wurde, einhalten, sie würden von oben und unter ihren Füßen zu essen bekommen. Unter ihnen gibt es eine Gemeinde mit maßvollem Wandel.
ref: Had the People of the Book observed the Torah and the Gospel, and all that had been revealed to them from their Lord, sustenance would have been showered over them from above and risen from beneath their feet.
draft: And if they would uphold the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would be provided with food from above them and beneath their feet. Among them is a moderate community.
hil: If they were to follow the Torah, the Gospel, and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would be provided with food from above and beneath their feet. Among them, there is a moderate community.
compare: And if they would uphold the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would be provided with food from above them and beneath their feet. Among them is a moderate community.

src: Für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: For them there is painful punishment.
draft: For her, a painful agony is destined.
hil: For them, a painful agony is destined.
compare: For her, a painful agony is destined.

src: Er ist der beste Versorger.
ref: He is the Best of providers.
draft: He is the best provider.
hil: Verily, He is the best provider.
compare: He is the best provider.

src: ER fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was ER will. Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: He addeth in creation what soever He listeth Verily Allah is over everything Potent.
draft: HE adds to the creation what HE wills. Indeed, Allah is Almighty over everything.
hil: HE adds to the creation what HE wills. Surely, Allah is Almighty over everything.
compare: HE adds to the creation what HE wills. Indeed, Allah is Almighty over everything.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch nicht Leute alsWali, über die ALLAH erzürnt ist.
ref: O ye who believe! befriend not a people against whom Allah is Wroth.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not take people as guardians over whom Allah is angry.
hil: O believers, do not take as friends those who have earned the wrath of Allah after having lost hope in the hereafter, just as the unbelievers lost hope in those who are in graves.
compare: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not take people as guardians over whom Allah is angry.

src: Und wenn er ihnen verlesen wird, sagen sie: "Wir glauben an ihn.
ref: And when it is read out to them, say: "We believe in it.
draft: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it."
hil: And when it is recited to them, they say: 'We believe in it.'
compare: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it."

src: Das sind Insassen des (Höllen)feuers.
ref: They are the dwellers of the Fire, therein they will abide.
draft: These are inmates of the (Hell)fire.
hil: They are rightful Peoples of the Fire who disbelieve and deny His revelations.
compare: These are inmates of the (Hell)fire.

src: Aber diejenigen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, werden in Gärten geführt, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen, mit der Erlaubnis ihres Herrn.
ref: And those who believed (in the Oneness of Allah and His Messengers and whatever they brought) and did righteous deeds, will be made to enter Gardens under which rivers flow, - to dwell therein forever (i.e. in Paradise), with the permission of their Lord.
draft: But those who believe and do good deeds will be guided to gardens beneath which rivers flow, therein they shall abide forever, with the permission of their Lord.
hil: Those who believe and do good deeds will be led to the gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they shall abide forever with the permission of their Lord.
compare: But those who believe and do good deeds will be guided to gardens beneath which rivers flow, therein they shall abide forever, with the permission of their Lord.

src: Wie lasset ihr euch da (von Ihm) abwenden?
ref: How then can you turn away?
draft: How do you let yourselves turn away (from Him) like that?
hil: How do you let yourselves turn away (from Him) like that?
compare: How do you let yourselves turn away (from Him) like that?

src: Dabei sind sie demütig gegen Allah und verkaufen Seine Zeichen nicht gegen einen winzigen Preis. Jene haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn.
ref: They do not sell the Verses of Allah for a little price, for them is a reward with their Lord.
draft: They are humble towards Allah and do not sell His signs for a tiny price. They will receive their reward from their Lord.
hil: They are humble towards Allah and do not sell His signs for a tiny price. They will receive their reward from their Lord.
compare: They are humble towards Allah and do not sell His signs for a tiny price. They will receive their reward from their Lord.

src: Sprich: "Mein Herr kennt ihre Zahl am besten.
ref: They will say, 'Seven; and their dog was the eighth of them.'
draft: Speak: "My Lord knows their number best."
hil: Say, "My Lord knows their number best."
compare: Say, "My Lord knows their number best."

src: Dann machte Er seine Nachkommenschaft aus dem Erguß eines verächtlichen Wassers.
ref: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,
draft: Then he made his offspring from the ejaculation of contemptuous water.
hil: He then made his descendants from the effusion of contemptible water.
compare: He then made his descendants from the effusion of contemptible water.

src: Abweisen werde Ich von meinen Zeichen diejenigen, die sich auf der Erde zu Unrecht hochmütig verhalten. Wenn sie auch jedes Zeichen sehen, glauben sie nicht daran.
ref: I will turn away from My revelations those who behave proudly on earth without justification.
draft: I will reject those who behave arrogantly and unjustly on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they won't believe in them.
hil: I will reject those who behave arrogantly and unjustly on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they won't believe in them.
compare: I will reject those who behave arrogantly and unjustly on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they won't believe in them.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN.
ref: We have come to you with a token from your Lord.
draft: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord.
hil: We have already brought you a sign from your Lord.
compare: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord.

src: Euch wird nicht schaden, wer irregeht, wenn ihr der Rechtleitung folgt. Zu ALLAH ist eure Rückkehr allesamt, dann wird ER euch darüber in Kenntnis setzen, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: Fear for your own souls; he who has strayed cannot harm you in the least if you are on guidance; towards Allah only you will all return – He will then inform you of what you used to do.
draft: It will not harm you if someone goes astray, if you follow the guidance. To Allah is your return, all of you, then He will inform you of what you used to do.
hil: It will not harm you if someone goes astray, if you follow the guidance. To Allah is your return, all of you, then He will inform you of what you used to do.
compare: It will not harm you if someone goes astray, if you follow the guidance. To Allah is your return, all of you, then He will inform you of what you used to do.

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen.
ref: But do not take them back to hurt them, and whoever does that, then he has wronged himself.
draft: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions.
hil: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions.
compare: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions.

src: ER erschuf die Himmel und die Erde in Gesetzmäßigkeit und gestaltete euch, dann machte eure Gestalten schön.
ref: He created the heavens and the earth with Truth and shaped you, giving you excellent shapes.
draft: HE created the heavens and the earth in regular pattern and fashioned you, and made your shapes beautiful.
hil: He created the heavens and the earth in regular pattern and fashioned you, then made your shapes beautiful.
compare: He created the heavens and the earth in regular pattern and fashioned you, then made your shapes beautiful.

src: Sag: "Ist dies besser oder die Dschanna der Ewigkeit, die den Muttaqi versprochen wurde?!"
ref: Ask them: "Is this better or a garden for everlasting abode which has been promised the pious and devout?
draft: Say, "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"
hil: Say, 'Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!'
compare: Say, "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"

src: Allah will für euch Erleichterung; Er will für euch nicht Erschwernis, - damit ihr die Anzahl vollendet und Allah als den Größten preist, dafür, daß Er euch rechtgeleitet hat, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: Allah intendeth for you ease, and intendeth not for you hardship; so ye shall fulfil the number and shall magnify Allah for His having guided you, and haply ye may give thanks.
draft: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to burden you - so that you may complete the prescribed period and glorify Allah for having guided you, and that you may be grateful.
hil: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to burden you - so that you may complete the prescribed period and glorify Allah for having guided you, and that you may be grateful.
compare: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to burden you - so that you may complete the prescribed period and glorify Allah for having guided you, and that you may be grateful.

src: Ich habe Dir das gelobt, was ich in meinem Bauch trage - nur für den Gottesdienst (zu weihen), so nimm es von mir an!
ref: I have vowed to You what (the child that) is in my womb to be dedicated for Your services (free from all worldly work; to serve Your Place of worship), so accept this, from me.
draft: I have promised you what I carry in my belly - only for the church (to dedicate), so accept it from me!
hil: I have vowed to you what is in my belly - only to consecrate it for the worship - so accept it from me!
compare: I have vowed to you what is in my belly - only to consecrate it for the worship - so accept it from me!

src: Also welche von beiden Gruppen ist mehr berechtigt, sich sicher zu fühlen, solltet ihr es wissen?
ref: Tell me, whose way is the way of peace, if you have the knowledge?
draft: So which of the two groups is more justified in feeling safe, should you know it?
hil: So if you know, which of the two groups is more justified in feeling safe?
compare: So which of the two groups is more justified in feeling safe, should you know it?

src: Dann bezichtigten sie ihn der Lüge, dann richteten WIR sie zugrunde.
ref: Then they accused him of lies; so We annihilated them.
draft: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.
hil: Then they accused him of lying, and then WE destroyed them.
compare: Then they accused him of lying, and then WE destroyed them.

src: Und sie sagen: "O du, dem (angeblich) die Ermahnung offenbart worden ist, du bist ja fürwahr besessen.
ref: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.
draft: And they say, "Oh you, to whom the exhortation (allegedly) has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.
hil: And they say, 'Oh you, to whom the exhortation (allegedly) has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.'
compare: And they say, "Oh you, to whom the exhortation (allegedly) has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest. So wende dich mit dem Gesicht in Richtung von Almasdschidil-haram, und allerorts, wo ihr seid, wendet euch mit dem Gesicht in seine Richtung! Auch sicher, diejenigen, denen die Schrift zuteil wurde, wissen zweifellos, daß es doch die Wahrheit von ihrem HERRN ist. Und ALLAH ist gewiß nicht achtlos dem gegenüber, was ihr tut.
ref: We observe you turning your face, several times towards heaven (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him); so We will definitely make you turn (for prayer) towards a qiblah which pleases you; therefore now turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque (in Mecca); and O Muslims, wherever you may be, turn your faces (for prayer) towards it only; and those who have received the Book surely know that this is the truth from their Lord; and Allah is not unaware of their deeds. (Allah seeks to please the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)
draft: We already see the wandering of your face towards the sky. We will certainly let you take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid-al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face towards it! Also, surely those to whom the scripture was given know for certain that it is indeed the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not unaware of what you do.
hil: We already see the wandering of your face towards the sky. We will certainly let you take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid-al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face towards it! Also, surely those to whom the scripture was given know for certain that it is indeed the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not unaware of what you do.
compare: We already see the wandering of your face towards the sky. We will certainly let you take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid-al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face towards it! Also, surely those to whom the scripture was given know for certain that it is indeed the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not unaware of what you do.

src: Schreit heute nicht um Hilfe!
ref: Invoke not loudly this day!
draft: Do not cry for help today!
hil: Do not cry out for help today!
compare: Do not cry out for help today!

src: Es wurde befohlen: "O Noah, geh an Land, (und sei) mit Unserem Frieden begleitet!
ref: It was said, “O Nooh!
draft: "It was ordered: 'O Noah, go ashore, (and be) accompanied by Our Peace!'."
hil: It was commanded, 'O Noah, disembark in peace from Us!'
compare: "It was ordered: 'O Noah, go ashore, (and be) accompanied by Our Peace!'."

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz! Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: They said: "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place.
draft: They said, "Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place."
hil: They said, "Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place."
compare: They said, "Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place."

src: Wenn ihr das nicht tut, wird Verwirrung im Lande und gewaltiges Unheil entstehen.
ref: Unless you do the same there will be discord in the land and anarchy.
draft: If you don't do that, confusion in the country and tremendous calamity will arise.
hil: And if you do not do so, confusion in the land and great harm will ensue.
compare: If you don't do that, confusion in the country and tremendous calamity will arise.

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Er läßt sie zukommen, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: This is Allah’s munificence, which He may give to whomever He wills; and Allah is Extremely Munificent.
draft: That is the grace of God. He bestows it upon whom He wills. And God possesses great grace.
hil: "This is the grace of God. He sends it to whomever He wills. And God possesses great grace."
compare: "This is the grace of God. He sends it to whomever He wills. And God possesses great grace."

src: Ein Wohlgefallen von Gott ist aber größer.
ref: But the greatest bliss is the Good Pleasure of Allah.
draft: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.
hil: But a pleasure from God is greater.
compare: But a pleasure from God is greater.

src: Begebt euch in einen Schatten mit drei Verzweigungen,
ref: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
draft: "Go into a shadow with three branches"
hil: "Go into a shadow with three branches"
compare: "Go into a shadow with three branches"

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du zu uns gekommen, um uns von unseren Göttern abwendig zu machen? So bring uns doch her, was du uns androhst, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: They said: art thou come Unto us that thou mayest turn us aside from our gods? then bring thou upon us that wherewith thou threatenest us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
draft: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? So bring us what you have promised, if you are one of the truthful."
hil: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? So bring us what you have promised, if you are one of the truthful."
compare: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? So bring us what you have promised, if you are one of the truthful."

src: Das ist der Lohn der Ungläubigen.
ref: This is the recompense of those who do not believe.
draft: "This is the reward of the unbelievers."
hil: "This is the reward of the disbelievers."
compare: "This is the reward of the disbelievers."

src: So zieh mit deinen Angehörigen in einem Teil der Nacht fort, und folge du hinterdrein. Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Depart with your family in a part of the night and walk behind them and let none of you turn round.
draft: So depart with your relatives during a part of the night, and follow after them. And none of you shall turn back.
hil: "Thus, depart with your relatives during a part of the night, and follow after them, and none of you should turn back."
compare: So depart with your relatives during a part of the night, and follow after them. And none of you shall turn back.

src: Und sie kamen vor ALLAH allesamt. Die Schwachen sagten dann zu denjenigen, die sich in Arroganz erhoben haben: "Wir waren doch Gefolgsleute von euch! Könnt ihr von uns (nicht) etwas von ALLAHs Peinigung abwehren?" Sie sagten: "Hätte ALLAH uns rechtleiten lassen, hätten wir euch gewiß rechtgeleitet. Es ist uns gleich, ob wir uns in Ungeduld oder in Geduld üben. Für uns gibt es kein Entrinnen mehr."
ref: They will all publicly come in the presence of Allah – then those who were weak will say to those who were the leaders, “We were your followers – is it possible for you to avert some of Allah’s punishment from us?” They will answer, “If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you; it is the same for us, whether we panic or patiently endure – we have no place of refuge.” (* This conversation will take place between the disbelievers and their leaders.)
draft: And they all came before Allah. The weak then said to those who had exalted themselves in arrogance: "We were your followers! Can you not protect us from Allah's punishment?" They said: "Had Allah guided us, we would have certainly guided you. It is the same for us whether we endure patiently or impatiently. There is no refuge for us."
hil: And they all came before Allah. The weak said to those who had exalted themselves in arrogance: 'We were your followers! Can you not protect us from Allah's punishment?' They said: 'Had Allah guided us, we would have certainly guided you. Whether we endure patiently or impatiently, it is the same for us. There is no escape for us.'
compare: And they all came before Allah. The weak said to those who had exalted themselves in arrogance: 'We were your followers! Can you not protect us from Allah's punishment?' They said: 'Had Allah guided us, we would have certainly guided you. Whether we endure patiently or impatiently, it is the same for us. There is no escape for us.'

src: (Und ich bin zu euch gesandt worden, auf) daß ihr Vergebung von eurem Herrn erflehet und euch dann reumütig zu Ihm bekehret. Er wird euch dann bis zum Ende einer festgesetzten Frist reich versorgen.
ref: and: 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord, then repent to Him, and He will give you fair enjoyment unto a term stated, and He will give of His bounty to every man of grace.
draft: (And I have been sent to you, so) that you seek forgiveness from your Lord and then turn to Him in repentance. He will then provide for you abundantly until the end of an appointed term.
hil: And I have been sent to you, so that you seek forgiveness from your Lord and then turn to Him in repentance. He will then provide for you abundantly until the end of an appointed term.
compare: (And I have been sent to you, so) that you seek forgiveness from your Lord and then turn to Him in repentance. He will then provide for you abundantly until the end of an appointed term.

src: Kein Volk kann seine Frist überschreiten; noch können sie dahinter zurückbleiben.
ref: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.
draft: No nation can exceed its deadline; nor can they lag behind it.
hil: No nation can exceed its deadline; nor can they lag behind it.
compare: No nation can exceed its deadline; nor can they lag behind it.

src: Sie belauschen nicht die hohen Angesehenen. Und sie werden von jeder Seite beworfen,
ref: So that they are not able to listen to the angels of higher (echelons), and are pelted from all sides
draft: "They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are being attacked from all sides."
hil: They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are being attacked from all sides.
compare: "They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are being attacked from all sides."

src: Also Niedergang sei denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, an ihrem Tag, der ihnen angedroht wird.
ref: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.
draft: Also decline be to those who have engaged in disbelief on their day, which is threatened to them.
hil: May decline be for those who have committed disbelief on their day which is threatened to them.
compare: May decline be for those who have committed disbelief on their day which is threatened to them.

src: Allah ist Gnädig zu den Menschen.
ref: God is Kind towards the servants.
draft: Allah is merciful to people.
hil: God is merciful to human beings.
compare: Allah is merciful to people.

src: Aber die Heuchler wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But the hypocrites do not know.
draft: But the hypocrites don't know.
hil: But the hypocrites do not know.
compare: But the hypocrites don't know.

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr ist euer Herr der Herr der Himmel und der Erde, Der sie erschaffen hat. Und ich gehöre zu denjenigen, die euch darüber Zeugnis ablegen.
ref: He said: "In fact it was your Lord, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them; and I bear witness to this.
draft: He said, "No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them. And I am one of those who testify to that for you."
hil: He said, 'No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them. And I am one of those who testify to that for you.'
compare: He said, "No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them. And I am one of those who testify to that for you."

src: Sie sagte: "Ach, wehe mir!
ref: She said: "Woe betide me!
draft: She said, "Oh, woe is me!"
hil: "She said, 'Oh, woe is me!'".
compare: She said, "Oh, woe is me!"

src: So darfst du nicht meinen, daß Gott sein Versprechen an die Gesandten bricht.
ref: Think not that God would go back on His promise (made) to the apostles.
draft: You must not think that God breaks his promise to the messengers.
hil: You must not think that God breaks his promise to the messengers.
compare: You must not think that God breaks his promise to the messengers.

src: Ah sieh!
ref: Alas indeed!
draft: Ah, see!
hil: Ah, see!
compare: Ah, see!

src: Ich schwöre bei den sich Verbergenden,
ref: I swear by the slinkers,
draft: I swear by those in hiding,
hil: I swear by those who hide themselves.
compare: I swear by those who hide themselves.

src: Und ich wurde angewiesen, von den Muslimen zu sein,
ref: And I have been commanded to be of those that surrender,
draft: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.
hil: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.
compare: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.

src: ALLAH hat sie euch vergeben. Und ALLAH ist allvergebend, allnachsichtig.
ref: God has overlooked (your failings) in this (respect), for God is forgiving and forbearing.
draft: ALLAH has forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
hil: Allah has forgiven you. And Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
compare: Allah has forgiven you. And Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: Nein, sondern ALLAH gehört die Bestimmung insgesamt. Wollen diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten, etwa nicht zur Kenntnis nehmen, daß wenn ALLAH wollte, ER alle Menschen rechtleitete?!
ref: So, do not the people of faith (still look forward to such a sign in response to the demand of the unbelievers and) despair as a result of knowing that had Allah so willed, He could have guided all to the Truth.
draft: No, but Allah has overall control. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if Allah wanted, He could guide all people?
hil: No, but the overall determination belongs to Allah. Do those who have internalized iman fail to realize that if Allah wanted He could guide all people?
compare: No, but Allah has overall control. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if Allah wanted, He could guide all people?

src: Auch gewähre ICH ihnen noch mehr Zeit. Doch Meine Bestrafung ist hart.
ref: And I will give them respite; indeed My secret plan is extremely solid.
draft: Also, I grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.
hil: Also, I grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.
compare: Also, I grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.

src: Und der geraden und der ungeraden (Zahl),
ref: The multiple and the one,
draft: "And the even and the odd (number),"
hil: And the even and the odd (number),
compare: "And the even and the odd (number),"

src: Da vergaben Wir ihm dies.
ref: So We forgave him.
draft: We forgave him for this.
hil: We forgave him for this.
compare: We forgave him for this.

src: Da kehrte Er Sich ihnen mit Erbarmen zu, auf daß sie sich bekehren möchten. Wahrlich, Allah ist der Gnädige, der Barmherzige.
ref: So He softened towards them that they may repent; for God surely accepts repentance and is merciful.
draft: He turned to them with mercy so that they might repent. Verily, Allah is the Merciful, the Compassionate.
hil: He turned to them with mercy so that they might repent. Verily, Allah is the Merciful, the Compassionate.
compare: He turned to them with mercy so that they might repent. Verily, Allah is the Merciful, the Compassionate.

src: O die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr auf eine festgesetzte Frist, einer vom anderen, eine Geldschuld aufnehmt, dann schreibt es auf. Und ein Schreiber soll (es) für euch gerecht aufschreiben.
ref: O believers, when you negotiate a debt for a fixed term, draw up an agreement in writing, though better it would be to have a scribe write it faithfully down; and no scribe should refuse to write as God has taught him, and write what the borrower dictates, and have fear of God, his Lord, and not leave out a thing.
draft: O you who believe, when you take a debt for a specified term, write it down between you. And let a scribe write (it) between you in justice.
hil: O you who have believed, when you take a debt for a specified term, write it down. And let a scribe write [it] between you in justice. Let no scribe refuse to write as Allah has taught him. So let him write, and let the one who has the obligation dictate. And let him fear Allah, his Lord, and not leave anything out of it. But if the one who has the obligation is of limited understanding or weak or unable to dictate himself, then let his guardian dictate in justice. And bring to witness two witnesses from among your men. And if there are not two men [available], then a man and two women from those whom you accept as witnesses - so that if one of the women errs, then the other can remind her. And let not the witnesses refuse when they are called upon. And do not be [too] weary to write it, whether it is small or large, for its [specified] term. That is more just in the sight of Allah and stronger as evidence and more likely to prevent doubt between you, except when it is an immediate transaction which you conduct among yourselves. For [then] there is no blame upon you if you do not write it. And take witnesses when you conclude a contract. Let no scribe be harmed or any witness. For if you do so, indeed, it is [grave] disobedience in you. And fear Allah. And Allah teaches you. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
compare: O you who believe, when you take a debt for a specified term, write it down between you. And let a scribe write (it) between you in justice.

src: Gärten und Beerengehege
ref: Orchards and vineyards,
draft: Gardens and berry enclosures.
hil: Gardens and berry enclosures.
compare: Gardens and berry enclosures.

src: Habt ihr etwa keinen Einblick?!
ref: Can you still not comprehend?
draft: Do you have no insight?!
hil: Do you have no insight?!
compare: Do you have no insight?!

src: Und dein Herr wird dir wahrlich geben, und dann wirst du zufrieden sein.
ref: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.
draft: And your Lord will surely give to you, and then you will be satisfied.
hil: And your Lord will surely give to you, and then you will be satisfied.
compare: And your Lord will surely give to you, and then you will be satisfied.

src: Aber nein! Vielmehr sagen sie: "(Das ist) ein Bündel von wirren Träumen. Nein! Vielmehr hat er ihn ersonnen. Nein! Vielmehr ist er ein Dichter. So soll er uns ein Zeichen bringen, so wie die Früheren gesandt wurden."
ref: Yet they say: "These are only confused dreams," or rather: "He has invented them;" or: "He is only a poet. Let him therefore bring a miracle to us as the earlier (apostles) were sent with."
draft: But no! Rather they say: "(That is) a bundle of confusing dreams. No! Rather he has conceived it. No! Rather he is a poet. Thus he should bring us a sign, just as the Ancients were sent (signs)."
hil: But no, rather they say, 'It's a bundle of confused dreams!' No, rather he came up with it! No, rather he is a poet! Therefore, he should bring us a sign, just like the earlier ones were sent.'
compare: But no, rather they say, 'It's a bundle of confused dreams!' No, rather he came up with it! No, rather he is a poet! Therefore, he should bring us a sign, just like the earlier ones were sent.'

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung.
ref: Give women their dowries graciously.
draft: And give the women their bridal gift as a present.
hil: And give the women their bridal gift as a present.
compare: And give the women their bridal gift as a present.

src: Und bestimmt wirst du sie unter allen Menschen am gierigsten nach Leben finden, und mehr noch als diejenigen, die Götzen anbeten.
ref: You will see they are covetous of life more than other men, even more than those who practise idolatry.
draft: And for sure you will find her among all humans to be the most greedy for life, and even more so than those who worship idols.
hil: And surely you will find her among all humans to be the most greedy for life, even more so than those who worship idols.
compare: And for sure you will find her among all humans to be the most greedy for life, and even more so than those who worship idols.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allgütig, allkundig.
ref: 'O my son, if it should be but the weight of one grain of mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, God shall bring it forth; surely God is All-subtle, All-aware.
draft: "My little son! Even if it were only the weight of a mustard seed, which should be in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH brings them. Certainly, Allah is all-good, all-knowing."
hil: "My little son! Even if it were only the weight of a mustard seed, which should be in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH brings them. Certainly, Allah is all-good, all-knowing."
compare: "My little son! Even if it were only the weight of a mustard seed, which should be in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH brings them. Certainly, Allah is all-good, all-knowing."

src: Ich will auch nicht (einfach) euch widersprechen im Hinblick auf das, was ich euch verbiete.
ref: I have no desire to do what I forbid you from doing.
draft: I don't even want to (simply) contradict you with regard to what I forbid you.
hil: I don't even want to (simply) contradict you with regard to what I forbid you.
compare: I don't even want to (simply) contradict you with regard to what I forbid you.

src: Und die Berge wie Wolleflocken sein werden,
ref: The mountains like the tufts of (carded) wool,
draft: And the mountains will be like woolen flakes.
hil: And the mountains shall be like woolen flakes.
compare: And the mountains will be like woolen flakes.

src: Und ihre Zungen behaupten lügnerisch, daß für sie das Beste bestimmt ist.
ref: Their tongues utter falsehoods (when they say) the finest of wages shall be theirs.
draft: And their tongues falsely claim that what is best has been ordained for them.
hil: And their tongues falsely claim that what is best has been ordained for them.
compare: And their tongues falsely claim that what is best has been ordained for them.

src: Diejenigen aber, die sich um Unsertwillen abmühen, werden Wir ganz gewiß Unsere Wege leiten. Und Allah ist wahrlich mit den Gutes Tuenden.
ref: And those who strove in Our way – We shall surely show them Our paths; and indeed Allah is with the virtuous.
draft: But those who strive in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And Allah is indeed with the doers of good.
hil: Those, however, who strive for Our sake, We shall surely guide them to our paths. And Allah is truly with those who do good.
compare: Those, however, who strive for Our sake, We shall surely guide them to our paths. And Allah is truly with those who do good.

src: So diene Ihm und verlasse dich auf Ihn.
ref: So worship Him (O Muhammad SAW) and put your trust in Him.
draft: Serve Him and rely on Him.
hil: Serve Him and rely on Him.
compare: Serve Him and rely on Him.

src: Und solltet ihr darin niemanden finden, dann betretet sie nicht, bis euch Erlaubnis gewährt wird.
ref: If you find that no one is in, then do not enter unless you have received permission.
draft: And if you don't find anyone in there, don't enter until you are granted permission.
hil: And if you don't find anyone in there, do not enter until permission is granted to you.
compare: And if you don't find anyone in there, don't enter until you are granted permission.

src: Dann machte ich doch ihnen Da'wa öffentlich,
ref: Then I called them loudly and more openly,
draft: Then I did make Da'wa to them publicly.
hil: Then I did make Da'wa to them publicly.
compare: Then I did make Da'wa to them publicly.

src: Doch wer ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten widerspricht und ALLAHs Richtlinien überschreitet, den wird ER ins Feuer eintreten lassen, darin wird er ewig bleiben. Und für ihn ist eine erniedrigende Peinigung bestimmt.
