draft: And the unbelievers say about the believers: "If (the Quran) were something good, they would not have attained it before us." And since they are not guided by it, they say: "This is an old lie."
hil: The unbelievers say of the believers: 'If (the Quran) were something good, they would not have achieved it before us.' And since they are not guided by it, they say, 'This is an old lie'.
compare: The unbelievers say of the believers: 'If (the Quran) were something good, they would not have achieved it before us.' And since they are not guided by it, they say, 'This is an old lie'.

src: Er hat die Schlüssel der Himmel und der Erde. Diejenigen, die die Zeichen Gottes verleugnen, das sind die Verlierer.
ref: He has the keys of the heavens and the earth; and those who deny the revelations of God will be losers.
draft: He has the keys to heaven and earth. Those who deny the signs of God, they are the losers.
hil: He has the keys to the heavens and the earth. Those who deny the signs of God, they are the losers.
compare: He has the keys to heaven and earth. Those who deny the signs of God, they are the losers.

src: Ihre Gesandten sagten: "Existiert etwa ein Zweifel über Allah, den Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde?
ref: Said their apostles: "Can there be doubt about God, the originator of the heavens and the earth?
draft: Their envoys said, "Is there any doubt about Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth?"
hil: Their messengers said, "Is there any doubt about Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth?"
compare: Their envoys said, "Is there any doubt about Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth?"

src: Jene sind (überhaupt) die Unachtsamen.
ref: They are the heedless ones.
draft: Those are (in general) the careless ones.
hil: Those are the careless ones (in general).
compare: Those are (in general) the careless ones.

src: Einen Teil tötetet ihr, und einen Teil nahmt ihr gefangen.
ref: Some of them you killed, and others you took captive.
draft: You killed a part, and captured a part.
hil: You killed a part, and captured a part.
compare: You killed a part, and captured a part.

src: Allah hat gesagt: Nehmt euch nicht zwei Götter. Er ist nur ein Einziger Gott. Vor Mir (allein) sollt ihr Ehrfurcht haben.
ref: And Allah has proclaimed, “Do not ascribe two Gods; indeed He is the only One God; therefore fear Me alone.”
draft: Allah has said: Do not take two gods. He is only a single God. You should have reverence for me (alone).
hil: Allah has said: Do not take two gods. He is only a single God. You should have reverence for me (alone).
compare: Allah has said: Do not take two gods. He is only a single God. You should have reverence for me (alone).

src: Ehefrauen des Propheten! Welche von euch eine bewiesene Abscheulichkeit vollbringt, für diese wird die Peinigung verzweifacht. Und dies ist für ALLAH immer ein Leichtes.
ref: Wives of the Prophet, whosoever among you commits a flagrant indecency, for her the chastisement shall be doubled; that is easy for God.
draft: "Wives of the Prophet! Whichever of you commits a proven act of lewdness, her punishment will be doubled, and that is easy for Allah."
hil: O wives of the Prophet! If any of you should commit a grossly indecent act, the penalty would be doubled for her, and that is so easy for Allah.
compare: "Wives of the Prophet! Whichever of you commits a proven act of lewdness, her punishment will be doubled, and that is easy for Allah."

src: Und hätte dein HERR es gewollt, hätte ER doch die Menschen zu einer einzigen Umma gemacht - sie aber bleiben uneins
ref: But if your Lord had pleased He could have made all human beings into one community of belief. But they would still have differed from one another,
draft: And had your LORD wished, HE would have made mankind into a single community, but they continue to be divided.
hil: And had your Lord willed, He could have made mankind one community, but they remain divided.
compare: And had your LORD wished, HE would have made mankind into a single community, but they continue to be divided.

src: Und seid nicht wie diejenigen, die sich gespalten haben und uneins geworden sind, nachdem die deutlichen Zeichen zu ihnen gekommen waren.
ref: So be not like those who became disunited and differed among themselves after clear proofs had come to them.
draft: And do not be like those who have split and become divided after the clear signs came to them.
hil: Do not be like those who have caused divisions and became disunited after the clear signs came to them.
compare: And do not be like those who have split and become divided after the clear signs came to them.

src: Sie sagten: "Fürchte dich nicht!" Und sie überbrachten ihm frohe Botschaft über einen äußerst wissenden Jungen.
ref: They said, “Do not fear,” and they announced to him the good news of a knowledgeable boy.
draft: They said, "Don't be afraid!" And they brought him joyful news about an extremely knowledgeable boy.
hil: They said, “Do not fear – we convey to you the glad tidings of a knowledgeable boy.”
compare: They said, "Don't be afraid!" And they brought him joyful news about an extremely knowledgeable boy.

src: Dies (ist deshalb so), weil jene, die ungläubig sind, dem Trügerischen folgen, und weil diejenigen, die gläubig sind, der Wahrheit ihres Herrn folgen. So beschreibt Allah den Menschen ihre Lage.
ref: This is because the disbelievers followed falsehood and the believers followed the Truth which is from their Lord; this is how Allah illustrates the examples of people to them.
draft: This is why those who are unbelievers follow the deceptive [one], and those who believe follow the truth of their Lord. Thus Allah presents to the people their comparisons.
hil: This is why those who are unbelievers follow the deceptive [one], and those who believe follow the truth of their Lord. Thus Allah presents to the people their comparisons.
compare: This is why those who are unbelievers follow the deceptive [one], and those who believe follow the truth of their Lord. Thus Allah presents to the people their comparisons.

src: Als die Nacht über ihn hereinbrach, sah er einen Himmelskörper. Er sagte: "Das ist mein Herr."
ref: When the night came with her covering of darkness he saw a star, and (Azar, his father) said: "This is my Lord."
draft: As the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body. He said, "That is my Lord."
hil: As the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body. He said, "That is my Lord."
compare: As the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body. He said, "That is my Lord."

src: Aber Allah ist voll Huld gegen die Weltenbewohner.
ref: But gracious is God to the people of the world.
draft: But Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the world.
hil: But Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the world.
compare: But Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the world.

src: Und Wir haben den untersten Himmel mit Leuchten geschmückt und haben sie zu Wurfsteinen gegen die Satane gemacht.
ref: We have adorned the lower heaven with lamps, and have made them a means to drive away the satans.
draft: And we have adorned the lowest heaven with lights and made them spheres to repel the devils.
hil: He adorned the lowest heaven with lights and made them as missiles to repel the devils.
compare: He adorned the lowest heaven with lights and made them as missiles to repel the devils.

src: Ihr könnt auf der Erde nichts vereiteln. Und ihr habt außer Gott weder Freund noch Helfer.
ref: You cannot thwart Him on the earth, and have no friend or helper apart from Him.
draft: You can't thwart anything on Earth. And you have neither friend nor helper except God.
hil: O people! You cannot thwart anything on Earth. And you have neither friend nor helper except God.
compare: O people! You cannot thwart anything on Earth. And you have neither friend nor helper except God.

src: "Aber jetzt erst! Wo du dich doch zuvor widersetztest und zu den Unheilstiftern gehörtest?
ref: "Yes, now" (was the answer), "though before this you were disobedient and rebellious.
draft: "But now only! When you previously resisted and belonged to the troublemakers?"
hil: Now only! Where you previously resisted and belonged to the troublemakers?
compare: Now only! Where you previously resisted and belonged to the troublemakers?

src: Und euch wird nur für das vergolten, was ihr zu tun pflegtet,
ref: And be rewarded but only for what you had done,
draft: "And you will only be rewarded for what you used to do."
hil: Indeed, you will only be rewarded for what you used to do.
compare: Indeed, you will only be rewarded for what you used to do.

src: Du bist aber nur ein Warner.
ref: (Muhammad), you are only a warner.
draft: You are just a warner.
hil: But you are only a warner.
compare: You are just a warner.

src: Sag: Wollt ihr mit uns über Allah streiten, wo Er doch unser und euer Herr ist?
ref: Say: "Why do you dispute with us about God when He is equally your Lord and our Lord?
draft: Say: Will you argue with us about Allah while He is our and your Lord?
hil: Say: Do you want to argue with us about Allah, when He is our Lord and your Lord?
compare: Say: Will you argue with us about Allah while He is our and your Lord?

src: Und derjenige (Mann) aus Ägypten, der ihn gekauft hatte, sagte zu seiner Frau: "Nimm ihn freundlich auf.
ref: The Egyptian who bought him instructed his wife: "House him honourably.
draft: And the one (man) from Egypt, who had bought him, said to his wife: "Receive him kindly".
hil: And he, the man from Egypt who bought him, said to his wife, 'Receive him kindly.'
compare: And the one (man) from Egypt, who had bought him, said to his wife: "Receive him kindly".

src: So richte dein Antlitz in aufrichtiger Weise auf den Glauben; (dies entspricht) der natürlichen Veranlagung, mit der Allah die Menschen geschaffen hat.
ref: So keep yourself exclusively on the true way, the creational law of God according to which He created man with the quality of choosing right or wrong.
draft: So turn your face in a sincere way towards the faith; (this corresponds to) the natural disposition with which Allah has created mankind.
hil: "Turn your face in a sincere manner towards the faith, which corresponds to the natural disposition with which Allah has created mankind."
compare: "Turn your face in a sincere manner towards the faith, which corresponds to the natural disposition with which Allah has created mankind."

src: Hast du nicht jene gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde?
ref: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture?
draft: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given?
hil: Have you not seen those to whom some of the Scripture was given?
compare: Have you not seen those to whom some of the Scripture was given?

src: Und jedesmal wenn du den Quran rezitiert hast, errichteten WIR zwischen dir und denjenigen, die keinen Iman an das Jenseits verinnerlichen, einen unsichtbaren Vorhang.
ref: When you recite the Qur'an, We place a hidden veil between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter;
draft: And every time you recited the Quran, we set up an invisible curtain between you and those who do not internalize faith in the hereafter.
hil: And every time you recited the Quran, we set up an invisible curtain between you and those who do not internalize faith in the hereafter.
compare: And every time you recited the Quran, we set up an invisible curtain between you and those who do not internalize faith in the hereafter.

src: Und bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde und lobpreise deinen Herrn am Abend und am frühen Morgen.
ref: And ask forgiveness for thy sin, and proclaim the praise of thy Lord at evening and dawn.
draft: And ask forgiveness for your sin and praise your Lord in the evening and in the early morning.
hil: Please ask for forgiveness for your sin and praise your Lord in the evening and early morning.
compare: And ask forgiveness for your sin and praise your Lord in the evening and in the early morning.

src: Für diejenigen von euch, die sich von ihren Frauen durch den Rückenspruch scheiden...
ref: Those among you who make their wives unlawful (Az-Zihar) to them by saying to them "You are like my mother's back."
draft: For those of you who divorce your wives by saying "I divorce you" behind your back...
hil: "For those of you who divorce your wives by saying 'I divorce you' behind your back..."
compare: For those of you who divorce your wives by saying "I divorce you" behind your back...

src: Es wird dir nichts gesagt außer dem, was den Gesandten vor dir gesagt wurde.
ref: Nothing is said to you which had not been said to other apostles before you.
draft: You will not be told anything except what was said to the messengers before you.
hil: You will not be told anything except what was said to the messengers before you.
compare: You will not be told anything except what was said to the messengers before you.

src: Dann trifft ihn das Alter, während er (noch) schwache Nachkommen hat. Nun trifft ihn ein Wirbelsturm mit Feuer, er verbrennt.
ref: But he is afflicted with old age and has weak offspring, and it is hit by a whirlwind containing fire and is burned.
draft: Then comes old age to him, while he still has weak offspring. Now a whirlwind with fire hits him, he burns.
hil: Then he encounters old age while he still has weak descendants. Now he is hit by a whirlwind with fire, he burns.
compare: Then he encounters old age while he still has weak descendants. Now he is hit by a whirlwind with fire, he burns.

src: Und sie wurden zum Guten des Gesagten rechtgeleitet.
ref: They were guided to purity of speech.
draft: And they were guided to the good of what was said.
hil: And they were guided to the good of what was said.
compare: And they were guided to the good of what was said.

src: Es ist nur eine Ermahnung für die ganze Schöpfung.
ref: It is only a warning for all mankind.
draft: It is only a admonition for the whole creation.
hil: It is only a admonition for the entire creation.
compare: It is only a admonition for the whole creation.

src: Und urteile zwischen ihnen nach dem, was Gott herabgesandt hat, und folge nicht ihren Neigungen.
ref: And judge between them according to what God revealed, and do not follow their desires.
draft: And make a judgment between them according to what God has sent down, and do not follow their inclinations.
hil: And judge between them according to what God has sent down, and do not follow their inclinations.
compare: And make a judgment between them according to what God has sent down, and do not follow their inclinations.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Freudenerregten.
ref: God does not like those who exult.
draft: Surely, Allah does not love those who are exhilarated with joy.
hil: Indeed, Allah does not love those who are exhilarated with joy.
compare: Surely, Allah does not love those who are exhilarated with joy.

src: Und auch die in Erfahrung bringe, die heucheln.
ref: And that he might know those who played the hypocrite.
draft: And also discover those who pretend.
hil: Allah also tests those who pretend.
compare: And also discover those who pretend.

src: Und das Wasser begann zu sinken, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: Withhold (your rain)." And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).
draft: And the water began to sink, and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
hil: And the water began to sink and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
compare: And the water began to sink, and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Er ist es, Der in Seiner Barmherzigkeit die Winde als frohe Botschaft schickt, bis daß Wir sie, wenn sie eine schwere Wolke tragen, zu einem toten Ort treiben; dann lassen Wir Wasser aus ihr herab, mit dem Wir Früchte von jeglicher Art hervorbringen. So bringen Wir auch die Toten hervor, auf daß ihr dessen eingedenk sein möget.
ref: And it is He Who sends the winds giving glad tidings, ahead of His mercy; until when they come bearing heavy clouds, We drove it towards a city devoid of vegetation, and then rained water upon it, then produced fruits of various kinds from it; this is how We will bring forth the dead, so that you may heed advice.
draft: He is the one who, in His mercy, sends the winds as good tidings until We drive them to a dead place if they carry a heavy cloud; then We let water come down from it, with which We bring forth fruits of every kind. Thus, We also bring forth the dead, so that you may be mindful of it.
hil: He is the one who sends the winds as glad tidings in His mercy until We drive them, when they carry a heavy cloud, to a dead place; then We bring forth water from it, with which We bring forth fruits of every kind. Thus, We also bring forth the dead, so that you may remember.
compare: He is the one who, in His mercy, sends the winds as good tidings until We drive them to a dead place if they carry a heavy cloud; then We let water come down from it, with which We bring forth fruits of every kind. Thus, We also bring forth the dead, so that you may be mindful of it.

src: Gewiß, sie sind ein Volk von Frevlern."
ref: They are certainly a rebellious people."
draft: "Surely, they are a people of wrongdoers."
hil: Indeed, they are a people of wrongdoers.
compare: "Surely, they are a people of wrongdoers."

src: Gewiß, WIR haben dir die Schrift mit der Wahrheit hinabgesandt, damit du zwischen den Menschen richtest mit dem, was ALLAH dir erklärt hat.
ref: Surely We have sent down to thee the Book with the truth, so that thou mayest judge between the people by that God has shown thee.
draft: Surely, WE have revealed to you the Book with the truth so that you may judge between people according to what Allah has taught you.
hil: Indeed, We have sent down the Scripture to you with the truth that you may judge between people in accordance with what Allah has taught you.
compare: Surely, WE have revealed to you the Book with the truth so that you may judge between people according to what Allah has taught you.

src: Dafür werdet ihr dann Uns gegenüber keinen Rächer für euch finden.
ref: Then you will not find any avenger against Us.
draft: For this, you will not find any avenger for yourself against us.
hil: You will not find any avenger for yourselves against us.
compare: You will not find any avenger for yourselves against us.

src: Und es gibt keinen unter euch, der nicht dahin wie zur Tränke gehen würde?
ref: There is not one among you who will not reach it.
draft: And is there anyone among you who would not go there as if to a watering place?
hil: Is there anyone among you who would not go there as if to a watering place?
compare: And is there anyone among you who would not go there as if to a watering place?

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, and superb dwellings in everlasting Gardens of Eden; this is the greatest success.
draft: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing under them, and in pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the great success.
hil: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing under them, and in pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the great success.
compare: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing under them, and in pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the great success.

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann zu den Bewohnern einer Stadt kamen, sie ihre Bewohner um etwas zu essen baten; diese aber weigerten sich, sie gastlich aufzunehmen. Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf. Er (Musa) sagte: "Wenn du wolltest, hättest du dafür wahrlich Lohn nehmen können."
ref: So they both set out again; until they came to the people of a dwelling – they asked its people for food – they refused to invite them – then in the village they both found a wall about to collapse, and the chosen bondman straightened it; said Moosa, “If you wished, you could have taken some wages for it!”
draft: They both continued on until they reached the inhabitants of a city and asked the inhabitants for something to eat, but they refused to receive them as guests. Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, and so he (Musa) set it up. He said: "If you had wanted, you could have really taken a reward for it."
hil: "They both continued until they came to the inhabitants of a city and asked the inhabitants for something to eat, but they refused to receive them as guests. Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, and he (Moses) set it up. He said: 'If you had wanted, you could have really taken a reward for it.'"
compare: "They both continued until they came to the inhabitants of a city and asked the inhabitants for something to eat, but they refused to receive them as guests. Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, and he (Moses) set it up. He said: 'If you had wanted, you could have really taken a reward for it.'"

src: Dann werden diese ihnen die Rede erwidern: "Gewiß, ihr seid zweifelsohne Lügner."
ref: They will fling back at them the saying, 'Surely, you are truly liars.'
draft: Then they will retort to them: "Surely, you are undoubtedly liars".
hil: They will then reply to them and say, "Indeed, you are undoubtedly liars."
compare: They will then reply to them and say, "Indeed, you are undoubtedly liars."

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"? Die Ungläubigen sagen: "Das ist wahrlich ein deutlicher Zauberer.3"
ref: Are people amazed that We have sent to a man among them, the divine revelation that “Warn the people and convey glad tidings to the believers that for them with their Lord is the place* of truth”? The disbelievers say, “Indeed he is an open magician.” (* Positions of honour on the Day of Resurrection or in heaven.)
draft: Is it surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among them, “Warn mankind and give good news to those who believe that they are firmly established with their Lord”? The disbelievers say, “This is clearly magic.” (Quran 10:2)
hil: It is not surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among them saying, "Warn the people and give good news to those who believe that they have a true position with their Lord." The unbelievers say, "This is clearly a magician."
compare: Is it surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among them, “Warn mankind and give good news to those who believe that they are firmly established with their Lord”? The disbelievers say, “This is clearly magic.” (Quran 10:2)

src: Allah weiß besser über ihren Glauben Bescheid. Wenn ihr sie dann als gläubig erkennt, dann schickt sie nicht zu den Ungläubigen zurück.
ref: When believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them, Allah knows best as to their Faith, then if you ascertain that they are true believers, send them not back to the disbelievers, they are not lawful (wives) for the disbelievers nor are the disbelievers lawful (husbands) for them.
draft: "Allah knows better about their faith. If you recognize them as believers, then do not send them back to the unbelievers."
hil: Allah knows better about their faith. If you recognize them as believers, then do not send them back to the disbelievers.
compare: "Allah knows better about their faith. If you recognize them as believers, then do not send them back to the unbelievers."

src: ALLAH erlegt einer Seele nichts auf, außer was sie vermag. Ihr gebührt, was sie erworben, und ihr obliegt, was sie sich angeeignet hat.
ref: Allah does not burden anyone, except with something within its capacity; beneficial for it is the virtue it earned, and harmful for it is the evil it earned; “Our Lord!
draft: ALLAH imposes nothing on a soul except what it can bear. It deserves what it has earned, and it is responsible for what it has acquired.
hil: ALLAH imposes nothing on a soul except what it can bear. It deserves what it has earned, and it is responsible for what it has acquired.
compare: ALLAH imposes nothing on a soul except what it can bear. It deserves what it has earned, and it is responsible for what it has acquired.

src: ER sagte: "Du wirst Mich nicht sehen!
ref: "You cannot behold Me," He said.
draft: He said, "You won't see me!"
hil: He said, 'You won't see me!'
compare: He said, "You won't see me!"

src: Er sprach: "O Noah, er gehört nicht zu deiner Familie; siehe, dies ist kein rechtschaffenes Benehmen. So frage Mich nicht nach dem, von dem du keine Kenntnis hast.
ref: He said: "O Nuh (Noah)! Surely, he is not of your family; verily, his work is unrighteous, so ask not of Me that of which you have no knowledge!
draft: He said, "O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge.
hil: He said, 'O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge.'
compare: He said, "O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge.

src: Auch hat Er die Herdentiere erschaffen.
ref: And the cattle! He hath created them.
draft: Also, He created the herd animals.
hil: Allah created the herd animals.
compare: Also, He created the herd animals.

src: Er sagte zu seinen Angehörigen: "Bleibt hier.
ref: "Wait here," he said to his family; "I have seen a fire.
draft: He said to his relatives: "Stay here."
hil: He said to his relatives: "Stay here."
compare: He said to his relatives: "Stay here."

src: Und wir erklärten den Tag des Gerichtes für Lüge,
ref: And rejected the Day of Judgement as a lie
draft: And we declared the Day of Judgement to be a lie.
hil: And we denied the Day of Judgement as a falsehood.
compare: And we denied the Day of Judgement as a falsehood.

src: Und gewähre ihnen Einblick, denn sie werden den Einblick haben.
ref: And wait; they will come to know soon.
draft: And grant them insight, for they will have the insight.
hil: Grant them insight, for they will have insight.
compare: Grant them insight, for they will have insight.

src: Dem das Königreich der Himmel und der Erde gehört; und Allah ist Zeuge von allem.
ref: Whose kingdom spreads over the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.
draft: To whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is a witness to all things.
hil: To whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is a witness to all things.
compare: To whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is a witness to all things.

src: Sie möchten gern die Worte Gottes abändern. Sprich: «Ihr dürft uns nicht folgen.
ref: They want to change God's word, but tell them, "You shall not follow us.
draft: You would like to change the words of God. Say, "You must not follow us."
hil: They would like to change the words of God. Say, 'You must not follow us.'
compare: You would like to change the words of God. Say, "You must not follow us."

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr eure beigesellten Partner, an die ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bittgebete richtet? Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschufen!
ref: Proclaim, “Just show me your partners (false deities) whom you worship other than Allah; show me which part of the earth have they created – or do they have any share in the heavens?”
draft: Say: "How do you see your associated partners, to whom you direct supplication instead of Allah? Show me what they created from the earth!"
hil: Say: "How do you see your associated partners, to whom you direct supplication instead of Allah? Show me what they created from the earth!"
compare: Say: "How do you see your associated partners, to whom you direct supplication instead of Allah? Show me what they created from the earth!"

src: Dann erretten WIR Unsere Gesandten und diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben. Solcherart obliegt es Uns, die Mumin zu erretten.
ref: Then We shall save Our Noble Messengers and the believers – this is it; it is incumbent upon Our mercy to save the Muslims.
draft: Then we will rescue our messengers and those who have internalized the faith. In this way, it is our responsibility to rescue the believers.
hil: "Then We will save Our messengers and those who have internalized faith. Thus it is incumbent upon Us to save the believers."
compare: "Then We will save Our messengers and those who have internalized faith. Thus it is incumbent upon Us to save the believers."

src: Allah ist mit den Standhaften.
ref: Truly! Allah is with As-Sabirin (the patient ones, etc.).
draft: Allah is with the steadfast.
hil: Allah is with the steadfast.
compare: Allah is with the steadfast.

src: Die die Engel abberufen, während sie gute (Menschen) gewesen sind.
ref: Those whom the angels cause to die (when they are) good.
draft: The angels recall those who have been good.
hil: "The angels recall those who have been good."
compare: The angels recall those who have been good.

src: Und wer von euch krank ist oder an seinem Haupt ein Leiden hat, der soll Ersatz leisten durch Fasten, Mildtätigkeit oder Darbringen eines Schlachtopfers.
ref: But if you are sick or have ailment of the scalp (preventing the shaving of hair), then offer expiation by fasting or else giving alms or a sacrificial offering.
draft: "And whoever among you is sick or has a disease in his head should make amends by fasting, giving charity, or offering a sacrifice."
hil: And whoever among you is sick or has a disease in his head should make amends by fasting, giving charity, or offering a sacrifice.
compare: "And whoever among you is sick or has a disease in his head should make amends by fasting, giving charity, or offering a sacrifice."

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr es? Wenn ALLAH mich und diejenigen mit mir zugrunde richtet oder Gnade erweist, wer gewährt den Kafir einen Schutz vor einer qualvollen Peinigung?"
ref: Say: "Just think: If God destroys me and those with me, or is benevolent to us, who will then protect the unbelievers from a painful doom?"
draft: Say: "How do you see it? If ALLAH destroys me and those with me or shows mercy, who will grant the Kafir protection from a painful punishment?"
hil: Say: "How do you see it? If ALLAH destroys me and those with me or shows mercy, who will grant the Kafir protection from a painful punishment?"
compare: Say: "How do you see it? If ALLAH destroys me and those with me or shows mercy, who will grant the Kafir protection from a painful punishment?"

src: Es ist die Gemeinschaft eures Vaters Ibrahim. ER nannte euch Muslime vorher und in diesem (Quran), damit der Gesandte Zeuge über euch wird und ihr Zeugen über die Menschen werdet.
ref: He hath named you Muslims of old time and in this (Scripture), that the messenger may be a witness against you, and that ye may be witnesses against mankind. So establish worship, pay the poor-due, and hold fast to Allah.
draft: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He named you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the messenger would bear witness about you and you would bear witness about the people.
hil: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He called you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the Messenger would bear witness about you and you would bear witness about the people.
compare: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He named you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the messenger would bear witness about you and you would bear witness about the people.

src: Den Herrn von Mose und Aaron.»
ref: "The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
draft: "To the Lord of Moses and Aaron."
hil: To the Lord of Moses and Aaron.
compare: "To the Lord of Moses and Aaron."

src: Und sie sagten: "Was ist los mit diesem Gesandten, er ißt die Speisen und geht zu den Märkten, würde zu ihm doch ein Engel herabgesandt, damit er mit ihm einWarner wird!
ref: But they say: "What sort of prophet is this who eats food and walks the market places? Why was no angel sent to him to act as admonisher with him?
draft: And they said, "What's wrong with this messenger, he eats the food and goes to the markets, if only an angel would be sent down to him to be a warner with him!"
hil: And they said, "What's wrong with this messenger, he eats the food and goes to the markets, if only an angel would be sent down to him to be a warner with him!"
compare: And they said, "What's wrong with this messenger, he eats the food and goes to the markets, if only an angel would be sent down to him to be a warner with him!"

src: Er ist es, Der euch bei Nacht abberuft und weiß, was ihr bei Tag begangen habt, und euch hierauf an ihm auferweckt, damit eine festgesetzte Frist erfüllt wird.
ref: It is He indeed who sends you to death at night, and knows what you do in the day, then makes you rise with it again in order that the fixed term of life be fulfilled.
draft: He is the one who calls you at night and knows what you have done during the day, and then resurrects you so that a fixed term is fulfilled.
hil: He is the one who calls you at night and knows what you have done during the day, and then resurrects you so that a fixed term is fulfilled.
compare: He is the one who calls you at night and knows what you have done during the day, and then resurrects you so that a fixed term is fulfilled.

src: Und hütet ja eure Eide. So macht euch Allah Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: So God makes clear to you His signs; haply you will be thankful.
draft: And keep your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His signs that you may be grateful.
hil: Take care of your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His signs that you may be grateful.
compare: And keep your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His signs that you may be grateful.

src: Sie sagten: "Verbrennt ihn und helft euren Göttern, wenn ihr etwas tun wollt."
ref: They said: "Burn him, and save your gods, if you are men of action."
draft: They said: "Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something."
hil: They said, 'Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something.'
compare: They said, 'Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something.'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH bleibt immer allwissend, allkundig.
ref: Indeed Allah is Ever All-Knower, Well-Acquainted with all things.
draft: Certainly, ALLAH always remains omniscient, all-knowing.
hil: Certainly, ALLAH always remains omniscient, all-knowing.
compare: Certainly, ALLAH always remains omniscient, all-knowing.

src: Ihr werdet (noch) erfahren, über wen eine Strafe kommen wird, die ihn in Schande stürzt, und wer ein Lügner ist.
ref: You will come to know who it is on whom descends the torment that will cover him with ignominy, and who is a liar!
draft: You will (still) find out who will be punished with shame and who is a liar.
hil: You will find out (yet) about whom a penalty will come that will humiliate him, and who is a liar.
compare: You will find out (yet) about whom a penalty will come that will humiliate him, and who is a liar.

src: Aber diejenigen, die böse Taten begehen und danach bereuen und glauben-, gewiß, dein Herr ist danach wahrlich Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: Yet those who do wrong, then repent and believe, are forgiven, for your Lord is forgiving and kind.
draft: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe - indeed, your Lord is thereafter Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe - indeed, your Lord is thereafter truly Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe - indeed, your Lord is thereafter truly Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Sie sind doch nicht ihre Mütter. Ihre Mütter sind die, die sie geboren haben.
ref: Their mothers are none else but those who gave birth to them.
draft: You are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.
hil: You are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.
compare: You are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.

src: Als ob sie wohlverwahrte Eier wären.
ref: Like sheltered eggs in a nest.
draft: As if they were well-preserved eggs.
hil: "Allows they were well-preserved eggs."
compare: As if they were well-preserved eggs.

src: Reisende kamen vorbei. Sie sandten ihren Wasserschöpfer, und er ließ seinen Eimer hinunter.
ref: A caravan happened to pass, and sent the water-carrier to bring water from the well.
draft: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water dipper and he lowered his bucket.
hil: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water dipper, and he lowered his bucket.
compare: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water dipper and he lowered his bucket.

src: Er ist zweifelsohne dieWahrheit von unserem HERRN! Wir waren doch vor ihm Muslime."
ref: Indeed even before it we have been from those who submit themselves to Allah in Islam as Muslims (like 'Abdullah bin Salam and Salman Al-Farisi, etc.).
draft: "He is without a doubt the truth of our LORD! We were Muslims before him."
hil: He is undoubtedly the truth from our Lord! We were Muslims before him.
compare: He is undoubtedly the truth from our Lord! We were Muslims before him.

src: 'Ain-sin-qaf.
ref: 'Am Sin Qaf.
draft: Ain-sin-qaf.
hil: Ain-sin-qaf.
compare: Ain-sin-qaf.

src: Und Wir wollen euch sicherlich prüfen, bis Wir diejenigen von euch ausscheiden, die kämpfen und standhaft sind.
ref: We shall certainly test you until We know those who strive hard for the cause of God and those who exercise patience.
draft: And We will certainly test you until We select those among you who strive and endure patiently.
hil: We will certainly test you until We select those among you who strive and endure patiently.
compare: And We will certainly test you until We select those among you who strive and endure patiently.

src: ALLAH gewährt viel Rizq, wem ER will, und läßt es wenig sein.
ref: God outspreads and straitens His provision unto whomsoever He will.
draft: ALLAH grants abundant sustenance to whomsoever HE wills, and straitens it (for whomsoever HE wills).
hil: Allah grants abundant sustenance to whomsoever He wills, and straitens it (for whomsoever He wills).
compare: ALLAH grants abundant sustenance to whomsoever HE wills, and straitens it (for whomsoever HE wills).

src: Du brichst das Versprechen nicht.»
ref: Verily Thou failest not the tryst.
draft: "You're not breaking the promise."
hil: You don't break the promise.
compare: "You're not breaking the promise."

src: Und diejenigen, die weder neben ALLAH an einen anderen Gott Bittgebete richten, noch den Menschen töten, den ALLAH für haram erklärte, außer mit Berechtigung, noch Zina begehen.
ref: And those who call not unto anot her god along with Allah and slay not any soul which Allah hath forbidden, save in justification, and commit not fornication.
draft: And those who do not direct supplication to any other god besides Allah, nor take a life which Allah has forbidden, unless for a just cause, nor commit adultery.
hil: Those who do not direct supplication to any other god besides Allah, nor take a life which Allah has forbidden, unless for a just cause, nor commit adultery.
compare: And those who do not direct supplication to any other god besides Allah, nor take a life which Allah has forbidden, unless for a just cause, nor commit adultery.

src: (Sei nicht traurig,) denn du kannst nicht die Toten hören lassen noch die Tauben den Ruf hören lassen, wenn sie den Rücken kehren.
ref: You cannot make the dead to listen nor the deaf hear the call when they have turned back and retreated,
draft: "Don't be sad, as you cannot make the dead hear or make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs."
hil: Do not be sad, as you cannot make the dead hear or make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs.
compare: "Don't be sad, as you cannot make the dead hear or make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs."

src: Diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig sein.
ref: Those are the dwellers of the Fire, and they will abide therein forever.
draft: These are the companions of fire. They will be in it forever.
hil: These are the companions of fire. They will be in it forever.
compare: These are the companions of fire. They will be in it forever.

src: Darum führe uns unter den Bezeugenden auf."
ref: Enroll us among the witnesses."
draft: Therefore lead us among the witnesses.
hil: Therefore lead us among the witnesses.
compare: Therefore lead us among the witnesses.

src: Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: If so, bring on us what you threaten us with, if what you say is true."
draft: "Also let us experience what you warn us about, if you are one of the truthful."
hil: Let us, therefore, experience that which you are warning us against, if you are truthful.
compare: Let us, therefore, experience that which you are warning us against, if you are truthful.

src: O Prophet, mühe dich gegen die Ungläubigen und Heuchler ab und sei hart gegen sie! Ihr Zufluchtsort wird die Hölle sein - ein schlimmer Ausgang!
ref: O Herald of the Hidden! Fight against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be stern with them; and their destination hell; and what an evil place to return!
draft: O Prophet, strive against the unbelievers and hypocrites and be stern with them! Their refuge will be hell - a terrible destination!
hil: O dear Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be severe with them! Their destination is hell, and what a wretched outcome!
compare: O Prophet, strive against the unbelievers and hypocrites and be stern with them! Their refuge will be hell - a terrible destination!

src: Es sind Finsternisse, die einen über den anderen, wenn er seine Hand ausstreckt, beinahe sieht er sie nicht.
ref: If you stretch your hand, you could hardly see it.
draft: There are darknesses, one on top of the other, when one reaches out his hand, he almost cannot see them.
hil: There are layers of darkness, one on top of the other. When one reaches out his hand, he can hardly see them.
compare: There are layers of darkness, one on top of the other. When one reaches out his hand, he can hardly see them.

src: Darin bleiben sie ewig, wie die Himmel und die Erde (des Jenseits) bleiben - außer was dein HERR will. Gewiß, dein HERR macht, was ER will.
ref: Remaining in it as long as the heavens and the earth remain, except as much as your Lord willed*; indeed your Lord may do whatever, whenever, He wills. (* Remaining forever even after the heavens and the earth are destroyed.)
draft: They will remain therein forever, as will the heavens and the earth of the Hereafter - except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord does what He wills.
hil: They will remain therein forever, as will the heavens and the earth of the Hereafter - except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord does what He wills.
compare: They will remain therein forever, as will the heavens and the earth of the Hereafter - except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord does what He wills.

src: Zwei Männer von denjenigen, die Ehrfurcht haben und denen ALLAH von Seinen Gaben gewährte, sagten: "Tretet zu ihnen durch das Tor ein! Und wenn ihr es durchschritten habt, werdet ihr dann doch Sieger sein.
ref: Two men of those who feared, but whom God had blessed, said, “Go at them by the gate; and when you have entered it, you will prevail.
draft: Two men from among those who show respect and to whom ALLAH granted His gifts said: "Enter through the gate to them! And when you have passed through it, you will surely be victorious.
hil: Two men from among those who show respect and to whom Allah granted His gifts said: 'Enter through the gate to them! And when you have passed through it, you will surely be victorious.'
compare: Two men from among those who show respect and to whom ALLAH granted His gifts said: "Enter through the gate to them! And when you have passed through it, you will surely be victorious.

src: Am Tag, da Allah sie alle auferweckt, da werden sie Ihm schwören, wie sie euch schwören, und meinen, sie hätten eine Grundlage.
ref: On the day that God will raise them together, they will swear before Him as they swear before you, and imagine they are on the right path.
draft: On the day when Allah will raise them all up, they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they have a firm foundation.
hil: On the day when God will resurrect them all together, they will swear to Him as they swore to you and they will think that they have a good case but they are certainly liars.
compare: On the day when Allah will raise them all up, they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they have a firm foundation.

src: Aber trefft nicht heimlich eine Abmachung mit ihnen, außer ihr sagt geziemende Worte.
ref: And do not consummate the marriage until the term prescribed is fulfilled.
draft: But do not make a secret agreement with them unless you speak appropriate words.
hil: Do not make a secret agreement with them except when you speak appropriate words.
compare: Do not make a secret agreement with them except when you speak appropriate words.

src: Dann wurde er ein Blutklumpen; dann bildete und vervollkommnete Er (ihn)
ref: Then formed into an embryo? Then He fashioned, shaped and proportioned
draft: Then he became a blood clot; then He formed and perfected it.
hil: He then became a clot; and then (God) formed and perfected him.
compare: He then became a clot; and then (God) formed and perfected him.

src: Um undankbar zu sein für das, was Wir ihnen zukommen ließen. So genießet nur.
ref: That they may show ingratitude for that which We have vouchsafed unto them.
draft: To be ungrateful for what we have bestowed upon them. So just enjoy.
hil: To be ungrateful for what We have bestowed upon them. So just enjoy.
compare: To be ungrateful for what we have bestowed upon them. So just enjoy.

src: Wissen sie denn nicht, daß Allah die Versorgung großzügig gewährt, wem Er will, und auch bemißt?
ref: Do they not know that God enhances or restricts the provision of any one He will.
draft: Do you not know that Allah generously grants sustenance to whomever he wills, and also measures it?
hil: Do you not know that Allah generously grants sustenance to whomever he wills, and also measures it?
compare: Do you not know that Allah generously grants sustenance to whomever he wills, and also measures it?

src: Und ALLAH gegenüber sollen die Mumin Tawakkul üben!
ref: And in God let the believers put their trust.
draft: And the believers should exercise trust in Allah!
hil: Believers must exercise Tawakkul towards Allah!
compare: And the believers should exercise trust in Allah!

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il! Gewiß, er war wahrhaftig im Versprechen und war ein Gesandter, ein Prophet.
ref: And remember Ismail in the Book; he was indeed true to his promise and was a Noble Messenger, a Prophet.
draft: And mention in the Scripture, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger, a prophet.
hil: And mention Ishmael in the Scripture. Indeed, he was true to his promise and was a messenger, a prophet.
compare: And mention Ishmael in the Scripture. Indeed, he was true to his promise and was a messenger, a prophet.

src: Oder (sind jene sicher davor,) daß Er sie nicht durch vorgewarnte Vernichtung erfaßt? Euer Herr ist wahrlich Gütig Barmherzig.
ref: Or, that he will not take hold of them by giving them a fright? verily thy Lord is Kind, Merciful.
draft: Or (are they sure) that He will not seize them by a sudden overwhelming (calamity)? Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
hil: Are they safe from the destruction that comes upon them suddenly or are they not? Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
compare: Or (are they sure) that He will not seize them by a sudden overwhelming (calamity)? Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.

src: Und Allah hat euch aus Erde erschaffen, dann aus einem Samentropfen, dann machte Er euch zu Paaren. Und kein weibliches Wesen wird schwanger oder entbindet ohne Sein Wissen.
ref: God has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen and then divided you into pairs; no female conceives or gives birth without His knowledge; and no one's life is prolonged or shortened, but it is recorded in a Book.
draft: And Allah has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen, then made you pairs. And no female being conceives or gives birth without His knowledge.
hil: Allah has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen, then made you pairs. And no female being conceives or gives birth without His knowledge.
compare: And Allah has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen, then made you pairs. And no female being conceives or gives birth without His knowledge.

src: Und wenn sie ein Zeichen sehen, so verdrehen sie es zu Spott
ref: When they see a sign, they laugh at it,
draft: And when they see a sign, they twist it into mockery.
hil: And when they see a sign, they twist it into mockery.
compare: And when they see a sign, they twist it into mockery.

src: Belehrt hat ihn der Besitzer starker Kräfte,
ref: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,
draft: The owner of strong powers has instructed him.
hil: The owner of strong powers has instructed him.
compare: The owner of strong powers has instructed him.

src: Und ALLAH ist über das, was ihr tut, allwissend.
ref: God is aware of what you do.
draft: And Allah is all-knowing about what you do.
hil: Therefore, Allah is all-knowing about what you do.
compare: And Allah is all-knowing about what you do.

src: Sie sagten: "O Moses, siehe, dort lebt ein tyrannisches Volk, und wir werden es (das Land) nicht betreten, ehe jene es nicht verlassen haben.
ref: They said: "O Moses, in that land live a people who are formidable; we shall never go there until they leave.
draft: They said, "O Moses, behold, there lives a tyrannical people, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left."
hil: They said, "O Moses, behold, there lives a tyrannical people, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left."
compare: They said, "O Moses, behold, there lives a tyrannical people, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left."

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen).
ref: What comes to you of good is verily from God; and what comes to you of ill is from your own self (your actions).
draft: "What befalls you of good, it is from Allah. And what befalls you of calamity, it is due to your own actions."
hil: What befalls you of good, it is from Allah. And what befalls you of calamity, it is due to your own actions.
compare: "What befalls you of good, it is from Allah. And what befalls you of calamity, it is due to your own actions."

src: Und zu Uns führt der Lebensweg.
ref: To Us is the arrival.
draft: And the path of life leads us to Us.
hil: And the path of life leads us to Us.
compare: And the path of life leads us to Us.

src: Das ist die Ermahnung derer, die mit mir sind, und die Ermahnung derer, die vor mir lebten. Aber die meisten von ihnen kennen die Wahrheit nicht, so wenden sie sich ab.
ref: Say, “Bring your proof; this is the remembrance of those with me and those before me”; but in fact most of them do not know the Truth, so they turn away.
draft: This is the admonition of those who are with me, and the admonition of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.
hil: This is the reminder of those who are with me and the reminder of those who lived before me. But most of them don't know the truth, so they turn away.
compare: This is the reminder of those who are with me and the reminder of those who lived before me. But most of them don't know the truth, so they turn away.

src: Gewiß, manches Spekulieren ist eine Verfehlung.
ref: And spy not, neither backbite one another.
draft: Certainly, some speculation is a misconduct.
hil: Indeed, some speculation is a misconduct
compare: Indeed, some speculation is a misconduct

src: Er sprach: "lch bin der Bote deines Herrn.
ref: If thou fearest God...
draft: He said: "I am the messenger of your Lord."
hil: He said, 'I am the messenger of your Lord.'
compare: He said: "I am the messenger of your Lord."

src: Und sie folgten dem, was die Satane während der Herrschaft Salomos vortrugen; doch nicht Salomo war ungläubig, sondern. die Satane waren ungläubig; sie brachten den Menschen die Zauberei bei sowie das, was den beiden Engeln in Babel, Harut und Marut, herabgesandt wurde.
ref: And they follow that which the Satans recited in the reign of Sulaiman; and Sulaiman blasphemed not, but the Satans blasphemed.; teaching people magic; and they follow that also which was sent down unto the two angels in Babil, Harut, and Marut.
draft: And they followed what the devils gave out during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who was disbelieving, but the devils were disbelieving, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.
hil: And they followed what the devils gave out during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who was disbelieving, but the devils were disbelieving; they taught people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.
compare: And they followed what the devils gave out during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who was disbelieving, but the devils were disbelieving, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.

src: (Dies) als Belohnung von deinem Herrn, als hinreichende Gabe,
ref: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,
draft: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,
hil: This is a reward from your Lord as a sufficient gift.
compare: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,

src: Du siehst dann die, die Unrecht tun, erschrocken vor dem, was sie erworben haben, und es wird über sie hereinbrechen. Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses.
ref: You will see (on the Day of Resurrection), the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) fearful of that which they have earned, and it (Allah's Torment) will surely befall them, while those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous deeds (will be) in the flowering meadows of the Gardens (Paradise), having what they wish from their Lord.
draft: Then you will see those who do wrong, terrified by what they have earned, and it will come to pass against them. But those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of paradise.
hil: You will see those who do wrong, terrified by what they have earned, and it will come to pass against them. But those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of paradise.
compare: Then you will see those who do wrong, terrified by what they have earned, and it will come to pass against them. But those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of paradise.

src: (Die Folgen) eurer Übertretungen tragt nur ihr selbst.
ref: Your violations are against your own souls.
draft: (The consequences) of your transgressions, only you bear yourself.
hil: Only you bear (the consequences) of your transgressions.
compare: (The consequences) of your transgressions, only you bear yourself.

src: Ihm gehört, wer in den Himmeln und auf der Erde ist. Alle sind Ihm demütig ergeben.
ref: All those who are in the heavens and the earth are His, and they are all obedient to Him.
draft: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on earth. All are humbly submissive to Him.
hil: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and on the earth. All are humbly submissive to Him.
compare: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on earth. All are humbly submissive to Him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen!
ref: “These – the people of ours – have set up Gods besides Allah; why do they not bring a clear proof regarding them?
draft: These are our people, they took Gods instead of Him. Would that they put forward a clear confirmation for it!
hil: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. Would that they present a clear confirmation for it!
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. Would that they present a clear confirmation for it!

src: Er ist es, Der euch Gehör, Augenlicht und Herzen hat entstehen lassen.
ref: It is He, Who has created for you (the sense of) hearing (ears), sight (eyes), and hearts (understanding).
draft: He is the one who has created your hearing, eyesight and hearts.
hil: He is the One who has caused your hearing, eyesight, and hearts to be created.
compare: He is the one who has created your hearing, eyesight and hearts.

src: "O Moses, tritt vor und fürchte dich nicht; denn du gehörst zu jenen, die in Sicherheit sind.
ref: "O Moses, approach," (said the Voice), "and have no fear. You will be safe.
draft: "O Moses, step forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are safe."
hil: O Moses, step forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are safe.
compare: "O Moses, step forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are safe."

src: Zu ihnen kam ein edler Gesandter:
ref: A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
draft: "A noble envoy came to them."
hil: A noble envoy came to them.
compare: "A noble envoy came to them."

src: Ist das (etwa) eine Gunst, die du mir vorhältst, daß du die Kinder lsra'ils geknechtet hast?"
ref: But the favour you oblige me with is that you have enslaved the children of Israel."
draft: Is that (perhaps) a favor that you are withholding from me, that you have enslaved the children of Israel?
hil: Is that (perhaps) a favor that you are withholding from me, that you have enslaved the children of Israel?
compare: Is that (perhaps) a favor that you are withholding from me, that you have enslaved the children of Israel?

src: Und Allah gab ihm die Herrschaft und die Weisheit und lehrte ihn von dem, was Er wollte.
ref: David slew Goliath, and Allah bestowed on him the kingship and wisdom, and taught him from that He willed.
draft: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and the wisdom and taught him of what He wanted.
hil: And Allah granted him sovereignty and wisdom and taught him what he willed.
compare: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and the wisdom and taught him of what He wanted.

src: Und die Engel stehen an seinem Rand.
ref: The angels will stand on all its sides.
draft: And the angels stand at its edge.
hil: And the angels stand at its edge.
compare: And the angels stand at its edge.

src: Wisset, daß wahrlich das diesseitige Leben nur ein Spiel und ein Zeitvertreib ist und ein Prunk und Geprahle unter euch und ein Wettrennen um Vermehrung von Gut und Kindern. Es gleicht dem reichlichen Regen, dessen Pflanzenwuchs den Säern gefällt. Dann verdorrt er; und du siehst ihn vergilben; hierauf wird er brüchig; und im Jenseits gibt es eine strenge Strafe, aber auch Vergebung von Allah und Wohlgefallen. Und das diesseitige Leben ist nichts anderes als eine Nutznießung, durch die man sich betören läßt.
ref: Know that the life of this world is nothing but play and pastime, and adornment, and boasting amongst yourselves, and the desire to surpass each other in wealth and children; like the rain the produce of which pleased the farmer, then dried so you see it yellow, and then turned into dry trampled hay; and in the Hereafter is a severe punishment, and the forgiveness from Allah and His pleasure; and the life of this world is nothing but counterfeit wealth.
draft: Know that truly this worldly life is nothing but a game and a pastime, and a show and competition among you for the increase in wealth and children. It is like abundant rain, the growth of which pleases the farmers, and then it withers away and you see it turning yellow, and then it becomes debris. And in the Hereafter, there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from Allah and acceptance. And this worldly life is no more than a temporary enjoyment.
hil: Know that truly this worldly life is nothing but a game and a pastime, and a show and competition among you for the increase in wealth and children. It is like abundant rain, the growth of which pleases the farmers, and then it withers away and you see it turning yellow, and then it becomes debris. And in the Hereafter, there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from Allah and acceptance. And this worldly life is no more than a temporary enjoyment.
compare: Know that truly this worldly life is nothing but a game and a pastime, and a show and competition among you for the increase in wealth and children. It is like abundant rain, the growth of which pleases the farmers, and then it withers away and you see it turning yellow, and then it becomes debris. And in the Hereafter, there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from Allah and acceptance. And this worldly life is no more than a temporary enjoyment.

src: Der Mensch lehnt sich wahrlich auf,
ref: Verily, man does transgress all bounds (in disbelief and evil deed, etc.).
draft: The human is truly rebelling.
hil: Verily, man is in rebellion.
compare: Verily, man is in rebellion.

src: Dann werden Wir euch eure Sünden vergeben; wahrlich, Wir werden jenen, die Gutes tun, noch mehr (an Gnade) erweisen."
ref: We shall forgive you your wrong-doings. We shall increase (the reward) for the good-doers."
draft: Then We will forgive you your sins; indeed, We will bestow upon those who do good [a reward] beyond measure.
hil: Then We will forgive you your sins; indeed, We will bestow upon those who do good [a reward] beyond measure.
compare: Then We will forgive you your sins; indeed, We will bestow upon those who do good [a reward] beyond measure.

src: Kein Willkomm (sei) ihnen! Sie sollen im Feuer brennen.
ref: Verily, they shall burn in the Fire!
draft: No welcome be to them! They shall burn in the fire.
hil: No welcome be to them! They shall burn in the fire.
compare: No welcome be to them! They shall burn in the fire.

src: Und erlahmt nicht in der Verfolgung der Leute. Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: Do not relax in pursuit of the disbelievers; if you are suffering, they also suffer as you do; and you expect from Allah what they do not; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.
draft: And do not slacken [in regard to war booty] and pursue the enemy with the utmost vigour. If you are suffering, then surely they are suffering just as you are, but you have hope from Allah (God) that they do not have. Allah (God) is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
hil: Do not be faint of heart in pursuing these people: if you happen to suffer harm, they too are suffering just as you are, while you may hope from Allah what they cannot hope for. Allah (God) is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
compare: And do not slacken [in regard to war booty] and pursue the enemy with the utmost vigour. If you are suffering, then surely they are suffering just as you are, but you have hope from Allah (God) that they do not have. Allah (God) is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

src: Und wir werden gewiß nicht gepeinigt werden.»
ref: We are not the punished!
draft: "And we certainly will not be tormented."
hil: And for sure we will not be tormented.
compare: "And we certainly will not be tormented."

src: Diejenigen, die auf ihren Herrn hören, erhalten das Beste. Diejenigen, die nicht auf ihn hören, würden wohl, wenn sie alles, was auf der Erde ist, besäßen und noch einmal soviel dazu, sich damit loskaufen wollen. Sie erwartet eine böse Abrechnung, und ihre Heimstätte ist die Hölle - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: For those who obeyed the command of Allah is goodness and if those who did not obey Him owned all that is in the earth and in addition a similar one like it, they would give it to redeem their souls; it is they who will have a wretched account, and their destination is hell; and what a wretched resting place!
draft: Those who listen to their Lord will receive the best. Those who do not listen to Him, even if they possessed everything on earth and twice as much again, would want to use it as a ransom. They are awaiting an evil reckoning, and their home is hell - what a terrible dwelling place!
hil: Those who listen to their Lord will receive the best. Those who do not listen to Him, even if they possessed everything on earth and twice as much again, would want to use it as a ransom. They are awaiting an evil reckoning, and their home is hell - what a terrible dwelling place!
compare: Those who listen to their Lord will receive the best. Those who do not listen to Him, even if they possessed everything on earth and twice as much again, would want to use it as a ransom. They are awaiting an evil reckoning, and their home is hell - what a terrible dwelling place!

src: ALLAH leitet zum Seinem Licht recht, wen ER will.
ref: God guides to His light whom He will.
draft: ALLAH guides to His light whom He wills.
hil: Thus Allah guides whom He wills to His light.
compare: ALLAH guides to His light whom He wills.

src: Diesen wird ALLAH Gnade erweisen.
ref: Allah will have His Mercy on them.
draft: Allah will show mercy to him.
hil: Allah will show mercy to him.
compare: Allah will show mercy to him.

src: Sie sagen: "Pflegten nicht doch eure Gesandten mit den klaren Beweisen zu euch zu kommen?"
ref: They will say: "Did not your apostles come to you with clear proofs?"
draft: They say: "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"
hil: They say: "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"
compare: They say: "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"

src: Meine Söhne! Geht und erkundigt euch nach Yusuf und seinem Bruder und verzweifelt nicht an den Ruhh von ALLAH, denn es zweifeln an den Ruhh von ALLAH nur die Kafir-Leute."
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God. Only they despair of God's mercy who do not believe."
draft: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of Allah's mercy. Only the Kafir people doubt Allah's mercy."
hil: My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of Allah's mercy. Only those who do not believe doubt Allah's mercy.
compare: My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of Allah's mercy. Only those who do not believe doubt Allah's mercy.

src: Sag: "Weshalb habt ihr ALLAHs Propheten vorher getötet, solltet ihr Mumin sein?!"
ref: Say: "Why have you then been slaying God's apostles as of old, if you do believe?"
draft: Say: "Why did you kill ALLAH's prophets before, if you are Mumin?!"
hil: Say: 'Why did you kill ALLAH's prophets before, if you are Mumin?!'
compare: Say: "Why did you kill ALLAH's prophets before, if you are Mumin?!"

src: Und unter den Leuten der Schrift gibt es wahrlich manche, die an Allah glauben und (an) das, was zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt worden ist, und was zu ihnen (selbst) herabgesandt worden ist.
ref: And there are, certainly, among the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians), those who believe in Allah and in that which has been revealed to you, and in that which has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.
draft: And among the people of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and [in] what was revealed to you and what was revealed to them.
hil: And among the people of the Book there are certainly some who believe in Allah and in what has been sent down to you and in what has been sent down to them. They are humbly submissive to Allah and do not trade the signs of Allah for a paltry price.
compare: And among the people of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and [in] what was revealed to you and what was revealed to them.

src: Darin ist wahrlich ein Zeichen für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid.
ref: In this will be a portent for you if you do believe.
draft: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you are believers.
hil: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you are believers.
compare: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you are believers.

src: Und zu Madyan (entsandten WIR) ihren Bruder Schu'aib. So sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: And We sent towards Madyan, their fellowman Shuaib – he therefore said, “O my people!
draft: And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shuaib. So he said: "My people!
hil: And unto Midian (We sent) their brother, Shu'ayb. So he said: 'My people!'
compare: And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shuaib. So he said: "My people!

src: DU bist unser Wali, so vergib uns und erweise uns Gnade! Und DU bist der Beste der Vergebenden.
ref: You are our saviour, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of forgivers.
draft: You are our guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And you are the best of forgivers.
hil: You are our guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And you are the best of forgivers.
compare: You are our guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And you are the best of forgivers.

src: Und es begreifen sie nur die Wissenden.
ref: But only those endowed with knowledge will comprehend them.
draft: And only the knowledgeable understand it.
hil: And only the knowledgeable understand it.
compare: And only the knowledgeable understand it.

src: Oder fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER über euch Sandsturm schickt?!
ref: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you?
draft: Or do you feel safe from the One whose command is in the sky, that He sends upon you a storm of sand?!
hil: Or do you not fear the One whose command is in the sky, that He may send upon you a sandstorm?!
compare: Or do you feel safe from the One whose command is in the sky, that He sends upon you a storm of sand?!

src: Kann es sein, daß wenn er stirbt oder getötet wird, daß ihr auf euren Fersen (zum Kufr) umkehrt?
ref: So what if he dies or is killed! Will you turn back and go away in haste?
draft: Can it be that if he dies or is killed, you turn on your heels (to Kufr)?
hil: Can it be that if he dies or is killed, you turn on your heels (towards Kufr)?
compare: Can it be that if he dies or is killed, you turn on your heels (towards Kufr)?

src: Und da die Berge versetzt und zu einer Luftspiegelung werden.
ref: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
draft: And since the mountains are being moved and becoming a mirage.
hil: Indeed, the mountains are moved and become a mirage.
compare: Indeed, the mountains are moved and become a mirage.

src: Und gehorcht Allah und Seinem Gesandten, und streitet nicht miteinander, sonst würdet ihr den Mut verlieren, und eure Kraft würde vergehen! Und seid standhaft!
ref: And obey Allah and His apostle, and dispute not, lest ye flag and your predominance depart, and be patient.
draft: And obey Allah and His apostle, and do not fight with one another, or else you would lose courage and your strength would be gone! And be steadfast!
hil: Obey Allah and His apostle, and do not fight with one another, or you would lose courage and your strength would be gone! And be steadfast!
compare: Obey Allah and His apostle, and do not fight with one another, or you would lose courage and your strength would be gone! And be steadfast!

src: Das sind die (wahren) Lügner.
ref: These are the liars.
draft: These are the (true) liars.
hil: These are the (true) liars.
compare: These are the (true) liars.

src: Doch sollten sie dich verraten wollen, so haben sie ALLAH bereits vorher verraten, dann hat ER sie unterwerfen lassen.
ref: But if they intend to betray you (O Muhammad SAW), they have already betrayed Allah before. So He gave (you) power over them.
draft: But if they want to betray you, they have already betrayed ALLAH before, then HE has made them submissive.
hil: If they try to deceive you, remember they have deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
compare: But if they want to betray you, they have already betrayed ALLAH before, then HE has made them submissive.

src: Und wenn die Gräber umgewühlt werden,
ref: When the graves are overturned,
draft: And when the graves are disturbed.
hil: And when the graves are disturbed.
compare: And when the graves are disturbed.

src: Allah wird alles ans Licht bringen, wovor ihr euch fürchtet."
ref: Say: 'Mock on; God will bring forth what you fear.'
draft: "Allah will bring to light everything you fear."
hil: Say, 'Allah will bring to light everything you fear.'
compare: "Allah will bring to light everything you fear."

src: Richte Bittgebete an deinen HERRN mit dem, wozu ER dich verpflichtete, wir sind gewiß rechtgeleitet!"
ref: Pray for us to your Lord, by the means of His covenant which is with you; we will certainly come to guidance.”
draft: "Direct your supplications to your LORD with what HE has obligated you, we are certainly rightly guided!"
hil: "Direct your supplications to your LORD with what HE has obligated you, we are certainly rightly guided!"
compare: "Direct your supplications to your LORD with what HE has obligated you, we are certainly rightly guided!"

src: Entweder peinigst du sie, oder du gewährst ihnen Gutes."
ref: Either you punish them, or treat them with kindness."
draft: "Either you torment them, or you grant them good."
hil: You either torment them or grant them good.
compare: "Either you torment them, or you grant them good."

src: Dies ist ein von Ihm gemachtes Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges - (erwähnt) in At-taurat, Alindschil und im Quran. Und wer hält sein Versprechen besser als ALLAH ein?!
ref: Rejoice wherefore in your bargain which ye have made.
draft: This is a promise made by Him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran. And who keeps their promise better than Allah?
hil: This is a promise made by Him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran. And who keeps their promise better than Allah?
compare: This is a promise made by Him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran. And who keeps their promise better than Allah?

src: Die (wahren) Gläubigen sind ja diejenigen, die an Allah und Seinen Gesandten glauben und hierauf nicht zweifeln und sich mit ihrem Besitz und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf Allahs Weg abmühen.
ref: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God.
draft: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, but strive with their wealth and their selves in the way of Allah.
hil: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, but strive with their wealth and their own selves in the way of Allah.
compare: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, but strive with their wealth and their own selves in the way of Allah.

src: Aber die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But most of them do not know.
draft: But most of them do not know.
hil: However, most of them do not know.
compare: However, most of them do not know.

src: Da kam seine Frau in Aufregung heran, und sie schlug ihre Wange und sagte: "(Ich bin doch) eine unfruchtbare alte Frau!"
ref: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"
draft: Then his wife came over in agitation, and she slapped her cheek and said, "(I am) an infertile old woman!"
hil: Then his wife came in agitation, and she struck her cheek and said, 'I am an unproductive old woman!'
compare: Then his wife came over in agitation, and she slapped her cheek and said, "(I am) an infertile old woman!"

src: Solltest DU sie peinigen, so sind sie doch Deine Diener.
ref: If Thou punish them, lo! they are Thy slaves, and if Thou forgive them (lo! they are Thy slaves).
draft: If you torment them, they are your servants.
hil: If you torment them, they are still your servants.
compare: If you torment them, they are still your servants.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Schirk betrieben, die von ihnen beigesellten Partner gesehen haben, werden sie sagen: "Unser HERR!
ref: And when the polytheists will see their ascribed partners, they will say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when those who practiced sorcery behold their partners whom they had made supplications, they will say, "Our Lord!
hil: And when those who associated partners with Allah see their partners, they will say, "Our Lord!
compare: And when those who associated partners with Allah see their partners, they will say, "Our Lord!

src: So wurden ihre Häuser dem Erdboden gleichgemacht, auch der Brunnen ist verlassen und das Schloß ist errichtet.
ref: How many a well and fortress reinforced lie abandoned!
draft: So their houses were razed to the ground, the well is abandoned, and the castle has been built.
hil: Thus, their houses were levelled to the ground, the well was abandoned, and the castle was erected.
compare: So their houses were razed to the ground, the well is abandoned, and the castle has been built.

src: Dann brachten WIR heraus, wer in ihr von den Mumin war.
ref: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
draft: Then we found out who among them was a Moomin.
hil: Then We revealed who among them was a Mumin.
compare: Then we found out who among them was a Moomin.

src: Wollt ihr denn geduldig sein? Und dein Herr ist Allsehend.
ref: And O dear Prophet, your Lord is All Seeing.
draft: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
hil: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
compare: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.

src: Sie haben sich ihre Schriftgelehrten und Mönche zu Herren genommen außer Allah; und den Messias, den Sohn der Maria.
ref: They have taken their rabbis and their priests as lords instead of God, as well as the Messiah son of Mary.
draft: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.
hil: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.
compare: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr das, was ALLAH euch vom Rizq hinabsandte, dann ihr es in Haram und Halal eingeteilt habt?"
ref: Say: "Have you thought of what God has sent you for food, of which you have labelled some as lawful and some forbidden?"
draft: Say, "How do you view what Allah has sent down to you as provision, and then you have divided it into lawful and unlawful?"
