hil: Say, 'What do you think about what Allah has sent down to you as provision, and then you have divided it into what is unlawful and what is lawful?' Say, 'Has Allah given you His permission or are you forging falsehood against Allah?'
compare: Say, "How do you view what Allah has sent down to you as provision, and then you have divided it into lawful and unlawful?"

src: Ebenso zu Seinen Ayat zählt, daß ER für euch von eurem Wesen Partnerwesen erschuf, damit ihr bei ihnen Geborgenheit findet. Und ER setzte zwischen euch Liebe und Barmherzigkeit. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die nachdenken.
ref: And among His signs is that He created spouses for you from yourselves for you to gain rest from them, and kept love and mercy between yourselves; indeed in this are signs for the people who ponder.
draft: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who give thought.
hil: Among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who reflect.
compare: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who give thought.

src: Hierauf legte Er sie den Engeln vor und sagte: "Teilt Mir deren Namen mit, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid!"
ref: After this he taught Adam the names of all things. Then He set these before the angels and asked, "Tell Me the names of these things, if you are right (in thinking that the appointment of a vicegerent will cause disorder)".
draft: Then He presented them to the angels and said, "Tell me their names if you are truthful!"
hil: He then presented them to the angels and said, "Tell me their names if you are truthful!"
compare: Then He presented them to the angels and said, "Tell me their names if you are truthful!"

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit würde niemand von euch jemals lauter sein.
ref: And whosoever followeth the footsteps of the Satan, then he only urgeth to indecency and abomination.
draft: And without the grace of Allah towards you and His mercy, none of you would ever be pure.
hil: Without the grace of Allah towards you and His mercy, none of you would ever be pure.
compare: And without the grace of Allah towards you and His mercy, none of you would ever be pure.

src: Dann entfernten sie sich. ALLAH möge ihre Herzen (vom Iman) entfernen, weil sie gewiß Leute sind, die nicht begreifen.
ref: Indeed God has turned their hearts away (from the truth), for they cannot discern the law of heaven.
draft: Then they moved away. Allah may remove their hearts (from Iman) because they are certainly people who do not understand.
hil: Then they moved away. May Allah remove their hearts (from Iman) because they are certainly people who do not understand.
compare: Then they moved away. May Allah remove their hearts (from Iman) because they are certainly people who do not understand.

src: Darum, wenn sie sich von euch fernhalten und nicht gegen euch kämpfen, sondern euch Frieden bieten; dann hat Allah euch keinen Grund gegen sie gegeben.
ref: If they keep aloof and do not fight, and offer peace, God has left you no reason to fight them.
draft: Therefore, if they stay away from you and do not fight against you but offer you peace, Allah has not given you any reason to fight against them.
hil: Therefore, if they keep away from you, and do not fight against you but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight against them.
compare: Therefore, if they keep away from you, and do not fight against you but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight against them.

src: Wenn wir wollten, könnten auch wir etwas Derartiges sagen. Das sind nichts als Fabeln der Früheren.»
ref: Had we wanted, we could have said the like of this; these are nothing but myths of the ancients.”
draft: "If we wanted to, we could say something like that too. These are nothing but fables of the past."
hil: "If we wanted to, we could say something similar. These are nothing but fables of the past."
compare: "If we wanted to, we could say something like that too. These are nothing but fables of the past."

src: Josef, wende dich davon ab. Und (du), bitte um Vergebung für deine Schuld. Du gehörst ja zu denen, die sich versündigt haben.»
ref: Ignore this affair, O Joseph; and you, O woman, ask forgiveness for your sin, for you were surely errant."
draft: Josef, turn away from this. And (you), ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You are among those who have sinned.
hil: Joseph, turn away from this. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt, as you belong among those who have sinned.
compare: Joseph, turn away from this. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt, as you belong among those who have sinned.

src: Und gewiß, manch einer von euch zögert. Und wenn ein Unglück euch heimsucht, sagt er: "ALLAH hat mir bereits eine Wohltat erwiesen, daß ich unter ihnen nicht anwesend war."
ref: Someone among you will surely lag behind, and if calamity should befall you, will say: "God was gracious to me that I was not among them."
draft: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune befalls you, he says, "ALLAH has already shown me a favor by not being present among them."
hil: And indeed, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune strikes you, he says, "Allah has already shown me favor that I was not among them."
compare: And indeed, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune strikes you, he says, "Allah has already shown me favor that I was not among them."

src: Und als sie die Peinigung überkam, sagten sie: "Musa!
ref: And whenever the punishment came upon them they said, “O Moosa!
draft: And when the torment overtook them, they said, "Musa!
hil: And when the torment overtook them, they said, "Musa!"
compare: And when the torment overtook them, they said, "Musa!"

src: Sie schwören euch bei ALLAH, damit sie euch zufriedenstellen, während ALLAH und Sein Gesandter doch berechtigter sind, zufriedengestellt zu werden, sollten sie Mumin sein.
ref: They swear by God to please you; but if they are believers it would have been worthier to have pleased God and His Apostle.
draft: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, while Allah and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied, if they are believers.
hil: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, whereas Allah and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied, if they are believers.
compare: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, whereas Allah and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied, if they are believers.

src: So wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der geschützten Gebetsstätte!
ref: And wheresoever you people are, turn your faces (in prayer) in that direction.
draft: "So turn your face towards the protected place of prayer!"
hil: So turn your face towards the protected place of prayer!
compare: "So turn your face towards the protected place of prayer!"

src: Also vergalten Wir es ihnen. Siehe nun, wie das Ende der Leugner war!
ref: So We took revenge from them – therefore see what sort of fate befell those who denied!
draft: So we paid them back. Now see what the end of the deniers was!
hil: "So We paid them back. Now see what the end of the deniers was!"
compare: So we paid them back. Now see what the end of the deniers was!

src: Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu bebauen und zu bestellen gegeben.
ref: He hath caused you to spring out of the earth, and hath made you dwell therein.
draft: He made you arise from the earth and gave it to you to cultivate and manage.
hil: He caused you to arise from the earth and gave it to you to cultivate and manage.
compare: He caused you to arise from the earth and gave it to you to cultivate and manage.

src: Und sie sagen: "Dies sind verwehrtes Vieh und verwehrte (Früchte auf den) Saatfelder(n).
ref: They also say: "These cattle and these crops are consecrated. None may eat of them other than those we permit," -- so they assert.
draft: And they say, "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits on the) cultivated fields."
hil: They say: "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits on the) cultivated fields."
compare: They say: "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits on the) cultivated fields."

src: Er sagte: "Ihr befindet euch in einer (noch) schlechteren Lage. Und Allah weiß sehr wohl, was ihr beschreibt."
ref: But Joseph kept this secret and did not disclose it to them, and said (to himself): "You are worse in the degree of evil, for God knows better of what you allege."
draft: He said: "You are in an even worse position. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
hil: "He said: 'You are in an even worse position. And Allah knows very well what you describe.'"
compare: He said: "You are in an even worse position. And Allah knows very well what you describe."

src: Und er wird froh zu seinen Angehörigen zurückkehren.
ref: And will return to his people full of joy.
draft: And he will be happy to return to his relatives.
hil: And he will return happily to his relatives.
compare: And he will be happy to return to his relatives.

src: Darin sind gehobene Liegen
ref: And within it are couches placed on high,
draft: There are elevated loungers in it.
hil: There are elevated loungers in it.
compare: There are elevated loungers in it.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Was ist denn der Herr der Weltenbewohner?"
ref: The Pharaoh asked: "And what is the Lord of all the worlds?"
draft: Pharaoh said, "What then is the Lord of the worlds?"
hil: Pharaoh said, 'What then is the Lord of the worlds?'
compare: Pharaoh said, "What then is the Lord of the worlds?"

src: Und wer Kufr gegenüber dem Iman betreibt, dessen Handeln ist zweifellos nichtig, und er gehört im Jenseits zu den Verlierern.
ref: Useless shall be rendered the acts of those who turn back on their faith, and they will be among the losers in the life to come.
draft: And whoever practices disbelief towards the Imam, his actions are undoubtedly null and he is one of the losers in the Hereafter.
hil: You who practice disbelief towards the Imam, your deeds are undoubtedly void and you will be among the losers in the Hereafter.
compare: You who practice disbelief towards the Imam, your deeds are undoubtedly void and you will be among the losers in the Hereafter.

src: ER sagte: "Ist dies nicht dieWahrheit?!"
ref: He will say, 'Is not this the truth?'
draft: He said: "Isn't this the truth?!"
hil: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"
compare: He said: "Isn't this the truth?!"

src: Die Menschen fragen dich nach der Stunde. Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah.
ref: People ask thee ccncerning the Hour.
draft: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.
hil: The people ask you about the hour. Say, 'The knowledge about it is only with Allah.'
compare: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.

src: Und ALLAH erschuf alles sich bewegende Lebewesen aus Wasser. So geht manch einer von ihnen auf seinem Bauch, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf zwei Beinen, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf Vieren. ALLAH erschafft, was ER will! Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: And Allah created every animal on earth, from water; so among them is a kind that moves upon its belly; and among them is a kind that moves upon two legs; and among them a kind that moves upon four legs; Allah creates whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them go on their bellies, some of them on two legs, and some on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed Allah is over all things competent.
hil: Allah has created every moving creature from water. Some of them move on their bellies, some of them walk on two legs, and some on four. Allah creates whatever He wants. Certainly, Allah has power over all things.
compare: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them go on their bellies, some of them on two legs, and some on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed Allah is over all things competent.

src: Die Juden sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Christen"; und die Christen sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Juden", obwohl sie doch (beide) die Schrift lesen.
ref: The Jews say, 'The Christians stand not on anything'; the Christians say, 'The Jews stand not on anything'; yet they recite the Book.
draft: The Jews say: "Christians stand on nothing"; and the Christians say: "Jews stand on nothing", even though (both) read the scripture.
hil: The Jews say, "Christians stand on nothing"; and the Christians say, "Jews stand on nothing," even though both read the scripture.
compare: The Jews say: "Christians stand on nothing"; and the Christians say: "Jews stand on nothing", even though (both) read the scripture.

src: Das Gleichnis dessen, was sie in diesem diesseitigen Leben spenden, ist wie das Gleichnis vom Wind, der bittere Kälte bringt und die Äcker von Leuten, die Unrecht begangen haben, heimsucht und dann zerstört. Und ALLAH fügte ihnen kein Unrecht zu, sondern sie fügten sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is similar to the freezing cold wind which struck the fields of a nation who wronged themselves, and destroyed it completely; and Allah did not oppress them, but it is they who wronged themselves.
draft: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and visits the fields of people who have committed injustice and destroys them. And Allah did not wrong them, but they were wronging themselves.
hil: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and visits the fields of people who have committed injustice and destroys them. And Allah did not wrong them, but they were wronging themselves.
compare: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and visits the fields of people who have committed injustice and destroys them. And Allah did not wrong them, but they were wronging themselves.

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war.
ref: They were that day, nearer to disbelief than to Faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
draft: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith, they said yes with their mouths, but it wasn't in their hearts.
hil: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith, they said yes with their mouths, but it wasn't in their hearts.
compare: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith, they said yes with their mouths, but it wasn't in their hearts.

src: Dann erfaßte Ich jene, die ungläubig waren, und wie war es mit der Verleugnung!
ref: So We seized the unbelievers. How great was the change I wrought in their condition then!
draft: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!
hil: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!
compare: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!

src: Und die Soldaten deines HERRN kennt niemand außer Ihm.
ref: And none knoweth the hosts of thy Lord but He.
draft: And no one knows the soldiers of your LORD except Him.
hil: No one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.
compare: And no one knows the soldiers of your LORD except Him.

src: Doch sie fügten damit niemandem Schaden zu, es sei denn mit der Ermächtigung Allahs.
ref: Yet they could not harm any one or without the dispensation of God.
draft: But they did not harm anyone thereby except by permission of Allah.
hil: Allah permitted them, and they did not harm anyone thereby except by His permission.
compare: But they did not harm anyone thereby except by permission of Allah.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Laßt mich Musa töten; soll er (doch) seinen Herrn anrufen!
ref: "Let me kill Moses," the Pharaoh said, "and let him call to his Lord.
draft: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Musa; let him call his Lord then!"
hil: Pharaoh said, 'Let me kill Musa; let him call his Lord then!'
compare: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Musa; let him call his Lord then!"

src: Und wer Allah Götter zur Seite stellt, der hat wahrhaftig eine gewaltige Sünde begangen.
ref: And he who ascribes compeers to God is guilty of the gravest sin.
draft: "And whoever sets up gods besides Allah, he has indeed committed a heinous sin."
hil: And whoever sets up gods besides Allah, he has indeed committed a heinous sin.
compare: "And whoever sets up gods besides Allah, he has indeed committed a heinous sin."

src: Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: Indeed, He knows the secrets of the hearts.
draft: Certainly, he knows about the innermost of the breasts.
hil: "Certainly, He knows about the innermost of the breasts."
compare: "Certainly, He knows about the innermost of the breasts."

src: Sie sagten: "Wir brachen das Versprechen dir gegenüber nicht aus eigener Kraft.
ref: They replied: 'We have not failed in our promise to you through our choosing.
draft: They said, "We didn't break the promise to you on our own."
hil: They said, 'We did not break the promise to you on our own.'
compare: They said, 'We did not break the promise to you on our own.'

src: Sollte er von ihr dann (zum dritten Mal) die Talaq-Scheidung vollzogen haben, so wird sie für ihn danach nicht mehr halal, bis sie einen anderen Ehemann heiratet.
ref: If a man divorces her again (a third time), she becomes unlawful for him (and he cannot remarry her) until she has married another man.
draft: If he then (for the third time) pronounces the Talaq divorce to her, she will not be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.
hil: If he pronounces the Talaq divorce to her again (for the third time), she will not be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.
compare: If he pronounces the Talaq divorce to her again (for the third time), she will not be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.

src: Und es ist für euch kein Vergehen, wenn ihr Heiratsabsichten gegenüber solchen Frauen andeutet oder bei euch innerlich hegt.
ref: You commit no error by announcing your engagement to women, or by keeping it to yourselves.
draft: And it is not a crime for you to indicate or internally harbor marriage intentions towards such women.
hil: And it is not a sin for you to indicate or internally harbor marriage intentions towards such women.
compare: And it is not a sin for you to indicate or internally harbor marriage intentions towards such women.

src: Und WIR erretteten diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten und Taqwa gemäß zu handeln pflegten.
ref: We deliver those who believe and take heed for themselves.
draft: And WE saved those who internalized the Iman and acted according to Taqwa.
hil: And WE saved those who internalized Iman and acted in accordance with Taqwa.
compare: And WE saved those who internalized Iman and acted in accordance with Taqwa.

src: Du bist der, der alles hört und weiß.»
ref: Thou art the Hearer, the Knower.
draft: "You are the one who hears and knows everything."
hil: Indeed, You alone are the All-Knowing, the Wise.
compare: Indeed, You alone are the All-Knowing, the Wise.

src: Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie.
ref: But to refrain (i.e. not to discard their outer clothing) is better for them.
draft: But if they abstain from it, it is better for them.
hil: But it is better for them if they abstain from it.
compare: But if they abstain from it, it is better for them.

src: Abziehende der Kopfhäute,
ref: That would skin the scalp.
draft: "removers of scalp"
hil: Removers of scalps
compare: "removers of scalp"

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle.
ref: Do on your part what you can, O people, I will do what I will.
draft: My people! Act according to your convictions, so do I.
hil: Oh my people! Act according to your beliefs, as I also act.
compare: My people! Act according to your convictions, so do I.

src: Waret ihr dabei, als Allah euch dies gebot?" Wer ist also ungerechter als der, welcher eine Lüge gegen Allah ersinnt, um die Leute ohne Wissen irrezuführen?
ref: Then who doth greater wrong than he who deviseth a lie concerning Allah, that he may lead mankind astray without knowledge. Lo!
draft: "Were you there when Allah commanded you to do this?" Who, then, is more unjust than he who invents a lie against Allah to mislead people without knowledge?
hil: Were you there when Allah commanded you to do this?' Who, then, is more unjust than he who invents a lie against Allah to mislead people without knowledge?
compare: "Were you there when Allah commanded you to do this?" Who, then, is more unjust than he who invents a lie against Allah to mislead people without knowledge?

src: Den Menschen erschaffen hat aus einem Embryo.
ref: Created man from an embryo;
draft: "He created man from an embryo."
hil: He created man from an embryo.
compare: "He created man from an embryo."

src: (Dies ist) das Gleichnis des (Paradies)gartens, der den Gottesfürchtigen versprochen ist: Er ist durcheilt von Bächen'; sein Ernteertrag ist immerwährend und (auch) sein Schatten.
ref: The likeness of Paradise promised the pious and devout is (of a garden) with streams of rippling water, everlasting fruits and shade.
draft: "The parable of the Garden of Paradise promised to the God-fearing: it is traversed by streams; its harvest is perpetual and so is its shade."
hil: This is a description of the Paradise promised to the pious. Rivers flow beneath it; its fruits are unending, and its shade is perpetual.
compare: This is a description of the Paradise promised to the pious. Rivers flow beneath it; its fruits are unending, and its shade is perpetual.

src: Und die ihr Zeugnis ablegen,
ref: Who uphold their testimonies,
draft: "And those who bear witness,"
hil: And those who testify,
compare: "And those who bear witness,"

src: Aber Er läßt in seine Barmherzigkeit eingehen, wen Er will.
ref: But He admits whomsoever He pleases into His Mercy.
draft: But He causes to enter into His mercy whoever He wills.
hil: He admits to His mercy whom He wills.
compare: But He causes to enter into His mercy whoever He wills.

src: Und als Unsere Boten zu Lot kamen, war er ihretwegen besorgt und fühlte sich außerstande, ihnen zu helfen. Sie sprachen: "Fürchte dich nicht und sei nicht traurig, wir wollen dich und die Deinen sicher retten, bis auf deine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen.
ref: And when Our sent angels came to Lut, he was unhappy at their arrival and was depressed – and they said, “Do not fear or grieve; we will surely rescue you and your family, except your wife, who is of those who will stay behind.”
draft: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was concerned about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not be afraid or grieved; we will certainly save you and your family except your wife, who will be one of those who stay behind."
hil: When our messengers came to Lot, he was concerned about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not be afraid or sad, we will surely save you and your family, except your wife, who is among those who will remain behind."
compare: When our messengers came to Lot, he was concerned about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not be afraid or sad, we will surely save you and your family, except your wife, who is among those who will remain behind."

src: Und gewiß, bereits erleichterten WIR den Quran zur Ermahnung! Gibt es etwa einen sich Erinnernden?!
ref: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?
draft: And surely, We have made the Quran easy for remembrance. Is there anyone who will take heed?
hil: Indeed, We have made the Quran easy to understand and take heed. Is there anyone who remembers?
compare: Indeed, We have made the Quran easy to understand and take heed. Is there anyone who remembers?

src: Allah sieht die Menschen wohl,
ref: And under God's eyes are devotees
draft: Allah sees people well.
hil: Allah sees people well. And fear not people but fear Me, and do not exchange My revelations for a small price. And never would Allah have caused you to lose your faith. And thus We have made you a midmost nation that you might be witnesses to the people, and that the Messenger might be a witness to you. Allah has indeed heard the speech of the woman who is arguing with you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) concerning her husband, and is complaining to Allah. And Allah has listened to your conversation. Surely, Allah is All-Hearing and All-Seeing.
compare: Allah sees people well.

src: (Erinnere) an den Tag, wenn er euch zum Tag des Zusammenbringens zusammenbringt. Dies ist der (Anklage-)Tag wegen Übervorteilung.
ref: The day He will gather you together on the Day of Gathering, will be the day of Judgement.
draft: (Recall) the day when he brings you together for the day of gathering. This is the day of (accusation) because of fraud.
hil: Recall the day when he brings you together for the day of gathering. This is the Day of (accusation) because of fraud.
compare: (Recall) the day when he brings you together for the day of gathering. This is the day of (accusation) because of fraud.

src: Und am Tag, da Er sie versammelt, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt, um einander kennenzulernen. Den Verlust haben diejenigen, die die Begegnung mit Gott für Lüge erklärt haben und der Rechtleitung nicht gefolgt sind.
ref: And on the day when He will raise all of them together, as if they had never stayed on earth except for a moment during the day, they will recognise one another; for completely ruined are those who denied the meeting with Allah and were not on guidance.
draft: And on the day when He gathers them as if they had not remained [in the world] but an hour of the day, they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided.
hil: On the day when He gathers them as if they had not remained [in the world] but an hour of the day, they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided.
compare: And on the day when He gathers them as if they had not remained [in the world] but an hour of the day, they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided.

src: ALLAH will ihnen keinen Anteil am Jenseits gewähren.
ref: It is Allah's Will to give them no portion in the Hereafter.
draft: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the Hereafter.
hil: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the Hereafter.
compare: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the Hereafter.

src: Sie sagte zu seiner Schwester: "Spüre ihm nach."
ref: She told his sister: "Follow him."
draft: She said to his sister, "Track him down."
hil: She said to his sister, 'Track him down.'
compare: She said to his sister, 'Track him down.'

src: Zakaria! Gewiß, WIR überbringen dir doch frohe Botschaft von einem Jungen Namens Yahya. Dessen Namen haben WIR niemandem zuvor gegeben.
ref: O Zakariyya! verily We give thee the glad tidings of a boy: his name shall be Yahya; We have not afore-time made his namesake.
draft: Zakaria! Surely, We bring you good news of a boy named Yahya. Whose name We have not given to anyone before.
hil: O Zachariah, We give you the good news of a son named Yahya (John). To none have We given his name before.
compare: Zakaria! Surely, We bring you good news of a boy named Yahya. Whose name We have not given to anyone before.

src: Und wer an Allah glaubt und das Rechte tut - Er wird seine Übel von ihm nehmen und wird ihn in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (sie) auf ewig verweilen.
ref: He who believed and did the right, will have his evil deeds expunged by God and admitted to gardens with rivers flowing by, and abide there perpetually.
draft: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove his misdeeds from him and will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.
hil: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteous deeds - Allah will remove his misdeeds from him and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.
compare: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteous deeds - Allah will remove his misdeeds from him and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.

src: Da könnt ihr weder (etwas) abwenden noch Hilfe erfahren. Und wer von euch Unrecht tut, den lassen Wir große Strafe kosten "
ref: Then you shall neither be able to repel your punishment nor shall get any help from anywhere; and whoso is guilty. of iniquity'' among you, We shall make him taste a severe torment.
draft: You can neither prevent (anything) nor receive help. And whoever among you does wrong, We shall cause him to taste a great punishment."
hil: You can neither repel anything nor find help. And whoever among you does wrong, We shall cause him to taste great punishment.
compare: You can neither repel anything nor find help. And whoever among you does wrong, We shall cause him to taste great punishment.

src: Wer ist dieser, der um ALLAHs willen eine Hasan-Anleihe macht, damit ALLAH sie für ihn um ein Vielfaches vermehrt?!
ref: Who will give a goodly loan to God which He might double many times?
draft: Who is the one who, for the sake of ALLAH, makes a Hasan loan so that ALLAH may increase it for him multiple times?!
hil: Who is the one who, for the sake of Allah, makes a Hasan loan so that Allah may increase it for him multiple times?!
compare: Who is the one who, for the sake of ALLAH, makes a Hasan loan so that ALLAH may increase it for him multiple times?!

src: So fragt die Leute der Ermahnung, wenn ihr (es) nicht wißt.
ref: If you do not know, then ask the keepers of the oracles of God.
draft: So ask the people for instruction, if you do not know.
hil: Ask the people for instruction, if you do not know.
compare: So ask the people for instruction, if you do not know.

src: Du Mensch!
ref: O Man!
draft: You human!
hil: You human!
compare: You human!

src: Zu Ihm ist eure Rückkehr, alle zusammen - ein wahrhaftiges Versprechen von ALLAH.
ref: To Him will you all return: God's promise is true.
draft: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from ALLAH.
hil: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from Allah.
compare: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from ALLAH.

src: Gewiß, denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, werden weder ihre Vermögenswerte noch ihre Kinder vor ALLAH etwas nutzen.
ref: As for those who disbelieve, neither wealth nor children will avail them in the least against God.
draft: Certainly, those who have committed Kufr, neither their wealth nor their children will be of any benefit to them before Allah.
hil: Certainly, those who have committed Kufr, neither their wealth nor their children will be of any benefit to them before Allah.
compare: Certainly, those who have committed Kufr, neither their wealth nor their children will be of any benefit to them before Allah.

src: Sag: "Nennt sie doch!" Oder macht ihr Ihm etwa Mitteilung über das, was ER auf der Erde nicht kennt oder sind dies nur Worthülsen?!
ref: Proclaim, “Just name them – or is it that you inform Him of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the earth – or is it just superficial talk?”
draft: Say: "Name them!" Or are you informing Him of something He doesn't know on earth, or are these just empty words?!
hil: Say: 'Name them!' Or are you informing Him of something He doesn't know on earth, or are these just empty words?!
compare: Say: 'Name them!' Or are you informing Him of something He doesn't know on earth, or are these just empty words?!

src: Sie sagten: "Wer hat dies mit unseren Göttern getan? Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten."
ref: They said: who hath wrought this to our gods? verily he is of the wrong-doers.
draft: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He truly belongs to the unjust."
hil: They said, 'Who has done this with our gods? He truly belongs to the unjust.'
compare: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He truly belongs to the unjust."

src: Diese sind diejenigen, die ihrem HERRN gegenüber Kufr betrieben haben. Und diese sind es, um deren Hälse Eisenringe sein werden.
ref: They are the ones who deny their Lord, and they will have collars around their necks.
draft: These are the ones who committed disbelief towards their Lord. And these are the ones whose necks will be in iron collars.
hil: Those are they who defied their Lord, and they are the ones whose necks will be in iron collars.
compare: Those are they who defied their Lord, and they are the ones whose necks will be in iron collars.

src: So diene Mir und verrichte das Gebet zu Meinem Gedenken.
ref: So serve Me and establish Prayers to remember Me.
draft: So serve Me and perform the prayer for My remembrance.
hil: So serve Me and perform the prayer for My remembrance.
compare: So serve Me and perform the prayer for My remembrance.

src: Was ist mit diesem Buch, daß es nichts, weder klein noch groß, ausläßt, ohne es zu erfassen?»
ref: What sort of Book is this that leaves neither a small thing nor a big thing, but has recorded it with numbers!"
draft: "What is it about this book that it excludes nothing, neither small nor large, without capturing it?"
hil: "What is it about this book that it excludes nothing, neither small nor large, without capturing it?"
compare: "What is it about this book that it excludes nothing, neither small nor large, without capturing it?"

src: Und für sie ist eine andauernde Peinigung bestimmt,
ref: There is perpetual punishment for them,
draft: And for them, a continuous torment is destined.
hil: And for them, an everlasting torment is determined.
compare: And for them, an everlasting torment is determined.

src: Das ist eine Ermahnung für dich und dein Volk. Und ihr werdet zur Verantwortung gezogen.
ref: And it is undoubtedly an honour for you and your people; and you will soon be questioned.
draft: This is a warning for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.
hil: This is an admonition for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.
compare: This is a warning for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.

src: Das ist etwas von Allahs Huld gegen uns und gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten Menschen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: This is among God's favours to us and to all mankind; but most men are not grateful.
draft: "That is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are ungrateful."
hil: That is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are ungrateful.
compare: "That is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are ungrateful."

src: Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Walk behind them and let no one turn around.
draft: And none of you should turn around.
hil: And none of you should turn around.
compare: And none of you should turn around.

src: Das ist eine Gemeinschaft, die dahingegangen ist. Sie erhält, was sie erworben hat, und ihr erhaltet, was ihr erworben habt.
ref: Those are a people who have passed away; theirs is that which they earned and yours that which ye earn.
draft: This is a community that has passed away. It receives what it has acquired, and you receive what you have acquired.
hil: This is a nation that has passed away; for them is what they earned, and yours is what you earned; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.
compare: This is a nation that has passed away; for them is what they earned, and yours is what you earned; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.

src: Aber die bösen Ränke umschließen nur ihre Urheber.
ref: But their evil plots will turn back on the plotters themselves.
draft: But the evil schemes only entangle their creators.
hil: Heinous schemes only entangle their creators.
compare: But the evil schemes only entangle their creators.

src: Er ist es, Der in Wahrheit die Himmel und die Erde erschuf; und am Tage, da Er spricht: "Sei!" wird es so sein.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose. The day He will say "Be, " it will be.
draft: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when he says "Be!", it will be so.
hil: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when he says 'Be!', it will be so.
compare: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when he says "Be!", it will be so.

src: Doch wenn sie dich auffordern, Mir das zur Seite zu setzen, wovon du keine Kenntnis hast, dann gehorche ihnen nicht. In weltlichen Dingen aber verkehre mit ihnen auf gütige Weise.
ref: But if they (both) strive with you to make you join in worship with Me others that of which you have no knowledge, then obey them not, but behave with them in the world kindly, and follow the path of him who turns to Me in repentance and in obedience.
draft: But if they ask you to put aside from me what you have no knowledge of, do not obey them. But in worldly matters, associate with them in a kindly manner.
hil: But if they ask you to put aside from me what you have no knowledge of, do not obey them. But in worldly matters, associate with them in a kindly manner.
compare: But if they ask you to put aside from me what you have no knowledge of, do not obey them. But in worldly matters, associate with them in a kindly manner.

src: Das ist es, was Er euch geboten hat, auf daß ihr es begreifen möget.
ref: These things has God enjoined on you. Haply you may understand.
draft: This is what He has commanded you, so that you may understand it.
hil: This is what He has commanded you, so that you may understand it.
compare: This is what He has commanded you, so that you may understand it.

src: Das geschah, um Schlechtigkeit und Unsittlichkeit von ihm abzuwenden.
ref: Thus it was, that We might turn away from him evil and illegal sexual intercourse.
draft: That happened to prevent wickedness and immorality from him.
hil: That was done to avert wickedness and immorality from him.
compare: That was done to avert wickedness and immorality from him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter.
ref: As for these our people here, they have taken to other gods apart from Him.
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
hil: Those are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.

src: Es steht uns nicht zu, eine Ermächtigung zu bringen - außer mit der Erlaubnis Allahs.
ref: It is not in our power to bring a miracle for you without the leave of God.
draft: It is not for us to bring an authorization - except with the permission of Allah.
hil: It is not for us to bring you an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.
compare: It is not for us to bring you an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es?
ref: He said: "O my people, think.
draft: He said, "My people! What do you think?"
hil: "He said, 'My people! What do you think?'"
compare: He said, "My people! What do you think?"

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden sagen: "Unser Herr, zeige uns jene der Ginn und der Menschen, die uns irreführten, damit wir sie mit unseren Füßen treten, so daß sie zu den Niedrigsten gehören."
ref: Those who disbelieve will say: "O Lord, show us those among the jinns and men who had led us astray that we may trample them underfoot and make them wholly abject."
draft: And the unbelievers will say: "Our Lord, show us those of the jinn and the people who misled us, so that we may tread upon them with our feet and they may become of the lowest."
hil: And the disbelievers will say, 'Our Lord, show us the jinn and men who led us astray, so that we may put them under our feet and they may become the lowest.'
compare: And the unbelievers will say: "Our Lord, show us those of the jinn and the people who misled us, so that we may tread upon them with our feet and they may become of the lowest."

src: Aber nein, bei deinem Herrn!
ref: But no, by your Lord!
draft: But no, by your Lord!
hil: But no, by your Lord!
compare: But no, by your Lord!

src: So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: (The image of) the calf had sunk deep into their hearts on account of unbelief.
draft: So in their hearts (affection) for the calf was impressed due to their kufr.
hil: And so in their hearts was ingrained (affection) for the calf due to their kufr.
compare: And so in their hearts was ingrained (affection) for the calf due to their kufr.

src: Und wir sind Ihm ergeben.
ref: To Him we are submitters (Muslims)'
draft: And we are devoted to him.
hil: And we are devoted to Him.
compare: And we are devoted to him.

src: So siehe wiederholt hin, siehst du irgend etwas an Rissen?!
ref: Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?
draft: So look repeatedly, do you see anything cracking?!
hil: So look repeatedly, do you see anything cracking?!
compare: So look repeatedly, do you see anything cracking?!

src: Aber er kann ihnen keinen Schaden zufügen, außer mit Allahs Erlaubnis. Und auf Allah sollen sich die Gläubigen verlassen.
ref: But he cannot harm them in the least, except as Allah permits, and in Allah let the believers put their trust.
draft: But he cannot harm them except by Allah's permission. And in Allah let the believers put their trust.
hil: But he cannot harm them except by Allah's permission. And the believers should rely on Allah.
compare: But he cannot harm them except by Allah's permission. And in Allah let the believers put their trust.

src: Muhammad ist nicht der Vater eines eurer Männer, sondern der Gesandte Allahs und der letzte aller Propheten, und Allah besitzt die volle Kenntnis aller Dinge.
ref: Muhammad is not the father of any man among you, but a messenger of God, and the seal of the prophets. God has knowledge of everything.
draft: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of the Prophets. And Allah is knowledgeable about all things.
hil: Muhammad is not the father of any one of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the final Prophet, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.
compare: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of the Prophets. And Allah is knowledgeable about all things.

src: Denn ER ist mir gegenüber immer großzügig gewesen.
ref: He has been gracious to me.
draft: Because HE has always been generous to me.
hil: Because HE has always been generous to me.
compare: Because HE has always been generous to me.

src: "So halte sie fest und befiel deinem Volk, sich an das Schönste in ihnen zu halten!
ref: “Hold fast to them, and exhort your people to adopt the best of them.
draft: "So hold onto them and command your people to keep to the most beautiful thing in them!"
hil: Keep hold of them and command your people to hold on to the most beautiful thing in them!
compare: "So hold onto them and command your people to keep to the most beautiful thing in them!"

src: Und wer darauf verzichtet, wird dies eine Kaffara für ihn sein.
ref: But if anyone remits the retaliation by way of charity, it shall be for him an expiation.
draft: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a Kaffara for him.
hil: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a Kaffara for him.
compare: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a Kaffara for him.

src: Und nachdem das Beben sie erfaßt hatte, sagte er: "HERR!
ref: When they arrived they were seized by a tremor.
draft: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "LORD!
hil: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "Lord!"
compare: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "LORD!

src: Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers, sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: They are the residents of Hell, and will there for ever abide.
draft: These are the companions of the fire, they will dwell in it forever.
hil: These are the companions of the Fire, they will dwell therein forever.
compare: These are the companions of the fire, they will dwell in it forever.

src: Dabei lesen sie (alle) das Buch. Auch diejenigen, die unwissend sind, äußern sich in der gleichen Weise.
ref: So too the ignorant say the like of them.
draft: They (all) are reading the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.
hil: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.
compare: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.

src: Und wer sich Satan statt Allah zum Beschützer nimmt, der hat sicherlich einen offenkundigen Verlust erlitten
ref: He who holds Satan as friend in place of God will assuredly be damned to perdition.
draft: And whoever takes Satan instead of Allah as a protector, has certainly suffered a clear loss.
hil: And whoever takes Satan as a protector instead of Allah has certainly suffered an obvious loss.
compare: And whoever takes Satan instead of Allah as a protector, has certainly suffered a clear loss.

src: Sie versuchten ihn in bezug auf seine Gäste zu überreden.
ref: And they indeed sought to shame his guest (by asking to commit sodomy with them).
draft: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.
hil: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.
compare: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.

src: Und sagte: «Ich bin krank.»
ref: And said: "I am sick (of what you worship)!"
draft: And said, "I am sick."
hil: And said, 'I am sick.'
compare: And said, "I am sick."

src: Gewiß, wir kehren zu unserem HERRN zurück,
ref: We shall return to our Lord.
draft: Certainly, we are returning to our LORD,
hil: Certainly, we are returning to our LORD,
compare: Certainly, we are returning to our LORD,

src: Aber sie ziehen ihn der Lüge.
ref: But they denounced him as a liar.
draft: But they accuse him of lying.
hil: But they accuse him of lying.
compare: But they accuse him of lying.

src: Und sie leisten wissentlich falsche Eide.
ref: And they swear to a lie while they know.
draft: "They knowingly make false oaths."
hil: And they knowingly make false oaths.
compare: "They knowingly make false oaths."

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und gute Werke tun, werden die Bewohner des Paradieses sein. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: But those who believe and do good deeds are people of Paradise, and shall live there forever.
draft: But those who believe and do good works will be the inhabitants of Paradise. They will abide therein eternally.
hil: As for those who believe and do good, We never burden a soul beyond capacity. They are men of Paradise where they will abide forever.
compare: But those who believe and do good works will be the inhabitants of Paradise. They will abide therein eternally.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der für euch das Meer gratis fügbar machte, damit die Schiffe darauf nach Seiner Anweisung fahren, damit ihr von Seiner Gunst anstrebt und damit ihr euch dankbar erweist.
ref: It is God who subjugated the ocean for you so that ships may ply through it by His command, and you may seek His bounty, and may haply be grateful.
draft: ALLAH is the one who made the sea freely available to you, so that ships may sail upon it according to His instructions, that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.
hil: Allah is the One who made the sea freely available to you so that ships may sail upon it according to His instructions, that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.
compare: ALLAH is the one who made the sea freely available to you, so that ships may sail upon it according to His instructions, that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.

src: Aber gegen sie wird Allah dir genügen.
ref: So Allah will suffice you against them.
draft: But Allah will suffice you against them.
hil: But Allah will suffice you against them.
compare: But Allah will suffice you against them.

src: Sag: "Entsinnt ihr euch nicht?!"
ref: Say: "Then why do you not bethink yourselves?"
draft: Say: "Don't you remember?!"
hil: Say: "Do you not recall?!"
compare: Say: "Don't you remember?!"

src: Außer deinen auserwählten Dienern unter ihnen.»
ref: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."
draft: "Except for your chosen servants among them."
hil: Except for Your chosen servants among them.
compare: "Except for your chosen servants among them."

src: Doch verkünde den Geduldigen eine frohe Botschaft
ref: But give good news to the steadfast.
draft: But proclaim to the patient a joyful message.
hil: Proclaim a joyful message to the patient.
compare: But proclaim to the patient a joyful message.

src: ER sagte: "Geh! Wer dir von ihnen folgt, dann ist Dschahannam gewiß eure Vergeltung - eine ausreichende Vergeltung!
ref: He said, “Be gone – therefore whoever among them follows you – so hell is the recompense for you all, a sufficient punishment.”
draft: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you among them, then Jahannam is surely your recompense - an ample recompense!"
hil: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you among them, then Jahannam is surely your recompense - an ample recompense!"
compare: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you among them, then Jahannam is surely your recompense - an ample recompense!"

src: Und sie gesellten ALLAH einen Teil von dem bei, was ER an Äckern und An'am erschuf, und sagten: "Dies gehört ALLAH - ihrer Behauptung nach - und dies gehört den von uns beigesellten Partnern." Und was den von ihnen beigesellten Partnern gehört, erreicht ALLAH nicht, aber was ALLAH gehört, dies erreicht die von ihnen beigesellten Partner.
ref: They allocate a share from God's own created fields and cattle to God, and they say: "This is God's" -- or so they think -- "and that, of the compeers of God," so that what belongs to the compeers does not reach God, but that which is God's may reach the compeers (set up by them).
draft: And they associate with Allah partners that which He created for them of crops and livestock, and say, "This is for Allah," according to their claim, "and this is for our partners [associated with Him]." But what is for their "partners" does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah - this reaches their "partners".
hil: "They associate partners with Allah in that which He created of crops and livestock, and say, "This is for Allah," according to their claim, "and this is for our partners [associated with Him]." But what their "partners" own does not reach Allah, while what belongs to Allah - this reaches their "partners"."
compare: "They associate partners with Allah in that which He created of crops and livestock, and say, "This is for Allah," according to their claim, "and this is for our partners [associated with Him]." But what their "partners" own does not reach Allah, while what belongs to Allah - this reaches their "partners"."

src: ALLAH ermahnt euch, daß ihr jemals Gleiches wiederholt, solltet ihr Mumin sein.
ref: God counsels you not to do a thing like this, if you are believers.
draft: ALLAH reminds you that if you are a believer, you must never repeat the same mistake again.
hil: ALLAH reminds you not to repeat the same mistake again, should you be a believer.
compare: ALLAH reminds you not to repeat the same mistake again, should you be a believer.

src: Tritt ein unter Meine Diener,
ref: "Enter then among My votaries,
draft: Enter among my servants.
hil: Enter among My servants.
compare: Enter among my servants.

src: Und in der Nacht.
ref: Or at night.
draft: And in the night.
hil: And in the night.
compare: And in the night.

src: Den Geduldigen wird ihr Lohn voll erstattet, ohne daß es (viel) gerechnet wird.
ref: Only those who persevere will get their reward measureless."
draft: The patient will be fully reimbursed their reward without it being (much) calculated.
hil: The patient will be fully reimbursed their reward without it being (much) calculated.
compare: The patient will be fully reimbursed their reward without it being (much) calculated.

src: Gewiß, er ist doch euer Meister, der euch die Magie lehrte, und ihr werdet es doch noch wissen. Ich werde zweifelsohne eure Füße und eure Hände wechselseitig abtrennen und werde euch gewiß noch allesamt kreuzigen!"
ref: He is indeed your leader who taught you magic; so now you will come to know; I swear, I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet from alternate sides, and crucify all of you.”
draft: "Surely, he is still your master who taught you magic, and you will still remember it. I will undoubtedly sever your feet and hands alternately and will certainly crucify all of you!"
hil: Indeed, he is still your master who taught you magic, and you will still remember it. I will undoubtedly sever your feet and hands alternately and I will certainly crucify all of you!
compare: "Surely, he is still your master who taught you magic, and you will still remember it. I will undoubtedly sever your feet and hands alternately and will certainly crucify all of you!"

src: Aber wir werden gewiß, so Gott will, die richtige finden.»
ref: If God wills we shall be guided aright."
draft: But we will surely find the right one, God willing.
hil: But we will certainly find the right one, God willing.
compare: But we will surely find the right one, God willing.

src: Not und Leid berührten sie, und sie wurden hin und her geschüttelt, so daß der Gesandte und diejenigen, die mit ihm gläubig waren, dann sagten: Wann kommt die Unterstützung Gottes? Wahrlich, die Unterstützung Gottes ist nahe.
ref: Affliction and adversity befell them; and they were shaken until the Messenger, and those who believed with him, said: 'When will the victory of Allah come' Is it not so that the victory of Allah is near.
draft: Adversity and suffering touched them and they were shaken back and forth, so that the envoy and those who believed with him said: When comes the help of God? Verily, the help of God is near.
hil: Adversity and suffering touched them and they were shaken back and forth, so that the envoy and those who believed with him said: 'When comes the help of God?' Verily, the help of God is near.
compare: Adversity and suffering touched them and they were shaken back and forth, so that the envoy and those who believed with him said: 'When comes the help of God?' Verily, the help of God is near.

src: Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah. Aber die meisten Menschen wissen nicht.
ref: Say: 'The knowledge of it is only with God, but most men know not.'
draft: Say: The knowledge about that is only with Allah. But most people do not know.
hil: Say, "The knowledge about that is only with Allah. But most people do not know."
compare: Say: The knowledge about that is only with Allah. But most people do not know.

src: Und wenn du zehn (Jahre) vervollständigst, dann ist dies dir überlassen. Und ich will es dir nicht schwer machen.
ref: If thou completest ten, that shall be of thy own accord; I do not desire to' press hard 'upon thee.
draft: "And if you complete ten (years), then it is up to you. And I won't make it difficult for you."
hil: And when you complete ten years, it is up to you. And I will not make it difficult for you.
compare: "And if you complete ten (years), then it is up to you. And I won't make it difficult for you."

src: Wenn es unter euch auch nur zwanzig gibt, die standhaft sind, werden sie zweihundert besiegen. Und wenn es unter euch hundert gibt, werden sie tausend von denen, die ungläubig sind, besiegen.
ref: Urge the believers to fight; if there are twenty persevering men among you, they shall overcome two hundred; and if there are a hundred among you, they shall overcome a thousand disbelievers because the disbelievers are a people who do not have sense.
draft: If there are even only twenty among you who are steadfast, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are among you a hundred steadfast, they will defeat a thousand of those who are disbelievers.
hil: If there are only twenty steadfast among you, they will vanquish two hundred; and if there are one hundred, they will rout a thousand disbelievers.
compare: If there are even only twenty among you who are steadfast, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are among you a hundred steadfast, they will defeat a thousand of those who are disbelievers.

src: Er sprach: "So ist es; dein Herr aber spricht: "Es ist Mir ein leichtes, und Ich habe dich zuvor geschaffen, als du ein Nichts warst.""
ref: (The angel) answered: "Thus will it be. Your Lord said: 'This is easy for Me; for when I brought you into being you were nothing.'
draft: He said, "So it is; but your Lord says: "It is easy for Me, and I created you before, when you were nothing."
hil: "He said, 'So it is; but your Lord says: "It is easy for Me, and I created you before, when you were nothing."'
compare: "He said, 'So it is; but your Lord says: "It is easy for Me, and I created you before, when you were nothing."'

src: "Gewiß, ihr und das, dem ihr anstatt Allahs dient, seid Brennstoff der Hölle. Ihr werdet dahin hinabgehen."
ref: Verily you and those you worship other than God will be faggots for Hell; and come to it you will.
draft: "Surely, you and that which you worship besides Allah are the fuel of Hell. You will enter it."
hil: Surely, you and that which you worship instead of Allah are the fuel of Hell. You will descend into it.
compare: "Surely, you and that which you worship besides Allah are the fuel of Hell. You will enter it."

src: Das ist das, was im Jenseits für die Gottesfürchtigen folgt.
ref: Such is the payment of the righteous.
draft: This is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.
hil: That is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.
compare: This is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.

src: Und Pharao und diejenigen, die vor ihm lebten, und die verschwundenen Städte zeigten sündiges Verhallen.
ref: Then came the Pharaoh, and those before him whose habitations were overthrown while they were committing crimes.
draft: And Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities showed sinful behavior.
hil: And indeed Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities showed sinful behavior.
compare: And indeed Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities showed sinful behavior.

src: Besitzer von Kraft und beim Herrn des Thrones in Ansehen,
ref: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,
draft: Owners of power and in the sight of the Lord of thrones,
hil: Owners of power and in the sight of the Lord of thrones,
compare: Owners of power and in the sight of the Lord of thrones,

src: Und wenn dem Menschen Unglück zustößt, richtet er an Uns Bittgebete im Liegen, im Sitzen oder im Stehen.
ref: When man is afflicted with adversity he calls to Us, whether lying on his side, or sitting or standing.
draft: And when a person encounters misfortune, he directs prayers to Us while lying down, sitting, or standing.
hil: And when misfortune visits a person, they call upon Us whether lying down, sitting, or standing.
compare: And when misfortune visits a person, they call upon Us whether lying down, sitting, or standing.

src: Für sie gibt es Strafe im diesseitigen Leben; aber die Strafe des Jenseits ist wahrlich härter. Und sie werden vor Allah keinen Behüter haben.
ref: They will be punished in the life of this world, and indeed the punishment of the Hereafter is the most severe; and there is none to save them from Allah.
draft: "For them there is punishment in this life, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harsher. And they will have no protector before Allah."
hil: "Those who disobey will face punishment in this life, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harsher. And they will have no guardian before Allah."
compare: "For them there is punishment in this life, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harsher. And they will have no protector before Allah."

src: Weiß er denn nicht, wenn der Inhalt der Gräber herausgeworfen wird
ref: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare
draft: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out?
hil: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out?
compare: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out?

src: Er vergibt, wem Er will, und Er bestraft, wen Er will.
ref: He forgiveth whomsoever He will and tormenteth whomsoever He will.
draft: He forgives whom He wills, and punishes whom He wills.
hil: He forgives whom He wills, and punishes whom He wills.
compare: He forgives whom He wills, and punishes whom He wills.

src: Ausgenommen davon sind jene, derer dein Herr Sich erbarmt hat, und dazu hat Er sie erschaffen. Und das Wort deines Herrn ist in Erfüllung gegangen: "Wahrlich, Ich werde Gahannam mit den Ginn und den Menschen insgesamt füllen."
ref: Except those upon whom your Lord had mercy; and this is why He created them; and the Word of your Lord has been concluded that, “Indeed I will, surely, fill hell with jinns and men combined.”
draft: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord had mercy on, and He has created them. And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Surely I will fill Gehenna with jinn and all mankind together."
hil: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord had mercy on, and He has created them. And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Surely I will fill Gehenna with jinn and all mankind together."
compare: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord had mercy on, and He has created them. And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Surely I will fill Gehenna with jinn and all mankind together."

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr Allah fürchtet, wird Er euch Entscheidungskraft gewähren und eure Übel von euch nehmen und euch vergeben; und Allah ist voll großer Huld.
ref: O believers, if you follow the path shown by God, He will give you a standard (of right and wrong), and overlook your sins, and forgive you. God is abounding in benevolence.
draft: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you discernment and will remove your evils from you and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.
hil: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you discernment and will remove your evils from you and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.
compare: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you discernment and will remove your evils from you and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.

src: Und er setzte es ihnen vor.
ref: He set it before them.
draft: And he presented it to them.
hil: And he presented it to them.
compare: And he presented it to them.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Ibrahim von seinem HERRN mit Worten geprüft wurde, und er sie dann einhielt. ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH mache dich zum Imam für die Menschen."
ref: Remember, when his Lord tried Abraham by a number of commands which he fulfilled, God said to him: "I will make you a leader among men."
draft: And (remember) when Abraham was tested by his Lord with words and he fulfilled them. He said, "Indeed, I will make you a leader for the people."
hil: And (remember) when Abraham was tested by his Lord with words and he fulfilled them. He said, 'Indeed, I will make you a leader for the people.'
compare: And (remember) when Abraham was tested by his Lord with words and he fulfilled them. He said, "Indeed, I will make you a leader for the people."

src: Mein HERR schenke mir von den gottgefällig Guttuenden."
ref: (And he prayed:) "O Lord, grant me a righteous son."
draft: "My LORD give me of the god-pleasing blessings."
hil: My Lord, grant me from the god-pleasing blessings.
compare: My Lord, grant me from the god-pleasing blessings.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin der Gesandte des Herrn der Weltenbewohner."
ref: He said: "I have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I am the messenger of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I am the messenger of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds.'
compare: He said, "Certainly, I am the messenger of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."

src: Nun - und beim Schreibrohr und bei dem, was sie nie derschreiben!
ref: NUN. I CALL to witness the pen and what they inscribe,
draft: Now - and at the writing tube and with that which they never write!
hil: Now - and with the writing tube and with that which they never write!
compare: Now - and with the writing tube and with that which they never write!

src: Wir aber sehen sie nahe.
ref: But We see it very near.
draft: We, however, see them closely.
hil: But we see them near.
compare: We, however, see them closely.

src: Ich habe doch davor ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: (Remember that I am one of you) and have lived a whole life with you before (its revelation).
draft: I have indeed dwelt among you my whole life before.
hil: I have dwelt among you my whole life before.
compare: I have dwelt among you my whole life before.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Zweifelsohne eignen sich viele von den Rabbinern und Priestern Vermögenswerte von Menschen durch das für nichtig Erklärte an und halten vom Weg ALLAHs ab.
ref: O believers, many rabbis and priests devour the possessions of others wrongfully, and keep men away from the path of God.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through the invalidated (means) and prevent (them) from the path of Allah.
hil: You who have internalized faith! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through the invalidated (means) and prevent (them) from the path of Allah.
compare: You, who have internalized the imam! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through the invalidated (means) and prevent (them) from the path of Allah.

src: Und als Unsere Gesandten zu Lut kamen, geriet er ihretwegen in eine böse Lage und war durch ihre Anwesenheit beklommen.
ref: And when Our Messengers came to Lout (Lot), he was grieved on their account and felt himself straitened for them (lest the town people should approach them to commit sodomy with them).
draft: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was troubled on their account and felt uneasy about their presence.
hil: The messengers of Allah came to Lot and he was troubled on their account and felt uneasy about their presence.
compare: The messengers of Allah came to Lot and he was troubled on their account and felt uneasy about their presence.

src: ER war Derjenige, Der dich mit Seinem Sieg und mit den Mumin gestärkt hat.
ref: It is He who has strengthened you with His help and with believers
draft: He was the One who strengthened you with His victory and with the believers.
hil: He was the One who strengthened you with His victory and with the believers.
compare: He was the One who strengthened you with His victory and with the believers.

src: Bestimmt ist für sie eine gewaltige Pein,
ref: For them is great suffering.
draft: Certainly, a tremendous pain is destined for them.
hil: Certainly, a tremendous pain is destined for them.
compare: Certainly, a tremendous pain is destined for them.

src: Als Abraham sagte: «Mein Herr, mache dieses Gebiet sicher, und laß mich und meine Söhne es meiden, den Götzen zu dienen.
ref: Remember when Abraham prayed: "O Lord, make this a city of peace, and preserve me and my progeny from worshipping idols:
draft: When Abraham said, "My Lord, make this area secure, and protect me and my sons from serving idols."
hil: When Abraham said, 'My Lord, make this area secure, and protect me and my children from serving idols.'
compare: When Abraham said, "My Lord, make this area secure, and protect me and my sons from serving idols."

src: Diese haben eine höhere Rangstufe als die, die erst nachher gespendet und gekämpft haben.
ref: They are higher in position than those who spent after (the victory) and fought.
draft: These have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.
hil: They have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought later.
compare: They have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought later.

src: Und wenn gegen euch tatsächlich gekämpft wird, werden wir euch ganz gewiß helfen."
ref: If you are fought against, we will help you.'
draft: "And if there is actually fighting against you, we will certainly help you."
hil: And if actually fighting is waged against you, we will certainly help you.
compare: And if actually fighting is waged against you, we will certainly help you.

src: Sag: "Seht ihr, woran ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bitt-gebete richtet, sollte ALLAH mir Schädigendes wollen, könnten sie das Schädigende von Ihm wegnehmen? Oder sollte ER mir eine Gnade wollen, könnten diese Seine Gnade zurückhalten?"
ref: Say: "Then just think. Can those whom you worship apart from God remove the distress God is pleased to visit upon me, or withhold a blessing God is pleased to favour me with?'
draft: Say: "Do you see to what instead of Allah you direct supplication? If Allah should intend me harm, could they remove His harm? Or if He should intend me mercy, could they withhold His mercy?"
hil: Say: "Do you see to what instead of Allah you direct supplication? If Allah should intend me harm, could they remove His harm? Or if He should intend me mercy, could they withhold His mercy?"
compare: Say: "Do you see to what instead of Allah you direct supplication? If Allah should intend me harm, could they remove His harm? Or if He should intend me mercy, could they withhold His mercy?"

src: Sie sagen: «Ja doch.
ref: They will say, “Yes indeed, why not?”
draft: They say: "Yes indeed."
hil: They say, 'Yes indeed.'
compare: They say: "Yes indeed."

src: ALLAH setzte keinem Mann zwei Herzen in seinem Innern ein. Und ER machte eure Ehefrauen, denen ihr (die Formel von) Zihar aussprecht, nicht zu euren Müttern. Ebenfalls machte ER die nach euch Genannten nicht zu euren Söhnen. Dies ist euer Wort aus euren Mündern. Und ALLAH sagt dasWahre und ER leitet zum wahren Weg recht.
ref: Allah has not kept two hearts in the body of any man; nor has He made them your mothers those wives of yours, whom you declare to be your mothers; nor has He made them your sons, whom you have adopted; this is the statement of your mouths; and Allah proclaims the truth and it is He Who shows the path.
draft: ALLAH did not grant any man two hearts within his body. And HE did not make your wives, whom you declare by the formula of zihar, as your mothers. Similarly, HE did not make those whom you call your sons, as your actual sons. This is just a saying that you speak with your mouths. And ALLAH speaks the truth and HE guides to the right path.
hil: ALLAH did not grant any man two hearts within his body. And HE did not make your wives, whom you declare by the formula of zihar, as your mothers. Similarly, HE did not make those whom you call your sons, as your actual sons. This is just a saying that you speak with your mouths. And ALLAH speaks the truth and HE guides to the right path.
compare: ALLAH did not grant any man two hearts within his body. And HE did not make your wives, whom you declare by the formula of zihar, as your mothers. Similarly, HE did not make those whom you call your sons, as your actual sons. This is just a saying that you speak with your mouths. And ALLAH speaks the truth and HE guides to the right path.

src: Die vor einem jagenden Löwen fliehen?
ref: Fleeing from a lion?
draft: Flee in front of a hunting lion?
hil: Flee in front of a hunting lion?
compare: Flee in front of a hunting lion?

src: Ich habe ihnen nichts anderes gesagt als das, was Du mir befohlen hast, nämlich: >Dienet Gott, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn. < Ich war Zeuge über sie, solange ich unter ihnen weilte. Als Du mich abberufen hast, warst Du der Wächter über sie. Und Du bist über alle Dinge Zeuge.
ref: “I have not told them except what You commanded me, that ‘Worship Allah, Who is my Lord and is also your Lord’; I was aware of them till I was among them; and when You raised me, only You watched over them; and all things are present before You.”
draft: I have told them nothing but what you have ordered me to say, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I was among them. When you took me away, you were the watcher over them, and you are a witness to all things.
hil: I have told them nothing but what you have ordered me to say, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I was among them. When you took me away, you were the watcher over them, and you are a witness to all things.
compare: I have told them nothing but what you have ordered me to say, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I was among them. When you took me away, you were the watcher over them, and you are a witness to all things.

src: Immer wieder, wenn eine Umma eingetreten ist, hat sie ihre Vorgängerin verflucht.
ref: Every time a crowd enters, it will curse its sister-crowd.
draft: Again and again, when a new Umma has taken office, it has cursed its predecessor.
hil: "You again and again, when a new Ummah has taken office, have cursed its predecessor."
compare: Again and again, when a new Umma has taken office, it has cursed its predecessor.

src: Ihre Herberge wird Gahannam sein, und dies ist ein schlimmes Ende!
ref: Their abode is Hell, an evil destination?
draft: Your abode will be Gehenna, and this is a terrible end!
hil: Your destination shall be Gehenna, and what a wretched end!
compare: Your abode will be Gehenna, and this is a terrible end!

src: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. Das sind die Verse des Buches. Und was dir von deinem Herrn hinabgesandt wurde, ist die Wahrheit. Jedoch die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Alif-Lam-Meem-Ra*; these are verses of the Book; and that which has been sent down upon you from your Lord is true, but most men do not believe. (* Alphabets of the Arabic language – Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)
draft: "Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what was sent down to you from your Lord is the truth. But most people do not believe."
hil: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what was sent down to you from your Lord is the truth. But most people do not believe.
compare: "Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what was sent down to you from your Lord is the truth. But most people do not believe."

src: Also hinsichtlich des Schaums, so wird er beiseite geworfen, doch hinsichtlich dessen, das den Menschen nützt, so verbleibt es in der Erde. Solcherart prägt ALLAH die Gleichnisse.
ref: Thus Allah sets forth parables (for the truth and falsehood, i.e. Belief and disbelief).
draft: Regarding the foam, it is thrown away, but regarding that which benefits people, it remains in the earth. In this way, Allah explains his parables.
hil: For as far as the foam is concerned, it is thrown away, but for that which benefits people, it remains behind on earth. Thus, Allah draws analogies.
compare: Regarding the foam, it is thrown away, but regarding that which benefits people, it remains in the earth. In this way, Allah explains his parables.

src: Und die Thamud, das Volk Lots und die Leute des Waldes.
ref: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, as well as the dwellers of the Wood, had denied.
draft: And the Thamud, the people of Lot and the people of the forest.
hil: "And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the forest."
compare: "And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the forest."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, und eine Seele soll danach schauen, was sie für morgen vorausschickte!
ref: O ye who believe! fear Allah, and let every soul look to that which it sendeth forward for the morrow.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Act with Taqwa towards ALLAH, and let each soul look at what it sent ahead for tomorrow!
hil: O believers who have internalized faith! Act with Taqwa towards ALLAH as He should be feared, and let each soul look at what it sent ahead for tomorrow!
compare: O believers who have internalized faith! Act with Taqwa towards ALLAH as He should be feared, and let each soul look at what it sent ahead for tomorrow!

src: Diejenigen, die ihr Vermögen bei Nacht und Tag, geheim oder offen, spenden, haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn, sie haben nichts zu befürchten, und sie werden nicht traurig sein.
ref: Those who spend of their wealth in the way of God, day and night, in secret or openly, have their reward with their Lord, and have nothing to fear or regret.
draft: Those who donate their wealth at night and day, secretly or openly, have their reward with their Lord, they have nothing to fear, and they will not be sad.
hil: Those who donate their wealth, openly or in secret, at night and during the day, have their reward with their Lord and they have nothing to fear, nor will they grieve.
compare: Those who donate their wealth at night and day, secretly or openly, have their reward with their Lord, they have nothing to fear, and they will not be sad.

src: Sag: Die Angelegenheit ist ganz und gar (in) Allahs (Entscheidung). Sie halten in ihrem Innersten verborgen, was sie dir nicht offenlegen; sie sagen: "Wenn wir etwas von der Angelegenheit (zu entscheiden) hätten, würden wir hier nicht getötet."
ref: Slumber overtook a party, while another party cared only for themselves, thinking of Allah thoughts that were not true, the guess of ignorance, saying: 'Have we any say in the affair' Say: 'The entire affair belongs to Allah' They conceal in themselves what they do not disclose to you.
draft: Say: "The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep hidden in their hearts what they do not reveal to you. They say: "If we had anything to decide about the matter, we would not have been killed here."
hil: Say: 'The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep hidden in their hearts what they do not reveal to you. They say: 'If we had anything to decide about the matter, we would not have been killed here.''
compare: Say: "The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep hidden in their hearts what they do not reveal to you. They say: "If we had anything to decide about the matter, we would not have been killed here."

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt.
ref: But Allah saved (you).
draft: But Allah has preserved (you).
hil: But Allah has preserved (you).
compare: But Allah has preserved (you).

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben und zu ihren Brüdern sagten, als diese sich auf Handelsreisen oder Feldzügen befanden: "Wären sie bei uns geblieben, wären sie weder gestorben, noch getötet worden." (Sagt es nicht), damit ALLAH dies als Bitterkeit (nur) in ihren Herzen bleiben läßt. Und ALLAH (alleine) macht lebendig und läßt sterben. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: O People who Believe!
