ref: What, have they not considered within themselves?
draft: Did they not think about themselves?!
hil: Did they not think about themselves?!
compare: Did they not think about themselves?!

src: Und die frohe Botschaft gib den Demütigen
ref: Give good tidings to those who bow in obedience to God,
draft: And the good news give to the humble.
hil: Give the good news to the humble.
compare: Give the good news to the humble.

src: Das Gleichnis derer, denen die Thora auferlegt wurde, und die ihr dann nicht nachlebten, ist wie das Gleichnis eines Esels, der Bücher trägt. Übel steht es um die Leute, die Allahs Zeichen leugnen. Und Allah rechtleitet kein ungerechtes Volk.
ref: The example of those who were entrusted with the Taurat, and did not carry out its commands, is like the donkey carrying books; what a wretched example is of the people who denied the signs of Allah; and Allah does not guide the unjust.
draft: The parable of those to whom the Torah was given but who did not uphold it is like a donkey carrying books. It is a bad situation for those who deny Allah's signs, and Allah does not guide an unjust people.
hil: The parable of those to whom the Torah was given but who did not uphold it is like a donkey carrying books. It is a bad situation for those who deny Allah's signs, and Allah does not guide an unjust people.
compare: The parable of those to whom the Torah was given but who did not uphold it is like a donkey carrying books. It is a bad situation for those who deny Allah's signs, and Allah does not guide an unjust people.

src: Und WIR wiesen dem Menschen zu, seinen Eltern Ihsan zu erweisen. Seine Mutter war schwanger mit ihm in Angestrengtheit und brachte ihn zur Welt in Angestrengtheit.
ref: We have enjoined on man to be good to his parents: His mother carries him in her womb with hardship, and gives birth to him in pain.
draft: And WE have enjoined unto man concerning his parents. His mother beareth him with reluctance, and bringeth him forth with reluctance.
hil: And WE have enjoined upon man to do Ihsan to his parents. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship.
compare: And WE have enjoined upon man to do Ihsan to his parents. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship.

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz!
ref: They said, “O governor!
draft: They said: "Al-'aziz!"
hil: They said, "Al-'aziz!"
compare: They said: "Al-'aziz!"

src: Und euer HERR ist gewiß Der Allgnade Erweisende.
ref: Surely your Lord is Ar-Rahman.
draft: And your LORD is certainly The One who shows all-grace.
hil: And your Lord is certainly The One who shows all-grace.
compare: And your LORD is certainly The One who shows all-grace.

src: Und wenn du sie fragst, wer die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und die Sonne und den Mond dienstbar gemacht hat, sagen sie bestimmt: «Gott.» Wie leicht lassen sie sich doch abwenden!
ref: And if you ask them, “Who created the heavens and the earth, and subjected the sun and the moon?”, they will surely say, “Allah”; so where are they reverting?
draft: And if you ask them who created the heavens and the earth, and made the sun and the moon subservient, they will certainly say, "God." How easily they are turned away!
hil: If you ask them: 'Who created the heavens and the earth, and who set the sun and the moon to work?' They will answer: 'God.' They are so easily turned away!
compare: If you ask them: 'Who created the heavens and the earth, and who set the sun and the moon to work?' They will answer: 'God.' They are so easily turned away!

src: Und wenn die Menschen (vor Mir) versammelt werden, werden sie ihre Feinde sein und ihre Anbetung verleugnen.
ref: When all men are gathered together (on that Day) they will become their enemies and deny their worship.
draft: And when the people are gathered (before Me), they will be their enemies and deny their worship.
hil: And when the people are gathered (before Me), they will be their enemies and deny their worship.
compare: And when the people are gathered (before Me), they will be their enemies and deny their worship.

src: Sag: "Ja!
ref: Say: "Yes!
draft: Say: "Yes!"
hil: Say, 'Yes!'
compare: Say: "Yes!"

src: Als er zu seinem Vater sagte: "Mein Vater! Weshalb betest du etwas an, das weder sieht, noch hört, noch von dir irgend etwas abwenden kann?
ref: Remember, when he said to his father: "O my father, why do you worship that which can neither hear nor see nor even profit you the least?
draft: When he said to his father, "My Father! Why do you worship something that neither sees nor hears nor can turn away anything from you?"
hil: When he said to his father, 'My father! Why do you worship something that neither sees nor hears nor can turn away anything from you?'
compare: When he said to his father, "My Father! Why do you worship something that neither sees nor hears nor can turn away anything from you?"

src: sie würden gewiß sagen: "Nur unsere Blicke sind benommen; wahrlich, man hat uns nur etwas vorgegaukelt."
ref: They will say all the same: "Our eyes were dazed (and clouded over). We were a people ensorcelled."
draft: They would certainly say: "Only our gazes are numb; truly, we have only been shown something."
hil: They would certainly say: 'Only our gazes are numb; truly, we have only been shown something.'
compare: They would certainly say: "Only our gazes are numb; truly, we have only been shown something."

src: Es ist so! Denn ALLAH wandelt keine Gabe (in Bestrafung) um, die ER Leuten beschert hat, bis sie sich selbst (zum Schlechten) verändern.
ref: That is so because Allah will never change a grace which He has bestowed on a people until they change what is in their ownselves.
draft: It is so! Because ALLAH does not turn a gift (into punishment) that HE has bestowed on people until they themselves (change for the worse).
hil: It is so! Because ALLAH does not turn a gift (into punishment) that HE has bestowed on people until they themselves (change for the worse).
compare: It is so! Because ALLAH does not turn a gift (into punishment) that HE has bestowed on people until they themselves (change for the worse).

src: Ihr Menschen! Esst von dem, was auf Erden ist, an genießbaren Halalmitteln, und folgt nicht den Fußstapfen des Satans!
ref: O men, eat only the things of the earth that are lawful and good.
draft: "Oh mankind! Eat from what is on the earth, that is lawful and good, and do not follow the footsteps of Satan."
hil: O men, eat of what is in the earth lawful and good, and follow not the steps of Satan; he is a manifest foe to you.
compare: "Oh mankind! Eat from what is on the earth, that is lawful and good, and do not follow the footsteps of Satan."

src: Sagt: "Wollt ihr mit uns über ALLAH disputieren, wo ER unser und euer HERR ist, und wo uns unsere Taten und euch eure Taten gehören, und wo wir Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig sind?!"
ref: Say: "Why do you dispute with us about God when He is equally your Lord and our Lord? To us belong our actions, to you yours; and we are true to Him."
draft: Say: "Do you want to dispute with us about ALLAH, while HE is our and your LORD, and while our deeds and your deeds belong to us, and while we are sincere to Him?!"
hil: Say: "Do you want to dispute with us about ALLAH, while HE is our and your LORD, and while our deeds and your deeds belong to us, and while we are sincere to Him?!"
compare: Say: "Do you want to dispute with us about ALLAH, while HE is our and your LORD, and while our deeds and your deeds belong to us, and while we are sincere to Him?!"

src: Und WIR ließen sie in Unsere Gnade eintreten.
ref: And they were admitted to Our grace.
draft: And we let them enter into our mercy.
hil: And we allowed them to enter into Our grace.
compare: And we let them enter into our mercy.

src: Auch hat mein Bruder Aaron eine redegewandtere Zunge. So sende ihn mit mir zur Unterstützung, daß er mich bestätige. Ich fürchte, daß sie mich der Lüge zeihen.»
ref: So send my brother Aaron with me as helper for he is more fluent than I with words, that he should affirm me, for I fear that they would call me a liar."
draft: Also, my brother Aaron has a more eloquent tongue. So send him with me for support so that he can confirm me. I'm afraid they will accuse me of lying.
hil: Also, my brother Aaron has a more eloquent tongue. So send him with me for support so that he can confirm me. I fear they will accuse me of lying.
compare: Also, my brother Aaron has a more eloquent tongue. So send him with me for support so that he can confirm me. I'm afraid they will accuse me of lying.

src: Immer wieder wenn sie aus ihr (Dschahannam) aus einer Drangsal herausgehen wollten, werden sie wieder zu ihr zurückgeschickt.
ref: Whenever in their anguish they try to get out of it, they are restored to it.
draft: Again and again, when they wanted to get out of it (Jahannam) out of distress, they are sent back to it again.
hil: Again and again, when they wanted to get out of it (Jahannam) out of distress, they are sent back to it again.
compare: Again and again, when they wanted to get out of it (Jahannam) out of distress, they are sent back to it again.

src: Und solltest du diejenigen sehen, die über Unsere Ayat lästern, so wende dich von ihnen (so lange) ab, bis sie zu einem anderen Thema übergehen.
ref: When you see them argue about Our messages, withdraw from their company until they begin to talk of other things.
draft: And if you see those who ridicule Our verses, then avoid them until they change the subject.
hil: And if you see those who ridicule Our verses, then avoid them until they change the subject.
compare: And if you see those who ridicule Our verses, then avoid them until they change the subject.

src: Er aber erklärte (es) für Lüge und war ungehorsam.
ref: But (the Pharaoh) disavowed and disobeyed.
draft: But he declared (it) a lie and was disobedient.
hil: But he declared it a lie and was disobedient.
compare: But he declared (it) a lie and was disobedient.

src: Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?! Auch der Warner kam zu euch.
ref: But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you?
draft: Have WE not granted you a long lifetime during which the one who wanted to remember could remember?! The Warner also came to you.
hil: Have We not granted you a long life span during which one who wished to remember could remember? The Warner also came to you.
compare: Have WE not granted you a long lifetime during which the one who wanted to remember could remember?! The Warner also came to you.

src: Der Satan ist gegen den Erbarmer widerspenstig.
ref: Verily Satan was disobedient to Ar-Rahman.
draft: The devil is rebellious against the Merciful.
hil: The Devil is rebellious against the Merciful.
compare: The devil is rebellious against the Merciful.

src: Und (auch) diejenigen unter diesen da, die Unrecht tun, werden die bösen Taten treffen, die sie begangen haben.
ref: So will the evil deeds of those who are sinners among them recoil back on them.
draft: And (also) those among them who do wrong will be met with the evil deeds they have committed.
hil: "And those among them who do wrong will be met with the evil deeds they have committed."
compare: And (also) those among them who do wrong will be met with the evil deeds they have committed.

src: Euer Besitz und eure Kinder sind nur eine Versuchung; Allah aber - bei Ihm gibt es großartigen Lohn.
ref: Your wealth and children are surely meant as trial for you: But with God is the great reward.
draft: Your possessions and your children are only a temptation, but Allah- with Him is great reward.
hil: Your possessions and your children are but a trial, whereas Allah- with Him is a vast reward.
compare: Your possessions and your children are but a trial, whereas Allah- with Him is a vast reward.

src: Und dort vor Salomo wurden dessen Heerscharen der Ginn und Menschen und Vögel versammelt, und sie standen in Reih und Glied geordnet
ref: His armies of jinns and men and Tair assembled, formed into ranks, (and marched)
draft: And there, in front of Solomon, his armies of jinn, humans, and birds were gathered, and they stood in orderly rows.
hil: And there, in front of Solomon, his armies of jinn, humans, and birds were gathered, and they stood in orderly rows.
compare: And there, in front of Solomon, his armies of jinn, humans, and birds were gathered, and they stood in orderly rows.

src: Das ist der Tag, an dem sie nicht reden
ref: They will not be able to speak that day,
draft: This is the day they don't speak."
hil: "That is the day on which they do not speak."
compare: This is the day they don't speak."

src: Vielmehr sind es geehrte Diener.
ref: (Those whom they think are God's sons) are only His honorable servants.
draft: Rather, they are honored servants.
hil: It is rather honorable servants.
compare: Rather, they are honored servants.

src: Sie werden ihrem Herrn begegnen. Allein, ich erachte euch für ein Volk, das unwissend ist.
ref: Surely, they are going to meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people that are ignorant.
draft: "You will meet your lord. However, I consider you to be a people who are ignorant."
hil: They will meet their Lord. But, I consider you to be an ignorant people.
compare: "You will meet your lord. However, I consider you to be a people who are ignorant."

src: Auch ist es eine Erinnerung für die Mumin.
ref: You are to warn with it—and a reminder for the believers.
draft: Also, it is a reminder for the Moomins.
hil: It is also a reminder for the believers.
compare: Also, it is a reminder for the Moomins.

src: So kehre dich von ihnen ab; du bist (hierin) nicht zu tadeln.
ref: Turn away from them. You will not be blamed.
draft: Therefore, turn away from them; you are not to blame for this.
hil: Therefore, turn away from them, you are not to be blamed for this.
compare: Therefore, turn away from them; you are not to blame for this.

src: Du versuchst nur, ein Tyrann im Land zu werden, und du willst kein Friedensstifter sein."
ref: You only want to be a tyrant in the land and no peacemaker."
draft: "You're just trying to become a tyrant in the country and you don't want to be a peacemaker."
hil: You are only trying to become a tyrant in the country and you do not want to be a peacemaker.
compare: "You're just trying to become a tyrant in the country and you don't want to be a peacemaker."

src: Ob er wohl (die Botschaft) für Lüge erklärt und sich abkehrt?
ref: If he cries lies, and turns away -
draft: Whether he declares (the message) as a lie and turns away?
hil: Whether he declares (the message) as a lie and turns away?
compare: Whether he declares (the message) as a lie and turns away?

src: Allah hatte ja mit den Kinder Isra'ils ein Abkommen getroffen. Und Wir beriefen von ihnen zwölf Obmänner.
ref: God covenanted the people of Israel and raised twelve leaders among them, and said: "I shall verily be with you.
draft: "Allah had made an agreement with the Children of Israel. And We appointed twelve leaders among them."
hil: Indeed, Allah had entered into a covenant with the Children of Israel, and We appointed twelve leaders from among them.
compare: "Allah had made an agreement with the Children of Israel. And We appointed twelve leaders among them."

src: Und gewiß, ich denke doch über dich, du Pharao! - daß du verleitet bist."
ref: I truly think, O Pharaoh, your days are done."
draft: "And surely, I am thinking about you, you Pharaoh! - that you are misled."
hil: "Surely, I am thinking about you, Pharaoh, that you are misled."
compare: "Surely, I am thinking about you, Pharaoh, that you are misled."

src: Laß Mich in Ruhe mit denen, die diese Botschaft für Lüge erklären.
ref: So leave those who deny this Discourse to Me.
draft: Please let me alone with those who declare this message to be a lie.
hil: Leave me alone with those who declare this message a lie.
compare: Leave me alone with those who declare this message a lie.

src: Geh hinaus. Du gehörst zu den Erniedrigten.»
ref: Go, and away; you are one of the damned."
draft: "Go out. You belong to the humiliated ones."
hil: Go out. You belong to the humiliated ones.
compare: "Go out. You belong to the humiliated ones."

src: Und Gott zürnt ihm und verflucht ihn und bereitet ihm eine gewaltige Pein.
ref: For him a greater punishment awaits.
draft: And God is angry with him and curses him and prepares a great torment for him.
hil: God becomes angry with him and curses him and prepares a great torment for him.
compare: God becomes angry with him and curses him and prepares a great torment for him.

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, die glauben und deren Herzen im Gedenken Allahs Ruhe finden.
ref: “Those who accepted faith and whose hearts gain solace from the remembrance of Allah; pay heed!
draft: (They are) those who believe and find tranquility in the remembrance of Allah in their hearts.
hil: Those who believe and find tranquility in the contemplation of God in their hearts, surely, in the contemplation of God, hearts find peace!
compare: (They are) those who believe and find tranquility in the remembrance of Allah in their hearts.

src: Die Entscheidungsträger vom Pharaos Leuten sagten: "Gewiß, dieser ist doch ein im Wissen fundierter Magier!
ref: The nobles of Pharaoh said: "He surely is a clever magician.
draft: "The decision makers of the pharaoh's people said: "Certainly, this is a magician based in knowledge!"
hil: "The decision makers of the pharaoh's people said, 'Certainly, this is a magician based in knowledge!'".
compare: "The decision makers of the pharaoh's people said, 'Certainly, this is a magician based in knowledge!'".

src: Sie (die Königin) sagte: "Ihr Vornehmen, ein ehrenvoller Brief ist mir überbracht worden.
ref: (The Queen said): "O nobles, a venerable letter has been delivered to me.
draft: She (the queen) said: "Your Excellency, an honorable letter has been brought to me."
hil: She (the queen) said, 'Your Excellency, an honorable letter has been brought to me.'
compare: She (the queen) said: "Your Excellency, an honorable letter has been brought to me."

src: Dann bezichtigten sie ihn der Lüge, dann verletzten sie ihm (dem Kamelweibchen) die Beine, dann richtete ihr HERR sie wegen ihrer Verfehlung zugrunde, dann ließ ER es ihnen gleichmäßig sein.
ref: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
draft: Then they accused him of lying, then they injured (the female camel) its legs, then their LORD brought them to ruin for their transgression, then HE made it equal for them.
hil: Then they accused him of lying, then they injured (the female camel) its legs, then their LORD brought them to ruin for their transgression, then HE made it equal for them.
compare: Then they accused him of lying, then they injured (the female camel) its legs, then their LORD brought them to ruin for their transgression, then HE made it equal for them.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Unrecht begingen, die Peinigung gesehen haben, wird diese ihnen weder erleichtert, noch wird ihnen Zeitaufschub gewährt.
ref: And when the wicked shall face the torment it will not be decreased, nor will they be reprieved.
draft: And when those who committed injustice see the punishment, it will neither be made easier for them nor will they be granted a respite.
hil: Do not enter the residences of the prophet unless permission is given to you for a meal, without waiting for the time of its preparation - but if you are invited, then enter, and when you have eaten, then depart - and without making yourselves comfortable in a conversation.
compare: And when those who committed injustice see the punishment, it will neither be made easier for them nor will they be granted a respite.

src: Ihre Angelegenheit unterliegt nur ALLAH, dann wird ER ihnen das kundtun, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: Their affair is with God. He will tell them the truth of what they were doing.
draft: Your matter is subject only to Allah, then He will inform them of what they used to do.
hil: Your matter is subject only to Allah, then He will inform them of what they used to do.
compare: Your matter is subject only to Allah, then He will inform them of what they used to do.

src: So ließen Wir die einen von ihnen auf die anderen folgen und machten sie zu(m Gegenstand von) Geschichten. Weg darum mit Leuten, die nicht glauben!
ref: So oft as there came unto a community their apostle, they belied him, so We made them follow one anot her, and We made them bywords: so away with a people who believe not!
draft: So we let some of them follow others and made them the subject of stories. So away with people who do not believe!
hil: "Thus, We let some of them follow the others and made them the subject of stories. So away with those who do not believe!"
compare: "Thus, We let some of them follow the others and made them the subject of stories. So away with those who do not believe!"

src: Bis auf eine alte Frau unter denen, die zurückblieben und dem Verderben anheimfielen.
ref: Except one old woman who remained behind.
draft: Except for an old woman among those who remained and fell into ruin.
hil: The only exception was an old woman among those who remained and fell into ruin.
compare: The only exception was an old woman among those who remained and fell into ruin.

src: Der Mensch ist ja eilfertig.
ref: Curse him, etc." and that one should not do, but one should be patient].
draft: The human is indeed eager.
hil: Man is indeed hasty.
compare: Man is indeed hasty.

src: Allah wird sie bald in Seine Barmherzigkeit einführen. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allvergebend, Barmherzig.
ref: This is certainly a means of achieving nearness (to God), and God will admit them to His mercy, for God is forgiving and kind.
draft: "Allah will soon introduce them into His mercy. Truly, Allah is All-Forgiving, Merciful."
hil: Soon Allah will lead them into His mercy. Truly, Allah is All-Forgiving, Merciful.
compare: Soon Allah will lead them into His mercy. Truly, Allah is All-Forgiving, Merciful.

src: In Deiner Hand ist das Gute; wahrlich, Du hast Macht über alle Dinge.
ref: All goodness is Yours (entirely). Indeed You have the power over all things.
draft: In your hand is the good; truly, you have power over all things.
hil: In your hand is the good; surely, you have power over all things.
compare: In your hand is the good; truly, you have power over all things.

src: ALLAH möge euch vergeben.
ref: God will forgive you.
draft: May Allah forgive you.
hil: May Allah forgive you.
compare: May Allah forgive you.

src: Und auswirft, was in ihr ist, und somit ganz leer wird
ref: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,
draft: And throws out what is inside her and thus becomes completely empty.
hil: And throws out what is inside her and thus becomes completely empty.
compare: And throws out what is inside her and thus becomes completely empty.

src: Und sie sagen: "Wann wird dieses Versprechen (verwirklicht werden), wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid?"
ref: They say: "When is this promise going to come, if what you say is true?"
draft: And they say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
hil: And they say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
compare: And they say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"

src: Vielmehr wissen die meisten von ihnen nicht.
ref: Nay, most of them know not.
draft: Most of them don't know, rather.
hil: Rather, most of them do not know.
compare: Most of them don't know, rather.

src: Die Vergeltung für diejenigen unter euch, die dies tun, ist nichts als Schande im diesseitigen Leben, und am Tag der Auferstehung werden sie der härtesten Pein zugeführt werden. Und Gott läßt nicht unbeachtet, was ihr tut.
ref: There is no other award for them who so act but disgrace in the world, and on the Day of Judgement the severest of punishment; for God is not heedless of all that you do.
draft: The retribution for those among you who do such is nothing but disgrace in this earthly life, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be subjected to the harshest punishment. And God does not overlook what you do.
hil: The retribution for those among you who do such is nothing but disgrace in this earthly life, and on the Day of Resurrection, they will be subjected to the harshest punishment. And God does not overlook what you do.
compare: The retribution for those among you who do such is nothing but disgrace in this earthly life, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be subjected to the harshest punishment. And God does not overlook what you do.

src: Und wenn sie um Hilfe rufen, wird Ihrem Hilferuf entsprochen mit Wasser wie das Geschmolzene, das die Gesichter schmort.
ref: If they ask for water they will be helped to liquid like molten brass that would scald their mouths.
draft: And when they call for help, their cry for help is answered with water like that which boils faces.
hil: And if they cry for help, their cry will be answered with water like the melted that scorches faces.
compare: And if they cry for help, their cry will be answered with water like the melted that scorches faces.

src: Ihr Menschen! Bereits ist zu euch doch ein Gesandter mit der Wahrheit von eurem HERRN gekommen, so verinnerlicht den Iman, dies ist besser für euch.
ref: O men, the Messenger has now come to you with the truth from your Lord; so believe; better is it for you.
draft: "O mankind! There has come to you a Messenger with the truth from your Lord, so believe in Him; that is better for you."
hil: O mankind! A Messenger has come to you with the truth from your Lord, so believe in him; this is better for you.
compare: O mankind! A Messenger has come to you with the truth from your Lord, so believe in him; this is better for you.

src: Uns beeilen, ihnen gute Dinge (zu gewähren)? Aber nein! Sie merken nicht.
ref: We provide them with the means of competing with each other in virtuous deeds, but they do not realize this.
draft: Hurry up to grant them good things? But no! They don't notice.
hil: Hurry up to grant them good things? But no! They do not notice.
compare: Hurry up to grant them good things? But no! They do not notice.

src: Nein, sondern wir glauben, daß ihr Lügner seid!"
ref: In fact, we think you are a liar."
draft: No, but we believe that you are liars!
hil: No, but we believe that you are liars!
compare: No, but we believe that you are liars!

src: Dient eurem HERRN, Der euch erschuf und diejenigen vor euch, damit ihr Taqwa gemäß handelt.
ref: Worship your Lord, Who has created you and those before you, in the hope of attaining piety.
draft: Serve your Lord who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous.
hil: Serve your Lord who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous.
compare: Serve your Lord who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous.

src: Und stifteten darin viel Unheil.
ref: And multiplied corruption.
draft: And caused much harm therein.
hil: And caused much harm therein.
compare: And caused much harm therein.

src: Betreiben sie etwa Schirk mit dem, was Nichts schafft, während sie alle doch erschaffen werden?!
ref: Do they associate those with Him who cannot create a thing, and are themselves created,
draft: Do you operate Schirk with that which creates nothing, while you all are indeed created?!
hil: Do they commit Shirk with what creates nothing, while all of them will surely be created?
compare: Do you operate Schirk with that which creates nothing, while you all are indeed created?!

src: Da ergriff sie Gott wegen ihrer Sünden.
ref: But Allah seized them with punishment for their sins.
draft: She was seized by God because of her sins.
hil: It is like the case of those who were seized by God for their sins.
compare: She was seized by God because of her sins.

src: Dies sind Allahs Grenzen, so übertretet sie nicht! Wer aber Allahs Grenzen übertritt, diejenigen sind die Ungerechten.
ref: Do not exceed the limits of God, for those who exceed the bounds set by God are transgressors.
draft: These are Allah's borders, so do not cross them! But whoever crosses Allah's borders, they are the unjust.
hil: These are the limits of Allah, so do not transgress them! But those who transgress the limits of Allah, they are the unjust.
compare: These are Allah's borders, so do not cross them! But whoever crosses Allah's borders, they are the unjust.

src: Euch wird euer Lohn am Tag der Auferstehung voll erstattet.
ref: And only on the Day of Resurrection shall you be paid your wages in full.
draft: You will be fully reimbursed your reward on the Day of Resurrection.
hil: You will be fully reimbursed your reward on the Day of Resurrection.
compare: You will be fully reimbursed your reward on the Day of Resurrection.

src: Doch wenn ihr Kufr betreibt, so ist Meine Peinigung gewiß qualvoll."
ref: My punishment is dire.
draft: "But if you commit disbelief, then surely My punishment is painful."
hil: But if you engage in disbelief, then surely My punishment is painful.
compare: "But if you commit disbelief, then surely My punishment is painful."

src: Und für euch gibt es anstelle von ALLAH weder Wali, noch Beistehenden.
ref: And you have not besides Allah any protector or helper.
draft: And for you there is no protector or helper instead of Allah.
hil: And for you there is neither protector nor helper instead of Allah.
compare: And for you there is no protector or helper instead of Allah.

src: Und für diejenigen, welche die gottmißfälligen Taten intrigieren, ist eine harte Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: To Him ascend (all) the goodly words, and the righteous deeds exalt it (the goodly words i.e. the goodly words are not accepted by Allah unless and until they are followed by good deeds), but those who plot evils, theirs will be severe torment.
draft: And for those who conspire the disapproved actions, a harsh punishment is determined.
hil: And for those who conspire to commit the disapproved actions, a harsh punishment is destined.
compare: And for those who conspire to commit the disapproved actions, a harsh punishment is destined.

src: Doch solltet ihr euch abwenden, so fürchte ich doch für euch die Peinigung eines langen Tages.
ref: But if you turn away, I fear the punishment of a terrible Day for you.
draft: But if you turn away, I fear for you the torment of a long day.
hil: But if you turn away, I fear for you the torment of a long day.
compare: But if you turn away, I fear for you the torment of a long day.

src: Es sind aber nur die Ungläubigen, die Unsere Zeichen leugnen.
ref: Only those who are infidels will deny it.
draft: But only the unbelievers deny Our signs.
hil: But it is only the disbelievers who deny Our signs.
compare: But it is only the disbelievers who deny Our signs.

src: Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER! ER ist ALLAH, Der Einzige, Der Allbezwingende.
ref: Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
draft: Praised and exalted is HE! HE is ALLAH, the only one, the conqueror of all.
hil: Praised and exalted is HE! HE is ALLAH, the only one, the conqueror of all.
compare: Praised and exalted is HE! HE is ALLAH, the only one, the conqueror of all.

src: Also gräme dich nicht wegen der fisq-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: So do not grieve for these, the wicked people."
draft: "Do not worry about the people who cause fisq."
hil: Do not grieve because of the people who engage in disobedience.
compare: "Do not worry about the people who cause fisq."

src: Aber dir gehört es, zu befehlen.
ref: It is for you to decide.
draft: But it's up to you to command.
hil: But it's up to you to command.
compare: But it's up to you to command.

src: Sie sind doch im Zweifel über die Begegnung mit ihrem HERRN.
ref: They are in doubt concerning the Meeting with their Lord? (i.e. Resurrection after their deaths, and their return to their Lord).
draft: You are uncertain about meeting your LORD.
hil: They are uncertain about meeting their Lord.
compare: You are uncertain about meeting your LORD.

src: Und der Gesandte sagt: "O mein Herr, mein Volk mied diesen Qur'an unter Mißachtung."
ref: The prophet will say: "O my Lord, my people had fettered the Qur'an."
draft: And the envoy says: "Oh my Lord, my people avoided this Qur'an with contempt."
hil: The Messenger says: "Oh my Lord, my people avoided this Qur'an with contempt."
compare: The Messenger says: "Oh my Lord, my people avoided this Qur'an with contempt."

src: So haben Wir ihn als klare Zeichen hinabgesandt, und (es ist so,) daß Allah rechtleitet, wen Er will.
ref: That is why We have sent down these clear revelations, for God gives guidance whomsoever He please.
draft: So We sent him down as clear evidence, and (it is) that Allah guides whom He wills.
hil: Thus have We sent him down as clear signs, and Allah guides whom He wills.
compare: So We sent him down as clear evidence, and (it is) that Allah guides whom He wills.

src: So wendet euch nicht als Schuldige ab."
ref: So do not turn away from Him as sinners."
draft: "So don't turn away as guilty."
hil: So do not turn away as guilty.
compare: So do not turn away as guilty.

src: Und dein HERR genügt als Wakil."
ref: Thy Lord suffices as a guardian.
draft: "And your Lord is sufficient as a Guardian."
hil: And your Lord is sufficient as a Guardian.
compare: "And your Lord is sufficient as a Guardian."

src: Dem, der Gutes vollbringt, wird Besseres als das zuteil sein, und sie werden vor dem Schrecken an jenem Tag sicher sein.
ref: Whoever comes with good (deeds) will receive better than (what he had done), and be safe that day from terror.
draft: To him who does good deeds, better things will be given than those, and they will be secure from terror on that day.
hil: Those who do good deeds will be granted something better than that, and they will be secure from terror on that day.
compare: Those who do good deeds will be granted something better than that, and they will be secure from terror on that day.

src: Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: And did they do that which they are exhorted to do, it would be for them better and more strengthening.
draft: "And if they had done what they were exhorted to do, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them even more (in faith)."
hil: If only they had done what they were exhorted to do, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them even more (in faith).
compare: If only they had done what they were exhorted to do, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them even more (in faith).

src: um undankbar zu sein für das, was Wir ihnen gegeben haben, und um zu genießen; sie werden (es noch) erfahren.
ref: And deny what We had given them, in order to go on enjoying themselves. They will come to know soon.
draft: To be ungrateful for what We have given them and to enjoy it; they will (still) experience it.
hil: To be ungrateful for what We have given them and to enjoy it; they will (still) experience it.
compare: To be ungrateful for what We have given them and to enjoy it; they will (still) experience it.

src: (Aber) gewiß, Meine List ist fest.
ref: Verily, My Plan is strong.
draft: (But) indeed, my cunning is strong.
hil: (But) indeed, my strategy is solid.
compare: (But) indeed, my strategy is solid.

src: Ihnen genügt Dschahannam, sie werden darin hineingeworfen.
ref: Hell is enough for them. They will roast in it.
draft: They suffice for you Jahannam, they will be thrown into it.
hil: Jahannam is enough for them, they will be thrown into it.
compare: Jahannam is enough for them, they will be thrown into it.

src: Das ist Allah, euer Herr. Segensreich ist darum Allah, der Herr der Welten.
ref: That then is God, your Lord, so blessed be God, the Lord of all Being.
draft: This is Allah, your Lord. Therefore, Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, is blessed.
hil: He is Allah, your Lord. Therefore, Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, is blessed.
compare: He is Allah, your Lord. Therefore, Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, is blessed.

src: Allah wird ganz gewiß diejenigen kennen, die die Wahrheit sprechen, und Er wird ganz gewiß die Lügner kennen.
ref: So Allah will surely know those who are true and He will surely know the liars.
draft: Allah will surely know those who speak the truth, and He will surely know the liars.
hil: Allah will surely know those who speak the truth, and He will surely know the liars.
compare: Allah will surely know those who speak the truth, and He will surely know the liars.

src: (Ihre Abneigung gegen diese Einteilung von Al-anfal ist) genauso (wie damals), als dein HERR dich aus deiner Wohnstätte mit der Wahrheit herausführen ließ, während eine Gruppe von den Mumin gewiß dem doch abgeneigt war.
ref: As your Lord sent you from your home (to fight) for the true cause, a section of the faithful were averse,
draft: (Your aversion to this classification of Al-anfal is) just like (back then), when your Lord brought you out of your dwelling with the truth, while a group of the faithful were surely averse to it.
hil: Your aversion to this classification of Al-anfal is just like back then, when your Lord brought you out of your dwelling with the truth, while a group of the faithful were surely averse to it.
compare: (Your aversion to this classification of Al-anfal is) just like (back then), when your Lord brought you out of your dwelling with the truth, while a group of the faithful were surely averse to it.

src: Die Kaffara dafür ist die Speisung von zehn Bedürftigen in jenem Maß, wie ihr die Eurigen im Durchschnitt speist, oder Ihre Bekleidung oder die Befreiung eines Unfreien.
ref: The atonement for it is by feeding ten needy people from the average of what you feed your families, or by clothing them, or by freeing a slave.
draft: The Kaffara for it is the feeding of ten needy people to the extent that you feed your own or your clothing or the liberation of a slave.
hil: The Kaffara for it is the feeding of ten needy people to the extent that you feed your own or your clothing or the liberation of a slave.
compare: The Kaffara for it is the feeding of ten needy people to the extent that you feed your own or your clothing or the liberation of a slave.

src: Gewiß, sie waren jungeMänner, die den Iman an ihren HERRN verinnerlichten, undWIR ließen sie noch mehr Rechtleitung gewinnen.
ref: They were a few young men who believed in their Lord; so We gave them greater guidance.
draft: Certainly, they were young men who internalized the faith in their Lord, and we allowed them to gain even more guidance.
hil: Certainly, they were young men who internalized faith in their Lord, and we allowed them to gain even more guidance.
compare: Certainly, they were young men who internalized faith in their Lord, and we allowed them to gain even more guidance.

src: Aber der Lohn des Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für diejenigen, die glauben und gottesfürchtig sind.
ref: And certainly the recompense of the life to come is better for those who believe and follow the right path.
draft: But the reward of the hereafter is truly better for those who believe and are God-conscious.
hil: But the reward of the hereafter is truly better for those who believe and are God-conscious.
compare: But the reward of the hereafter is truly better for those who believe and are God-conscious.

src: ER trifft damit von Seinen Dienern, wen ER will.
ref: He makes it reach whomever He wills of His servants.
draft: He meets whoever He wants of His servants with that.
hil: He meets whom He wills of His servants.
compare: He meets whoever He wants of His servants with that.

src: Und Wir legten zwischen ihnen und den Städten, die Wir gesegnet haben, sichtbare Städte an.
ref: We placed other prominent towns between them, the towns that We had blessed and had set well-measured stages between them.
draft: And We placed visible cities between them and the cities which We have blessed.
hil: And We have placed visible cities between them and the cities that We have blessed.
compare: And We placed visible cities between them and the cities which We have blessed.

src: Wahrlich, Allah ist über alle Dinge Allwissend.
ref: Verily God has knowledge of everything.
draft: Truly, Allah is All-Knowing of all things.
hil: Truly, Allah is All-Knowing of all things.
compare: Truly, Allah is All-Knowing of all things.

src: Ha Mim.
ref: HA MIM.
draft: "By the clear Book"
hil: "By the Book"
compare: "By the Book"

src: Die Engel und Gabriel steigen zu Ihm auf in einem Tage, dessen Ausmaß fünfzigtausend Jahre beträgt.
ref: To whom the angels and the soul take a day to ascend, whose length is fifty thousand years.
draft: The angels and Gabriel ascend to Him in a day whose extent is fifty thousand years.
hil: The angels and Gabriel ascend to Him in a day whose extent is fifty thousand years.
compare: The angels and Gabriel ascend to Him in a day whose extent is fifty thousand years.

src: Seine Leute kamen eilig zu ihm getrieben. Zuvor pflegten sie böse Taten zu begehen.
ref: And his people came to him, running towards him; and erstwhile they had been doing evil deeds.
draft: His people came hastily driven to him. Previously, they used to commit evil deeds.
hil: The people came hastily driven to him. Previously, they used to commit evil deeds.
compare: His people came hastily driven to him. Previously, they used to commit evil deeds.

src: Und manche von ihnen bezichtigen dich (ungerechter Verteilung) der Sadaqa. Doch würde ihnen davon etwas gegeben, wären sie zufrieden. Aber wenn ihnen davon nichts gegeben wird, so sind sie wütend.
ref: And among them is one who slanders you regarding the distribution of charity; so if they receive some of it they would be happy – and if not, thereupon they get displeased!
draft: And some of them accuse you (of unfair distribution) of the Sadaqa. But if something were given to them, they would be satisfied. But if nothing is given to them, they are angry.
hil: And some of them accuse you (of unfair distribution) of Sadaqa. But if something were given to them, they would be satisfied. But if nothing is given to them, they become angry.
compare: And some of them accuse you (of unfair distribution) of the Sadaqa. But if something were given to them, they would be satisfied. But if nothing is given to them, they are angry.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Musa für seine Leute um Wasser bat, dann sagten WIR: "Schlage mit deinem Stock an den Felsen!" Dann entsprangen daraus zwölf Quellen, bereits kennt jede Gruppe ihre Trinkstelle. Esst und trinkt von ALLAHs Rizq und übertreibt nicht auf Erden als Verderben-Anrichtende!
ref: And when Moosa asked for water for his people, We said, “Strike this rock with your staff”; thereupon twelve springs gushed forth from it; each group recognised its drinking-place; “Eat and drink from what Allah has provided, and do not roam about the earth making turmoil in it.”
draft: And (remember) when Musa asked for water for his people, then WE said, "Strike the rock with your staff!" Then twelve springs gushed forth from it, each group already knowing their drinking place. Eat and drink from Allah's provision and do not act corruptly on the earth as mischief-makers!
hil: And (remember) when Musa asked for water for his people, then WE said, "Strike the rock with your staff!" Then twelve springs gushed forth from it, each group already knowing their drinking place. Eat and drink from Allah's provision and do not act corruptly on the earth as mischief-makers!
compare: And (remember) when Musa asked for water for his people, then WE said, "Strike the rock with your staff!" Then twelve springs gushed forth from it, each group already knowing their drinking place. Eat and drink from Allah's provision and do not act corruptly on the earth as mischief-makers!

src: Und esst und trinkt, bis für euch der weiße Faden (der Dämmerung) vom schwarzen Faden (der Nacht) unterscheidbar wird, dann vollendet das Siyam bis zur Nacht! Und werdet nicht intim mit ihnen, während ihr I'tikaf in den Moscheen vollzieht.
ref: And eat and drink, until the white thread shows clearly to you from the black thread at the dawn; then complete the Fast unto the night, and do not lie with them while you cleave to the mosques.
draft: And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black thread of night for you. Then complete the Siyam until nightfall. And do not be intimate with them while you are in I'tikaf in the mosques.
hil: And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black thread of night for you. Then complete the Siyam until nightfall! And do not be intimate with them while you are performing I'tikaf in the mosques.
compare: And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black thread of night for you. Then complete the Siyam until nightfall. And do not be intimate with them while you are in I'tikaf in the mosques.

src: So verinnerlicht den Iman an ALLAH und an Seine Gesandten.
ref: So have faith in Allah and His apostles, and do not say, ‘[God is] a trinity.’
draft: "So internalize the faith in ALLAH and His messengers."
hil: Have faith in Allah and His messengers.
compare: "So internalize the faith in ALLAH and His messengers."

src: Also esset von dem, was sie für euch fangen, und sprecht Allahs Namen darüber aus.
ref: So eat from what they catch for you, and pronounce God’s name over it.
draft: Also eat from what they catch for you, and mention the name of Allah on it.
hil: Therefore, eat of those beasts and birds of prey which you have trained as hounds, training and teaching them (to catch) in the manner as directed to you by Allah; mention the name of Allah over it, and fear Allah. Verily Allah is swift in reckoning.
compare: Also eat from what they catch for you, and mention the name of Allah on it.

src: Und keine lasttragende (Seele) nimmt die Last einer anderen auf sich.
ref: If you are grateful He will be pleased with you.
draft: And no load-bearing (soul) takes on the burden of another.
hil: And no load-bearing (soul) takes on the burden of another.
compare: And no load-bearing (soul) takes on the burden of another.

src: Und sie eilen dann zum Weg um die Wette, aber wie könnten sie da sehen?
ref: Then they would have raced along to cross the Bridge but how could they have seen (their way)?
draft: And then they hurry along the way as if in a race, but how could they see there?
hil: And they hurry then to the path like a race, but how could they see there?
compare: And then they hurry along the way as if in a race, but how could they see there?

src: Gewiß, ER ist Seinen Dienern gegenüber allkundig, allsehend.
ref: He is all-aware and all-seeing.
draft: Certainly, HE is all-knowing, all-seeing to his servants.
hil: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from Allah. Indeed, He initiates the creation, then repeats it, so that He may reward those who internalized faith and did good deeds in a fair manner. But for those who committed unbelief, there is a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to do.
compare: Certainly, HE is all-knowing, all-seeing to his servants.

src: Sie geben einander zum Trug prunkende Rede ein und hätte es dein Herr gewollt, hätten sie es nicht getan; so überlaß sie sich selbst mit dem, was sie erdichten.
ref: But if your Lord had willed they would not have done so. Pay no attention to them and to what they fabricate.
draft: They give each other deceitful pompous speeches, and had your lord wanted it, they would not have done so; so they left themselves to their own devices with what they create.
hil: They give each other deceitful pompous speeches, and had your Lord wanted it, they would not have done so; so they left themselves to their own devices with what they create.
compare: They give each other deceitful pompous speeches, and had your lord wanted it, they would not have done so; so they left themselves to their own devices with what they create.

src: Und gehöre nicht zu den Unachtsamen!
ref: Be not thou among the heedless.
draft: And do not belong to the careless ones!
hil: And do not be among the heedless!
compare: And do not belong to the careless ones!

src: Das ist Allahs Anordnung, die Er zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt hat.
ref: This is the commandment of God that is sent down to you.
draft: This is Allah's commandment that He has revealed to you.
hil: This is Allah's commandment that He has revealed to you.
compare: This is Allah's commandment that He has revealed to you.

src: Dann ist es an jenem Tag ein schwerer Tag,
ref: It will be a day of distress,
draft: Then it is a difficult day on that day.
hil: Then on that day, it will be a hard day.
compare: Then on that day, it will be a hard day.

src: So wartet ab! Ich gehöre mit euch zu den Abwartenden."
ref: So wait (for what is to come), I am waiting with you."
draft: "So wait! I belong with you to those who are waiting."
hil: So wait! I belong with you to those who are waiting.
compare: "So wait! I belong with you to those who are waiting."

src: Um damit Korn und Pflanzen hervorzubringen
ref: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,
draft: To produce grain and plants with it.
hil: To produce grain and plants with it.
compare: To produce grain and plants with it.

src: Gewiß, das Gebet hält davon ab, das Schändliche und das Verwerfliche (zu tun). Und das Gedenken Allahs ist wahrlich größer.
ref: Surely prayer keeps you away from the obscene and detestable, but the remembrance of God is greater far; and God knows what you do.
draft: Certainly, prayer prevents (one) from doing shameful and reprehensible (things). And the remembrance of Allah is truly greater.
hil: Certainly, prayer prevents from doing shameful and reprehensible (things). And the remembrance of Allah is truly greater.
compare: Certainly, prayer prevents (one) from doing shameful and reprehensible (things). And the remembrance of Allah is truly greater.

src: O die ihr glaubt, nehmt nicht die Ungläubigen anstatt der Gläubigen zu Schutzherren!
ref: O believers, do not hold unbelievers as friends in preference to the faithful.
draft: O you who believe, do not take the disbelievers as allies instead of the believers!
hil: O you who believe, do not take the disbelievers as allies instead of the believers!
compare: O you who believe, do not take the disbelievers as allies instead of the believers!

src: Sind beide im Gleichnis etwa gleich?!
ref: Can they be equal?
draft: Are both approximately equal in the parable?!
hil: Are both in the parable approximately equal?!
compare: Are both approximately equal in the parable?!

src: Er aber gab (dir) Macht über sie; und Allah ist Allwissend, Allweise.
ref: So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
draft: But He gave you power over them; and Allah is All-knowing, All-wise.
hil: He gave you power over them; and Allah is All-knowing, All-wise.
compare: But He gave you power over them; and Allah is All-knowing, All-wise.

src: Es ist wie mit den Leuten des Pharao und denen, die vor ihnen lebten: Sie erklärten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für Lüge, so ließen Wir sie für ihre Sünden verderben, und Wir ließen die Leute des Pharao ertrinken.
ref: Their case is like that of the people of Pharaoh and those before them: they rejected the signs of their Lord as false and so We destroyed them for their sins, and caused the people of Pharaoh to drown.
draft: It is like with the people of the pharaoh and those who lived before them: They declared the signs of their Lord to be lies, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We made the people of the pharaoh drown.
hil: It is like with the people of the pharaoh and those who lived before them: They declared the signs of their Lord to be lies, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We made the people of the pharaoh drown.
compare: It is like with the people of the pharaoh and those who lived before them: They declared the signs of their Lord to be lies, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We made the people of the pharaoh drown.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf. Und Er begann die Schöpfung des Menschen aus Ton.
ref: Who made all things He created excellent; and first fashioned man from clay,
draft: He who has made everything good that He created. And He began the creation of man from clay.
hil: "He who has made everything good that He created. And He began the creation of man from clay."
compare: He who has made everything good that He created. And He began the creation of man from clay.

src: Keineswegs haben sie ALLAH verherrlicht, wie es Ihm gebührt, als sie sagten: "ALLAH hat keinem Menschen irgend etwas hinabgesandt." Sag: "Wer hat denn die Schrift hinabgesandt, mit der Musa als Licht und als Rechtleitung für die Menschen kam?
ref: And they (the Jews) did not realise (or appreciate) the importance of Allah as was required when they said, “Allah has not sent down anything upon any human being”; say, “Who has sent down the Book which Moosa brought, a light and guidance for mankind, which you have divided into different papers, some which you show and hide most of them?
draft: They did not glorify Allah as He deserves when they said, "Allah has not sent down anything to any human being." Say, "Who then sent down the scripture that came to Moses as a light and guidance for the people?"
hil: Say: "They did not glorify Allah as He deserves when they said, 'Allah has not sent down anything to any human being.' Say, 'Who then sent down the scripture that came to Moses as a light and guidance for the people?'"
compare: Say: "They did not glorify Allah as He deserves when they said, 'Allah has not sent down anything to any human being.' Say, 'Who then sent down the scripture that came to Moses as a light and guidance for the people?'"

src: Dann bringe uns, was du uns androhst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: Then bring upon us what you predict for us, if you are a man of truth."
draft: "Then bring us what you threatened us with, if you are one of the truthful."
hil: Then bring us what you threaten us with, if you are one of the truthful.
compare: "Then bring us what you threatened us with, if you are one of the truthful."

src: Die Zahl der Monate bei Gott ist zwölf Monate, im Buch Gottes festgestellt am Tag, da Er die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat. Vier davon sind heilig. Das ist die richtige Religion. So tut euch selbst in ihnen kein Unrecht. Und kämpft gegen die Polytheisten allesamt, wie sie gegen euch allesamt kämpfen. Und wißt, Gott ist mit den Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: Indeed the number of months before Allah is twelve – in the Book of Allah – since the day He created the heavens and the earth, of which four are sacred; this the straight religion; so do not wrong yourselves in those months; and constantly fight against the polytheists as they constantly fight against you; and know well that Allah is with the pious.
draft: The number of months with God is twelve months, as recorded in God's book on the day when He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. That is the right religion. So do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the polytheists all together as they fight against you all together. And know that God is with the righteous.
hil: The number of months with God is twelve months, as recorded in God's book on the day when He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. That is the right religion. So do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the polytheists all together as they fight against you all together. And know that God is with the righteous.
compare: The number of months with God is twelve months, as recorded in God's book on the day when He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. That is the right religion. So do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the polytheists all together as they fight against you all together. And know that God is with the righteous.

src: Doch ihr seid keineswegs dessen Aufbewahrer.
ref: It is not ye who are the holders of the store thereof.
draft: But you are by no means its keepers.
hil: But by no means are you its keepers.
compare: But by no means are you its keepers.

src: Darin liegen Zeichen für die Leute, die Verstand haben.
ref: Verily there are signs in this for men of understanding.
draft: Therein lie signs for people who have understanding.
hil: Therein lie signs for people who have understanding.
compare: Therein lie signs for people who have understanding.

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich All verzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: But God is forbearing and forgiving.
draft: And Allah is truly All-forgiving and All-merciful.
hil: And Allah is truly All-forgiving and All-merciful.
compare: And Allah is truly All-forgiving and All-merciful.

src: Und niemand kann Uns voraus sein.
ref: And we are not to be outrun.
draft: And no one can be ahead of Us.
hil: And no one can be ahead of Us.
compare: And no one can be ahead of Us.

src: Und ALLAH hat euch erschaffen, dann läßt ER euch sterben. Und manch einer von euch wird in das faselnde Alter zurückgesetzt, damit er nichts mehr weiß, nachdem er über Wissen verfügte.
ref: It is God who creates you, then makes you die; and some reach the age of dotage when they forget what they had known before.
draft: And ALLAH has created you, then HE lets you die. And some of you will be reset to the babbling age, so that he no longer knows anything, after having knowledge.
hil: Allah created you, then He causes you to die. And some of you are returned to senility, though knowing nothing after having had knowledge.
compare: And ALLAH has created you, then HE lets you die. And some of you will be reset to the babbling age, so that he no longer knows anything, after having knowledge.

src: Und erfüllt die (eingegangene) Verpflichtung. Gewiß, nach der (Erfüllung der) Verpflichtung wird gefragt werden.
ref: And fulfil the covenant; surely the covenant shall be questioned of.
draft: And fulfills the (incurred) obligation. Certainly, there will be a question about (the fulfillment of) the obligation.
hil: Fulfill the obligation entered into. Certainly, there will be a question after the fulfillment of the obligation.
compare: And fulfills the (incurred) obligation. Certainly, there will be a question about (the fulfillment of) the obligation.

src: Und nehmt Zeugen, wenn ihr miteinander Handel treibt. Und weder dem Schreiber noch dem Zeugen soll Schaden zugefügt werden.
ref: Have witnesses to the deal, (and make sure) that the scribe or the witness is not harmed.
draft: And take witnesses when you transact with one another. And neither the scribe nor the witness shall be harmed.
hil: And take witnesses when transacting with one another. And neither the scribe nor the witness shall be harmed.
compare: And take witnesses when you transact with one another. And neither the scribe nor the witness shall be harmed.

src: Dies sind wahrlich die Worte eines edlen Gesandten,
ref: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,
draft: These are truly the words of a noble messenger.
hil: These are indeed the words of a noble messenger.
compare: These are indeed the words of a noble messenger.

src: Haben sie denn nicht auf das geschaut, was vom Himmel und von der Erde vor ihnen und was hinter ihnen ist?
ref: Do they not see what is before them and what is behind them of the heavens and the earth?
draft: Have they not looked at what is in front of them, what is in the heavens and on the earth, and what is behind them?
hil: Do they not behold what is before them and what is behind them of the heavens and the earth? If We will, We can sink the earth with them or cause a fragment of the heaven to fall upon them.
compare: Have they not looked at what is in front of them, what is in the heavens and on the earth, and what is behind them?

src: Als die Munafiq zu dir kamen, sagten sie: "Wir bezeugen, daß du doch ALLAHs Gesandter bist." Und ALLAH weiß, daß du doch Sein Gesandter bist. Und ALLAH bezeugt: "Gewiß, die Munafiq sind doch Lügner."
ref: When the hypocrites come in your presence (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) they say, “We testify that you surely are Allah’s Noble Messenger”; and Allah knows that you indeed are His Noble Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are indeed liars.
draft: When the hypocrites come to you, they say, "We testify that you are indeed Allah's Messenger." And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, but Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars.
hil: When the hypocrites came to you, they said, "We testify that you are indeed Allah's Messenger." And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, while Allah testifies: 'Certainly, the hypocrites are indeed liars.'
compare: When the hypocrites come to you, they say, "We testify that you are indeed Allah's Messenger." And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, but Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars.

src: Bestimme für mich eine Aya!"
ref: Make a sign for me."
draft: "Determine a verse for me!"
hil: He said, 'Determine a verse for me!'.
compare: "Determine a verse for me!"

src: Darin werden sie auf immer ewig weilen; und sie werden weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: They will live in it for ever, and will find no saviour or helper.
draft: "They will dwell there forever and ever; and they will find neither friend nor helper."
hil: They will abide therein forever and ever, and they will neither find a friend nor a helper.
compare: "They will dwell there forever and ever; and they will find neither friend nor helper."

src: Und die spenden, was sie spenden, während ihre Herzen sich (davor) ängstigen, daß sie zu ihrem Herrn zurückkehren werden,
ref: Who give whatsoever they give (in His way), and their hearts tremble with fear that they have to go back to their Lord,
draft: And they donate whatever they donate while their hearts are anxious about their return to their Lord.
hil: And they give whatever they give, while their hearts are anxious about their return to their Lord.
compare: And they donate whatever they donate while their hearts are anxious about their return to their Lord.

src: Und sie haben Allah andere als Seinesgleichen zur Seite gestellt, um (die Menschen) von Seinem Weg abirren zu lassen.
ref: They have appointed equals of God to mislead people from His path. Tell them: "Enjoy yourselves (so long as you may).
draft: And they have associated other deities with Allah to mislead (people) from His path.
hil: And they have associated other deities with Allah to mislead (people) from His path.
compare: And they have associated other deities with Allah to mislead (people) from His path.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist al-Masih, der Sohn Maryams", wo doch al-Masih (selbst) gesagt hat: "O Kinder Isra'ils, dient Allah, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn!"
ref: They are surely infidels who say: "God is the Christ, son of Mary." But the Christ had only said: "O children of Israel, worship God who is my Lord and your Lord."
draft: Truly, those who say "Indeed, Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary" are unbelievers, for the Messiah himself has said: "O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord."
hil: Truly, those who say 'Indeed, Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary' are unbelievers, for the Messiah himself has said: 'O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord.'
compare: Truly, those who say "Indeed, Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary" are unbelievers, for the Messiah himself has said: "O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord."

src: Und wenn WIR wollten, hätten WIR sie mit ihresgleichen eingetauscht.
ref: And whenever We list, We can replace them with others like Unto them.
draft: And if we wanted to, we could have exchanged them for their own kind.
hil: If We wanted, We could have exchanged them for their own kind.
compare: And if we wanted to, we could have exchanged them for their own kind.

src: Wir begreifen nicht viel von dem, was du sagst - außerdem gewiß sehen wir, daß du doch unter uns ein Schwacher bist.
ref: We do not understand much of what you say, and we see you a weak (man, it is said that he was a blind man) among us.
draft: We do not understand much of what you say - moreover, we certainly see that you are a weakling among us.
hil: We do not understand much of what you say - moreover, we certainly see that you are a weakling among us.
compare: We do not understand much of what you say - moreover, we certainly see that you are a weakling among us.

src: Könnt niemanden gegen Ihn verführen,
ref: Can mislead anyone away from Him,
draft: "Can't seduce anyone against him"
hil: You cannot seduce anyone against Him.
compare: You cannot seduce anyone against Him.

src: Bestimmt ist für sie bei ihrem Herrn die Wohnstätte des Friedens. Er ist ihr Freund wegen dessen, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: For them is the abode of peace with their Lord and He is their Master – the result of their deeds.
draft: Surely, for them with their Lord is the home of peace. He is their ally because of what they used to do.
hil: Surely, for them with their Lord is the home of peace. He is their ally because of what they used to do.
compare: Surely, for them with their Lord is the home of peace. He is their ally because of what they used to do.

src: Und wer dem Gesandten widerspricht - nachdem ihm die Rechtleitung deutlich wurde, und einem anderen als dem Weg der Mumin folgt, den werden WIR das verantworten lassen, wofür er verantwortlich war, und dann werden WIR ihn in Dschahannam hineinwerfen lassen. Und erbärmlich ist dieses Werden.
ref: And he who opposes the Prophet even after the way has become clear to him, and follows a path other than the way of believers, We shall lead him to what he has chosen for himself, and shall take him to Hell: How evil a journey's end.
draft: And whoever contradicts the messenger - after the guidance has been made clear to him and follows other than the way of the believers - We will leave him in what he has taken and drive him into Hell, and what an evil destination.
hil: And whoever contradicts the Messenger - after the guidance has become clear to him, and follows a path other than that of the believers - We will hold him accountable for what he was responsible for, and then We will hurl him into Jahannam. And what an evil destination.
compare: And whoever contradicts the Messenger - after the guidance has become clear to him, and follows a path other than that of the believers - We will hold him accountable for what he was responsible for, and then We will hurl him into Jahannam. And what an evil destination.

src: Als dein Herr Mose rief: «Geh zum Volk, das Unrecht tut,
ref: When your Lord called upon Moses: "Go to the wicked people,
draft: When your Lord called Moses, "Go to the people who do wrong,
hil: When your Lord called Moses, "Go to the people who do wrong,
compare: When your Lord called Moses, "Go to the people who do wrong,

src: Dennoch gibt es unter euch welche, die nur auf sie hören. Und Gott weiß über die Bescheid, die Unrecht tun.
ref: They have some spies among you, and Allah knows best the wrongdoers.
draft: Nevertheless, there are some among you who only listen to them, and God knows about those who do wrong.
hil: Still, there are some among you who only listen to them, and God knows about those who do wrong.
compare: Nevertheless, there are some among you who only listen to them, and God knows about those who do wrong.

src: Und damit Staub aufwirbeln,
ref: Raising clouds of dust,
draft: And raise dust.
hil: And thus raise dust.
compare: And raise dust.

src: Und nehmt zwei gerechte Leute von euch zu Zeugen, und erhaltet das Zeugnis Gottes aufrecht.
ref: And call in to witness two men of equity from among yourselves; and perform the witnessing to God Himself.
draft: And take two just people from among yourselves as witnesses and keep the testimony of God upright.
hil: And take two just people from among yourselves as witnesses, and keep the testimony of God upright.
compare: And take two just people from among yourselves as witnesses and keep the testimony of God upright.
